      <tr>
        <td id="L111" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="111"></td>
        <td id="LC111" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">I. The Period</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L112" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="112"></td>
        <td id="LC112" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L113" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="113"></td>
        <td id="LC113" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L114" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="114"></td>
        <td id="LC114" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">It was the best of times,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L115" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="115"></td>
        <td id="LC115" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">it was the worst of times,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L116" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="116"></td>
        <td id="LC116" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">it was the age of wisdom,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L117" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="117"></td>
        <td id="LC117" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">it was the age of foolishness,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L118" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="118"></td>
        <td id="LC118" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">it was the epoch of belief,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L119" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="119"></td>
        <td id="LC119" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">it was the epoch of incredulity,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L120" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="120"></td>
        <td id="LC120" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">it was the season of Light,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L121" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="121"></td>
        <td id="LC121" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">it was the season of Darkness,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L122" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="122"></td>
        <td id="LC122" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">it was the spring of hope,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L123" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="123"></td>
        <td id="LC123" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">it was the winter of despair,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L124" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="124"></td>
        <td id="LC124" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">we had everything before us,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L125" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="125"></td>
        <td id="LC125" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">we had nothing before us,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L126" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="126"></td>
        <td id="LC126" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">we were all going direct to Heaven,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L127" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="127"></td>
        <td id="LC127" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">we were all going direct the other way--</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L128" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="128"></td>
        <td id="LC128" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">in short, the period was so far like the present period, that some of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L129" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="129"></td>
        <td id="LC129" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">its noisiest authorities insisted on its being received, for good or for</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L130" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="130"></td>
        <td id="LC130" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">evil, in the superlative degree of comparison only.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L131" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="131"></td>
        <td id="LC131" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L132" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="132"></td>
        <td id="LC132" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">There were a king with a large jaw and a queen with a plain face, on the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L133" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="133"></td>
        <td id="LC133" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">throne of England; there were a king with a large jaw and a queen with</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L134" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="134"></td>
        <td id="LC134" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">a fair face, on the throne of France. In both countries it was clearer</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L135" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="135"></td>
        <td id="LC135" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">than crystal to the lords of the State preserves of loaves and fishes,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L136" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="136"></td>
        <td id="LC136" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">that things in general were settled for ever.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L137" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="137"></td>
        <td id="LC137" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L138" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="138"></td>
        <td id="LC138" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">It was the year of Our Lord one thousand seven hundred and seventy-five.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L139" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="139"></td>
        <td id="LC139" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Spiritual revelations were conceded to England at that favoured period,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L140" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="140"></td>
        <td id="LC140" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">as at this. Mrs. Southcott had recently attained her five-and-twentieth</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L141" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="141"></td>
        <td id="LC141" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">blessed birthday, of whom a prophetic private in the Life Guards had</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L142" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="142"></td>
        <td id="LC142" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">heralded the sublime appearance by announcing that arrangements were</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L143" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="143"></td>
        <td id="LC143" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">made for the swallowing up of London and Westminster. Even the Cock-lane</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L144" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="144"></td>
        <td id="LC144" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">ghost had been laid only a round dozen of years, after rapping out its</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L145" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="145"></td>
        <td id="LC145" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">messages, as the spirits of this very year last past (supernaturally</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L146" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="146"></td>
        <td id="LC146" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">deficient in originality) rapped out theirs. Mere messages in the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L147" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="147"></td>
        <td id="LC147" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">earthly order of events had lately come to the English Crown and People,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L148" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="148"></td>
        <td id="LC148" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">from a congress of British subjects in America: which, strange</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L149" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="149"></td>
        <td id="LC149" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">to relate, have proved more important to the human race than any</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L150" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="150"></td>
        <td id="LC150" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">communications yet received through any of the chickens of the Cock-lane</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L151" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="151"></td>
        <td id="LC151" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">brood.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L152" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="152"></td>
        <td id="LC152" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L153" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="153"></td>
        <td id="LC153" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">France, less favoured on the whole as to matters spiritual than her</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L154" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="154"></td>
        <td id="LC154" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">sister of the shield and trident, rolled with exceeding smoothness down</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L155" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="155"></td>
        <td id="LC155" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">hill, making paper money and spending it. Under the guidance of her</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L156" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="156"></td>
        <td id="LC156" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Christian pastors, she entertained herself, besides, with such humane</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L157" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="157"></td>
        <td id="LC157" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">achievements as sentencing a youth to have his hands cut off, his tongue</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L158" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="158"></td>
        <td id="LC158" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">torn out with pincers, and his body burned alive, because he had not</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L159" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="159"></td>
        <td id="LC159" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">kneeled down in the rain to do honour to a dirty procession of monks</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L160" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="160"></td>
        <td id="LC160" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">which passed within his view, at a distance of some fifty or sixty</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L161" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="161"></td>
        <td id="LC161" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">yards. It is likely enough that, rooted in the woods of France and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L162" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="162"></td>
        <td id="LC162" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Norway, there were growing trees, when that sufferer was put to death,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L163" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="163"></td>
        <td id="LC163" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">already marked by the Woodman, Fate, to come down and be sawn into</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L164" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="164"></td>
        <td id="LC164" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">boards, to make a certain movable framework with a sack and a knife in</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L165" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="165"></td>
        <td id="LC165" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">it, terrible in history. It is likely enough that in the rough outhouses</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L166" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="166"></td>
        <td id="LC166" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">of some tillers of the heavy lands adjacent to Paris, there were</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L167" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="167"></td>
        <td id="LC167" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">sheltered from the weather that very day, rude carts, bespattered with</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L168" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="168"></td>
        <td id="LC168" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">rustic mire, snuffed about by pigs, and roosted in by poultry, which</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L169" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="169"></td>
        <td id="LC169" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the Farmer, Death, had already set apart to be his tumbrils of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L170" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="170"></td>
        <td id="LC170" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the Revolution. But that Woodman and that Farmer, though they work</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L171" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="171"></td>

        <td id="L172" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="172"></td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L174" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="174"></td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L175" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="175"></td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L217" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="217"></td>
        <td id="LC217" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">II. The Mail</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L218" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="218"></td>
        <td id="LC218" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L219" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="219"></td>
        <td id="LC219" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L220" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="220"></td>
        <td id="LC220" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">It was the Dover road that lay, on a Friday night late in November,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L221" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="221"></td>
        <td id="LC221" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">before the first of the persons with whom this history has business.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L222" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="222"></td>
        <td id="LC222" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">The Dover road lay, as to him, beyond the Dover mail, as it lumbered up</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L223" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="223"></td>
        <td id="LC223" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Shooter&#39;s Hill. He walked up hill in the mire by the side of the mail,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L224" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="224"></td>

      </tr>

        <td id="L225" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="225"></td>
        <td id="LC225" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">for walking exercise, under the circumstances, but because the hill,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L226" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="226"></td>
        <td id="LC226" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and the harness, and the mud, and the mail, were all so heavy, that the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>

        <td id="LC227" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">horses had three times already come to a stop, besides once drawing the</td>

        <td id="L228" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="228"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L229" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="229"></td>

      </tr>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L231" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="231"></td>
        <td id="LC231" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">otherwise strongly in favour of the argument, that some brute animals</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L232" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="232"></td>

        <td id="L234" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="234"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L235" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="235"></td>

      </tr>

        <td id="L237" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="237"></td>

      <tr>

        <td id="L241" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="241"></td>

      </tr>

        <td id="L242" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="242"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L243" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="243"></td>
        <td id="LC243" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L244" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="244"></td>
        <td id="LC244" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">There was a steaming mist in all the hollows, and it had roamed in its</td>

        <td id="L245" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="245"></td>

      <tr>

      </tr>
      <tr>

        <td id="LC247" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">air in ripples that visibly followed and overspread one another, as the</td>
      </tr>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L249" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="249"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L250" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="250"></td>
        <td id="LC250" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and a few yards of road; and the reek of the labouring horses steamed</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L251" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="251"></td>
        <td id="LC251" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">into it, as if they had made it all.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L252" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="252"></td>
        <td id="LC252" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L253" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="253"></td>
        <td id="LC253" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Two other passengers, besides the one, were plodding up the hill by the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L254" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="254"></td>
        <td id="LC254" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">side of the mail. All three were wrapped to the cheekbones and over the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L255" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="255"></td>
        <td id="LC255" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">ears, and wore jack-boots. Not one of the three could have said, from</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L256" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="256"></td>
        <td id="LC256" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">anything he saw, what either of the other two was like; and each was</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L257" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="257"></td>
        <td id="LC257" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">hidden under almost as many wrappers from the eyes of the mind, as from</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L258" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="258"></td>
        <td id="LC258" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the eyes of the body, of his two companions. In those days, travellers</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L259" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="259"></td>
        <td id="LC259" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">were very shy of being confidential on a short notice, for anybody on</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L260" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="260"></td>
        <td id="LC260" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the road might be a robber or in league with robbers. As to the latter,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L261" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="261"></td>
        <td id="LC261" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">when every posting-house and ale-house could produce somebody in</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L262" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="262"></td>
        <td id="LC262" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“the Captain&#39;s” pay, ranging from the landlord to the lowest stable</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L263" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="263"></td>
        <td id="LC263" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">non-descript, it was the likeliest thing upon the cards. So the guard</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L264" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="264"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L459" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="459"></td>
        <td id="LC459" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">hill.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L460" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="460"></td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L461" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="461"></td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L471" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="471"></td>
        <td id="LC471" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">III. The Night Shadows</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L472" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="472"></td>
        <td id="LC472" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L473" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="473"></td>
        <td id="LC473" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L474" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="474"></td>
        <td id="LC474" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">A wonderful fact to reflect upon, that every human creature is</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L475" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="475"></td>
        <td id="LC475" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">constituted to be that profound secret and mystery to every other. A</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L476" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="476"></td>
        <td id="LC476" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">solemn consideration, when I enter a great city by night, that every</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L477" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="477"></td>
        <td id="LC477" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">one of those darkly clustered houses encloses its own secret; that every</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L478" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="478"></td>
        <td id="LC478" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">room in every one of them encloses its own secret; that every beating</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L479" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="479"></td>
        <td id="LC479" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">heart in the hundreds of thousands of breasts there, is, in some of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L480" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="480"></td>
        <td id="LC480" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">its imaginings, a secret to the heart nearest it! Something of the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L481" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="481"></td>
        <td id="LC481" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">awfulness, even of Death itself, is referable to this. No more can I</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L482" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="482"></td>
        <td id="LC482" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">turn the leaves of this dear book that I loved, and vainly hope in time</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L483" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="483"></td>
        <td id="LC483" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">to read it all. No more can I look into the depths of this unfathomable</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L484" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="484"></td>
        <td id="LC484" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">water, wherein, as momentary lights glanced into it, I have had glimpses</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L485" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="485"></td>
        <td id="LC485" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">of buried treasure and other things submerged. It was appointed that the</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L486" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="486"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L487" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="487"></td>
        <td id="LC487" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">but a page. It was appointed that the water should be locked in an</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L488" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="488"></td>
        <td id="LC488" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">eternal frost, when the light was playing on its surface, and I stood</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L489" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="489"></td>
        <td id="LC489" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">in ignorance on the shore. My friend is dead, my neighbour is dead,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L490" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="490"></td>

        <td id="LC491" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">consolidation and perpetuation of the secret that was always in that</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L494" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="494"></td>

        <td id="L505" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="505"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L553" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="553"></td>
        <td id="LC553" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the strong-rooms underground, at Tellson&#39;s, with such of their valuable</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L554" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="554"></td>
        <td id="LC554" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">stores and secrets as were known to the passenger (and it was not a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L555" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="555"></td>
        <td id="LC555" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">little that he knew about them), opened before him, and he went in among</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L556" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="556"></td>
        <td id="LC556" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">them with the great keys and the feebly-burning candle, and found them</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L557" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="557"></td>
        <td id="LC557" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">safe, and strong, and sound, and still, just as he had last seen them.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L558" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="558"></td>
        <td id="LC558" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L559" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="559"></td>
        <td id="LC559" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">But, though the bank was almost always with him, and though the coach</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L560" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="560"></td>
        <td id="LC560" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">(in a confused way, like the presence of pain under an opiate) was</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L561" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="561"></td>
        <td id="LC561" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">always with him, there was another current of impression that never</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L562" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="562"></td>
        <td id="LC562" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">ceased to run, all through the night. He was on his way to dig some one</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L563" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="563"></td>
        <td id="LC563" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">out of a grave.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L564" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="564"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L565" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="565"></td>
        <td id="LC565" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Now, which of the multitude of faces that showed themselves before him</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L566" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="566"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L567" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="567"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L568" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="568"></td>
        <td id="LC568" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">years, and they differed principally in the passions they expressed,</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L569" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="569"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L570" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="570"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L571" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="571"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L572" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="572"></td>

      </tr>

      </tr>

      <tr>
        <td id="L600" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="600"></td>
        <td id="LC600" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">After such imaginary discourse, the passenger in his fancy would dig,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L601" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="601"></td>
        <td id="LC601" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and dig, dig--now with a spade, now with a great key, now with his</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L602" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="602"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L603" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="603"></td>
        <td id="LC603" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">hanging about his face and hair, he would suddenly fan away to dust. The</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L604" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="604"></td>
        <td id="LC604" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">passenger would then start to himself, and lower the window, to get the</td>
      </tr>

      </tr>

      </tr>

      <tr>
        <td id="L640" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="640"></td>
        <td id="LC640" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">passenger started to the consciousness of daylight, and found that the</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L641" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="641"></td>
        <td id="LC641" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">shadows of the night were gone.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L642" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="642"></td>
        <td id="LC642" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L643" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="643"></td>
        <td id="LC643" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">He lowered the window, and looked out at the rising sun. There was a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L644" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="644"></td>
        <td id="LC644" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">ridge of ploughed land, with a plough upon it where it had been left</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L645" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="645"></td>
        <td id="LC645" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">last night when the horses were unyoked; beyond, a quiet coppice-wood,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L646" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="646"></td>
        <td id="LC646" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">in which many leaves of burning red and golden yellow still remained</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L647" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="647"></td>
        <td id="LC647" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">upon the trees. Though the earth was cold and wet, the sky was clear,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L648" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="648"></td>
        <td id="LC648" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and the sun rose bright, placid, and beautiful.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L649" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="649"></td>
        <td id="LC649" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L650" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="650"></td>
        <td id="LC650" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Eighteen years!” said the passenger, looking at the sun. “Gracious</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L651" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="651"></td>
        <td id="LC651" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Creator of day! To be buried alive for eighteen years!”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L652" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="652"></td>
        <td id="LC652" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L653" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="653"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L654" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="654"></td>
        <td id="LC654" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L655" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="655"></td>
        <td id="LC655" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L656" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="656"></td>
        <td id="LC656" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">IV. The Preparation</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L657" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="657"></td>
        <td id="LC657" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L658" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="658"></td>
        <td id="LC658" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L659" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="659"></td>
        <td id="LC659" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">When the mail got successfully to Dover, in the course of the forenoon,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L660" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="660"></td>
        <td id="LC660" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the head drawer at the Royal George Hotel opened the coach-door as his</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L661" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="661"></td>
        <td id="LC661" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">custom was. He did it with some flourish of ceremony, for a mail journey</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L662" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="662"></td>
        <td id="LC662" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">from London in winter was an achievement to congratulate an adventurous</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L663" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="663"></td>
        <td id="LC663" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">traveller upon.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L664" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="664"></td>
        <td id="LC664" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L665" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="665"></td>
        <td id="LC665" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">By that time, there was only one adventurous traveller left be</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L666" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="666"></td>
        <td id="LC666" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">congratulated: for the two others had been set down at their respective</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L667" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="667"></td>
        <td id="LC667" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">roadside destinations. The mildewy inside of the coach, with its damp</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L668" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="668"></td>
        <td id="LC668" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and dirty straw, its disagreeable smell, and its obscurity, was rather</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L669" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="669"></td>
        <td id="LC669" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">like a larger dog-kennel. Mr. Lorry, the passenger, shaking himself out</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L670" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="670"></td>
        <td id="LC670" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">of it in chains of straw, a tangle of shaggy wrapper, flapping hat, and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L671" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="671"></td>
        <td id="LC671" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">muddy legs, was rather like a larger sort of dog.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L672" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="672"></td>
        <td id="LC672" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L673" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="673"></td>
        <td id="LC673" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“There will be a packet to Calais, tomorrow, drawer?”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L674" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="674"></td>
        <td id="LC674" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L675" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="675"></td>
        <td id="LC675" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Yes, sir, if the weather holds and the wind sets tolerable fair. The</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L676" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="676"></td>
        <td id="LC676" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">tide will serve pretty nicely at about two in the afternoon, sir. Bed,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L677" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="677"></td>
        <td id="LC677" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">sir?”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L678" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="678"></td>
        <td id="LC678" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L679" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="679"></td>
        <td id="LC679" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“I shall not go to bed till night; but I want a bedroom, and a barber.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L680" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="680"></td>
        <td id="LC680" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L681" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="681"></td>
        <td id="LC681" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“And then breakfast, sir? Yes, sir. That way, sir, if you please.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L682" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="682"></td>
        <td id="LC682" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Show Concord! Gentleman&#39;s valise and hot water to Concord. Pull off</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L683" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="683"></td>
        <td id="LC683" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">gentleman&#39;s boots in Concord. (You will find a fine sea-coal fire, sir.)</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L684" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="684"></td>
        <td id="LC684" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Fetch barber to Concord. Stir about there, now, for Concord!”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L685" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="685"></td>
        <td id="LC685" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L686" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="686"></td>
        <td id="LC686" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">The Concord bed-chamber being always assigned to a passenger by the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L687" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="687"></td>
        <td id="LC687" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">mail, and passengers by the mail being always heavily wrapped up from</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L688" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="688"></td>
        <td id="LC688" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">head to foot, the room had the odd interest for the establishment of the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L689" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="689"></td>
        <td id="LC689" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Royal George, that although but one kind of man was seen to go into it,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L690" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="690"></td>
        <td id="LC690" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">all kinds and varieties of men came out of it. Consequently, another</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L691" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="691"></td>
        <td id="LC691" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">drawer, and two porters, and several maids and the landlady, were all</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L692" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="692"></td>
        <td id="LC692" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">loitering by accident at various points of the road between the Concord</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L693" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="693"></td>
        <td id="LC693" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and the coffee-room, when a gentleman of sixty, formally dressed in a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L694" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="694"></td>
        <td id="LC694" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">brown suit of clothes, pretty well worn, but very well kept, with large</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L695" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="695"></td>
        <td id="LC695" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">square cuffs and large flaps to the pockets, passed along on his way to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L696" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="696"></td>
        <td id="LC696" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">his breakfast.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L697" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="697"></td>
        <td id="LC697" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L698" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="698"></td>
        <td id="LC698" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">The coffee-room had no other occupant, that forenoon, than the gentleman</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L699" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="699"></td>
        <td id="LC699" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">in brown. His breakfast-table was drawn before the fire, and as he sat,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L700" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="700"></td>
        <td id="LC700" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">with its light shining on him, waiting for the meal, he sat so still,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L701" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="701"></td>
        <td id="LC701" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">that he might have been sitting for his portrait.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L702" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="702"></td>
        <td id="LC702" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L703" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="703"></td>
        <td id="LC703" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Very orderly and methodical he looked, with a hand on each knee, and a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L704" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="704"></td>
        <td id="LC704" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">loud watch ticking a sonorous sermon under his flapped waist-coat,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L705" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="705"></td>
        <td id="LC705" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">as though it pitted its gravity and longevity against the levity and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L706" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="706"></td>
        <td id="LC706" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">evanescence of the brisk fire. He had a good leg, and was a little vain</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L707" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="707"></td>
        <td id="LC707" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">of it, for his brown stockings fitted sleek and close, and were of a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L708" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="708"></td>
        <td id="LC708" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">fine texture; his shoes and buckles, too, though plain, were trim. He</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L709" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="709"></td>
        <td id="LC709" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">wore an odd little sleek crisp flaxen wig, setting very close to his</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L710" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="710"></td>
        <td id="LC710" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">head: which wig, it is to be presumed, was made of hair, but which</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L711" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="711"></td>
        <td id="LC711" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">looked far more as though it were spun from filaments of silk or glass.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L712" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="712"></td>
        <td id="LC712" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">His linen, though not of a fineness in accordance with his stockings,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L713" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="713"></td>
        <td id="LC713" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">was as white as the tops of the waves that broke upon the neighbouring</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L714" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="714"></td>
        <td id="LC714" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">beach, or the specks of sail that glinted in the sunlight far at sea. A</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L715" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="715"></td>
        <td id="LC715" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">face habitually suppressed and quieted, was still lighted up under the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L716" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="716"></td>
        <td id="LC716" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">quaint wig by a pair of moist bright eyes that it must have cost</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L717" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="717"></td>
        <td id="LC717" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">their owner, in years gone by, some pains to drill to the composed and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L718" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="718"></td>
        <td id="LC718" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">reserved expression of Tellson&#39;s Bank. He had a healthy colour in his</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L719" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="719"></td>
        <td id="LC719" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">cheeks, and his face, though lined, bore few traces of anxiety.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L720" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="720"></td>
        <td id="LC720" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">But, perhaps the confidential bachelor clerks in Tellson&#39;s Bank were</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L721" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="721"></td>
        <td id="LC721" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">principally occupied with the cares of other people; and perhaps</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L722" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="722"></td>
        <td id="LC722" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">second-hand cares, like second-hand clothes, come easily off and on.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L723" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="723"></td>
        <td id="LC723" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L724" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="724"></td>
        <td id="LC724" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Completing his resemblance to a man who was sitting for his portrait,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L725" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="725"></td>
        <td id="LC725" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Mr. Lorry dropped off to sleep. The arrival of his breakfast roused him,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L726" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="726"></td>
        <td id="LC726" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and he said to the drawer, as he moved his chair to it:</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L727" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="727"></td>
        <td id="LC727" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L728" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="728"></td>
        <td id="LC728" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“I wish accommodation prepared for a young lady who may come here at any</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L729" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="729"></td>
        <td id="LC729" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">time to-day. She may ask for Mr. Jarvis Lorry, or she may only ask for a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>

        <td id="LC730" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">gentleman from Tellson&#39;s Bank. Please to let me know.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L731" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="731"></td>
        <td id="LC731" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L732" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="732"></td>
        <td id="LC732" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Yes, sir. Tellson&#39;s Bank in London, sir?”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L733" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="733"></td>
        <td id="LC733" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L734" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="734"></td>
        <td id="LC734" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Yes.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L735" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="735"></td>
        <td id="LC735" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L736" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="736"></td>
        <td id="LC736" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Yes, sir. We have oftentimes the honour to entertain your gentlemen in</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L737" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="737"></td>
        <td id="LC737" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">their travelling backwards and forwards betwixt London and Paris, sir. A</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L738" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="738"></td>
        <td id="LC738" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">vast deal of travelling, sir, in Tellson and Company&#39;s House.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L739" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="739"></td>
        <td id="LC739" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L740" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="740"></td>
        <td id="LC740" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Yes. We are quite a French House, as well as an English one.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L741" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="741"></td>
        <td id="LC741" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L742" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="742"></td>
        <td id="LC742" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Yes, sir. Not much in the habit of such travelling yourself, I think,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L743" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="743"></td>
        <td id="LC743" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">sir?”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L744" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="744"></td>
        <td id="LC744" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L745" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="745"></td>
        <td id="LC745" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Not of late years. It is fifteen years since we--since I--came last</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L746" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="746"></td>

        <td id="L841" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="841"></td>
        <td id="LC841" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Pray take a seat, sir.” In a very clear and pleasant young voice; a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L842" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="842"></td>
        <td id="LC842" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">little foreign in its accent, but a very little indeed.</td>

      <tr>

      <tr>
        <td id="L844" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="844"></td>

        <td id="LC922" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">He seemed wilfully to mistake the word she had repeated, when he added,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L923" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="923"></td>

        <td id="L928" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="928"></td>

        <td id="LC929" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Why, yes, of Beauvais. Like Monsieur Manette, your father, the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L930" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="930"></td>
        <td id="LC930" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">gentleman was of Beauvais. Like Monsieur Manette, your father, the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L931" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="931"></td>
        <td id="LC931" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">gentleman was of repute in Paris. I had the honour of knowing him there.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L932" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="932"></td>
        <td id="LC932" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Our relations were business relations, but confidential. I was at that</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L933" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="933"></td>
        <td id="LC933" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">time in our French House, and had been--oh! twenty years.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L934" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="934"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L935" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="935"></td>
        <td id="LC935" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“At that time--I may ask, at what time, sir?”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L936" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="936"></td>
        <td id="LC936" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L937" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="937"></td>
        <td id="LC937" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“I speak, miss, of twenty years ago. He married--an English lady--and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L938" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="938"></td>

        <td id="L1213" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1213"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1214" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1214"></td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L1304" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1304"></td>
        <td id="LC1304" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">there.” With that advice, he wiped his soiled hand upon the joker&#39;s</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1305" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1305"></td>
        <td id="LC1305" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">dress, such as it was--quite deliberately, as having dirtied the hand on</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1306" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1306"></td>
        <td id="LC1306" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">his account; and then recrossed the road and entered the wine-shop.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1307" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1307"></td>
        <td id="LC1307" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1308" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1308"></td>
        <td id="LC1308" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">This wine-shop keeper was a bull-necked, martial-looking man of thirty,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1309" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1309"></td>
        <td id="LC1309" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and he should have been of a hot temperament, for, although it was a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1310" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1310"></td>
        <td id="LC1310" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">bitter day, he wore no coat, but carried one slung over his shoulder.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1311" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1311"></td>
        <td id="LC1311" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">His shirt-sleeves were rolled up, too, and his brown arms were bare to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1312" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1312"></td>
        <td id="LC1312" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the elbows. Neither did he wear anything more on his head than his own</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1313" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1313"></td>
        <td id="LC1313" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">crisply-curling short dark hair. He was a dark man altogether, with good</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1314" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1314"></td>
        <td id="LC1314" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">eyes and a good bold breadth between them. Good-humoured looking on</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1315" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1315"></td>
        <td id="LC1315" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the whole, but implacable-looking, too; evidently a man of a strong</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1316" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1316"></td>
        <td id="LC1316" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">resolution and a set purpose; a man not desirable to be met, rushing</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1317" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1317"></td>
        <td id="LC1317" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">down a narrow pass with a gulf on either side, for nothing would turn</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1318" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1318"></td>
        <td id="LC1318" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the man.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1319" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1319"></td>
        <td id="LC1319" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1320" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1320"></td>
        <td id="LC1320" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Madame Defarge, his wife, sat in the shop behind the counter as he</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1321" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1321"></td>
        <td id="LC1321" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">came in. Madame Defarge was a stout woman of about his own age, with</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1322" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1322"></td>
        <td id="LC1322" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">a watchful eye that seldom seemed to look at anything, a large hand</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1323" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1323"></td>
        <td id="LC1323" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">heavily ringed, a steady face, strong features, and great composure of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1324" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1324"></td>
        <td id="LC1324" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">manner. There was a character about Madame Defarge, from which one might</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1325" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1325"></td>
        <td id="LC1325" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">have predicated that she did not often make mistakes against herself</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1326" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1326"></td>
        <td id="LC1326" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">in any of the reckonings over which she presided. Madame Defarge being</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1327" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1327"></td>
        <td id="LC1327" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">sensitive to cold, was wrapped in fur, and had a quantity of bright</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1328" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1328"></td>
        <td id="LC1328" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">shawl twined about her head, though not to the concealment of her large</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1329" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1329"></td>
        <td id="LC1329" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">earrings. Her knitting was before her, but she had laid it down to pick</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1330" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1330"></td>
        <td id="LC1330" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">her teeth with a toothpick. Thus engaged, with her right elbow supported</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1331" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1331"></td>
        <td id="LC1331" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">by her left hand, Madame Defarge said nothing when her lord came in, but</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1332" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1332"></td>
        <td id="LC1332" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">coughed just one grain of cough. This, in combination with the lifting</td>

        <td id="LC1333" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">of her darkly defined eyebrows over her toothpick by the breadth of a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1334" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1334"></td>
        <td id="LC1334" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">line, suggested to her husband that he would do well to look round the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1335" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1335"></td>
        <td id="LC1335" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">shop among the customers, for any new customer who had dropped in while</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L1336" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1336"></td>
        <td id="LC1336" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">he stepped over the way.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1337" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1337"></td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L1338" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1338"></td>
        <td id="LC1338" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">The wine-shop keeper accordingly rolled his eyes about, until they</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1339" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1339"></td>
        <td id="LC1339" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">rested upon an elderly gentleman and a young lady, who were seated in</td>
      </tr>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1344" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1344"></td>

        <td id="L1345" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1345"></td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L1346" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1346"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1355" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1355"></td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L1356" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1356"></td>
        <td id="LC1356" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">When this interchange of Christian name was effected, Madame Defarge,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1357" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1357"></td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L1359" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1359"></td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L1360" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1360"></td>
        <td id="LC1360" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“It is not often,” said the second of the three, addressing Monsieur</td>

      <tr>

        <td id="LC1364" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“It is so, Jacques,” Monsieur Defarge returned.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1365" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1365"></td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L1372" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1372"></td>

        <td id="L1373" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1373"></td>

      </tr>

        <td id="L1374" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1374"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1378" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1378"></td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L1379" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1379"></td>
        <td id="LC1379" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">This third interchange of the Christian name was completed at the moment</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1380" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1380"></td>

        <td id="L1381" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1381"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1384" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1384"></td>
