      <tr>
        <td id="L1385" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1385"></td>
        <td id="LC1385" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">The three customers pulled off their hats to Madame Defarge, with three</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1386" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1386"></td>
        <td id="LC1386" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">flourishes. She acknowledged their homage by bending her head, and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1387" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1387"></td>
        <td id="LC1387" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">giving them a quick look. Then she glanced in a casual manner round the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1388" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1388"></td>
        <td id="LC1388" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">wine-shop, took up her knitting with great apparent calmness and repose</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1389" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1389"></td>
        <td id="LC1389" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">of spirit, and became absorbed in it.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1390" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1390"></td>
        <td id="LC1390" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1391" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1391"></td>
        <td id="LC1391" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Gentlemen,” said her husband, who had kept his bright eye observantly</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1392" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1392"></td>
        <td id="LC1392" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">upon her, “good day. The chamber, furnished bachelor-fashion, that you</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1393" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1393"></td>
        <td id="LC1393" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">wished to see, and were inquiring for when I stepped out, is on the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1394" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1394"></td>
        <td id="LC1394" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">fifth floor. The doorway of the staircase gives on the little courtyard</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1395" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1395"></td>
        <td id="LC1395" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">close to the left here,” pointing with his hand, “near to the window of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1396" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1396"></td>
        <td id="LC1396" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">my establishment. But, now that I remember, one of you has already been</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1397" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1397"></td>
        <td id="LC1397" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">there, and can show the way. Gentlemen, adieu!”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1398" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1398"></td>
        <td id="LC1398" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1399" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1399"></td>
        <td id="LC1399" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">They paid for their wine, and left the place. The eyes of Monsieur</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1400" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1400"></td>
        <td id="LC1400" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Defarge were studying his wife at her knitting when the elderly</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1401" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1401"></td>
        <td id="LC1401" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">gentleman advanced from his corner, and begged the favour of a word.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1402" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1402"></td>
        <td id="LC1402" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1403" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1403"></td>
        <td id="LC1403" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Willingly, sir,” said Monsieur Defarge, and quietly stepped with him to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1404" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1404"></td>
        <td id="LC1404" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the door.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1405" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1405"></td>
        <td id="LC1405" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1406" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1406"></td>
        <td id="LC1406" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Their conference was very short, but very decided. Almost at the first</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1407" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1407"></td>
        <td id="LC1407" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">word, Monsieur Defarge started and became deeply attentive. It had</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1408" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1408"></td>
        <td id="LC1408" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">not lasted a minute, when he nodded and went out. The gentleman then</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1409" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1409"></td>
        <td id="LC1409" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">beckoned to the young lady, and they, too, went out. Madame Defarge</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1410" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1410"></td>
        <td id="LC1410" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">knitted with nimble fingers and steady eyebrows, and saw nothing.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1411" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1411"></td>
        <td id="LC1411" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1412" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1412"></td>
        <td id="LC1412" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Mr. Jarvis Lorry and Miss Manette, emerging from the wine-shop thus,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1413" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1413"></td>
        <td id="LC1413" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">joined Monsieur Defarge in the doorway to which he had directed his own</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1414" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1414"></td>
        <td id="LC1414" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">company just before. It opened from a stinking little black courtyard,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1415" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1415"></td>
        <td id="LC1415" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and was the general public entrance to a great pile of houses, inhabited</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1416" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1416"></td>
        <td id="LC1416" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">by a great number of people. In the gloomy tile-paved entry to the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1417" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1417"></td>
        <td id="LC1417" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">gloomy tile-paved staircase, Monsieur Defarge bent down on one knee</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1418" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1418"></td>
        <td id="LC1418" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">to the child of his old master, and put her hand to his lips. It was</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1419" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1419"></td>
        <td id="LC1419" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">a gentle action, but not at all gently done; a very remarkable</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1420" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1420"></td>
        <td id="LC1420" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">transformation had come over him in a few seconds. He had no good-humour</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1421" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1421"></td>
        <td id="LC1421" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">in his face, nor any openness of aspect left, but had become a secret,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1422" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1422"></td>
        <td id="LC1422" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">angry, dangerous man.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1423" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1423"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1424" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1424"></td>
        <td id="LC1424" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“It is very high; it is a little difficult. Better to begin slowly.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1425" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1425"></td>

        <td id="L1426" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1426"></td>

        <td id="L1427" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1427"></td>

        <td id="L1428" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1428"></td>
        <td id="LC1428" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Is he alone?” the latter whispered.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1429" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1429"></td>

      <tr>

        <td id="LC1430" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Alone! God help him, who should be with him!” said the other, in the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1431" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1431"></td>
        <td id="LC1431" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">same low voice.</td>

        <td id="L1432" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1432"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1433" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1433"></td>
        <td id="LC1433" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Is he always alone, then?”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1434" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1434"></td>
        <td id="LC1434" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>

      <tr>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1436" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1436"></td>
        <td id="LC1436" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1437" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1437"></td>
        <td id="LC1437" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Of his own desire?”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1438" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1438"></td>
        <td id="LC1438" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>

        <td id="LC1439" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Of his own necessity. As he was, when I first saw him after they</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1440" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1440"></td>
        <td id="LC1440" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">found me and demanded to know if I would take him, and, at my peril be</td>

        <td id="LC1441" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">discreet--as he was then, so he is now.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1442" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1442"></td>
        <td id="LC1442" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1443" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1443"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1444" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1444"></td>

      <tr>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1446" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1446"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1447" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1447"></td>
        <td id="LC1447" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">The keeper of the wine-shop stopped to strike the wall with his hand,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1448" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1448"></td>
        <td id="LC1448" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and mutter a tremendous curse. No direct answer could have been half so</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1449" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1449"></td>
        <td id="LC1449" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">forcible. Mr. Lorry&#39;s spirits grew heavier and heavier, as he and his</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L1450" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1450"></td>
        <td id="LC1450" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">two companions ascended higher and higher.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1451" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1451"></td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L1452" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1452"></td>
        <td id="LC1452" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Such a staircase, with its accessories, in the older and more crowded</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1453" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1453"></td>
        <td id="LC1453" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">parts of Paris, would be bad enough now; but, at that time, it was vile</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1454" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1454"></td>
        <td id="LC1454" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">indeed to unaccustomed and unhardened senses. Every little habitation</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1455" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1455"></td>
        <td id="LC1455" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">within the great foul nest of one high building--that is to say,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1456" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1456"></td>
        <td id="LC1456" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the room or rooms within every door that opened on the general</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1457" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1457"></td>
        <td id="LC1457" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">staircase--left its own heap of refuse on its own landing, besides</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1458" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1458"></td>
        <td id="LC1458" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">flinging other refuse from its own windows. The uncontrollable and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1459" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1459"></td>
        <td id="LC1459" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">hopeless mass of decomposition so engendered, would have polluted</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1460" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1460"></td>
        <td id="LC1460" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the air, even if poverty and deprivation had not loaded it with their</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1461" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1461"></td>
        <td id="LC1461" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">intangible impurities; the two bad sources combined made it almost</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1462" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1462"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1463" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1463"></td>
        <td id="LC1463" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and poison, the way lay. Yielding to his own disturbance of mind, and to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1464" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1464"></td>
        <td id="LC1464" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">his young companion&#39;s agitation, which became greater every instant, Mr.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1465" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1465"></td>
        <td id="LC1465" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Jarvis Lorry twice stopped to rest. Each of these stoppages was made</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1466" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1466"></td>
        <td id="LC1466" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">at a doleful grating, by which any languishing good airs that were left</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1467" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1467"></td>

      </tr>

        <td id="L1468" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1468"></td>
        <td id="LC1468" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">to crawl in. Through the rusted bars, tastes, rather than glimpses, were</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1469" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1469"></td>
        <td id="LC1469" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">caught of the jumbled neighbourhood; and nothing within range, nearer</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1470" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1470"></td>
        <td id="LC1470" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">or lower than the summits of the two great towers of Notre-Dame, had any</td>

        <td id="LC1471" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">promise on it of healthy life or wholesome aspirations.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1472" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1472"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1473" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1473"></td>
        <td id="LC1473" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">At last, the top of the staircase was gained, and they stopped for the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1474" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1474"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1475" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1475"></td>
        <td id="LC1475" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and of contracted dimensions, to be ascended, before the garret story</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1476" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1476"></td>
        <td id="LC1476" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">was reached. The keeper of the wine-shop, always going a little in</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1477" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1477"></td>
        <td id="LC1477" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">advance, and always going on the side which Mr. Lorry took, as though he</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1478" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1478"></td>
        <td id="LC1478" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">dreaded to be asked any question by the young lady, turned himself about</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1479" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1479"></td>
        <td id="LC1479" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">here, and, carefully feeling in the pockets of the coat he carried over</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1480" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1480"></td>
        <td id="LC1480" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">his shoulder, took out a key.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1481" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1481"></td>
        <td id="LC1481" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1482" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1482"></td>
        <td id="LC1482" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“The door is locked then, my friend?” said Mr. Lorry, surprised.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1483" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1483"></td>
        <td id="LC1483" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1484" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1484"></td>
        <td id="LC1484" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Ay. Yes,” was the grim reply of Monsieur Defarge.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1485" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1485"></td>
        <td id="LC1485" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1486" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1486"></td>
        <td id="LC1486" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“You think it necessary to keep the unfortunate gentleman so retired?”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1487" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1487"></td>
        <td id="LC1487" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1488" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1488"></td>
        <td id="LC1488" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“I think it necessary to turn the key.” Monsieur Defarge whispered it</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1489" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1489"></td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L1583" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1583"></td>
        <td id="LC1583" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">The garret, built to be a depository for firewood and the like, was dim</td>

        <td id="L1584" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1584"></td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L1589" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1589"></td>

      </tr>

      </tr>

        <td id="L1668" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1668"></td>

      </tr>

        <td id="L1669" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1669"></td>

        <td id="L1670" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1670"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1671" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1671"></td>
        <td id="LC1671" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Are you going to finish that pair of shoes to-day?” asked Defarge,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1672" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1672"></td>

      <tr>

        <td id="L1674" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1674"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1675" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1675"></td>
        <td id="LC1675" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1676" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1676"></td>
        <td id="LC1676" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Do you mean to finish that pair of shoes to-day?”</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L1677" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1677"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1679" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1679"></td>

        <td id="LC1768" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Monsieur Manette”; Mr. Lorry laid his hand upon Defarge&#39;s arm; “do you</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1769" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1769"></td>
        <td id="LC1769" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">remember nothing of this man? Look at him. Look at me. Is there no old</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1770" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1770"></td>
        <td id="LC1770" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">banker, no old business, no old servant, no old time, rising in your</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1771" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1771"></td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L1864" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1864"></td>
        <td id="LC1864" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">He formed this speech with his lips many times before he could utter it.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1865" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1865"></td>
        <td id="LC1865" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">But when he did find spoken words for it, they came to him coherently,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1866" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1866"></td>
        <td id="LC1866" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">though slowly.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1867" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1867"></td>
        <td id="LC1867" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1868" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1868"></td>
        <td id="LC1868" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“How was this?--_Was it you_?”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1869" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1869"></td>
        <td id="LC1869" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1870" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1870"></td>
        <td id="LC1870" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Once more, the two spectators started, as he turned upon her with a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1871" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1871"></td>
        <td id="LC1871" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">frightful suddenness. But she sat perfectly still in his grasp, and only</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1872" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1872"></td>
        <td id="LC1872" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">said, in a low voice, “I entreat you, good gentlemen, do not come near</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1873" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1873"></td>
        <td id="LC1873" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">us, do not speak, do not move!”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1874" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1874"></td>
        <td id="LC1874" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1875" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1875"></td>
        <td id="LC1875" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Hark!” he exclaimed. “Whose voice was that?”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1876" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1876"></td>
        <td id="LC1876" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1877" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1877"></td>
        <td id="LC1877" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">His hands released her as he uttered this cry, and went up to his white</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1878" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1878"></td>
        <td id="LC1878" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">hair, which they tore in a frenzy. It died out, as everything but his</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1879" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1879"></td>
        <td id="LC1879" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">shoemaking did die out of him, and he refolded his little packet and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1880" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1880"></td>
        <td id="LC1880" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">tried to secure it in his breast; but he still looked at her, and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1881" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1881"></td>
        <td id="LC1881" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">gloomily shook his head.</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L1882" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1882"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1883" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1883"></td>
        <td id="LC1883" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“No, no, no; you are too young, too blooming. It can&#39;t be. See what the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1884" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1884"></td>
        <td id="LC1884" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">prisoner is. These are not the hands she knew, this is not the face</td>
      </tr>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1886" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1886"></td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L1889" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1889"></td>

        <td id="LC1896" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">me. Kiss me, kiss me! O my dear, my dear!”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1897" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1897"></td>
        <td id="LC1897" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L1898" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1898"></td>
        <td id="LC1898" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">His cold white head mingled with her radiant hair, which warmed and</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L1899" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1899"></td>
        <td id="LC1899" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">lighted it as though it were the light of Freedom shining on him.</td>

        <td id="L1900" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1900"></td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L1901" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1901"></td>
        <td id="LC1901" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“If you hear in my voice--I don&#39;t know that it is so, but I hope it</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1902" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1902"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1906" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1906"></td>
        <td id="LC1906" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">I hint to you of a Home that is before us, where I will be true to you</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1907" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1907"></td>
        <td id="LC1907" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">with all my duty and with all my faithful service, I bring back the</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L1910" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1910"></td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L1911" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1911"></td>

      <tr>

      <tr>
        <td id="L1927" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1927"></td>
        <td id="LC1927" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">He had sunk in her arms, and his face dropped on her breast: a sight so</td>

        <td id="L1934" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1934"></td>

      </tr>

        <td id="L1935" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1935"></td>

        <td id="LC1948" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">him.”</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L1949" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1949"></td>

        <td id="L1950" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1950"></td>
        <td id="LC1950" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“It is true,” said Defarge, who was kneeling to look on and hear. “More</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1951" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1951"></td>
        <td id="LC1951" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">than that; Monsieur Manette is, for all reasons, best out of France.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1952" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1952"></td>
        <td id="LC1952" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Say, shall I hire a carriage and post-horses?”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1953" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1953"></td>
        <td id="LC1953" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1954" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1954"></td>
        <td id="LC1954" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“That&#39;s business,” said Mr. Lorry, resuming on the shortest notice his</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1955" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1955"></td>
        <td id="LC1955" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">methodical manners; “and if business is to be done, I had better do it.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1956" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1956"></td>
        <td id="LC1956" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1957" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1957"></td>
        <td id="LC1957" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Then be so kind,” urged Miss Manette, “as to leave us here. You see how</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1958" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1958"></td>
        <td id="LC1958" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">composed he has become, and you cannot be afraid to leave him with me</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1959" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1959"></td>
        <td id="LC1959" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">now. Why should you be? If you will lock the door to secure us from</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1960" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1960"></td>
        <td id="LC1960" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">interruption, I do not doubt that you will find him, when you come back,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1961" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1961"></td>
        <td id="LC1961" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">as quiet as you leave him. In any case, I will take care of him until</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1962" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1962"></td>
        <td id="LC1962" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">you return, and then we will remove him straight.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1963" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1963"></td>
        <td id="LC1963" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1964" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1964"></td>
        <td id="LC1964" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Both Mr. Lorry and Defarge were rather disinclined to this course, and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1965" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1965"></td>
        <td id="LC1965" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">in favour of one of them remaining. But, as there were not only carriage</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1966" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1966"></td>
        <td id="LC1966" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and horses to be seen to, but travelling papers; and as time pressed,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1967" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1967"></td>
        <td id="LC1967" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">for the day was drawing to an end, it came at last to their hastily</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1968" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1968"></td>
        <td id="LC1968" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">dividing the business that was necessary to be done, and hurrying away</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1969" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1969"></td>
        <td id="LC1969" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">to do it.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1970" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1970"></td>
        <td id="LC1970" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1971" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1971"></td>
        <td id="LC1971" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Then, as the darkness closed in, the daughter laid her head down on the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1972" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1972"></td>
        <td id="LC1972" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">hard ground close at the father&#39;s side, and watched him. The darkness</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1973" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1973"></td>
        <td id="LC1973" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">deepened and deepened, and they both lay quiet, until a light gleamed</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1974" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1974"></td>
        <td id="LC1974" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">through the chinks in the wall.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1975" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1975"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1976" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1976"></td>
        <td id="LC1976" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Mr. Lorry and Monsieur Defarge had made all ready for the journey, and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1977" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1977"></td>
        <td id="LC1977" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">had brought with them, besides travelling cloaks and wrappers, bread and</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L1978" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1978"></td>
        <td id="LC1978" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">meat, wine, and hot coffee. Monsieur Defarge put this provender, and the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>

        <td id="LC1980" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">garret but a pallet bed), and he and Mr. Lorry roused the captive, and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1981" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1981"></td>
        <td id="LC1981" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">assisted him to his feet.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1982" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1982"></td>
        <td id="LC1982" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1983" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1983"></td>
        <td id="LC1983" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">No human intelligence could have read the mysteries of his mind, in</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1984" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1984"></td>

      </tr>

        <td id="L1985" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1985"></td>

      </tr>

        <td id="LC1990" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">occasionally clasping his head in his hands, that had not been seen</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="LC1991" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">in him before; yet, he had some pleasure in the mere sound of his</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L1992" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1992"></td>
        <td id="LC1992" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">daughter&#39;s voice, and invariably turned to it when she spoke.</td>

        <td id="L1994" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1994"></td>

      </tr>

        <td id="L2005" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2005"></td>

        <td id="L2013" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2013"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2014" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2014"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2015" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2015"></td>
        <td id="LC2015" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">prison to that house, was apparent to them. They heard him mutter,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2016" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2016"></td>
        <td id="LC2016" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“One Hundred and Five, North Tower;” and when he looked about him, it</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2017" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2017"></td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L2018" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2018"></td>

      <tr>

      </tr>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2021" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2021"></td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L2022" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2022"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2023" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2023"></td>
        <td id="LC2023" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">No crowd was about the door; no people were discernible at any of the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2024" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2024"></td>

      <tr>

        <td id="L2026" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2026"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2027" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2027"></td>
        <td id="LC2027" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">saw nothing.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2028" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2028"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2029" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2029"></td>
        <td id="LC2029" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">The prisoner had got into a coach, and his daughter had followed</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2030" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2030"></td>
        <td id="LC2030" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">him, when Mr. Lorry&#39;s feet were arrested on the step by his asking,</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L2031" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2031"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2032" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2032"></td>
        <td id="LC2032" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Defarge immediately called to her husband that she would get them, and</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L2034" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2034"></td>

        <td id="L2035" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2035"></td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L2036" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2036"></td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L2037" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2037"></td>
        <td id="LC2037" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Defarge got upon the box, and gave the word “To the Barrier!” The</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2038" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2038"></td>
        <td id="LC2038" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">postilion cracked his whip, and they clattered away under the feeble</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L2039" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2039"></td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L2040" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2040"></td>
        <td id="LC2040" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2041" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2041"></td>
        <td id="LC2041" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Under the over-swinging lamps--swinging ever brighter in the better</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2042" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2042"></td>
        <td id="LC2042" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">streets, and ever dimmer in the worse--and by lighted shops, gay crowds,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2043" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2043"></td>
        <td id="LC2043" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">illuminated coffee-houses, and theatre-doors, to one of the city</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2044" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2044"></td>
        <td id="LC2044" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">gates. Soldiers with lanterns, at the guard-house there. “Your papers,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2045" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2045"></td>
        <td id="LC2045" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">travellers!” “See here then, Monsieur the Officer,” said Defarge,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2046" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2046"></td>
        <td id="LC2046" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">getting down, and taking him gravely apart, “these are the papers of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2047" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2047"></td>
        <td id="LC2047" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">monsieur inside, with the white head. They were consigned to me, with</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2048" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2048"></td>
        <td id="LC2048" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">him, at the--” He dropped his voice, there was a flutter among the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2049" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2049"></td>
        <td id="LC2049" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">military lanterns, and one of them being handed into the coach by an arm</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2050" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2050"></td>
        <td id="LC2050" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">in uniform, the eyes connected with the arm looked, not an every day</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2051" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2051"></td>

        <td id="L2087" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2087"></td>

        <td id="L2136" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2136"></td>
        <td id="LC2136" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Death is Nature&#39;s remedy for all things, and why not Legislation&#39;s?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2137" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2137"></td>

      <tr>

        <td id="LC2141" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Death; the coiner of a bad shilling was put to Death; the sounders of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2142" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2142"></td>
        <td id="LC2142" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">three-fourths of the notes in the whole gamut of Crime, were put to</td>
      </tr>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2325" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2325"></td>
        <td id="LC2325" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2326" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2326"></td>
        <td id="LC2326" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Having thus given his parent God speed, young Jerry seated himself on</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2327" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2327"></td>
        <td id="LC2327" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the stool, entered on his reversionary interest in the straw his father</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2328" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2328"></td>
        <td id="LC2328" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">had been chewing, and cogitated.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2329" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2329"></td>
        <td id="LC2329" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2330" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2330"></td>
        <td id="LC2330" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Al-ways rusty! His fingers is al-ways rusty!” muttered young Jerry.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2331" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2331"></td>
        <td id="LC2331" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Where does my father get all that iron rust from? He don&#39;t get no iron</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2332" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2332"></td>
        <td id="LC2332" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">rust here!”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2333" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2333"></td>
        <td id="LC2333" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2334" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2334"></td>
        <td id="LC2334" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2335" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2335"></td>
        <td id="LC2335" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2336" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2336"></td>
        <td id="LC2336" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2337" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2337"></td>
        <td id="LC2337" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">II. A Sight</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2338" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2338"></td>
        <td id="LC2338" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2339" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2339"></td>
        <td id="LC2339" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2340" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2340"></td>
        <td id="LC2340" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“You know the Old Bailey well, no doubt?” said one of the oldest of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2341" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2341"></td>
        <td id="LC2341" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">clerks to Jerry the messenger.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2342" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2342"></td>
        <td id="LC2342" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2343" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2343"></td>
        <td id="LC2343" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Ye-es, sir,” returned Jerry, in something of a dogged manner. “I _do_</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2344" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2344"></td>
        <td id="LC2344" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">know the Bailey.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2345" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2345"></td>
        <td id="LC2345" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2346" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2346"></td>
        <td id="LC2346" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Just so. And you know Mr. Lorry.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2347" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2347"></td>
        <td id="LC2347" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2348" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2348"></td>
        <td id="LC2348" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“I know Mr. Lorry, sir, much better than I know the Bailey. Much</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2349" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2349"></td>
        <td id="LC2349" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">better,” said Jerry, not unlike a reluctant witness at the establishment</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2350" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2350"></td>
        <td id="LC2350" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">in question, “than I, as a honest tradesman, wish to know the Bailey.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2351" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2351"></td>
        <td id="LC2351" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2352" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2352"></td>
        <td id="LC2352" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Very well. Find the door where the witnesses go in, and show the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2353" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2353"></td>
        <td id="LC2353" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">door-keeper this note for Mr. Lorry. He will then let you in.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2354" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2354"></td>
        <td id="LC2354" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2355" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2355"></td>
        <td id="LC2355" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Into the court, sir?”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2356" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2356"></td>
        <td id="LC2356" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2357" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2357"></td>
        <td id="LC2357" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Into the court.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2358" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2358"></td>
        <td id="LC2358" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2359" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2359"></td>
        <td id="LC2359" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Mr. Cruncher&#39;s eyes seemed to get a little closer to one another, and to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2360" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2360"></td>
        <td id="LC2360" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">interchange the inquiry, “What do you think of this?”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2361" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2361"></td>
        <td id="LC2361" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2362" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2362"></td>
        <td id="LC2362" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Am I to wait in the court, sir?” he asked, as the result of that</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2363" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2363"></td>
        <td id="LC2363" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">conference.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2364" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2364"></td>
        <td id="LC2364" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2365" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2365"></td>
        <td id="LC2365" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“I am going to tell you. The door-keeper will pass the note to Mr.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2366" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2366"></td>
        <td id="LC2366" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Lorry, and do you make any gesture that will attract Mr. Lorry&#39;s</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2367" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2367"></td>
        <td id="LC2367" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">attention, and show him where you stand. Then what you have to do, is,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2368" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2368"></td>
        <td id="LC2368" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">to remain there until he wants you.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2369" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2369"></td>
        <td id="LC2369" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2370" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2370"></td>
        <td id="LC2370" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Is that all, sir?”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2371" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2371"></td>
        <td id="LC2371" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2372" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2372"></td>
        <td id="LC2372" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“That&#39;s all. He wishes to have a messenger at hand. This is to tell him</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2373" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2373"></td>
        <td id="LC2373" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">you are there.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2374" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2374"></td>
        <td id="LC2374" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2375" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2375"></td>
        <td id="LC2375" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">As the ancient clerk deliberately folded and superscribed the note,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2376" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2376"></td>
        <td id="LC2376" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Mr. Cruncher, after surveying him in silence until he came to the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2377" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2377"></td>
        <td id="LC2377" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">blotting-paper stage, remarked:</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2378" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2378"></td>
        <td id="LC2378" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2379" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2379"></td>
        <td id="LC2379" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“I suppose they&#39;ll be trying Forgeries this morning?”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2380" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2380"></td>
        <td id="LC2380" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2381" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2381"></td>
        <td id="LC2381" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Treason!”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2382" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2382"></td>
        <td id="LC2382" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2383" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2383"></td>
        <td id="LC2383" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“That&#39;s quartering,” said Jerry. “Barbarous!”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2384" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2384"></td>
        <td id="LC2384" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2385" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2385"></td>
        <td id="LC2385" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“It is the law,” remarked the ancient clerk, turning his surprised</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2386" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2386"></td>
        <td id="LC2386" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">spectacles upon him. “It is the law.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2387" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2387"></td>
        <td id="LC2387" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2388" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2388"></td>
        <td id="LC2388" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“It&#39;s hard in the law to spile a man, I think. It&#39;s hard enough to kill</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2389" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2389"></td>
        <td id="LC2389" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">him, but it&#39;s wery hard to spile him, sir.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2390" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2390"></td>
        <td id="LC2390" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2391" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2391"></td>
        <td id="LC2391" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Not at all,” retained the ancient clerk. “Speak well of the law. Take</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2392" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2392"></td>
        <td id="LC2392" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">care of your chest and voice, my good friend, and leave the law to take</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2393" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2393"></td>
        <td id="LC2393" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">care of itself. I give you that advice.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2394" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2394"></td>
        <td id="LC2394" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2395" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2395"></td>
        <td id="LC2395" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“It&#39;s the damp, sir, what settles on my chest and voice,” said Jerry. “I</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2396" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2396"></td>
        <td id="LC2396" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">leave you to judge what a damp way of earning a living mine is.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2397" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2397"></td>
        <td id="LC2397" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2398" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2398"></td>
        <td id="LC2398" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Well, well,” said the old clerk; “we all have our various ways of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2399" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2399"></td>
        <td id="LC2399" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">gaining a livelihood. Some of us have damp ways, and some of us have dry</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2400" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2400"></td>
        <td id="LC2400" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">ways. Here is the letter. Go along.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2401" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2401"></td>
        <td id="LC2401" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2402" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2402"></td>
        <td id="LC2402" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Jerry took the letter, and, remarking to himself with less internal</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2403" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2403"></td>
        <td id="LC2403" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">deference than he made an outward show of, “You are a lean old one,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2404" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2404"></td>
        <td id="LC2404" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">too,” made his bow, informed his son, in passing, of his destination,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2405" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2405"></td>
        <td id="LC2405" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and went his way.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2406" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2406"></td>
        <td id="LC2406" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2407" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2407"></td>
        <td id="LC2407" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">They hanged at Tyburn, in those days, so the street outside Newgate had</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2408" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2408"></td>
        <td id="LC2408" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">not obtained one infamous notoriety that has since attached to it.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2409" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2409"></td>
        <td id="LC2409" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">But, the gaol was a vile place, in which most kinds of debauchery and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2410" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2410"></td>
        <td id="LC2410" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">villainy were practised, and where dire diseases were bred, that came</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2411" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2411"></td>
        <td id="LC2411" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">into court with the prisoners, and sometimes rushed straight from the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2412" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2412"></td>
        <td id="LC2412" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">dock at my Lord Chief Justice himself, and pulled him off the bench. It</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2413" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2413"></td>
        <td id="LC2413" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">had more than once happened, that the Judge in the black cap pronounced</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2414" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2414"></td>
        <td id="LC2414" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">his own doom as certainly as the prisoner&#39;s, and even died before him.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2415" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2415"></td>
        <td id="LC2415" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">For the rest, the Old Bailey was famous as a kind of deadly inn-yard,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2416" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2416"></td>
        <td id="LC2416" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">from which pale travellers set out continually, in carts and coaches, on</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2417" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2417"></td>
        <td id="LC2417" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">a violent passage into the other world: traversing some two miles and a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2418" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2418"></td>
        <td id="LC2418" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">half of public street and road, and shaming few good citizens, if any.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2419" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2419"></td>
        <td id="LC2419" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">So powerful is use, and so desirable to be good use in the beginning. It</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2420" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2420"></td>
        <td id="LC2420" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">was famous, too, for the pillory, a wise old institution, that inflicted</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2421" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2421"></td>
        <td id="LC2421" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">a punishment of which no one could foresee the extent; also, for</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2422" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2422"></td>
        <td id="LC2422" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the whipping-post, another dear old institution, very humanising and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2423" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2423"></td>
        <td id="LC2423" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">softening to behold in action; also, for extensive transactions in</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L2424" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2424"></td>
        <td id="LC2424" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">blood-money, another fragment of ancestral wisdom, systematically</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2425" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2425"></td>
        <td id="LC2425" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">leading to the most frightful mercenary crimes that could be committed</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2426" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2426"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2427" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2427"></td>
        <td id="LC2427" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">illustration of the precept, that “Whatever is is right;” an aphorism</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2428" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2428"></td>
        <td id="LC2428" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">that would be as final as it is lazy, did it not include the troublesome</td>

      </tr>

      <tr>
        <td id="L2431" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2431"></td>

      </tr>
