        <td id="L2604" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2604"></td>
        <td id="LC2604" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2605" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2605"></td>
        <td id="LC2605" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">The Judge, whose eyes had gone in the general direction, recalled them,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2606" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2606"></td>
        <td id="LC2606" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">leaned back in his seat, and looked steadily at the man whose life was</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2607" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2607"></td>
        <td id="LC2607" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">in his hand, as Mr. Attorney-General rose to spin the rope, grind the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2608" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2608"></td>
        <td id="LC2608" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">axe, and hammer the nails into the scaffold.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2609" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2609"></td>
        <td id="LC2609" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2610" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2610"></td>
        <td id="LC2610" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2611" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2611"></td>
        <td id="LC2611" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2612" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2612"></td>
        <td id="LC2612" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2613" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2613"></td>
        <td id="LC2613" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">III. A Disappointment</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2614" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2614"></td>
        <td id="LC2614" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2615" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2615"></td>
        <td id="LC2615" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2616" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2616"></td>
        <td id="LC2616" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Mr. Attorney-General had to inform the jury, that the prisoner before</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2617" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2617"></td>
        <td id="LC2617" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">them, though young in years, was old in the treasonable practices which</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2618" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2618"></td>
        <td id="LC2618" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">claimed the forfeit of his life. That this correspondence with the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2619" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2619"></td>
        <td id="LC2619" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">public enemy was not a correspondence of to-day, or of yesterday, or</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2620" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2620"></td>
        <td id="LC2620" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">even of last year, or of the year before. That, it was certain the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2621" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2621"></td>
        <td id="LC2621" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">prisoner had, for longer than that, been in the habit of passing and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2622" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2622"></td>
        <td id="LC2622" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">repassing between France and England, on secret business of which</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2623" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2623"></td>
        <td id="LC2623" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">he could give no honest account. That, if it were in the nature of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2624" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2624"></td>
        <td id="LC2624" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">traitorous ways to thrive (which happily it never was), the real</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2625" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2625"></td>
        <td id="LC2625" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">wickedness and guilt of his business might have remained undiscovered.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2626" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2626"></td>
        <td id="LC2626" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">That Providence, however, had put it into the heart of a person who</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2627" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2627"></td>
        <td id="LC2627" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">was beyond fear and beyond reproach, to ferret out the nature of the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2628" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2628"></td>
        <td id="LC2628" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">prisoner&#39;s schemes, and, struck with horror, to disclose them to his</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2629" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2629"></td>
        <td id="LC2629" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Majesty&#39;s Chief Secretary of State and most honourable Privy Council.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2630" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2630"></td>
        <td id="LC2630" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">That, this patriot would be produced before them. That, his position and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2631" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2631"></td>
        <td id="LC2631" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">attitude were, on the whole, sublime. That, he had been the prisoner&#39;s</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2632" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2632"></td>
        <td id="LC2632" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">friend, but, at once in an auspicious and an evil hour detecting his</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2633" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2633"></td>
        <td id="LC2633" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">infamy, had resolved to immolate the traitor he could no longer cherish</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2634" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2634"></td>
        <td id="LC2634" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">in his bosom, on the sacred altar of his country. That, if statues</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2635" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2635"></td>
        <td id="LC2635" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">were decreed in Britain, as in ancient Greece and Rome, to public</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2636" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2636"></td>
        <td id="LC2636" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">benefactors, this shining citizen would assuredly have had one. That, as</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2637" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2637"></td>
        <td id="LC2637" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">they were not so decreed, he probably would not have one. That, Virtue,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2638" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2638"></td>
        <td id="LC2638" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">as had been observed by the poets (in many passages which he well</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2639" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2639"></td>
        <td id="LC2639" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">knew the jury would have, word for word, at the tips of their tongues;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2640" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2640"></td>
        <td id="LC2640" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">whereat the jury&#39;s countenances displayed a guilty consciousness that</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2641" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2641"></td>
        <td id="LC2641" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">they knew nothing about the passages), was in a manner contagious; more</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2642" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2642"></td>
        <td id="LC2642" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">especially the bright virtue known as patriotism, or love of country.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2643" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2643"></td>
        <td id="LC2643" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">That, the lofty example of this immaculate and unimpeachable witness</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2644" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2644"></td>
        <td id="LC2644" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">for the Crown, to refer to whom however unworthily was an honour, had</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2645" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2645"></td>
        <td id="LC2645" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">communicated itself to the prisoner&#39;s servant, and had engendered in him</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2646" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2646"></td>
        <td id="LC2646" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">a holy determination to examine his master&#39;s table-drawers and pockets,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2647" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2647"></td>
        <td id="LC2647" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and secrete his papers. That, he (Mr. Attorney-General) was prepared to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2648" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2648"></td>
        <td id="LC2648" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">hear some disparagement attempted of this admirable servant; but that,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2649" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2649"></td>
        <td id="LC2649" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">in a general way, he preferred him to his (Mr. Attorney-General&#39;s)</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2650" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2650"></td>
        <td id="LC2650" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">brothers and sisters, and honoured him more than his (Mr.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2651" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2651"></td>
        <td id="LC2651" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Attorney-General&#39;s) father and mother. That, he called with confidence</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2652" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2652"></td>
        <td id="LC2652" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">on the jury to come and do likewise. That, the evidence of these two</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2653" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2653"></td>
        <td id="LC2653" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">witnesses, coupled with the documents of their discovering that would be</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2654" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2654"></td>
        <td id="LC2654" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">produced, would show the prisoner to have been furnished with lists of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2655" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2655"></td>
        <td id="LC2655" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">his Majesty&#39;s forces, and of their disposition and preparation, both by</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2656" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2656"></td>
        <td id="LC2656" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">sea and land, and would leave no doubt that he had habitually conveyed</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2657" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2657"></td>
        <td id="LC2657" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">such information to a hostile power. That, these lists could not be</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2658" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2658"></td>
        <td id="LC2658" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">proved to be in the prisoner&#39;s handwriting; but that it was all the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2659" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2659"></td>
        <td id="LC2659" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">same; that, indeed, it was rather the better for the prosecution, as</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2660" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2660"></td>
        <td id="LC2660" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">showing the prisoner to be artful in his precautions. That, the proof</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2661" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2661"></td>
        <td id="LC2661" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">would go back five years, and would show the prisoner already engaged</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2662" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2662"></td>
        <td id="LC2662" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">in these pernicious missions, within a few weeks before the date of the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2663" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2663"></td>
        <td id="LC2663" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">very first action fought between the British troops and the Americans.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2664" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2664"></td>
        <td id="LC2664" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">That, for these reasons, the jury, being a loyal jury (as he knew they</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2665" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2665"></td>
        <td id="LC2665" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">were), and being a responsible jury (as _they_ knew they were), must</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2666" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2666"></td>
        <td id="LC2666" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">positively find the prisoner Guilty, and make an end of him, whether</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2667" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2667"></td>
        <td id="LC2667" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">they liked it or not. That, they never could lay their heads upon their</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2668" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2668"></td>
        <td id="LC2668" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">pillows; that, they never could tolerate the idea of their wives laying</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2669" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2669"></td>
        <td id="LC2669" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">their heads upon their pillows; that, they never could endure the notion</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2670" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2670"></td>
        <td id="LC2670" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">of their children laying their heads upon their pillows; in short, that</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2671" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2671"></td>
        <td id="LC2671" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">there never more could be, for them or theirs, any laying of heads upon</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2672" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2672"></td>
        <td id="LC2672" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">pillows at all, unless the prisoner&#39;s head was taken off. That head</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2673" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2673"></td>
        <td id="LC2673" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Mr. Attorney-General concluded by demanding of them, in the name of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2674" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2674"></td>
        <td id="LC2674" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">everything he could think of with a round turn in it, and on the faith</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2675" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2675"></td>
        <td id="LC2675" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">of his solemn asseveration that he already considered the prisoner as</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2676" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2676"></td>
        <td id="LC2676" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">good as dead and gone.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2677" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2677"></td>
        <td id="LC2677" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2678" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2678"></td>
        <td id="LC2678" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">When the Attorney-General ceased, a buzz arose in the court as if</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2679" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2679"></td>
        <td id="LC2679" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">a cloud of great blue-flies were swarming about the prisoner, in</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2680" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2680"></td>
        <td id="LC2680" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">anticipation of what he was soon to become. When toned down again, the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2681" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2681"></td>
        <td id="LC2681" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">unimpeachable patriot appeared in the witness-box.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2682" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2682"></td>
        <td id="LC2682" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2683" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2683"></td>
        <td id="LC2683" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Mr. Solicitor-General then, following his leader&#39;s lead, examined the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2684" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2684"></td>
        <td id="LC2684" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">patriot: John Barsad, gentleman, by name. The story of his pure soul was</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2685" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2685"></td>
        <td id="LC2685" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">exactly what Mr. Attorney-General had described it to be--perhaps, if</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2686" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2686"></td>
        <td id="LC2686" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">it had a fault, a little too exactly. Having released his noble bosom</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2687" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2687"></td>
        <td id="LC2687" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">of its burden, he would have modestly withdrawn himself, but that the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2688" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2688"></td>
        <td id="LC2688" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">wigged gentleman with the papers before him, sitting not far from Mr.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2689" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2689"></td>
        <td id="LC2689" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Lorry, begged to ask him a few questions. The wigged gentleman sitting</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2690" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2690"></td>
        <td id="LC2690" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">opposite, still looking at the ceiling of the court.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2691" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2691"></td>
        <td id="LC2691" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2692" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2692"></td>
        <td id="LC2692" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Had he ever been a spy himself? No, he scorned the base insinuation.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2693" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2693"></td>
        <td id="LC2693" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">What did he live upon? His property. Where was his property? He didn&#39;t</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2694" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2694"></td>
        <td id="LC2694" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">precisely remember where it was. What was it? No business of anybody&#39;s.</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L2695" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2695"></td>
        <td id="LC2695" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Had he inherited it? Yes, he had. From whom? Distant relation. Very</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L2696" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2696"></td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L2697" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2697"></td>
        <td id="LC2697" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">prison? Didn&#39;t see what that had to do with it. Never in a debtors&#39;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>

        <td id="LC2698" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">prison?--Come, once again. Never? Yes. How many times? Two or three</td>

        <td id="L2700" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2700"></td>

        <td id="L2701" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2701"></td>

      </tr>

        <td id="L2788" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2788"></td>
        <td id="LC2788" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">certain knowledge, before?”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2789" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2789"></td>
        <td id="LC2789" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L2790" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2790"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2791" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2791"></td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L2792" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2792"></td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L2793" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2793"></td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L2794" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2794"></td>
        <td id="LC2794" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“I was returning from France a few days afterwards, and, at Calais, the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2795" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2795"></td>
        <td id="LC2795" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">prisoner came on board the packet-ship in which I returned, and made the</td>

        <td id="L2796" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2796"></td>

      <tr>

        <td id="LC2798" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“At what hour did he come on board?”</td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2801" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2801"></td>

        <td id="L2802" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2802"></td>
        <td id="LC2802" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“In the dead of the night. Was he the only passenger who came on board</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L2803" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2803"></td>
        <td id="LC2803" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">at that untimely hour?”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2804" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2804"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2807" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2807"></td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L2809" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2809"></td>

        <td id="L2819" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2819"></td>
        <td id="LC2819" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">I lay on a sofa, almost from shore to shore.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2820" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2820"></td>

      <tr>

        <td id="LC2823" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">The young lady, to whom all eyes had been turned before, and were now</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2824" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2824"></td>
        <td id="LC2824" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">turned again, stood up where she had sat. Her father rose with her, and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2825" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2825"></td>
        <td id="LC2825" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">kept her hand drawn through his arm.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2826" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2826"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2827" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2827"></td>
        <td id="LC2827" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Miss Manette, look upon the prisoner.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2828" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2828"></td>
        <td id="LC2828" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2829" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2829"></td>
        <td id="LC2829" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">To be confronted with such pity, and such earnest youth and beauty, was</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2830" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2830"></td>
        <td id="LC2830" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">far more trying to the accused than to be confronted with all the crowd.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2831" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2831"></td>
        <td id="LC2831" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Standing, as it were, apart with her on the edge of his grave, not all</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2832" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2832"></td>
        <td id="LC2832" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the staring curiosity that looked on, could, for the moment, nerve him</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2833" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2833"></td>
        <td id="LC2833" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">to remain quite still. His hurried right hand parcelled out the herbs</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2834" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2834"></td>
        <td id="LC2834" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">before him into imaginary beds of flowers in a garden; and his efforts</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2835" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2835"></td>
        <td id="LC2835" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">to control and steady his breathing shook the lips from which the colour</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2836" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2836"></td>
        <td id="LC2836" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">rushed to his heart. The buzz of the great flies was loud again.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2837" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2837"></td>
        <td id="LC2837" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L2848" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2848"></td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L2851" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2851"></td>
        <td id="LC2851" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">The plaintive tone of her compassion merged into the less musical voice</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2852" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2852"></td>
        <td id="LC2852" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">of the Judge, as he said something fiercely: “Answer the questions put</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2853" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2853"></td>
        <td id="LC2853" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">to you, and make no remark upon them.”</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L2854" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2854"></td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L2861" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2861"></td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L2862" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2862"></td>
        <td id="LC2862" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">In the midst of a profound stillness, she faintly began: “When the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2863" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2863"></td>
        <td id="LC2863" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">gentleman came on board--”</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L2864" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2864"></td>

        <td id="L2865" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2865"></td>
        <td id="LC2865" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Do you mean the prisoner?” inquired the Judge, knitting his brows.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2866" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2866"></td>
        <td id="LC2866" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2868" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2868"></td>
        <td id="LC2868" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L2869" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2869"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2870" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2870"></td>
        <td id="LC2870" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2871" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2871"></td>
        <td id="LC2871" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“When the prisoner came on board, he noticed that my father,” turning</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2872" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2872"></td>
        <td id="LC2872" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">her eyes lovingly to him as he stood beside her, “was much fatigued</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2873" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2873"></td>
        <td id="LC2873" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and in a very weak state of health. My father was so reduced that I was</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2874" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2874"></td>
        <td id="LC2874" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">afraid to take him out of the air, and I had made a bed for him on the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2875" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2875"></td>
        <td id="LC2875" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">deck near the cabin steps, and I sat on the deck at his side to take</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2876" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2876"></td>
        <td id="LC2876" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">care of him. There were no other passengers that night, but we four.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2877" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2877"></td>
        <td id="LC2877" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">The prisoner was so good as to beg permission to advise me how I could</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2878" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2878"></td>
        <td id="LC2878" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">shelter my father from the wind and weather, better than I had done. I</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2879" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2879"></td>
        <td id="LC2879" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">had not known how to do it well, not understanding how the wind would</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2880" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2880"></td>
        <td id="LC2880" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">set when we were out of the harbour. He did it for me. He expressed</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2881" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2881"></td>
        <td id="LC2881" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">great gentleness and kindness for my father&#39;s state, and I am sure he</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2882" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2882"></td>
        <td id="LC2882" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">felt it. That was the manner of our beginning to speak together.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2883" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2883"></td>
        <td id="LC2883" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2884" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2884"></td>
        <td id="LC2884" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Let me interrupt you for a moment. Had he come on board alone?”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>

      </tr>

        <td id="L2925" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2925"></td>
        <td id="LC2925" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">difficult nature, which might get people into trouble, and that he was</td>

      </tr>

        <td id="L2927" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2927"></td>
        <td id="LC2927" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">had, within a few days, taken him to France, and might, at intervals,</td>

        <td id="LC2928" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">take him backwards and forwards between France and England for a long</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2929" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2929"></td>

        <td id="L2930" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2930"></td>

        <td id="LC2935" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">England&#39;s part. He added, in a jesting way, that perhaps George</td>

        <td id="L2936" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2936"></td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L2940" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2940"></td>
        <td id="LC2940" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Any strongly marked expression of face on the part of a chief actor in</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L2948" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2948"></td>

        <td id="L2951" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2951"></td>

        <td id="LC2953" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">father, Doctor Manette. Who was called accordingly.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2954" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2954"></td>

      <tr>

        <td id="L2970" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2970"></td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L2972" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2972"></td>

        <td id="L2973" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2973"></td>
        <td id="LC2973" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">He answered, in a tone that went to every heart, “A long imprisonment.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2974" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2974"></td>

        <td id="L2975" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2975"></td>
        <td id="LC2975" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Were you newly released on the occasion in question?”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2976" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2976"></td>
        <td id="LC2976" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2977" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2977"></td>
        <td id="LC2977" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“They tell me so.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2978" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2978"></td>
        <td id="LC2978" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2979" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2979"></td>
        <td id="LC2979" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Have you no remembrance of the occasion?”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2980" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2980"></td>
        <td id="LC2980" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>

        <td id="L3073" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3073"></td>

        <td id="L3259" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3259"></td>
        <td id="LC3259" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“You think so?” said Mr. Stryver. “Well! you have been present all day,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3260" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3260"></td>
        <td id="LC3260" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and you ought to know. You are a man of business, too.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3261" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3261"></td>

      <tr>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3263" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3263"></td>
        <td id="LC3263" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">now shouldered back into the group, just as he had previously shouldered</td>

        <td id="L3273" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3273"></td>

        <td id="L3340" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3340"></td>

        <td id="L3341" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3341"></td>
        <td id="LC3341" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Darnay as a young gentleman of generosity knows how to make allowance</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L3342" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3342"></td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L3343" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3343"></td>
        <td id="LC3343" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">I hope you have been this day preserved for a prosperous and happy</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3344" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3344"></td>
        <td id="LC3344" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">life.--Chair there!”</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L3345" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3345"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3346" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3346"></td>
        <td id="LC3346" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Perhaps a little angry with himself, as well as with the barrister, Mr.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3347" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3347"></td>
        <td id="LC3347" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Lorry bustled into the chair, and was carried off to Tellson&#39;s. Carton,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3348" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3348"></td>
        <td id="LC3348" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">who smelt of port wine, and did not appear to be quite sober, laughed</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3349" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3349"></td>
        <td id="LC3349" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">then, and turned to Darnay:</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3350" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3350"></td>
        <td id="LC3350" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3351" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3351"></td>
        <td id="LC3351" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“This is a strange chance that throws you and me together. This must</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3352" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3352"></td>

        <td id="L3445" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3445"></td>
        <td id="LC3445" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">opinion of your understanding.”</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L3446" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3446"></td>
        <td id="LC3446" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3447" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3447"></td>
        <td id="LC3447" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Nevertheless,” pursued Darnay, rising to ring the bell, “there is</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3448" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3448"></td>
        <td id="LC3448" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">nothing in that, I hope, to prevent my calling the reckoning, and our</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3449" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3449"></td>
        <td id="LC3449" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">parting without ill-blood on either side.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3450" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3450"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3451" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3451"></td>
        <td id="LC3451" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Carton rejoining, “Nothing in life!” Darnay rang. “Do you call the whole</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3452" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3452"></td>
        <td id="LC3452" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">reckoning?” said Carton. On his answering in the affirmative, “Then</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3453" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3453"></td>
        <td id="LC3453" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">bring me another pint of this same wine, drawer, and come and wake me at</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3454" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3454"></td>
        <td id="LC3454" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">ten.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3455" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3455"></td>

        <td id="LC3456" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">The bill being paid, Charles Darnay rose and wished him good night.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3457" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3457"></td>

        <td id="L3458" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3458"></td>
        <td id="LC3458" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">of defiance in his manner, and said, “A last word, Mr. Darnay: you think</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3459" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3459"></td>
        <td id="LC3459" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">I am drunk?”</td>

        <td id="L3494" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3494"></td>

        <td id="L3497" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3497"></td>

        <td id="L3502" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3502"></td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L3517" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3517"></td>

        <td id="L3525" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3525"></td>

        <td id="L3526" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3526"></td>

        <td id="L3527" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3527"></td>
        <td id="LC3527" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">ally. What the two drank together, between Hilary Term and Michaelmas,</td>

        <td id="L3528" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3528"></td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L3530" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3530"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3531" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3531"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3532" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3532"></td>
        <td id="LC3532" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">rumoured to be seen at broad day, going home stealthily and unsteadily</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3533" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3533"></td>
        <td id="LC3533" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">to his lodgings, like a dissipated cat. At last, it began to get about,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3534" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3534"></td>
        <td id="LC3534" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">among such as were interested in the matter, that although Sydney Carton</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3535" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3535"></td>
        <td id="LC3535" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">would never be a lion, he was an amazingly good jackal, and that he</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3536" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3536"></td>
        <td id="LC3536" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">rendered suit and service to Stryver in that humble capacity.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3537" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3537"></td>
        <td id="LC3537" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3538" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3538"></td>
        <td id="LC3538" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Ten o&#39;clock, sir,” said the man at the tavern, whom he had charged to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3539" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3539"></td>
        <td id="LC3539" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">wake him--“ten o&#39;clock, sir.”</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L3540" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3540"></td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L3541" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3541"></td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L3542" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3542"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3544" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3544"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3548" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3548"></td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L3550" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3550"></td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L3551" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3551"></td>
        <td id="LC3551" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">After a few dull efforts to get to sleep again, which the man</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3552" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3552"></td>
        <td id="LC3552" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">dexterously combated by stirring the fire continuously for five minutes,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3553" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3553"></td>
        <td id="LC3553" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">he got up, tossed his hat on, and walked out. He turned into the Temple,</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L3554" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3554"></td>
        <td id="LC3554" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and, having revived himself by twice pacing the pavements of King&#39;s</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L3555" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3555"></td>
        <td id="LC3555" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Bench-walk and Paper-buildings, turned into the Stryver chambers.</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L3556" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3556"></td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L3557" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3557"></td>
        <td id="LC3557" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">The Stryver clerk, who never assisted at these conferences, had gone</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3558" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3558"></td>

        <td id="L3561" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3561"></td>
        <td id="LC3561" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">may be observed in all free livers of his class, from the portrait of</td>

        <td id="L3562" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3562"></td>
        <td id="LC3562" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Jeffries downward, and which can be traced, under various disguises of</td>

        <td id="L3563" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3563"></td>
        <td id="LC3563" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Art, through the portraits of every Drinking Age.</td>

      <tr>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3596" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3596"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3605" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3605"></td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L3606" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3606"></td>
        <td id="LC3606" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">The lion then composed himself on his back on a sofa on one side of the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3607" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3607"></td>
        <td id="LC3607" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">drinking-table, while the jackal sat at his own paper-bestrewn table</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L3608" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3608"></td>
        <td id="LC3608" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">proper, on the other side of it, with the bottles and glasses ready to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3609" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3609"></td>
        <td id="LC3609" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">his hand. Both resorted to the drinking-table without stint, but each in</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3610" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3610"></td>
        <td id="LC3610" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">a different way; the lion for the most part reclining with his hands in</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3611" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3611"></td>
        <td id="LC3611" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">his waistband, looking at the fire, or occasionally flirting with some</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3612" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3612"></td>
        <td id="LC3612" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">lighter document; the jackal, with knitted brows and intent face,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3613" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3613"></td>
        <td id="LC3613" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">so deep in his task, that his eyes did not even follow the hand he</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3614" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3614"></td>
        <td id="LC3614" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">stretched out for his glass--which often groped about, for a minute or</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3615" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3615"></td>
        <td id="LC3615" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">more, before it found the glass for his lips. Two or three times, the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3616" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3616"></td>
        <td id="LC3616" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">matter in hand became so knotty, that the jackal found it imperative on</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3617" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3617"></td>
        <td id="LC3617" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">him to get up, and steep his towels anew. From these pilgrimages to the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3618" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3618"></td>
        <td id="LC3618" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">jug and basin, he returned with such eccentricities of damp headgear as</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3619" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3619"></td>
        <td id="LC3619" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">no words can describe; which were made the more ludicrous by his anxious</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3620" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3620"></td>
        <td id="LC3620" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">gravity.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3621" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3621"></td>
        <td id="LC3621" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3622" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3622"></td>
        <td id="LC3622" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">At length the jackal had got together a compact repast for the lion, and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3623" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3623"></td>
        <td id="LC3623" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">proceeded to offer it to him. The lion took it with care and caution,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3624" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3624"></td>
        <td id="LC3624" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">made his selections from it, and his remarks upon it, and the jackal</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3625" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3625"></td>
        <td id="LC3625" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">assisted both. When the repast was fully discussed, the lion put his</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3626" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3626"></td>
        <td id="LC3626" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">hands in his waistband again, and lay down to meditate. The jackal then</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3627" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3627"></td>
        <td id="LC3627" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">invigorated himself with a bumper for his throttle, and a fresh application</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3628" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3628"></td>
        <td id="LC3628" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">to his head, and applied himself to the collection of a second meal;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3629" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3629"></td>
        <td id="LC3629" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">this was administered to the lion in the same manner, and was not</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3630" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3630"></td>
        <td id="LC3630" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">disposed of until the clocks struck three in the morning.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3631" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3631"></td>
        <td id="LC3631" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3632" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3632"></td>
        <td id="LC3632" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“And now we have done, Sydney, fill a bumper of punch,” said Mr.</td>
      </tr>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3722" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3722"></td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L3726" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3726"></td>
        <td id="LC3726" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Quick to see what happened! If a girl, doll or no doll, swoons within a</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L3818" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3818"></td>
        <td id="LC3818" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">ingenious experiments, brought him otherwise into moderate request, and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3819" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3819"></td>

        <td id="L3823" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3823"></td>

        <td id="LC3841" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Although the Doctor&#39;s daughter had known nothing of the country of her</td>

        <td id="L3843" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3843"></td>

        <td id="LC3849" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">delicate hands, clear eyes, and good sense; were at once so pleasant in</td>

        <td id="L3908" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3908"></td>

        <td id="L3910" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3910"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3912" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3912"></td>
        <td id="LC3912" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3913" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3913"></td>
        <td id="LC3913" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">It was characteristic of this lady (as of some other people before her</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3914" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3914"></td>
        <td id="LC3914" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">time and since) that whenever her original proposition was questioned,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3915" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3915"></td>
        <td id="LC3915" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">she exaggerated it.</td>

        <td id="L3916" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3916"></td>

        <td id="L3917" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3917"></td>

        <td id="L3920" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3920"></td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L3923" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3923"></td>
