      <tr>
        <td id="L4007" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4007"></td>
        <td id="LC4007" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4008" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4008"></td>
        <td id="LC4008" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“That she thinks he has.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4009" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4009"></td>
        <td id="LC4009" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4010" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4010"></td>
        <td id="LC4010" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Now don&#39;t be angry at my asking all these questions; because I am a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4011" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4011"></td>
        <td id="LC4011" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">mere dull man of business, and you are a woman of business.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4012" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4012"></td>
        <td id="LC4012" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4013" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4013"></td>
        <td id="LC4013" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Dull?” Miss Pross inquired, with placidity.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4014" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4014"></td>
        <td id="LC4014" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4015" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4015"></td>
        <td id="LC4015" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Rather wishing his modest adjective away, Mr. Lorry replied, “No, no,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4016" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4016"></td>
        <td id="LC4016" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">no. Surely not. To return to business:--Is it not remarkable that Doctor</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4017" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4017"></td>
        <td id="LC4017" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Manette, unquestionably innocent of any crime as we are all well assured</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4018" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4018"></td>
        <td id="LC4018" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">he is, should never touch upon that question? I will not say with me,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4019" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4019"></td>
        <td id="LC4019" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">though he had business relations with me many years ago, and we are now</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4020" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4020"></td>
        <td id="LC4020" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">intimate; I will say with the fair daughter to whom he is so devotedly</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4021" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4021"></td>
        <td id="LC4021" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">attached, and who is so devotedly attached to him? Believe me, Miss</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4022" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4022"></td>
        <td id="LC4022" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Pross, I don&#39;t approach the topic with you, out of curiosity, but out of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4023" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4023"></td>
        <td id="LC4023" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">zealous interest.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4024" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4024"></td>
        <td id="LC4024" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4025" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4025"></td>
        <td id="LC4025" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Well! To the best of my understanding, and bad&#39;s the best, you&#39;ll tell</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4026" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4026"></td>
        <td id="LC4026" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">me,” said Miss Pross, softened by the tone of the apology, “he is afraid</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4027" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4027"></td>
        <td id="LC4027" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">of the whole subject.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4028" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4028"></td>
        <td id="LC4028" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4029" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4029"></td>
        <td id="LC4029" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Afraid?”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4030" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4030"></td>
        <td id="LC4030" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4031" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4031"></td>
        <td id="LC4031" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“It&#39;s plain enough, I should think, why he may be. It&#39;s a dreadful</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4032" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4032"></td>
        <td id="LC4032" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">remembrance. Besides that, his loss of himself grew out of it. Not</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4033" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4033"></td>
        <td id="LC4033" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">knowing how he lost himself, or how he recovered himself, he may never</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4034" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4034"></td>
        <td id="LC4034" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">feel certain of not losing himself again. That alone wouldn&#39;t make the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4035" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4035"></td>
        <td id="LC4035" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">subject pleasant, I should think.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4036" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4036"></td>
        <td id="LC4036" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4037" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4037"></td>
        <td id="LC4037" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">It was a profounder remark than Mr. Lorry had looked for. “True,” said</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4038" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4038"></td>
        <td id="LC4038" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">he, “and fearful to reflect upon. Yet, a doubt lurks in my mind, Miss</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4039" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4039"></td>
        <td id="LC4039" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Pross, whether it is good for Doctor Manette to have that suppression</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4040" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4040"></td>
        <td id="LC4040" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">always shut up within him. Indeed, it is this doubt and the uneasiness</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4041" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4041"></td>
        <td id="LC4041" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">it sometimes causes me that has led me to our present confidence.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4042" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4042"></td>
        <td id="LC4042" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4043" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4043"></td>
        <td id="LC4043" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Can&#39;t be helped,” said Miss Pross, shaking her head. “Touch that</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4044" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4044"></td>
        <td id="LC4044" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">string, and he instantly changes for the worse. Better leave it alone.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4045" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4045"></td>
        <td id="LC4045" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">In short, must leave it alone, like or no like. Sometimes, he gets up in</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4046" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4046"></td>
        <td id="LC4046" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the dead of the night, and will be heard, by us overhead there, walking</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4047" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4047"></td>
        <td id="LC4047" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">up and down, walking up and down, in his room. Ladybird has learnt to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4048" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4048"></td>
        <td id="LC4048" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">know then that his mind is walking up and down, walking up and down, in</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4049" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4049"></td>
        <td id="LC4049" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">his old prison. She hurries to him, and they go on together, walking up</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4050" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4050"></td>
        <td id="LC4050" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and down, walking up and down, until he is composed. But he never says</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4051" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4051"></td>
        <td id="LC4051" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">a word of the true reason of his restlessness, to her, and she finds it</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4052" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4052"></td>
        <td id="LC4052" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">best not to hint at it to him. In silence they go walking up and down</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4053" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4053"></td>
        <td id="LC4053" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">together, walking up and down together, till her love and company have</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4054" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4054"></td>
        <td id="LC4054" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">brought him to himself.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4055" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4055"></td>
        <td id="LC4055" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4056" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4056"></td>
        <td id="LC4056" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Notwithstanding Miss Pross&#39;s denial of her own imagination, there was a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4057" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4057"></td>
        <td id="LC4057" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">perception of the pain of being monotonously haunted by one sad idea,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4058" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4058"></td>
        <td id="LC4058" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">in her repetition of the phrase, walking up and down, which testified to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4059" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4059"></td>
        <td id="LC4059" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">her possessing such a thing.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4060" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4060"></td>
        <td id="LC4060" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4061" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4061"></td>
        <td id="LC4061" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">The corner has been mentioned as a wonderful corner for echoes; it</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4062" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4062"></td>
        <td id="LC4062" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">had begun to echo so resoundingly to the tread of coming feet, that it</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4063" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4063"></td>
        <td id="LC4063" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">seemed as though the very mention of that weary pacing to and fro had</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4064" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4064"></td>
        <td id="LC4064" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">set it going.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4065" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4065"></td>
        <td id="LC4065" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4066" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4066"></td>
        <td id="LC4066" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Here they are!” said Miss Pross, rising to break up the conference;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4067" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4067"></td>
        <td id="LC4067" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“and now we shall have hundreds of people pretty soon!”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4068" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4068"></td>
        <td id="LC4068" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4069" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4069"></td>
        <td id="LC4069" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">It was such a curious corner in its acoustical properties, such a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4070" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4070"></td>
        <td id="LC4070" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">peculiar Ear of a place, that as Mr. Lorry stood at the open window,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4071" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4071"></td>
        <td id="LC4071" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">looking for the father and daughter whose steps he heard, he fancied</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4072" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4072"></td>
        <td id="LC4072" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">they would never approach. Not only would the echoes die away, as though</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4073" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4073"></td>
        <td id="LC4073" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the steps had gone; but, echoes of other steps that never came would be</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4074" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4074"></td>
        <td id="LC4074" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">heard in their stead, and would die away for good when they seemed close</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4075" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4075"></td>
        <td id="LC4075" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">at hand. However, father and daughter did at last appear, and Miss Pross</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4076" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4076"></td>
        <td id="LC4076" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">was ready at the street door to receive them.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4077" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4077"></td>
        <td id="LC4077" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4078" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4078"></td>
        <td id="LC4078" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Miss Pross was a pleasant sight, albeit wild, and red, and grim, taking</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4079" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4079"></td>
        <td id="LC4079" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">off her darling&#39;s bonnet when she came up-stairs, and touching it up</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4080" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4080"></td>
        <td id="LC4080" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">with the ends of her handkerchief, and blowing the dust off it, and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4081" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4081"></td>
        <td id="LC4081" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">folding her mantle ready for laying by, and smoothing her rich hair with</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4082" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4082"></td>
        <td id="LC4082" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">as much pride as she could possibly have taken in her own hair if she</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4083" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4083"></td>
        <td id="LC4083" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">had been the vainest and handsomest of women. Her darling was a pleasant</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4084" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4084"></td>
        <td id="LC4084" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">sight too, embracing her and thanking her, and protesting against</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4085" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4085"></td>
        <td id="LC4085" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">her taking so much trouble for her--which last she only dared to do</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4086" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4086"></td>
        <td id="LC4086" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">playfully, or Miss Pross, sorely hurt, would have retired to her own</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4087" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4087"></td>
        <td id="LC4087" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">chamber and cried. The Doctor was a pleasant sight too, looking on at</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4088" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4088"></td>
        <td id="LC4088" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">them, and telling Miss Pross how she spoilt Lucie, in accents and with</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4089" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4089"></td>
        <td id="LC4089" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">eyes that had as much spoiling in them as Miss Pross had, and would</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4090" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4090"></td>
        <td id="LC4090" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">have had more if it were possible. Mr. Lorry was a pleasant sight too,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4091" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4091"></td>
        <td id="LC4091" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">beaming at all this in his little wig, and thanking his bachelor</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4092" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4092"></td>
        <td id="LC4092" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">stars for having lighted him in his declining years to a Home. But, no</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4093" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4093"></td>
        <td id="LC4093" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Hundreds of people came to see the sights, and Mr. Lorry looked in vain</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4094" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4094"></td>
        <td id="LC4094" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">for the fulfilment of Miss Pross&#39;s prediction.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4095" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4095"></td>
        <td id="LC4095" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4096" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4096"></td>
        <td id="LC4096" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Dinner-time, and still no Hundreds of people. In the arrangements of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4097" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4097"></td>
        <td id="LC4097" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the little household, Miss Pross took charge of the lower regions, and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4098" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4098"></td>
        <td id="LC4098" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">always acquitted herself marvellously. Her dinners, of a very modest</td>
      </tr>

      <tr>
        <td id="L4283" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4283"></td>

        <td id="LC4556" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">him that.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4557" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4557"></td>
        <td id="LC4557" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4558" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4558"></td>
        <td id="LC4558" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">He threw out a gold coin for the valet to pick up, and all the heads</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4559" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4559"></td>
        <td id="LC4559" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">craned forward that all the eyes might look down at it as it fell. The</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4560" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4560"></td>
        <td id="LC4560" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">tall man called out again with a most unearthly cry, “Dead!”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4561" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4561"></td>
        <td id="LC4561" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4562" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4562"></td>
        <td id="LC4562" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">He was arrested by the quick arrival of another man, for whom the rest</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4563" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4563"></td>
        <td id="LC4563" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">made way. On seeing him, the miserable creature fell upon his shoulder,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4564" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4564"></td>
        <td id="LC4564" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">sobbing and crying, and pointing to the fountain, where some women were</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4565" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4565"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4566" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4566"></td>
        <td id="LC4566" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">were as silent, however, as the men.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4567" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4567"></td>
        <td id="LC4567" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4568" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4568"></td>
        <td id="LC4568" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“I know all, I know all,” said the last comer. “Be a brave man, my</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4569" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4569"></td>
        <td id="LC4569" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Gaspard! It is better for the poor little plaything to die so, than to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4570" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4570"></td>
        <td id="LC4570" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">live. It has died in a moment without pain. Could it have lived an hour</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4571" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4571"></td>
        <td id="LC4571" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">as happily?”</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L4572" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4572"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4573" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4573"></td>
        <td id="LC4573" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“You are a philosopher, you there,” said the Marquis, smiling. “How do</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4574" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4574"></td>
        <td id="LC4574" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">they call you?”</td>

        <td id="L4575" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4575"></td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L4577" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4577"></td>

        <td id="L4579" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4579"></td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L4581" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4581"></td>

      <tr>

        <td id="LC4582" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Pick up that, philosopher and vendor of wine,” said the Marquis,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4583" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4583"></td>
        <td id="LC4583" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">throwing him another gold coin, “and spend it as you will. The horses</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4584" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4584"></td>
        <td id="LC4584" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">there; are they right?”</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L4585" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4585"></td>
        <td id="LC4585" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4586" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4586"></td>
        <td id="LC4586" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Without deigning to look at the assemblage a second time, Monsieur the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4587" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4587"></td>
        <td id="LC4587" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Marquis leaned back in his seat, and was just being driven away with the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4588" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4588"></td>
        <td id="LC4588" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">air of a gentleman who had accidentally broke some common thing, and had</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4589" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4589"></td>

        <td id="L4590" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4590"></td>
        <td id="LC4590" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">disturbed by a coin flying into his carriage, and ringing on its floor.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4591" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4591"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4593" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4593"></td>

        <td id="LC4594" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">He looked to the spot where Defarge the vendor of wine had stood, a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4595" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4595"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4596" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4596"></td>
        <td id="LC4596" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the pavement in that spot, and the figure that stood beside him was the</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L4598" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4598"></td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L4599" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4599"></td>
        <td id="LC4599" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“You dogs!” said the Marquis, but smoothly, and with an unchanged front,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4600" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4600"></td>
        <td id="LC4600" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">except as to the spots on his nose: “I would ride over any of you very</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L4601" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4601"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4602" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4602"></td>
        <td id="LC4602" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">threw at the carriage, and if that brigand were sufficiently near it, he</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L4603" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4603"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4604" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4604"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4605" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4605"></td>
        <td id="LC4605" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">So cowed was their condition, and so long and hard their experience of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4606" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4606"></td>
        <td id="LC4606" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">what such a man could do to them, within the law and beyond it, that not</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4607" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4607"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4608" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4608"></td>
        <td id="LC4608" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">But the woman who stood knitting looked up steadily, and looked the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4609" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4609"></td>
        <td id="LC4609" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Marquis in the face. It was not for his dignity to notice it; his</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4610" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4610"></td>
        <td id="LC4610" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">contemptuous eyes passed over her, and over all the other rats; and he</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4611" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4611"></td>
        <td id="LC4611" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">leaned back in his seat again, and gave the word “Go on!”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4612" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4612"></td>
        <td id="LC4612" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L4613" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4613"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4614" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4614"></td>
        <td id="LC4614" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">succession; the Minister, the State-Projector, the Farmer-General, the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4615" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4615"></td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L4616" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4616"></td>
        <td id="LC4616" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">whole Fancy Ball in a bright continuous flow, came whirling by. The rats</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4617" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4617"></td>
        <td id="LC4617" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">had crept out of their holes to look on, and they remained looking</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4619" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4619"></td>

        <td id="L4620" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4620"></td>
        <td id="LC4620" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">which they peeped. The father had long ago taken up his bundle and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4621" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4621"></td>
        <td id="LC4621" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">bidden himself away with it, when the women who had tended the bundle</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4622" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4622"></td>
        <td id="LC4622" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">while it lay on the base of the fountain, sat there watching the running</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4623" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4623"></td>
        <td id="LC4623" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">of the water and the rolling of the Fancy Ball--when the one woman who</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4624" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4624"></td>
        <td id="LC4624" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">had stood conspicuous, knitting, still knitted on with the steadfastness</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4625" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4625"></td>
        <td id="LC4625" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">of Fate. The water of the fountain ran, the swift river ran, the day ran</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4626" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4626"></td>
        <td id="LC4626" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">into evening, so much life in the city ran into death according to rule,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4627" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4627"></td>
        <td id="LC4627" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">time and tide waited for no man, the rats were sleeping close together</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4628" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4628"></td>
        <td id="LC4628" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">in their dark holes again, the Fancy Ball was lighted up at supper, all</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4629" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4629"></td>
        <td id="LC4629" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">things ran their course.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4630" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4630"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4631" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4631"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4632" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4632"></td>
        <td id="LC4632" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4633" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4633"></td>
        <td id="LC4633" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4634" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4634"></td>
        <td id="LC4634" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">VIII. Monseigneur in the Country</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4635" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4635"></td>
        <td id="LC4635" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4636" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4636"></td>
        <td id="LC4636" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4637" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4637"></td>
        <td id="LC4637" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">A beautiful landscape, with the corn bright in it, but not abundant.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4638" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4638"></td>
        <td id="LC4638" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Patches of poor rye where corn should have been, patches of poor peas</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4639" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4639"></td>
        <td id="LC4639" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and beans, patches of most coarse vegetable substitutes for wheat. On</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4640" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4640"></td>
        <td id="LC4640" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">inanimate nature, as on the men and women who cultivated it, a prevalent</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4641" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4641"></td>
        <td id="LC4641" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">tendency towards an appearance of vegetating unwillingly--a dejected</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4642" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4642"></td>
        <td id="LC4642" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">disposition to give up, and wither away.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4643" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4643"></td>
        <td id="LC4643" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4644" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4644"></td>
        <td id="LC4644" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Monsieur the Marquis in his travelling carriage (which might have been</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4645" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4645"></td>
        <td id="LC4645" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">lighter), conducted by four post-horses and two postilions, fagged up</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4646" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4646"></td>
        <td id="LC4646" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">a steep hill. A blush on the countenance of Monsieur the Marquis was</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4647" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4647"></td>
        <td id="LC4647" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">no impeachment of his high breeding; it was not from within; it was</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4648" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4648"></td>
        <td id="LC4648" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">occasioned by an external circumstance beyond his control--the setting</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4649" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4649"></td>
        <td id="LC4649" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">sun.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4650" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4650"></td>
        <td id="LC4650" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4651" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4651"></td>
        <td id="LC4651" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">The sunset struck so brilliantly into the travelling carriage when it</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4652" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4652"></td>
        <td id="LC4652" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">gained the hill-top, that its occupant was steeped in crimson. “It will</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4653" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4653"></td>
        <td id="LC4653" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">die out,” said Monsieur the Marquis, glancing at his hands, “directly.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4654" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4654"></td>
        <td id="LC4654" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4655" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4655"></td>
        <td id="LC4655" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">In effect, the sun was so low that it dipped at the moment. When the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4656" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4656"></td>
        <td id="LC4656" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">heavy drag had been adjusted to the wheel, and the carriage slid down</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4657" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4657"></td>
        <td id="LC4657" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">hill, with a cinderous smell, in a cloud of dust, the red glow departed</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4658" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4658"></td>
        <td id="LC4658" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">quickly; the sun and the Marquis going down together, there was no glow</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4659" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4659"></td>
        <td id="LC4659" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">left when the drag was taken off.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4660" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4660"></td>
        <td id="LC4660" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4661" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4661"></td>
        <td id="LC4661" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">But, there remained a broken country, bold and open, a little village</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4662" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4662"></td>
        <td id="LC4662" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">at the bottom of the hill, a broad sweep and rise beyond it, a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4663" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4663"></td>
        <td id="LC4663" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">church-tower, a windmill, a forest for the chase, and a crag with a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4664" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4664"></td>
        <td id="LC4664" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">fortress on it used as a prison. Round upon all these darkening objects</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4665" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4665"></td>
        <td id="LC4665" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">as the night drew on, the Marquis looked, with the air of one who was</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4666" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4666"></td>
        <td id="LC4666" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">coming near home.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4667" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4667"></td>
        <td id="LC4667" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4668" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4668"></td>
        <td id="LC4668" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">The village had its one poor street, with its poor brewery, poor</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4669" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4669"></td>
        <td id="LC4669" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">tannery, poor tavern, poor stable-yard for relays of post-horses, poor</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4670" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4670"></td>
        <td id="LC4670" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">fountain, all usual poor appointments. It had its poor people too. All</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4671" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4671"></td>
        <td id="LC4671" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">its people were poor, and many of them were sitting at their doors,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4672" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4672"></td>
        <td id="LC4672" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">shredding spare onions and the like for supper, while many were at the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4673" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4673"></td>
        <td id="LC4673" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">fountain, washing leaves, and grasses, and any such small yieldings of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4674" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4674"></td>
        <td id="LC4674" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the earth that could be eaten. Expressive signs of what made them poor,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4675" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4675"></td>
        <td id="LC4675" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">were not wanting; the tax for the state, the tax for the church, the tax</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4676" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4676"></td>
        <td id="LC4676" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">for the lord, tax local and tax general, were to be paid here and to be</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4677" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4677"></td>
        <td id="LC4677" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">paid there, according to solemn inscription in the little village, until</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4678" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4678"></td>
        <td id="LC4678" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the wonder was, that there was any village left unswallowed.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4679" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4679"></td>
        <td id="LC4679" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4680" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4680"></td>
        <td id="LC4680" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Few children were to be seen, and no dogs. As to the men and women,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4681" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4681"></td>
        <td id="LC4681" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">their choice on earth was stated in the prospect--Life on the lowest</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4682" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4682"></td>
        <td id="LC4682" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">terms that could sustain it, down in the little village under the mill;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4683" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4683"></td>
        <td id="LC4683" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">or captivity and Death in the dominant prison on the crag.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4684" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4684"></td>
        <td id="LC4684" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4685" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4685"></td>
        <td id="LC4685" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Heralded by a courier in advance, and by the cracking of his postilions&#39;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4686" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4686"></td>
        <td id="LC4686" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">whips, which twined snake-like about their heads in the evening air, as</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4687" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4687"></td>
        <td id="LC4687" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">if he came attended by the Furies, Monsieur the Marquis drew up in</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4688" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4688"></td>
        <td id="LC4688" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">his travelling carriage at the posting-house gate. It was hard by the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4689" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4689"></td>
        <td id="LC4689" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">fountain, and the peasants suspended their operations to look at him.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4690" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4690"></td>
        <td id="LC4690" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">He looked at them, and saw in them, without knowing it, the slow</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4691" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4691"></td>
        <td id="LC4691" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">sure filing down of misery-worn face and figure, that was to make the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4692" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4692"></td>
        <td id="LC4692" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">meagreness of Frenchmen an English superstition which should survive the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4693" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4693"></td>
        <td id="LC4693" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">truth through the best part of a hundred years.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4694" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4694"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4695" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4695"></td>
        <td id="LC4695" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Monsieur the Marquis cast his eyes over the submissive faces that</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4696" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4696"></td>
        <td id="LC4696" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">drooped before him, as the like of himself had drooped before</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4697" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4697"></td>

        <td id="L4698" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4698"></td>

        <td id="L4699" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4699"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4700" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4700"></td>

        <td id="L4701" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4701"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>

      <tr>

      </tr>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4709" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4709"></td>
        <td id="LC4709" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4710" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4710"></td>
        <td id="LC4710" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Coming up the hill, and at the top of the hill, both?”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4711" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4711"></td>
        <td id="LC4711" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4712" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4712"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4713" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4713"></td>
        <td id="LC4713" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4714" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4714"></td>
        <td id="LC4714" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“What did you look at, so fixedly?”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4715" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4715"></td>
        <td id="LC4715" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4716" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4716"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4717" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4717"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4718" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4718"></td>
        <td id="LC4718" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">He stooped a little, and with his tattered blue cap pointed under the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4719" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4719"></td>
        <td id="LC4719" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">carriage. All his fellows stooped to look under the carriage.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4720" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4720"></td>
        <td id="LC4720" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4721" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4721"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4722" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4722"></td>
        <td id="LC4722" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4723" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4723"></td>
        <td id="LC4723" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Pardon, Monseigneur; he swung by the chain of the shoe--the drag.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4724" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4724"></td>
        <td id="LC4724" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4725" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4725"></td>
        <td id="LC4725" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Who?” demanded the traveller.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4726" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4726"></td>
        <td id="LC4726" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4728" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4728"></td>
        <td id="LC4728" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4729" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4729"></td>
        <td id="LC4729" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“May the Devil carry away these idiots! How do you call the man? You</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4730" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4730"></td>
        <td id="LC4730" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">know all the men of this part of the country. Who was he?”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4731" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4731"></td>
        <td id="LC4731" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4732" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4732"></td>
        <td id="LC4732" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Your clemency, Monseigneur! He was not of this part of the country. Of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4733" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4733"></td>
        <td id="LC4733" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">all the days of my life, I never saw him.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4734" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4734"></td>
        <td id="LC4734" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4735" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4735"></td>
        <td id="LC4735" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Swinging by the chain? To be suffocated?”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4736" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4736"></td>
        <td id="LC4736" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4737" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4737"></td>
        <td id="LC4737" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“With your gracious permission, that was the wonder of it, Monseigneur.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4738" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4738"></td>
        <td id="LC4738" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">His head hanging over--like this!”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4739" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4739"></td>
        <td id="LC4739" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4740" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4740"></td>
        <td id="LC4740" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">He turned himself sideways to the carriage, and leaned back, with his</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4741" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4741"></td>
        <td id="LC4741" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">face thrown up to the sky, and his head hanging down; then recovered</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4742" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4742"></td>
        <td id="LC4742" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">himself, fumbled with his cap, and made a bow.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4743" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4743"></td>
        <td id="LC4743" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4744" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4744"></td>
        <td id="LC4744" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“What was he like?”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4745" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4745"></td>
        <td id="LC4745" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4746" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4746"></td>
        <td id="LC4746" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Monseigneur, he was whiter than the miller. All covered with dust,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4747" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4747"></td>
        <td id="LC4747" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">white as a spectre, tall as a spectre!”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4748" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4748"></td>
        <td id="LC4748" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4749" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4749"></td>
        <td id="LC4749" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">The picture produced an immense sensation in the little crowd; but all</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4750" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4750"></td>
        <td id="LC4750" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">eyes, without comparing notes with other eyes, looked at Monsieur</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4751" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4751"></td>
        <td id="LC4751" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the Marquis. Perhaps, to observe whether he had any spectre on his</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4752" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4752"></td>
        <td id="LC4752" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">conscience.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4753" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4753"></td>
        <td id="LC4753" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4754" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4754"></td>
        <td id="LC4754" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Truly, you did well,” said the Marquis, felicitously sensible that such</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4755" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4755"></td>
        <td id="LC4755" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">vermin were not to ruffle him, “to see a thief accompanying my carriage,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4756" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4756"></td>
        <td id="LC4756" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and not open that great mouth of yours. Bah! Put him aside, Monsieur</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4757" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4757"></td>
        <td id="LC4757" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Gabelle!”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4758" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4758"></td>
        <td id="LC4758" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4759" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4759"></td>
        <td id="LC4759" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Monsieur Gabelle was the Postmaster, and some other taxing functionary</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4760" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4760"></td>
        <td id="LC4760" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">united; he had come out with great obsequiousness to assist at this</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4761" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4761"></td>
        <td id="LC4761" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">examination, and had held the examined by the drapery of his arm in an</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4762" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4762"></td>
        <td id="LC4762" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">official manner.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4763" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4763"></td>
        <td id="LC4763" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4764" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4764"></td>
        <td id="LC4764" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Bah! Go aside!” said Monsieur Gabelle.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4765" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4765"></td>
        <td id="LC4765" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4766" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4766"></td>
        <td id="LC4766" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Lay hands on this stranger if he seeks to lodge in your village</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4767" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4767"></td>
        <td id="LC4767" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">to-night, and be sure that his business is honest, Gabelle.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4768" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4768"></td>
        <td id="LC4768" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4769" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4769"></td>
        <td id="LC4769" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Monseigneur, I am flattered to devote myself to your orders.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4770" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4770"></td>
        <td id="LC4770" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4771" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4771"></td>
        <td id="LC4771" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Did he run away, fellow?--where is that Accursed?”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4772" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4772"></td>
        <td id="LC4772" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4773" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4773"></td>
        <td id="LC4773" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">The accursed was already under the carriage with some half-dozen</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4774" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4774"></td>
        <td id="LC4774" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">particular friends, pointing out the chain with his blue cap. Some</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4775" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4775"></td>
        <td id="LC4775" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">half-dozen other particular friends promptly hauled him out, and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4776" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4776"></td>
        <td id="LC4776" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">presented him breathless to Monsieur the Marquis.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4777" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4777"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4778" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4778"></td>
        <td id="LC4778" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Did the man run away, Dolt, when we stopped for the drag?”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4779" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4779"></td>
        <td id="LC4779" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4780" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4780"></td>
        <td id="LC4780" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Monseigneur, he precipitated himself over the hill-side, head first, as</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4781" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4781"></td>
        <td id="LC4781" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">a person plunges into the river.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4782" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4782"></td>
        <td id="LC4782" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4784" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4784"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4785" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4785"></td>
        <td id="LC4785" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">The half-dozen who were peering at the chain were still among the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4786" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4786"></td>
        <td id="LC4786" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">wheels, like sheep; the wheels turned so suddenly that they were lucky</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4787" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4787"></td>
        <td id="LC4787" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">to save their skins and bones; they had very little else to save, or</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4788" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4788"></td>
        <td id="LC4788" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">they might not have been so fortunate.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4789" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4789"></td>
        <td id="LC4789" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4790" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4790"></td>
        <td id="LC4790" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">The burst with which the carriage started out of the village and up the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4791" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4791"></td>
        <td id="LC4791" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">rise beyond, was soon checked by the steepness of the hill. Gradually,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4792" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4792"></td>
        <td id="LC4792" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">it subsided to a foot pace, swinging and lumbering upward among the many</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4793" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4793"></td>
        <td id="LC4793" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">sweet scents of a summer night. The postilions, with a thousand gossamer</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4794" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4794"></td>
        <td id="LC4794" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">gnats circling about them in lieu of the Furies, quietly mended the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4795" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4795"></td>
        <td id="LC4795" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">points to the lashes of their whips; the valet walked by the horses; the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4796" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4796"></td>
        <td id="LC4796" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">courier was audible, trotting on ahead into the dull distance.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4797" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4797"></td>
        <td id="LC4797" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4798" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4798"></td>
        <td id="LC4798" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">At the steepest point of the hill there was a little burial-ground,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4799" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4799"></td>
        <td id="LC4799" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">with a Cross and a new large figure of Our Saviour on it; it was a poor</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4800" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4800"></td>
        <td id="LC4800" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">figure in wood, done by some inexperienced rustic carver, but he had</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4801" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4801"></td>
        <td id="LC4801" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">studied the figure from the life--his own life, maybe--for it was</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4802" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4802"></td>
        <td id="LC4802" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">dreadfully spare and thin.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4803" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4803"></td>
        <td id="LC4803" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4804" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4804"></td>
        <td id="LC4804" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">To this distressful emblem of a great distress that had long been</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4805" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4805"></td>
        <td id="LC4805" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">growing worse, and was not at its worst, a woman was kneeling. She</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4806" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4806"></td>
        <td id="LC4806" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">turned her head as the carriage came up to her, rose quickly, and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4807" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4807"></td>
        <td id="LC4807" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">presented herself at the carriage-door.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4808" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4808"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4809" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4809"></td>
        <td id="LC4809" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“It is you, Monseigneur! Monseigneur, a petition.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4810" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4810"></td>
        <td id="LC4810" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4811" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4811"></td>
        <td id="LC4811" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">With an exclamation of impatience, but with his unchangeable face,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4812" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4812"></td>
        <td id="LC4812" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Monseigneur looked out.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4813" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4813"></td>
        <td id="LC4813" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4814" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4814"></td>
        <td id="LC4814" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“How, then! What is it? Always petitions!”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4815" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4815"></td>
        <td id="LC4815" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>

      <tr>

        <td id="LC4816" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Monseigneur. For the love of the great God! My husband, the forester.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4817" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4817"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4818" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4818"></td>
        <td id="LC4818" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“What of your husband, the forester? Always the same with you people. He</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4819" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4819"></td>
        <td id="LC4819" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">cannot pay something?”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4820" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4820"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4822" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4822"></td>
        <td id="LC4822" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4824" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4824"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4826" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4826"></td>
        <td id="LC4826" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">grass.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4827" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4827"></td>

      </tr>

        <td id="L4828" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4828"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4829" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4829"></td>
        <td id="LC4829" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
