      <tr>
        <td id="L4831" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4831"></td>
        <td id="LC4831" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4832" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4832"></td>
        <td id="LC4832" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Again, well?”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4833" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4833"></td>
        <td id="LC4833" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4834" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4834"></td>
        <td id="LC4834" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">She looked an old woman, but was young. Her manner was one of passionate</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4835" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4835"></td>
        <td id="LC4835" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">grief; by turns she clasped her veinous and knotted hands together</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4836" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4836"></td>
        <td id="LC4836" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">with wild energy, and laid one of them on the carriage-door--tenderly,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4837" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4837"></td>
        <td id="LC4837" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">caressingly, as if it had been a human breast, and could be expected to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4838" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4838"></td>
        <td id="LC4838" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">feel the appealing touch.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4839" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4839"></td>
        <td id="LC4839" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4840" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4840"></td>
        <td id="LC4840" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Monseigneur, hear me! Monseigneur, hear my petition! My husband died of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4841" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4841"></td>
        <td id="LC4841" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">want; so many die of want; so many more will die of want.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4842" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4842"></td>
        <td id="LC4842" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4843" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4843"></td>
        <td id="LC4843" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Again, well? Can I feed them?”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4844" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4844"></td>
        <td id="LC4844" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4845" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4845"></td>
        <td id="LC4845" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Monseigneur, the good God knows; but I don&#39;t ask it. My petition is,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4846" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4846"></td>
        <td id="LC4846" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">that a morsel of stone or wood, with my husband&#39;s name, may be placed</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4847" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4847"></td>
        <td id="LC4847" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">over him to show where he lies. Otherwise, the place will be quickly</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4848" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4848"></td>
        <td id="LC4848" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">forgotten, it will never be found when I am dead of the same malady, I</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4849" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4849"></td>
        <td id="LC4849" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">shall be laid under some other heap of poor grass. Monseigneur, they</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4850" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4850"></td>
        <td id="LC4850" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">are so many, they increase so fast, there is so much want. Monseigneur!</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4851" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4851"></td>
        <td id="LC4851" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Monseigneur!”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4852" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4852"></td>
        <td id="LC4852" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4853" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4853"></td>
        <td id="LC4853" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">The valet had put her away from the door, the carriage had broken into</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4854" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4854"></td>
        <td id="LC4854" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">a brisk trot, the postilions had quickened the pace, she was left far</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4855" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4855"></td>
        <td id="LC4855" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">behind, and Monseigneur, again escorted by the Furies, was rapidly</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4856" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4856"></td>
        <td id="LC4856" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">diminishing the league or two of distance that remained between him and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4857" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4857"></td>
        <td id="LC4857" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">his chateau.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4858" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4858"></td>
        <td id="LC4858" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4859" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4859"></td>
        <td id="LC4859" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">The sweet scents of the summer night rose all around him, and rose, as</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4860" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4860"></td>
        <td id="LC4860" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the rain falls, impartially, on the dusty, ragged, and toil-worn group</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4861" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4861"></td>
        <td id="LC4861" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">at the fountain not far away; to whom the mender of roads, with the aid</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4862" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4862"></td>
        <td id="LC4862" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">of the blue cap without which he was nothing, still enlarged upon his</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4863" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4863"></td>
        <td id="LC4863" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">man like a spectre, as long as they could bear it. By degrees, as they</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4864" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4864"></td>
        <td id="LC4864" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">could bear no more, they dropped off one by one, and lights twinkled</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4865" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4865"></td>
        <td id="LC4865" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">in little casements; which lights, as the casements darkened, and more</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4866" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4866"></td>
        <td id="LC4866" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">stars came out, seemed to have shot up into the sky instead of having</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4867" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4867"></td>
        <td id="LC4867" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">been extinguished.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4868" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4868"></td>
        <td id="LC4868" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4869" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4869"></td>
        <td id="LC4869" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">The shadow of a large high-roofed house, and of many over-hanging trees,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4870" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4870"></td>
        <td id="LC4870" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">was upon Monsieur the Marquis by that time; and the shadow was exchanged</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4871" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4871"></td>
        <td id="LC4871" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">for the light of a flambeau, as his carriage stopped, and the great door</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4872" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4872"></td>
        <td id="LC4872" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">of his chateau was opened to him.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4873" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4873"></td>

        <td id="L4874" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4874"></td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L4881" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4881"></td>
        <td id="LC4881" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">IX. The Gorgon&#39;s Head</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4882" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4882"></td>
        <td id="LC4882" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4883" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4883"></td>
        <td id="LC4883" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4884" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4884"></td>
        <td id="LC4884" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">It was a heavy mass of building, that chateau of Monsieur the Marquis,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4885" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4885"></td>
        <td id="LC4885" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">with a large stone courtyard before it, and two stone sweeps of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4886" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4886"></td>
        <td id="LC4886" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">staircase meeting in a stone terrace before the principal door. A stony</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4887" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4887"></td>
        <td id="LC4887" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">business altogether, with heavy stone balustrades, and stone urns, and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4888" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4888"></td>
        <td id="LC4888" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">stone flowers, and stone faces of men, and stone heads of lions, in</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4889" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4889"></td>
        <td id="LC4889" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">all directions. As if the Gorgon&#39;s head had surveyed it, when it was</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4890" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4890"></td>
        <td id="LC4890" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">finished, two centuries ago.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4891" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4891"></td>
        <td id="LC4891" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4892" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4892"></td>
        <td id="LC4892" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Up the broad flight of shallow steps, Monsieur the Marquis, flambeau</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4893" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4893"></td>
        <td id="LC4893" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">preceded, went from his carriage, sufficiently disturbing the darkness</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4894" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4894"></td>
        <td id="LC4894" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">to elicit loud remonstrance from an owl in the roof of the great pile</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4895" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4895"></td>
        <td id="LC4895" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">of stable building away among the trees. All else was so quiet, that the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4896" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4896"></td>
        <td id="LC4896" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">flambeau carried up the steps, and the other flambeau held at the great</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4897" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4897"></td>
        <td id="LC4897" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">door, burnt as if they were in a close room of state, instead of being</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4898" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4898"></td>
        <td id="LC4898" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">in the open night-air. Other sound than the owl&#39;s voice there was none,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4899" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4899"></td>
        <td id="LC4899" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">save the falling of a fountain into its stone basin; for, it was one of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4900" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4900"></td>
        <td id="LC4900" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">those dark nights that hold their breath by the hour together, and then</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4901" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4901"></td>
        <td id="LC4901" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">heave a long low sigh, and hold their breath again.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4902" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4902"></td>
        <td id="LC4902" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4903" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4903"></td>
        <td id="LC4903" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">The great door clanged behind him, and Monsieur the Marquis crossed a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4904" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4904"></td>
        <td id="LC4904" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">hall grim with certain old boar-spears, swords, and knives of the chase;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4905" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4905"></td>
        <td id="LC4905" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">grimmer with certain heavy riding-rods and riding-whips, of which many a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4906" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4906"></td>
        <td id="LC4906" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">peasant, gone to his benefactor Death, had felt the weight when his lord</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4907" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4907"></td>
        <td id="LC4907" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">was angry.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4908" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4908"></td>
        <td id="LC4908" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4909" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4909"></td>
        <td id="LC4909" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Avoiding the larger rooms, which were dark and made fast for the night,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4910" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4910"></td>
        <td id="LC4910" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Monsieur the Marquis, with his flambeau-bearer going on before, went up</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4911" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4911"></td>
        <td id="LC4911" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the staircase to a door in a corridor. This thrown open, admitted him</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4912" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4912"></td>
        <td id="LC4912" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">to his own private apartment of three rooms: his bed-chamber and two</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4913" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4913"></td>
        <td id="LC4913" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">others. High vaulted rooms with cool uncarpeted floors, great dogs upon</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4914" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4914"></td>
        <td id="LC4914" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the hearths for the burning of wood in winter time, and all luxuries</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4915" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4915"></td>
        <td id="LC4915" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">befitting the state of a marquis in a luxurious age and country.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4916" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4916"></td>
        <td id="LC4916" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">The fashion of the last Louis but one, of the line that was never to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4917" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4917"></td>
        <td id="LC4917" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">break--the fourteenth Louis--was conspicuous in their rich furniture;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4918" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4918"></td>
        <td id="LC4918" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">but, it was diversified by many objects that were illustrations of old</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4919" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4919"></td>
        <td id="LC4919" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">pages in the history of France.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4920" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4920"></td>
        <td id="LC4920" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4921" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4921"></td>
        <td id="LC4921" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">A supper-table was laid for two, in the third of the rooms; a round</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4922" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4922"></td>
        <td id="LC4922" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">room, in one of the chateau&#39;s four extinguisher-topped towers. A small</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4923" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4923"></td>
        <td id="LC4923" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">lofty room, with its window wide open, and the wooden jalousie-blinds</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4924" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4924"></td>
        <td id="LC4924" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">closed, so that the dark night only showed in slight horizontal lines of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4925" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4925"></td>
        <td id="LC4925" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">black, alternating with their broad lines of stone colour.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4926" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4926"></td>
        <td id="LC4926" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4927" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4927"></td>
        <td id="LC4927" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“My nephew,” said the Marquis, glancing at the supper preparation; “they</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4928" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4928"></td>
        <td id="LC4928" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">said he was not arrived.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4929" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4929"></td>
        <td id="LC4929" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4930" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4930"></td>
        <td id="LC4930" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Nor was he; but, he had been expected with Monseigneur.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4931" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4931"></td>
        <td id="LC4931" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4932" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4932"></td>
        <td id="LC4932" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Ah! It is not probable he will arrive to-night; nevertheless, leave the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4933" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4933"></td>
        <td id="LC4933" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">table as it is. I shall be ready in a quarter of an hour.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4934" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4934"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4936" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4936"></td>
        <td id="LC4936" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">sumptuous and choice supper. His chair was opposite to the window, and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4937" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4937"></td>
        <td id="LC4937" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">he had taken his soup, and was raising his glass of Bordeaux to his</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4938" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4938"></td>
        <td id="LC4938" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">lips, when he put it down.</td>

      <tr>

        <td id="L4940" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4940"></td>

        <td id="L4967" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4967"></td>

        <td id="L4974" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4974"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5003" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5003"></td>
        <td id="LC5003" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">When coffee had been served and they were alone together, the nephew,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5004" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5004"></td>
        <td id="LC5004" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">looking at the uncle and meeting the eyes of the face that was like a</td>

        <td id="L5008" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5008"></td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L5013" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5013"></td>

      </tr>

        <td id="L5015" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5015"></td>
        <td id="LC5015" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the utmost brink of death, you would have cared to stop me there.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5016" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5016"></td>
        <td id="LC5016" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L5017" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5017"></td>
        <td id="LC5017" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">The deepened marks in the nose, and the lengthening of the fine straight</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5018" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5018"></td>
        <td id="LC5018" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">lines in the cruel face, looked ominous as to that; the uncle made a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5019" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5019"></td>
        <td id="LC5019" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">graceful gesture of protest, which was so clearly a slight form of good</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5020" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5020"></td>
        <td id="LC5020" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">breeding that it was not reassuring.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5021" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5021"></td>
        <td id="LC5021" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5022" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5022"></td>
        <td id="LC5022" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Indeed, sir,” pursued the nephew, “for anything I know, you may have</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5023" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5023"></td>
        <td id="LC5023" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">expressly worked to give a more suspicious appearance to the suspicious</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5024" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5024"></td>
        <td id="LC5024" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">circumstances that surrounded me.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5025" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5025"></td>
        <td id="LC5025" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5026" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5026"></td>
        <td id="LC5026" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“No, no, no,” said the uncle, pleasantly.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5027" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5027"></td>
        <td id="LC5027" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>

      <tr>
        <td id="L5121" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5121"></td>
        <td id="LC5121" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">of the family, if you will not. But you must be fatigued. Shall we</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5122" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5122"></td>
        <td id="LC5122" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">terminate our conference for the night?”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5123" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5123"></td>
        <td id="LC5123" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5124" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5124"></td>
        <td id="LC5124" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“A moment more.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5125" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5125"></td>
        <td id="LC5125" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5126" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5126"></td>
        <td id="LC5126" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“An hour, if you please.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5127" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5127"></td>
        <td id="LC5127" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5128" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5128"></td>
        <td id="LC5128" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Sir,” said the nephew, “we have done wrong, and are reaping the fruits</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5129" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5129"></td>
        <td id="LC5129" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">of wrong.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5130" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5130"></td>
        <td id="LC5130" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5131" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5131"></td>
        <td id="LC5131" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“_We_ have done wrong?” repeated the Marquis, with an inquiring smile,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5132" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5132"></td>
        <td id="LC5132" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and delicately pointing, first to his nephew, then to himself.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5133" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5133"></td>
        <td id="LC5133" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5134" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5134"></td>
        <td id="LC5134" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Our family; our honourable family, whose honour is of so much account</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5135" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5135"></td>
        <td id="LC5135" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">to both of us, in such different ways. Even in my father&#39;s time, we did</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5136" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5136"></td>
        <td id="LC5136" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">a world of wrong, injuring every human creature who came between us and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5137" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5137"></td>
        <td id="LC5137" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">our pleasure, whatever it was. Why need I speak of my father&#39;s time,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5138" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5138"></td>
        <td id="LC5138" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">when it is equally yours? Can I separate my father&#39;s twin-brother, joint</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5139" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5139"></td>
        <td id="LC5139" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">inheritor, and next successor, from himself?”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5140" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5140"></td>
        <td id="LC5140" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5141" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5141"></td>
        <td id="LC5141" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Death has done that!” said the Marquis.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5142" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5142"></td>
        <td id="LC5142" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5143" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5143"></td>
        <td id="LC5143" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“And has left me,” answered the nephew, “bound to a system that is</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5144" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5144"></td>
        <td id="LC5144" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">frightful to me, responsible for it, but powerless in it; seeking to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5145" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5145"></td>
        <td id="LC5145" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">execute the last request of my dear mother&#39;s lips, and obey the last</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5146" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5146"></td>
        <td id="LC5146" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">look of my dear mother&#39;s eyes, which implored me to have mercy and to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5147" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5147"></td>
        <td id="LC5147" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">redress; and tortured by seeking assistance and power in vain.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5148" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5148"></td>
        <td id="LC5148" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5149" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5149"></td>
        <td id="LC5149" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Seeking them from me, my nephew,” said the Marquis, touching him on the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5150" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5150"></td>
        <td id="LC5150" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">breast with his forefinger--they were now standing by the hearth--“you</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5151" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5151"></td>
        <td id="LC5151" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">will for ever seek them in vain, be assured.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5152" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5152"></td>
        <td id="LC5152" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5153" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5153"></td>
        <td id="LC5153" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Every fine straight line in the clear whiteness of his face, was</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5154" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5154"></td>
        <td id="LC5154" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">cruelly, craftily, and closely compressed, while he stood looking</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5155" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5155"></td>
        <td id="LC5155" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">quietly at his nephew, with his snuff-box in his hand. Once again he</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5156" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5156"></td>
        <td id="LC5156" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">touched him on the breast, as though his finger were the fine point of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5157" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5157"></td>
        <td id="LC5157" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">a small sword, with which, in delicate finesse, he ran him through the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5158" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5158"></td>
        <td id="LC5158" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">body, and said,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5159" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5159"></td>
        <td id="LC5159" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5160" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5160"></td>
        <td id="LC5160" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“My friend, I will die, perpetuating the system under which I have</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5161" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5161"></td>
        <td id="LC5161" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">lived.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5162" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5162"></td>
        <td id="LC5162" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5163" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5163"></td>
        <td id="LC5163" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">When he had said it, he took a culminating pinch of snuff, and put his</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5164" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5164"></td>
        <td id="LC5164" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">box in his pocket.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5165" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5165"></td>
        <td id="LC5165" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5166" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5166"></td>
        <td id="LC5166" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Better to be a rational creature,” he added then, after ringing a small</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5167" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5167"></td>
        <td id="LC5167" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">bell on the table, “and accept your natural destiny. But you are lost,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5168" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5168"></td>
        <td id="LC5168" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Monsieur Charles, I see.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5169" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5169"></td>
        <td id="LC5169" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5170" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5170"></td>
        <td id="LC5170" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“This property and France are lost to me,” said the nephew, sadly; “I</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5171" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5171"></td>
        <td id="LC5171" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">renounce them.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5172" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5172"></td>
        <td id="LC5172" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5173" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5173"></td>
        <td id="LC5173" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Are they both yours to renounce? France may be, but is the property? It</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5174" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5174"></td>
        <td id="LC5174" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">is scarcely worth mentioning; but, is it yet?”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5175" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5175"></td>
        <td id="LC5175" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5176" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5176"></td>
        <td id="LC5176" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“I had no intention, in the words I used, to claim it yet. If it passed</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5177" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5177"></td>
        <td id="LC5177" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">to me from you, to-morrow--”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5178" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5178"></td>
        <td id="LC5178" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5179" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5179"></td>
        <td id="LC5179" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Which I have the vanity to hope is not probable.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5180" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5180"></td>
        <td id="LC5180" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5181" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5181"></td>
        <td id="LC5181" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“--or twenty years hence--”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5182" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5182"></td>
        <td id="LC5182" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5183" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5183"></td>
        <td id="LC5183" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“You do me too much honour,” said the Marquis; “still, I prefer that</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5184" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5184"></td>
        <td id="LC5184" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">supposition.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5185" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5185"></td>
        <td id="LC5185" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5186" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5186"></td>
        <td id="LC5186" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“--I would abandon it, and live otherwise and elsewhere. It is little to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5187" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5187"></td>
        <td id="LC5187" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">relinquish. What is it but a wilderness of misery and ruin!”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5188" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5188"></td>
        <td id="LC5188" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5189" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5189"></td>
        <td id="LC5189" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Hah!” said the Marquis, glancing round the luxurious room.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5190" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5190"></td>
        <td id="LC5190" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5191" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5191"></td>
        <td id="LC5191" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“To the eye it is fair enough, here; but seen in its integrity,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5192" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5192"></td>
        <td id="LC5192" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">under the sky, and by the daylight, it is a crumbling tower of waste,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5193" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5193"></td>
        <td id="LC5193" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">mismanagement, extortion, debt, mortgage, oppression, hunger, nakedness,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5194" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5194"></td>
        <td id="LC5194" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and suffering.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5195" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5195"></td>
        <td id="LC5195" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5196" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5196"></td>
        <td id="LC5196" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Hah!” said the Marquis again, in a well-satisfied manner.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5197" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5197"></td>
        <td id="LC5197" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5198" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5198"></td>
        <td id="LC5198" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“If it ever becomes mine, it shall be put into some hands better</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5199" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5199"></td>
        <td id="LC5199" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">qualified to free it slowly (if such a thing is possible) from the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5200" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5200"></td>
        <td id="LC5200" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">weight that drags it down, so that the miserable people who cannot leave</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5201" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5201"></td>
        <td id="LC5201" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">it and who have been long wrung to the last point of endurance, may, in</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5202" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5202"></td>
        <td id="LC5202" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">another generation, suffer less; but it is not for me. There is a curse</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5203" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5203"></td>
        <td id="LC5203" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">on it, and on all this land.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5204" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5204"></td>
        <td id="LC5204" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5205" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5205"></td>
        <td id="LC5205" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“And you?” said the uncle. “Forgive my curiosity; do you, under your new</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5206" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5206"></td>
        <td id="LC5206" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">philosophy, graciously intend to live?”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5207" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5207"></td>
        <td id="LC5207" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5208" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5208"></td>
        <td id="LC5208" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“I must do, to live, what others of my countrymen, even with nobility at</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5209" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5209"></td>
        <td id="LC5209" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">their backs, may have to do some day--work.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5210" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5210"></td>
        <td id="LC5210" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5211" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5211"></td>
        <td id="LC5211" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“In England, for example?”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5212" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5212"></td>
        <td id="LC5212" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5213" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5213"></td>
        <td id="LC5213" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Yes. The family honour, sir, is safe from me in this country. The</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5214" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5214"></td>
        <td id="LC5214" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">family name can suffer from me in no other, for I bear it in no other.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5215" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5215"></td>
        <td id="LC5215" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5494" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5494"></td>
        <td id="LC5494" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Darnay hesitated.</td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5588" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5588"></td>
        <td id="LC5588" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">you, driven from it by its distractions, oppressions, and miseries; like</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5589" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5589"></td>
        <td id="LC5589" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">you, striving to live away from it by my own exertions, and trusting</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5590" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5590"></td>
        <td id="LC5590" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">in a happier future; I look only to sharing your fortunes, sharing your</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5591" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5591"></td>
        <td id="LC5591" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">life and home, and being faithful to you to the death. Not to divide</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5592" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5592"></td>
        <td id="LC5592" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">with Lucie her privilege as your child, companion, and friend; but to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5593" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5593"></td>
        <td id="LC5593" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">come in aid of it, and bind her closer to you, if such a thing can be.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5594" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5594"></td>
        <td id="LC5594" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5595" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5595"></td>
        <td id="LC5595" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">His touch still lingered on her father&#39;s hand. Answering the touch for a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5596" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5596"></td>
        <td id="LC5596" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">moment, but not coldly, her father rested his hands upon the arms of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5597" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5597"></td>
        <td id="LC5597" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">his chair, and looked up for the first time since the beginning of the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5598" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5598"></td>
        <td id="LC5598" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">conference. A struggle was evidently in his face; a struggle with that</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5599" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5599"></td>
        <td id="LC5599" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">occasional look which had a tendency in it to dark doubt and dread.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5600" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5600"></td>
        <td id="LC5600" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5601" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5601"></td>
        <td id="LC5601" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“You speak so feelingly and so manfully, Charles Darnay, that I thank</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5602" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5602"></td>
        <td id="LC5602" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">you with all my heart, and will open all my heart--or nearly so. Have</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5603" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5603"></td>
        <td id="LC5603" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">you any reason to believe that Lucie loves you?”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5604" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5604"></td>
        <td id="LC5604" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5605" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5605"></td>
        <td id="LC5605" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“None. As yet, none.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5606" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5606"></td>
        <td id="LC5606" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5607" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5607"></td>
        <td id="LC5607" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Is it the immediate object of this confidence, that you may at once</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5608" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5608"></td>
        <td id="LC5608" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">ascertain that, with my knowledge?”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5609" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5609"></td>
        <td id="LC5609" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5610" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5610"></td>
        <td id="LC5610" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Not even so. I might not have the hopefulness to do it for weeks; I</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5611" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5611"></td>
        <td id="LC5611" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">might (mistaken or not mistaken) have that hopefulness to-morrow.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5612" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5612"></td>
        <td id="LC5612" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5613" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5613"></td>
        <td id="LC5613" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Do you seek any guidance from me?”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5614" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5614"></td>
        <td id="LC5614" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5615" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5615"></td>
        <td id="LC5615" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“I ask none, sir. But I have thought it possible that you might have it</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5616" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5616"></td>
        <td id="LC5616" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">in your power, if you should deem it right, to give me some.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5617" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5617"></td>
        <td id="LC5617" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5618" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5618"></td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L5619" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5619"></td>
        <td id="LC5619" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5620" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5620"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5621" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5621"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5622" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5622"></td>
        <td id="LC5622" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“What is it?”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5623" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5623"></td>
        <td id="LC5623" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5624" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5624"></td>
        <td id="LC5624" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“I well understand that, without you, I could have no hope. I well</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5625" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5625"></td>
        <td id="LC5625" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">understand that, even if Miss Manette held me at this moment in her</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5626" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5626"></td>
        <td id="LC5626" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">innocent heart--do not think I have the presumption to assume so much--I</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5627" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5627"></td>
        <td id="LC5627" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">could retain no place in it against her love for her father.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5628" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5628"></td>
        <td id="LC5628" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5629" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5629"></td>
        <td id="LC5629" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“If that be so, do you see what, on the other hand, is involved in it?”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5630" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5630"></td>
        <td id="LC5630" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5631" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5631"></td>
        <td id="LC5631" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“I understand equally well, that a word from her father in any suitor&#39;s</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5632" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5632"></td>
        <td id="LC5632" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">favour, would outweigh herself and all the world. For which reason,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5633" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5633"></td>
        <td id="LC5633" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Doctor Manette,” said Darnay, modestly but firmly, “I would not ask that</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5634" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5634"></td>
        <td id="LC5634" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">word, to save my life.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5635" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5635"></td>
        <td id="LC5635" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5636" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5636"></td>
        <td id="LC5636" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“I am sure of it. Charles Darnay, mysteries arise out of close love, as</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5637" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5637"></td>
        <td id="LC5637" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">well as out of wide division; in the former case, they are subtle and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5638" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5638"></td>
        <td id="LC5638" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">delicate, and difficult to penetrate. My daughter Lucie is, in this one</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5639" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5639"></td>
        <td id="LC5639" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">respect, such a mystery to me; I can make no guess at the state of her</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5640" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5640"></td>
        <td id="LC5640" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">heart.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5641" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5641"></td>
        <td id="LC5641" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5642" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5642"></td>
        <td id="LC5642" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“May I ask, sir, if you think she is--” As he hesitated, her father</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5643" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5643"></td>
        <td id="LC5643" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">supplied the rest.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5644" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5644"></td>
        <td id="LC5644" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5645" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5645"></td>
        <td id="LC5645" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Is sought by any other suitor?”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5646" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5646"></td>
        <td id="LC5646" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5647" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5647"></td>
        <td id="LC5647" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“It is what I meant to say.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5648" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5648"></td>
        <td id="LC5648" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5649" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5649"></td>
        <td id="LC5649" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Her father considered a little before he answered:</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5650" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5650"></td>
        <td id="LC5650" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5651" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5651"></td>
        <td id="LC5651" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“You have seen Mr. Carton here, yourself. Mr. Stryver is here too,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5652" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5652"></td>
        <td id="LC5652" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">occasionally. If it be at all, it can only be by one of these.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5653" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5653"></td>
        <td id="LC5653" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5654" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5654"></td>
        <td id="LC5654" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Or both,” said Darnay.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5655" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5655"></td>
        <td id="LC5655" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5656" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5656"></td>
        <td id="LC5656" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“I had not thought of both; I should not think either, likely. You want</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5657" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5657"></td>
        <td id="LC5657" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">a promise from me. Tell me what it is.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5658" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5658"></td>
        <td id="LC5658" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5659" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5659"></td>
        <td id="LC5659" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“It is, that if Miss Manette should bring to you at any time, on her own</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5660" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5660"></td>
        <td id="LC5660" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">part, such a confidence as I have ventured to lay before you, you will</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5661" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5661"></td>
        <td id="LC5661" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">bear testimony to what I have said, and to your belief in it. I hope you</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5662" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5662"></td>
        <td id="LC5662" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">may be able to think so well of me, as to urge no influence against</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5663" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5663"></td>
        <td id="LC5663" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">me. I say nothing more of my stake in this; this is what I ask. The</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5664" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5664"></td>
        <td id="LC5664" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">condition on which I ask it, and which you have an undoubted right to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5665" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5665"></td>
        <td id="LC5665" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">require, I will observe immediately.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5666" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5666"></td>
        <td id="LC5666" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5667" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5667"></td>
        <td id="LC5667" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“I give the promise,” said the Doctor, “without any condition. I believe</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5668" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5668"></td>
        <td id="LC5668" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">your object to be, purely and truthfully, as you have stated it. I</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5669" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5669"></td>
        <td id="LC5669" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">believe your intention is to perpetuate, and not to weaken, the ties</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5670" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5670"></td>
        <td id="LC5670" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">between me and my other and far dearer self. If she should ever tell me</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5671" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5671"></td>
        <td id="LC5671" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">that you are essential to her perfect happiness, I will give her to you.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5672" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5672"></td>
        <td id="LC5672" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">If there were--Charles Darnay, if there were--”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5673" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5673"></td>
        <td id="LC5673" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5674" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5674"></td>
        <td id="LC5674" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">The young man had taken his hand gratefully; their hands were joined as</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5675" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5675"></td>
        <td id="LC5675" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the Doctor spoke:</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5676" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5676"></td>
        <td id="LC5676" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5677" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5677"></td>
        <td id="LC5677" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“--any fancies, any reasons, any apprehensions, anything whatsoever,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5678" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5678"></td>
        <td id="LC5678" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">new or old, against the man she really loved--the direct responsibility</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5679" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5679"></td>
        <td id="LC5679" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">thereof not lying on his head--they should all be obliterated for her</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5680" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5680"></td>
        <td id="LC5680" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">sake. She is everything to me; more to me than suffering, more to me</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5681" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5681"></td>
        <td id="LC5681" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">than wrong, more to me--Well! This is idle talk.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5682" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5682"></td>

        <td id="LC5776" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“I don&#39;t feel disposed to say much. Who is she?”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5865" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5865"></td>
        <td id="LC5865" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“You made mention of the young lady as a golden-haired doll. The young</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5866" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5866"></td>
        <td id="LC5866" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">lady is Miss Manette. If you had been a fellow of any sensitiveness or</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5867" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5867"></td>
        <td id="LC5867" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">delicacy of feeling in that kind of way, Sydney, I might have been a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5868" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5868"></td>
        <td id="LC5868" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">little resentful of your employing such a designation; but you are not.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5869" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5869"></td>
        <td id="LC5869" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">You want that sense altogether; therefore I am no more annoyed when I</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5870" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5870"></td>
        <td id="LC5870" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">think of the expression, than I should be annoyed by a man&#39;s opinion of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5871" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5871"></td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L6056" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6056"></td>
        <td id="LC6056" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“When I speak of success, I speak of success with the young lady; and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6057" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6057"></td>
        <td id="LC6057" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">when I speak of causes and reasons to make success probable, I speak of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6058" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6058"></td>
        <td id="LC6058" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">causes and reasons that will tell as such with the young lady. The young</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6059" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6059"></td>
        <td id="LC6059" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">lady, my good sir,” said Mr. Lorry, mildly tapping the Stryver arm, “the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6060" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6060"></td>
        <td id="LC6060" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">young lady. The young lady goes before all.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6061" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6061"></td>

      <tr>

        <td id="LC6064" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">present in question is a mincing Fool?”</td>

        <td id="LC6072" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">mind.”</td>

        <td id="L6074" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6074"></td>

        <td id="LC6088" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">bar?”</td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6100" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6100"></td>
        <td id="LC6100" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">not justified in saying anything about this matter, for, as a man of</td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6131" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6131"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6132" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6132"></td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L6136" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6136"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6137" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6137"></td>
        <td id="LC6137" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Then I say yes,” said Stryver: “I won&#39;t go up there now, I am not so</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6138" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6138"></td>
        <td id="LC6138" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">hot upon it as that comes to; I say yes, and I shall expect you to look</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6139" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6139"></td>
        <td id="LC6139" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">in to-night. Good morning.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6140" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6140"></td>
        <td id="LC6140" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6141" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6141"></td>
        <td id="LC6141" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Then Mr. Stryver turned and burst out of the Bank, causing such a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6142" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6142"></td>
        <td id="LC6142" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">concussion of air on his passage through, that to stand up against it</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6143" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6143"></td>
        <td id="LC6143" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">bowing behind the two counters, required the utmost remaining strength</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6144" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6144"></td>
        <td id="LC6144" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">of the two ancient clerks. Those venerable and feeble persons were</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6145" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6145"></td>
        <td id="LC6145" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">always seen by the public in the act of bowing, and were popularly</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6146" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6146"></td>
        <td id="LC6146" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">believed, when they had bowed a customer out, still to keep on bowing in</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6147" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6147"></td>
        <td id="LC6147" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the empty office until they bowed another customer in.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6148" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6148"></td>
        <td id="LC6148" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L6149" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6149"></td>
        <td id="LC6149" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">The barrister was keen enough to divine that the banker would not have</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6150" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6150"></td>
        <td id="LC6150" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">gone so far in his expression of opinion on any less solid ground than</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6151" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6151"></td>
        <td id="LC6151" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">moral certainty. Unprepared as he was for the large pill he had to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6152" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6152"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6153" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6153"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>

      <tr>
        <td id="L6155" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6155"></td>
        <td id="LC6155" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L6156" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6156"></td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L6183" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6183"></td>
