      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6188" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6188"></td>
        <td id="LC6188" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6189" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6189"></td>
        <td id="LC6189" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“No it doesn&#39;t; I assure you it doesn&#39;t. Having supposed that there was</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6190" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6190"></td>
        <td id="LC6190" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">sense where there is no sense, and a laudable ambition where there is</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6191" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6191"></td>
        <td id="LC6191" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">not a laudable ambition, I am well out of my mistake, and no harm is</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6192" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6192"></td>
        <td id="LC6192" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">done. Young women have committed similar follies often before, and have</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6193" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6193"></td>
        <td id="LC6193" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">repented them in poverty and obscurity often before. In an unselfish</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6194" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6194"></td>
        <td id="LC6194" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">aspect, I am sorry that the thing is dropped, because it would have been</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6195" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6195"></td>
        <td id="LC6195" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">a bad thing for me in a worldly point of view; in a selfish aspect, I am</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6196" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6196"></td>
        <td id="LC6196" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">glad that the thing has dropped, because it would have been a bad thing</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6197" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6197"></td>
        <td id="LC6197" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">for me in a worldly point of view--it is hardly necessary to say I could</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>

        <td id="LC6198" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">have gained nothing by it. There is no harm at all done. I have not</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6199" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6199"></td>
        <td id="LC6199" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">proposed to the young lady, and, between ourselves, I am by no means</td>

        <td id="L6200" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6200"></td>
        <td id="LC6200" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">certain, on reflection, that I ever should have committed myself to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6201" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6201"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6202" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6202"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6203" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6203"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6204" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6204"></td>
        <td id="LC6204" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">I regret it on account of others, but I am satisfied on my own account.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6205" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6205"></td>
        <td id="LC6205" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">And I am really very much obliged to you for allowing me to sound you,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6206" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6206"></td>

        <td id="L6207" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6207"></td>
        <td id="LC6207" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">you were right, it never would have done.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6208" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6208"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6209" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6209"></td>
        <td id="LC6209" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Mr. Lorry was so taken aback, that he looked quite stupidly at Mr.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6210" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6210"></td>
        <td id="LC6210" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Stryver shouldering him towards the door, with an appearance of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6211" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6211"></td>
        <td id="LC6211" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">showering generosity, forbearance, and goodwill, on his erring head.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6212" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6212"></td>
        <td id="LC6212" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Make the best of it, my dear sir,” said Stryver; “say no more about it;</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L6213" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6213"></td>
        <td id="LC6213" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">thank you again for allowing me to sound you; good night!”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6214" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6214"></td>
        <td id="LC6214" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6215" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6215"></td>
        <td id="LC6215" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Mr. Lorry was out in the night, before he knew where he was. Mr. Stryver</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6216" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6216"></td>
        <td id="LC6216" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">was lying back on his sofa, winking at his ceiling.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6217" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6217"></td>

        <td id="L6218" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6218"></td>

      </tr>

        <td id="L6219" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6219"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6220" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6220"></td>
        <td id="LC6220" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6221" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6221"></td>
        <td id="LC6221" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">XIII. The Fellow of No Delicacy</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6222" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6222"></td>
        <td id="LC6222" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6223" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6223"></td>
        <td id="LC6223" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6224" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6224"></td>
        <td id="LC6224" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">If Sydney Carton ever shone anywhere, he certainly never shone in the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6225" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6225"></td>
        <td id="LC6225" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">house of Doctor Manette. He had been there often, during a whole year,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6226" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6226"></td>
        <td id="LC6226" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and had always been the same moody and morose lounger there. When he</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6227" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6227"></td>
        <td id="LC6227" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">cared to talk, he talked well; but, the cloud of caring for nothing,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6228" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6228"></td>
        <td id="LC6228" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">which overshadowed him with such a fatal darkness, was very rarely</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6229" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6229"></td>
        <td id="LC6229" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">pierced by the light within him.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6230" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6230"></td>
        <td id="LC6230" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6231" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6231"></td>
        <td id="LC6231" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">And yet he did care something for the streets that environed that house,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6232" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6232"></td>
        <td id="LC6232" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and for the senseless stones that made their pavements. Many a night</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6233" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6233"></td>
        <td id="LC6233" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">he vaguely and unhappily wandered there, when wine had brought no</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6234" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6234"></td>
        <td id="LC6234" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">transitory gladness to him; many a dreary daybreak revealed his solitary</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6235" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6235"></td>
        <td id="LC6235" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">figure lingering there, and still lingering there when the first beams</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6236" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6236"></td>
        <td id="LC6236" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">of the sun brought into strong relief, removed beauties of architecture</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6237" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6237"></td>
        <td id="LC6237" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">in spires of churches and lofty buildings, as perhaps the quiet time</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6238" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6238"></td>
        <td id="LC6238" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">brought some sense of better things, else forgotten and unattainable,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6239" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6239"></td>
        <td id="LC6239" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">into his mind. Of late, the neglected bed in the Temple Court had known</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6240" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6240"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6334" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6334"></td>
        <td id="LC6334" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">sloth and sensuality, and fighting out the abandoned fight. A dream, all</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6335" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6335"></td>
        <td id="LC6335" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">a dream, that ends in nothing, and leaves the sleeper where he lay down,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6336" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6336"></td>
        <td id="LC6336" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">but I wish you to know that you inspired it.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6337" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6337"></td>
        <td id="LC6337" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6338" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6338"></td>
        <td id="LC6338" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Will nothing of it remain? O Mr. Carton, think again! Try again!”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6339" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6339"></td>
        <td id="LC6339" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6340" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6340"></td>
        <td id="LC6340" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“No, Miss Manette; all through it, I have known myself to be quite</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6341" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6341"></td>
        <td id="LC6341" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">undeserving. And yet I have had the weakness, and have still the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6342" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6342"></td>
        <td id="LC6342" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">weakness, to wish you to know with what a sudden mastery you kindled me,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6343" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6343"></td>
        <td id="LC6343" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">heap of ashes that I am, into fire--a fire, however, inseparable in</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6344" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6344"></td>
        <td id="LC6344" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">its nature from myself, quickening nothing, lighting nothing, doing no</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6345" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6345"></td>
        <td id="LC6345" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">service, idly burning away.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6346" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6346"></td>
        <td id="LC6346" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6347" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6347"></td>
        <td id="LC6347" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Since it is my misfortune, Mr. Carton, to have made you more unhappy</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6348" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6348"></td>
        <td id="LC6348" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">than you were before you knew me--”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6349" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6349"></td>
        <td id="LC6349" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6350" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6350"></td>
        <td id="LC6350" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Don&#39;t say that, Miss Manette, for you would have reclaimed me, if</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6351" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6351"></td>
        <td id="LC6351" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">anything could. You will not be the cause of my becoming worse.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6352" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6352"></td>
        <td id="LC6352" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6353" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6353"></td>
        <td id="LC6353" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Since the state of your mind that you describe, is, at all events,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6354" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6354"></td>
        <td id="LC6354" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">attributable to some influence of mine--this is what I mean, if I can</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6355" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6355"></td>
        <td id="LC6355" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">make it plain--can I use no influence to serve you? Have I no power for</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6356" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6356"></td>
        <td id="LC6356" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">good, with you, at all?”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6357" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6357"></td>
        <td id="LC6357" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6358" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6358"></td>
        <td id="LC6358" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“The utmost good that I am capable of now, Miss Manette, I have come</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6359" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6359"></td>
        <td id="LC6359" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">here to realise. Let me carry through the rest of my misdirected life,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6360" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6360"></td>
        <td id="LC6360" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the remembrance that I opened my heart to you, last of all the world;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6361" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6361"></td>
        <td id="LC6361" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and that there was something left in me at this time which you could</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6362" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6362"></td>
        <td id="LC6362" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">deplore and pity.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6363" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6363"></td>
        <td id="LC6363" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6364" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6364"></td>
        <td id="LC6364" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Which I entreated you to believe, again and again, most fervently, with</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6365" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6365"></td>
        <td id="LC6365" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">all my heart, was capable of better things, Mr. Carton!”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6366" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6366"></td>
        <td id="LC6366" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6367" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6367"></td>
        <td id="LC6367" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Entreat me to believe it no more, Miss Manette. I have proved myself,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6368" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6368"></td>
        <td id="LC6368" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and I know better. I distress you; I draw fast to an end. Will you let</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6369" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6369"></td>
        <td id="LC6369" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">me believe, when I recall this day, that the last confidence of my life</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6370" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6370"></td>
        <td id="LC6370" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">was reposed in your pure and innocent breast, and that it lies there</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6371" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6371"></td>
        <td id="LC6371" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">alone, and will be shared by no one?”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6372" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6372"></td>
        <td id="LC6372" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6373" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6373"></td>
        <td id="LC6373" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“If that will be a consolation to you, yes.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6374" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6374"></td>
        <td id="LC6374" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6375" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6375"></td>
        <td id="LC6375" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Not even by the dearest one ever to be known to you?”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6376" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6376"></td>
        <td id="LC6376" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L6377" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6377"></td>
        <td id="LC6377" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Mr. Carton,” she answered, after an agitated pause, “the secret is</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6378" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6378"></td>
        <td id="LC6378" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">yours, not mine; and I promise to respect it.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6379" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6379"></td>
        <td id="LC6379" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6380" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6380"></td>
        <td id="LC6380" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Thank you. And again, God bless you.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6381" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6381"></td>
        <td id="LC6381" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6382" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6382"></td>
        <td id="LC6382" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">He put her hand to his lips, and moved towards the door.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6383" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6383"></td>
        <td id="LC6383" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6384" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6384"></td>
        <td id="LC6384" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Be under no apprehension, Miss Manette, of my ever resuming this</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6385" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6385"></td>
        <td id="LC6385" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">conversation by so much as a passing word. I will never refer to it</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6386" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6386"></td>
        <td id="LC6386" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">again. If I were dead, that could not be surer than it is henceforth. In</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6387" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6387"></td>
        <td id="LC6387" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the hour of my death, I shall hold sacred the one good remembrance--and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6388" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6388"></td>
        <td id="LC6388" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">shall thank and bless you for it--that my last avowal of myself was made</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6389" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6389"></td>
        <td id="LC6389" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">to you, and that my name, and faults, and miseries were gently carried</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6390" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6390"></td>
        <td id="LC6390" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">in your heart. May it otherwise be light and happy!”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6391" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6391"></td>
        <td id="LC6391" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6392" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6392"></td>
        <td id="LC6392" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">He was so unlike what he had ever shown himself to be, and it was so</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6393" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6393"></td>
        <td id="LC6393" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">sad to think how much he had thrown away, and how much he every day kept</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6394" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6394"></td>
        <td id="LC6394" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">down and perverted, that Lucie Manette wept mournfully for him as he</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6395" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6395"></td>
        <td id="LC6395" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">stood looking back at her.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6396" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6396"></td>
        <td id="LC6396" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6397" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6397"></td>
        <td id="LC6397" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Be comforted!” he said, “I am not worth such feeling, Miss Manette. An</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6398" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6398"></td>
        <td id="LC6398" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">hour or two hence, and the low companions and low habits that I scorn</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6399" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6399"></td>
        <td id="LC6399" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">but yield to, will render me less worth such tears as those, than any</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6400" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6400"></td>
        <td id="LC6400" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">wretch who creeps along the streets. Be comforted! But, within myself, I</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6401" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6401"></td>
        <td id="LC6401" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">shall always be, towards you, what I am now, though outwardly I shall be</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6402" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6402"></td>
        <td id="LC6402" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">what you have heretofore seen me. The last supplication but one I make</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6403" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6403"></td>
        <td id="LC6403" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">to you, is, that you will believe this of me.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6404" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6404"></td>
        <td id="LC6404" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6405" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6405"></td>
        <td id="LC6405" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“I will, Mr. Carton.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6406" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6406"></td>
        <td id="LC6406" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6407" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6407"></td>
        <td id="LC6407" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“My last supplication of all, is this; and with it, I will relieve</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6408" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6408"></td>
        <td id="LC6408" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">you of a visitor with whom I well know you have nothing in unison, and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6409" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6409"></td>
        <td id="LC6409" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">between whom and you there is an impassable space. It is useless to say</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6410" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6410"></td>
        <td id="LC6410" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">it, I know, but it rises out of my soul. For you, and for any dear to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6411" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6411"></td>
        <td id="LC6411" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">you, I would do anything. If my career were of that better kind that</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6412" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6412"></td>
        <td id="LC6412" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">there was any opportunity or capacity of sacrifice in it, I would</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6413" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6413"></td>
        <td id="LC6413" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">embrace any sacrifice for you and for those dear to you. Try to hold</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6414" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6414"></td>
        <td id="LC6414" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">me in your mind, at some quiet times, as ardent and sincere in this one</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6415" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6415"></td>
        <td id="LC6415" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">thing. The time will come, the time will not be long in coming, when new</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6416" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6416"></td>
        <td id="LC6416" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">ties will be formed about you--ties that will bind you yet more tenderly</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6417" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6417"></td>
        <td id="LC6417" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and strongly to the home you so adorn--the dearest ties that will ever</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6418" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6418"></td>
        <td id="LC6418" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">grace and gladden you. O Miss Manette, when the little picture of a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6419" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6419"></td>
        <td id="LC6419" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">happy father&#39;s face looks up in yours, when you see your own bright</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6420" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6420"></td>
        <td id="LC6420" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">beauty springing up anew at your feet, think now and then that there is</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6421" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6421"></td>
        <td id="LC6421" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">a man who would give his life, to keep a life you love beside you!”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6422" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6422"></td>
        <td id="LC6422" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6423" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6423"></td>
        <td id="LC6423" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">He said, “Farewell!” said a last “God bless you!” and left her.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6424" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6424"></td>
        <td id="LC6424" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6425" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6425"></td>
        <td id="LC6425" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6426" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6426"></td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L6428" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6428"></td>
        <td id="LC6428" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">XIV. The Honest Tradesman</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6429" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6429"></td>
        <td id="LC6429" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6430" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6430"></td>
        <td id="LC6430" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6431" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6431"></td>
        <td id="LC6431" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">To the eyes of Mr. Jeremiah Cruncher, sitting on his stool in</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6432" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6432"></td>
        <td id="LC6432" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Fleet-street with his grisly urchin beside him, a vast number and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6433" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6433"></td>
        <td id="LC6433" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">variety of objects in movement were every day presented. Who could sit</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6434" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6434"></td>
        <td id="LC6434" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">upon anything in Fleet-street during the busy hours of the day, and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6435" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6435"></td>
        <td id="LC6435" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">not be dazed and deafened by two immense processions, one ever tending</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6436" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6436"></td>
        <td id="LC6436" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">westward with the sun, the other ever tending eastward from the sun,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6437" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6437"></td>
        <td id="LC6437" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">both ever tending to the plains beyond the range of red and purple where</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6438" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6438"></td>
        <td id="LC6438" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the sun goes down!</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6439" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6439"></td>
        <td id="LC6439" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6440" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6440"></td>
        <td id="LC6440" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">With his straw in his mouth, Mr. Cruncher sat watching the two streams,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6441" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6441"></td>
        <td id="LC6441" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">like the heathen rustic who has for several centuries been on duty</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6442" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6442"></td>
        <td id="LC6442" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">watching one stream--saving that Jerry had no expectation of their ever</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6443" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6443"></td>
        <td id="LC6443" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">running dry. Nor would it have been an expectation of a hopeful kind,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6444" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6444"></td>
        <td id="LC6444" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">since a small part of his income was derived from the pilotage of timid</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6445" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6445"></td>
        <td id="LC6445" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">women (mostly of a full habit and past the middle term of life) from</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6446" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6446"></td>
        <td id="LC6446" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Tellson&#39;s side of the tides to the opposite shore. Brief as such</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6447" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6447"></td>
        <td id="LC6447" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">companionship was in every separate instance, Mr. Cruncher never failed</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6448" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6448"></td>
        <td id="LC6448" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">to become so interested in the lady as to express a strong desire to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6449" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6449"></td>
        <td id="LC6449" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">have the honour of drinking her very good health. And it was from</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6450" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6450"></td>
        <td id="LC6450" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the gifts bestowed upon him towards the execution of this benevolent</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6451" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6451"></td>
        <td id="LC6451" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">purpose, that he recruited his finances, as just now observed.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6452" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6452"></td>
        <td id="LC6452" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6453" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6453"></td>
        <td id="LC6453" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Time was, when a poet sat upon a stool in a public place, and mused in</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6454" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6454"></td>
        <td id="LC6454" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the sight of men. Mr. Cruncher, sitting on a stool in a public place,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6455" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6455"></td>
        <td id="LC6455" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">but not being a poet, mused as little as possible, and looked about him.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6456" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6456"></td>
        <td id="LC6456" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6457" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6457"></td>
        <td id="LC6457" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">It fell out that he was thus engaged in a season when crowds were</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6458" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6458"></td>
        <td id="LC6458" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">few, and belated women few, and when his affairs in general were so</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6459" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6459"></td>
        <td id="LC6459" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">unprosperous as to awaken a strong suspicion in his breast that Mrs.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6460" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6460"></td>
        <td id="LC6460" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Cruncher must have been “flopping” in some pointed manner, when an</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6461" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6461"></td>
        <td id="LC6461" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">unusual concourse pouring down Fleet-street westward, attracted his</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6462" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6462"></td>
        <td id="LC6462" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">attention. Looking that way, Mr. Cruncher made out that some kind of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6463" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6463"></td>
        <td id="LC6463" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">funeral was coming along, and that there was popular objection to this</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6464" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6464"></td>
        <td id="LC6464" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">funeral, which engendered uproar.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6465" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6465"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6466" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6466"></td>
        <td id="LC6466" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Young Jerry,” said Mr. Cruncher, turning to his offspring, “it&#39;s a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6467" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6467"></td>
        <td id="LC6467" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">buryin&#39;.”</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L6468" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6468"></td>

        <td id="L6469" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6469"></td>
        <td id="LC6469" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Hooroar, father!” cried Young Jerry.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6470" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6470"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6471" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6471"></td>
        <td id="LC6471" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">The young gentleman uttered this exultant sound with mysterious</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6472" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6472"></td>
        <td id="LC6472" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">significance. The elder gentleman took the cry so ill, that he watched</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6473" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6473"></td>
        <td id="LC6473" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">his opportunity, and smote the young gentleman on the ear.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6474" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6474"></td>
        <td id="LC6474" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6475" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6475"></td>
        <td id="LC6475" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“What d&#39;ye mean? What are you hooroaring at? What do you want to conwey</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6476" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6476"></td>
        <td id="LC6476" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">to your own father, you young Rip? This boy is a getting too many for</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6477" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6477"></td>
        <td id="LC6477" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">_me_!” said Mr. Cruncher, surveying him. “Him and his hooroars! Don&#39;t</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6478" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6478"></td>

      </tr>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6481" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6481"></td>
        <td id="LC6481" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“I warn&#39;t doing no harm,” Young Jerry protested, rubbing his cheek.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6482" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6482"></td>
        <td id="LC6482" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>

      </tr>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6485" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6485"></td>
        <td id="LC6485" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6486" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6486"></td>
        <td id="LC6486" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">His son obeyed, and the crowd approached; they were bawling and hissing</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6487" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6487"></td>
        <td id="LC6487" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">round a dingy hearse and dingy mourning coach, in which mourning coach</td>

        <td id="L6488" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6488"></td>

        <td id="L6489" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6489"></td>
        <td id="LC6489" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">considered essential to the dignity of the position. The position</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6490" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6490"></td>

        <td id="LC6492" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">incessantly groaning and calling out: “Yah! Spies! Tst! Yaha! Spies!”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6493" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6493"></td>
        <td id="LC6493" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"> with many compliments too numerous and forcible to repeat.</td>

      <tr>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6495" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6495"></td>
        <td id="LC6495" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Funerals had at all times a remarkable attraction for Mr. Cruncher; he</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6496" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6496"></td>
        <td id="LC6496" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">always pricked up his senses, and became excited, when a funeral passed</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L6497" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6497"></td>
        <td id="LC6497" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Tellson&#39;s. Naturally, therefore, a funeral with this uncommon attendance</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L6498" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6498"></td>

      </tr>

      <tr>

      </tr>

        <td id="L6505" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6505"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6507" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6507"></td>
        <td id="LC6507" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">nevertheless, and vociferating in a surprising heat and with the</td>

        <td id="L6508" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6508"></td>
        <td id="LC6508" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">greatest ardour, “Spies! Yaha! Tst, tst! Spi--ies!”</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L6510" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6510"></td>
        <td id="LC6510" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">At length, a person better informed on the merits of the case, tumbled</td>
      </tr>

      <tr>
        <td id="L6512" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6512"></td>
        <td id="LC6512" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">funeral of one Roger Cly.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6513" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6513"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6514" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6514"></td>
        <td id="LC6514" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Was he a spy?” asked Mr. Cruncher.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6515" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6515"></td>

      </tr>

        <td id="LC6517" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Spi--i--ies!”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6518" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6518"></td>
        <td id="LC6518" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L6867" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6867"></td>

        <td id="L6878" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6878"></td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L6884" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6884"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6885" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6885"></td>
        <td id="LC6885" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">have commanded whole barrels of wine; and they glided from seat to seat,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6886" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6886"></td>
        <td id="LC6886" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and from corner to corner, swallowing talk in lieu of drink, with greedy</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L6890" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6890"></td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L6978" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6978"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6979" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6979"></td>
        <td id="LC6979" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Again the mender of roads went through the whole performance; in which</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6980" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6980"></td>
        <td id="LC6980" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">he ought to have been perfect by that time, seeing that it had been</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6981" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6981"></td>
        <td id="LC6981" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the infallible resource and indispensable entertainment of his village</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6982" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6982"></td>
        <td id="LC6982" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">during a whole year.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6983" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6983"></td>
        <td id="LC6983" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6984" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6984"></td>
        <td id="LC6984" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Jacques One struck in, and asked if he had ever seen the man before?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6985" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6985"></td>
        <td id="LC6985" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6986" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6986"></td>
        <td id="LC6986" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Never,” answered the mender of roads, recovering his perpendicular.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6987" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6987"></td>
        <td id="LC6987" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6988" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6988"></td>
        <td id="LC6988" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Jacques Three demanded how he afterwards recognised him then?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6989" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6989"></td>
        <td id="LC6989" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6990" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6990"></td>
        <td id="LC6990" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“By his tall figure,” said the mender of roads, softly, and with his</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6991" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6991"></td>
        <td id="LC6991" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">finger at his nose. “When Monsieur the Marquis demands that evening,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6992" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6992"></td>
        <td id="LC6992" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&#39;Say, what is he like?&#39; I make response, &#39;Tall as a spectre.&#39;”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6993" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6993"></td>
        <td id="LC6993" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6994" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6994"></td>
        <td id="LC6994" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“You should have said, short as a dwarf,” returned Jacques Two.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6995" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6995"></td>
        <td id="LC6995" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6996" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6996"></td>
        <td id="LC6996" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“But what did I know? The deed was not then accomplished, neither did he</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6997" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6997"></td>
        <td id="LC6997" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">confide in me. Observe! Under those circumstances even, I do not</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6998" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6998"></td>
        <td id="LC6998" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">offer my testimony. Monsieur the Marquis indicates me with his finger,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6999" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6999"></td>
        <td id="LC6999" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">standing near our little fountain, and says, &#39;To me! Bring that rascal!&#39;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7000" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7000"></td>
        <td id="LC7000" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">My faith, messieurs, I offer nothing.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7001" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7001"></td>
        <td id="LC7001" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7002" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7002"></td>
        <td id="LC7002" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“He is right there, Jacques,” murmured Defarge, to him who had</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7003" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7003"></td>
        <td id="LC7003" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">interrupted. “Go on!”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7004" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7004"></td>
        <td id="LC7004" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7005" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7005"></td>
        <td id="LC7005" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Good!” said the mender of roads, with an air of mystery. “The tall man</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7006" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7006"></td>
        <td id="LC7006" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">is lost, and he is sought--how many months? Nine, ten, eleven?”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7007" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7007"></td>
        <td id="LC7007" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7008" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7008"></td>
        <td id="LC7008" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“No matter, the number,” said Defarge. “He is well hidden, but at last</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7009" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7009"></td>
        <td id="LC7009" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">he is unluckily found. Go on!”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7010" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7010"></td>
        <td id="LC7010" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7011" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7011"></td>
        <td id="LC7011" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“I am again at work upon the hill-side, and the sun is again about to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7012" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7012"></td>
        <td id="LC7012" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">go to bed. I am collecting my tools to descend to my cottage down in the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7013" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7013"></td>
        <td id="LC7013" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">village below, where it is already dark, when I raise my eyes, and see</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7014" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7014"></td>
        <td id="LC7014" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">coming over the hill six soldiers. In the midst of them is a tall man</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7015" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7015"></td>
        <td id="LC7015" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">with his arms bound--tied to his sides--like this!”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7016" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7016"></td>
        <td id="LC7016" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7017" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7017"></td>
        <td id="LC7017" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">With the aid of his indispensable cap, he represented a man with his</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7018" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7018"></td>
        <td id="LC7018" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">elbows bound fast at his hips, with cords that were knotted behind him.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7019" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7019"></td>
        <td id="LC7019" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7020" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7020"></td>
        <td id="LC7020" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“I stand aside, messieurs, by my heap of stones, to see the soldiers</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7021" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7021"></td>
        <td id="LC7021" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and their prisoner pass (for it is a solitary road, that, where any</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7022" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7022"></td>
        <td id="LC7022" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">spectacle is well worth looking at), and at first, as they approach, I</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7023" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7023"></td>
        <td id="LC7023" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">see no more than that they are six soldiers with a tall man bound, and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7024" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7024"></td>
        <td id="LC7024" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">that they are almost black to my sight--except on the side of the sun</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7025" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7025"></td>
        <td id="LC7025" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">going to bed, where they have a red edge, messieurs. Also, I see that</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7026" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7026"></td>
        <td id="LC7026" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">their long shadows are on the hollow ridge on the opposite side of the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7027" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7027"></td>
        <td id="LC7027" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">road, and are on the hill above it, and are like the shadows of giants.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7028" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7028"></td>
        <td id="LC7028" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Also, I see that they are covered with dust, and that the dust moves</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7029" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7029"></td>
        <td id="LC7029" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">with them as they come, tramp, tramp! But when they advance quite near</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7030" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7030"></td>
        <td id="LC7030" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">to me, I recognise the tall man, and he recognises me. Ah, but he would</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7031" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7031"></td>
        <td id="LC7031" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">be well content to precipitate himself over the hill-side once again, as</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7032" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7032"></td>
        <td id="LC7032" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">on the evening when he and I first encountered, close to the same spot!”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7033" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7033"></td>
        <td id="LC7033" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7034" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7034"></td>
        <td id="LC7034" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">He described it as if he were there, and it was evident that he saw it</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7035" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7035"></td>
        <td id="LC7035" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">vividly; perhaps he had not seen much in his life.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7036" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7036"></td>
        <td id="LC7036" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7037" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7037"></td>
        <td id="LC7037" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“I do not show the soldiers that I recognise the tall man; he does not</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7038" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7038"></td>
        <td id="LC7038" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">show the soldiers that he recognises me; we do it, and we know it, with</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7039" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7039"></td>
        <td id="LC7039" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">our eyes. &#39;Come on!&#39; says the chief of that company, pointing to the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7040" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7040"></td>
        <td id="LC7040" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">village, &#39;bring him fast to his tomb!&#39; and they bring him faster. I</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7041" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7041"></td>
        <td id="LC7041" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">follow. His arms are swelled because of being bound so tight, his wooden</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7042" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7042"></td>
        <td id="LC7042" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">shoes are large and clumsy, and he is lame. Because he is lame, and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7043" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7043"></td>
        <td id="LC7043" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">consequently slow, they drive him with their guns--like this!”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7044" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7044"></td>
        <td id="LC7044" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7045" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7045"></td>
        <td id="LC7045" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">He imitated the action of a man&#39;s being impelled forward by the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7046" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7046"></td>
        <td id="LC7046" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">butt-ends of muskets.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7047" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7047"></td>
        <td id="LC7047" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7048" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7048"></td>
        <td id="LC7048" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“As they descend the hill like madmen running a race, he falls. They</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7049" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7049"></td>
        <td id="LC7049" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">laugh and pick him up again. His face is bleeding and covered with dust,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7050" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7050"></td>
        <td id="LC7050" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">but he cannot touch it; thereupon they laugh again. They bring him into</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7051" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7051"></td>
        <td id="LC7051" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the village; all the village runs to look; they take him past the mill,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7052" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7052"></td>
        <td id="LC7052" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and up to the prison; all the village sees the prison gate open in the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7053" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7053"></td>
        <td id="LC7053" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">darkness of the night, and swallow him--like this!”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7054" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7054"></td>
        <td id="LC7054" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7055" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7055"></td>
        <td id="LC7055" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">He opened his mouth as wide as he could, and shut it with a sounding</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7056" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7056"></td>
        <td id="LC7056" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">snap of his teeth. Observant of his unwillingness to mar the effect by</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7057" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7057"></td>
        <td id="LC7057" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">opening it again, Defarge said, “Go on, Jacques.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7058" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7058"></td>
        <td id="LC7058" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7059" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7059"></td>
        <td id="LC7059" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“All the village,” pursued the mender of roads, on tiptoe and in a low</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7060" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7060"></td>
        <td id="LC7060" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">voice, “withdraws; all the village whispers by the fountain; all the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7061" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7061"></td>
        <td id="LC7061" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">village sleeps; all the village dreams of that unhappy one, within the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7062" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7062"></td>
        <td id="LC7062" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">locks and bars of the prison on the crag, and never to come out of it,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7063" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7063"></td>
        <td id="LC7063" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">except to perish. In the morning, with my tools upon my shoulder, eating</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7064" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7064"></td>
        <td id="LC7064" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">my morsel of black bread as I go, I make a circuit by the prison, on</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7065" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7065"></td>
        <td id="LC7065" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">my way to my work. There I see him, high up, behind the bars of a lofty</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7066" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7066"></td>
        <td id="LC7066" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">iron cage, bloody and dusty as last night, looking through. He has no</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7067" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7067"></td>
        <td id="LC7067" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">hand free, to wave to me; I dare not call to him; he regards me like a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7068" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7068"></td>
        <td id="LC7068" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">dead man.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7069" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7069"></td>
        <td id="LC7069" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7070" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7070"></td>
        <td id="LC7070" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Defarge and the three glanced darkly at one another. The looks of all</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7071" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7071"></td>
        <td id="LC7071" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">of them were dark, repressed, and revengeful, as they listened to the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7072" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7072"></td>
        <td id="LC7072" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">countryman&#39;s story; the manner of all of them, while it was secret, was</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7073" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7073"></td>
        <td id="LC7073" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">authoritative too. They had the air of a rough tribunal; Jacques One</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7074" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7074"></td>
        <td id="LC7074" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and Two sitting on the old pallet-bed, each with his chin resting on</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7075" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7075"></td>
        <td id="LC7075" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">his hand, and his eyes intent on the road-mender; Jacques Three, equally</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7076" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7076"></td>
        <td id="LC7076" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">intent, on one knee behind them, with his agitated hand always gliding</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7077" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7077"></td>
        <td id="LC7077" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">over the network of fine nerves about his mouth and nose; Defarge</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7078" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7078"></td>
        <td id="LC7078" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">standing between them and the narrator, whom he had stationed in the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7079" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7079"></td>
        <td id="LC7079" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">light of the window, by turns looking from him to them, and from them to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7080" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7080"></td>
        <td id="LC7080" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">him.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7081" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7081"></td>
        <td id="LC7081" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7082" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7082"></td>
        <td id="LC7082" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Go on, Jacques,” said Defarge.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7083" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7083"></td>
        <td id="LC7083" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7084" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7084"></td>
        <td id="LC7084" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“He remains up there in his iron cage some days. The village looks</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7085" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7085"></td>
        <td id="LC7085" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">at him by stealth, for it is afraid. But it always looks up, from a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7086" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7086"></td>
        <td id="LC7086" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">distance, at the prison on the crag; and in the evening, when the work</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7087" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7087"></td>
        <td id="LC7087" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">of the day is achieved and it assembles to gossip at the fountain, all</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7088" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7088"></td>
        <td id="LC7088" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">faces are turned towards the prison. Formerly, they were turned towards</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7089" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7089"></td>
        <td id="LC7089" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the posting-house; now, they are turned towards the prison. They</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7090" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7090"></td>
        <td id="LC7090" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">whisper at the fountain, that although condemned to death he will not be</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7091" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7091"></td>
        <td id="LC7091" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">executed; they say that petitions have been presented in Paris, showing</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7092" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7092"></td>
        <td id="LC7092" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">that he was enraged and made mad by the death of his child; they say</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7093" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7093"></td>
        <td id="LC7093" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">that a petition has been presented to the King himself. What do I know?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7094" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7094"></td>
        <td id="LC7094" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">It is possible. Perhaps yes, perhaps no.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7095" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7095"></td>
        <td id="LC7095" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7096" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7096"></td>
        <td id="LC7096" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Listen then, Jacques,” Number One of that name sternly interposed.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7097" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7097"></td>
        <td id="LC7097" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Know that a petition was presented to the King and Queen. All here,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7098" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7098"></td>
        <td id="LC7098" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">yourself excepted, saw the King take it, in his carriage in the street,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7099" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7099"></td>
        <td id="LC7099" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">sitting beside the Queen. It is Defarge whom you see here, who, at the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7100" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7100"></td>
        <td id="LC7100" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">hazard of his life, darted out before the horses, with the petition in</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7101" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7101"></td>
        <td id="LC7101" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">his hand.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7102" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7102"></td>
