      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7103" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7103"></td>
        <td id="LC7103" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“And once again listen, Jacques!” said the kneeling Number Three:</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7104" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7104"></td>
        <td id="LC7104" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">his fingers ever wandering over and over those fine nerves, with a</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L7105" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7105"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7107" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7107"></td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L7108" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7108"></td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L7110" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7110"></td>

        <td id="L7111" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7111"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7112" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7112"></td>
        <td id="LC7112" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7113" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7113"></td>
        <td id="LC7113" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Again; on the other hand, they whisper at the fountain,” resumed the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7114" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7114"></td>
        <td id="LC7114" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">countryman, “that he is brought down into our country to be executed on</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7115" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7115"></td>
        <td id="LC7115" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the spot, and that he will very certainly be executed. They even whisper</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7116" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7116"></td>
        <td id="LC7116" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">that because he has slain Monseigneur, and because Monseigneur was the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7117" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7117"></td>
        <td id="LC7117" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">father of his tenants--serfs--what you will--he will be executed as a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7118" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7118"></td>
        <td id="LC7118" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">parricide. One old man says at the fountain, that his right hand, armed</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7119" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7119"></td>
        <td id="LC7119" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">with the knife, will be burnt off before his face; that, into wounds</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7120" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7120"></td>
        <td id="LC7120" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">which will be made in his arms, his breast, and his legs, there will be</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7121" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7121"></td>
        <td id="LC7121" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">poured boiling oil, melted lead, hot resin, wax, and sulphur; finally,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7122" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7122"></td>
        <td id="LC7122" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">that he will be torn limb from limb by four strong horses. That old man</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7123" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7123"></td>
        <td id="LC7123" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">says, all this was actually done to a prisoner who made an attempt on</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7124" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7124"></td>
        <td id="LC7124" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the life of the late King, Louis Fifteen. But how do I know if he lies?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7125" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7125"></td>
        <td id="LC7125" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">I am not a scholar.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7126" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7126"></td>
        <td id="LC7126" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7127" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7127"></td>
        <td id="LC7127" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Listen once again then, Jacques!” said the man with the restless hand</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7128" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7128"></td>
        <td id="LC7128" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and the craving air. “The name of that prisoner was Damiens, and it was</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7129" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7129"></td>
        <td id="LC7129" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">all done in open day, in the open streets of this city of Paris; and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7130" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7130"></td>
        <td id="LC7130" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">nothing was more noticed in the vast concourse that saw it done, than</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7131" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7131"></td>
        <td id="LC7131" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the crowd of ladies of quality and fashion, who were full of eager</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7132" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7132"></td>
        <td id="LC7132" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">attention to the last--to the last, Jacques, prolonged until nightfall,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7133" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7133"></td>
        <td id="LC7133" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">when he had lost two legs and an arm, and still breathed! And it was</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7134" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7134"></td>
        <td id="LC7134" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">done--why, how old are you?”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7135" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7135"></td>
        <td id="LC7135" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7136" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7136"></td>
        <td id="LC7136" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Thirty-five,” said the mender of roads, who looked sixty.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7137" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7137"></td>
        <td id="LC7137" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7138" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7138"></td>
        <td id="LC7138" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“It was done when you were more than ten years old; you might have seen</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7139" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7139"></td>
        <td id="LC7139" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">it.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7140" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7140"></td>
        <td id="LC7140" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7141" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7141"></td>
        <td id="LC7141" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Enough!” said Defarge, with grim impatience. “Long live the Devil! Go</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7142" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7142"></td>
        <td id="LC7142" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">on.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7143" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7143"></td>
        <td id="LC7143" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7144" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7144"></td>
        <td id="LC7144" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Well! Some whisper this, some whisper that; they speak of nothing else;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7145" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7145"></td>
        <td id="LC7145" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">even the fountain appears to fall to that tune. At length, on Sunday</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7146" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7146"></td>
        <td id="LC7146" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">night when all the village is asleep, come soldiers, winding down from</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7147" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7147"></td>
        <td id="LC7147" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the prison, and their guns ring on the stones of the little street.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7148" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7148"></td>
        <td id="LC7148" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Workmen dig, workmen hammer, soldiers laugh and sing; in the morning, by</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7149" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7149"></td>
        <td id="LC7149" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the fountain, there is raised a gallows forty feet high, poisoning the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7150" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7150"></td>
        <td id="LC7150" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">water.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7151" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7151"></td>
        <td id="LC7151" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7152" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7152"></td>
        <td id="LC7152" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">The mender of roads looked _through_ rather than _at_ the low ceiling,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7153" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7153"></td>
        <td id="LC7153" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and pointed as if he saw the gallows somewhere in the sky.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7154" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7154"></td>
        <td id="LC7154" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7155" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7155"></td>
        <td id="LC7155" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“All work is stopped, all assemble there, nobody leads the cows out,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7156" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7156"></td>
        <td id="LC7156" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the cows are there with the rest. At midday, the roll of drums. Soldiers</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7157" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7157"></td>
        <td id="LC7157" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">have marched into the prison in the night, and he is in the midst</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7158" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7158"></td>
        <td id="LC7158" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">of many soldiers. He is bound as before, and in his mouth there is</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7159" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7159"></td>
        <td id="LC7159" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">a gag--tied so, with a tight string, making him look almost as if he</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7160" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7160"></td>
        <td id="LC7160" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">laughed.” He suggested it, by creasing his face with his two thumbs,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7161" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7161"></td>
        <td id="LC7161" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">from the corners of his mouth to his ears. “On the top of the gallows is</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7162" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7162"></td>
        <td id="LC7162" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">fixed the knife, blade upwards, with its point in the air. He is hanged</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7163" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7163"></td>
        <td id="LC7163" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">there forty feet high--and is left hanging, poisoning the water.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7164" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7164"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7166" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7166"></td>

        <td id="L7167" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7167"></td>

        <td id="L7169" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7169"></td>
        <td id="LC7169" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“It is frightful, messieurs. How can the women and the children draw</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7170" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7170"></td>
        <td id="LC7170" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">water! Who can gossip of an evening, under that shadow! Under it, have</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7171" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7171"></td>
        <td id="LC7171" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">I said? When I left the village, Monday evening as the sun was going to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7172" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7172"></td>
        <td id="LC7172" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">bed, and looked back from the hill, the shadow struck across the church,</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L7173" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7173"></td>
        <td id="LC7173" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">across the mill, across the prison--seemed to strike across the earth,</td>

        <td id="LC7174" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">messieurs, to where the sky rests upon it!”</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L7175" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7175"></td>
        <td id="LC7175" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L7176" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7176"></td>
        <td id="LC7176" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">The hungry man gnawed one of his fingers as he looked at the other</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7177" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7177"></td>
        <td id="LC7177" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">three, and his finger quivered with the craving that was on him.</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L7178" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7178"></td>

        <td id="L7179" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7179"></td>

        <td id="L7180" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7180"></td>

        <td id="L7205" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7205"></td>
        <td id="LC7205" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">The hungry man repeated, in a rapturous croak, “Magnificent!” and began</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7206" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7206"></td>
        <td id="LC7206" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">gnawing another finger.</td>

        <td id="LC7208" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Are you sure,” asked Jacques Two, of Defarge, “that no embarrassment</td>

        <td id="L7209" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7209"></td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L7212" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7212"></td>

      </tr>

        <td id="L7214" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7214"></td>

      <tr>

      <tr>
        <td id="L7217" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7217"></td>
        <td id="LC7217" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Madame Defarge. It would be easier for the weakest poltroon that lives,</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L7220" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7220"></td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L7221" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7221"></td>
        <td id="LC7221" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">There was a murmur of confidence and approval, and then the man who</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7222" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7222"></td>
        <td id="LC7222" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">hungered, asked: “Is this rustic to be sent back soon? I hope so. He is</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>

      <tr>
        <td id="L7224" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7224"></td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L7225" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7225"></td>

        <td id="L7230" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7230"></td>

        <td id="L7231" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7231"></td>

      </tr>

        <td id="L7232" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7232"></td>

        <td id="L7239" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7239"></td>

        <td id="L7243" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7243"></td>
        <td id="LC7243" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Worse quarters than Defarge&#39;s wine-shop, could easily have been found</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7244" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7244"></td>
        <td id="LC7244" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">in Paris for a provincial slave of that degree. Saving for a mysterious</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7245" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7245"></td>
        <td id="LC7245" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">dread of madame by which he was constantly haunted, his life was very</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7246" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7246"></td>
        <td id="LC7246" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">new and agreeable. But, madame sat all day at her counter, so expressly</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7247" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7247"></td>
        <td id="LC7247" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">unconscious of him, and so particularly determined not to perceive that</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7248" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7248"></td>
        <td id="LC7248" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">his being there had any connection with anything below the surface, that</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7249" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7249"></td>
        <td id="LC7249" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">he shook in his wooden shoes whenever his eye lighted on her. For, he</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7250" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7250"></td>
        <td id="LC7250" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">contended with himself that it was impossible to foresee what that lady</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7251" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7251"></td>
        <td id="LC7251" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">might pretend next; and he felt assured that if she should take it</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7252" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7252"></td>
        <td id="LC7252" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">into her brightly ornamented head to pretend that she had seen him do a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7253" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7253"></td>
        <td id="LC7253" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">murder and afterwards flay the victim, she would infallibly go through</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7254" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7254"></td>
        <td id="LC7254" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">with it until the play was played out.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7255" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7255"></td>
        <td id="LC7255" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7256" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7256"></td>
        <td id="LC7256" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Therefore, when Sunday came, the mender of roads was not enchanted</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7257" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7257"></td>
        <td id="LC7257" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">(though he said he was) to find that madame was to accompany monsieur</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7258" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7258"></td>
        <td id="LC7258" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and himself to Versailles. It was additionally disconcerting to have</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7259" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7259"></td>
        <td id="LC7259" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">madame knitting all the way there, in a public conveyance; it was</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7260" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7260"></td>
        <td id="LC7260" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">additionally disconcerting yet, to have madame in the crowd in the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7261" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7261"></td>
        <td id="LC7261" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">afternoon, still with her knitting in her hands as the crowd waited to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7262" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7262"></td>
        <td id="LC7262" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">see the carriage of the King and Queen.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7263" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7263"></td>
        <td id="LC7263" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7264" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7264"></td>
        <td id="LC7264" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“You work hard, madame,” said a man near her.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7265" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7265"></td>
        <td id="LC7265" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7266" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7266"></td>
        <td id="LC7266" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Yes,” answered Madame Defarge; “I have a good deal to do.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7267" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7267"></td>
        <td id="LC7267" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7268" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7268"></td>
        <td id="LC7268" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“What do you make, madame?”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7269" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7269"></td>
        <td id="LC7269" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7270" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7270"></td>
        <td id="LC7270" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Many things.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7271" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7271"></td>
        <td id="LC7271" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7272" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7272"></td>
        <td id="LC7272" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“For instance--”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7273" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7273"></td>
        <td id="LC7273" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7274" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7274"></td>
        <td id="LC7274" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“For instance,” returned Madame Defarge, composedly, “shrouds.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7275" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7275"></td>
        <td id="LC7275" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7276" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7276"></td>
        <td id="LC7276" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">The man moved a little further away, as soon as he could, and the mender</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7277" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7277"></td>
        <td id="LC7277" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">of roads fanned himself with his blue cap: feeling it mightily close</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7278" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7278"></td>
        <td id="LC7278" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and oppressive. If he needed a King and Queen to restore him, he was</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7279" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7279"></td>
        <td id="LC7279" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">fortunate in having his remedy at hand; for, soon the large-faced King</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7280" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7280"></td>
        <td id="LC7280" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and the fair-faced Queen came in their golden coach, attended by the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7281" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7281"></td>
        <td id="LC7281" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">shining Bull&#39;s Eye of their Court, a glittering multitude of laughing</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7282" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7282"></td>
        <td id="LC7282" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">ladies and fine lords; and in jewels and silks and powder and splendour</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7283" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7283"></td>
        <td id="LC7283" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and elegantly spurning figures and handsomely disdainful faces of both</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7284" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7284"></td>
        <td id="LC7284" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">sexes, the mender of roads bathed himself, so much to his temporary</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7285" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7285"></td>
        <td id="LC7285" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">intoxication, that he cried Long live the King, Long live the Queen,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7286" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7286"></td>
        <td id="LC7286" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Long live everybody and everything! as if he had never heard of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7287" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7287"></td>
        <td id="LC7287" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">ubiquitous Jacques in his time. Then, there were gardens, courtyards,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7288" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7288"></td>
        <td id="LC7288" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">terraces, fountains, green banks, more King and Queen, more Bull&#39;s Eye,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7289" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7289"></td>
        <td id="LC7289" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">more lords and ladies, more Long live they all! until he absolutely wept</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7290" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7290"></td>
        <td id="LC7290" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">with sentiment. During the whole of this scene, which lasted some three</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7291" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7291"></td>
        <td id="LC7291" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">hours, he had plenty of shouting and weeping and sentimental company,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7292" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7292"></td>
        <td id="LC7292" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and throughout Defarge held him by the collar, as if to restrain him</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7293" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7293"></td>
        <td id="LC7293" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">from flying at the objects of his brief devotion and tearing them to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7294" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7294"></td>
        <td id="LC7294" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">pieces.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7295" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7295"></td>
        <td id="LC7295" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7296" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7296"></td>
        <td id="LC7296" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Bravo!” said Defarge, clapping him on the back when it was over, like a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7297" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7297"></td>
        <td id="LC7297" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">patron; “you are a good boy!”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7298" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7298"></td>
        <td id="LC7298" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7299" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7299"></td>
        <td id="LC7299" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">The mender of roads was now coming to himself, and was mistrustful of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7300" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7300"></td>
        <td id="LC7300" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">having made a mistake in his late demonstrations; but no.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7301" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7301"></td>
        <td id="LC7301" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7302" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7302"></td>
        <td id="LC7302" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“You are the fellow we want,” said Defarge, in his ear; “you make</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7303" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7303"></td>
        <td id="LC7303" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">these fools believe that it will last for ever. Then, they are the more</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7304" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7304"></td>
        <td id="LC7304" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">insolent, and it is the nearer ended.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7305" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7305"></td>
        <td id="LC7305" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7306" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7306"></td>
        <td id="LC7306" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Hey!” cried the mender of roads, reflectively; “that&#39;s true.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7307" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7307"></td>
        <td id="LC7307" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7308" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7308"></td>
        <td id="LC7308" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“These fools know nothing. While they despise your breath, and would</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7309" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7309"></td>
        <td id="LC7309" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">stop it for ever and ever, in you or in a hundred like you rather than</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7310" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7310"></td>
        <td id="LC7310" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">in one of their own horses or dogs, they only know what your breath</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7311" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7311"></td>
        <td id="LC7311" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">tells them. Let it deceive them, then, a little longer; it cannot</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7312" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7312"></td>
        <td id="LC7312" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">deceive them too much.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7313" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7313"></td>
        <td id="LC7313" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7314" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7314"></td>
        <td id="LC7314" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Madame Defarge looked superciliously at the client, and nodded in</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7315" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7315"></td>
        <td id="LC7315" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">confirmation.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7316" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7316"></td>
        <td id="LC7316" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7317" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7317"></td>
        <td id="LC7317" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“As to you,” said she, “you would shout and shed tears for anything, if</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7318" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7318"></td>
        <td id="LC7318" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">it made a show and a noise. Say! Would you not?”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7319" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7319"></td>
        <td id="LC7319" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7320" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7320"></td>
        <td id="LC7320" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Truly, madame, I think so. For the moment.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7321" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7321"></td>
        <td id="LC7321" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7322" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7322"></td>
        <td id="LC7322" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“If you were shown a great heap of dolls, and were set upon them to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7323" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7323"></td>
        <td id="LC7323" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">pluck them to pieces and despoil them for your own advantage, you would</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7324" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7324"></td>
        <td id="LC7324" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">pick out the richest and gayest. Say! Would you not?”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7325" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7325"></td>
        <td id="LC7325" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7326" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7326"></td>
        <td id="LC7326" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Truly yes, madame.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7327" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7327"></td>
        <td id="LC7327" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7328" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7328"></td>
        <td id="LC7328" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Yes. And if you were shown a flock of birds, unable to fly, and were</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7329" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7329"></td>
        <td id="LC7329" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">set upon them to strip them of their feathers for your own advantage,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7330" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7330"></td>
        <td id="LC7330" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">you would set upon the birds of the finest feathers; would you not?”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7331" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7331"></td>
        <td id="LC7331" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7332" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7332"></td>
        <td id="LC7332" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“It is true, madame.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7333" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7333"></td>
        <td id="LC7333" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7334" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7334"></td>
        <td id="LC7334" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“You have seen both dolls and birds to-day,” said Madame Defarge, with</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7335" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7335"></td>
        <td id="LC7335" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">a wave of her hand towards the place where they had last been apparent;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7336" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7336"></td>
        <td id="LC7336" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“now, go home!”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7337" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7337"></td>
        <td id="LC7337" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7338" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7338"></td>
        <td id="LC7338" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7339" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7339"></td>
        <td id="LC7339" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7340" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7340"></td>
        <td id="LC7340" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7341" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7341"></td>
        <td id="LC7341" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">XVI. Still Knitting</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7342" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7342"></td>
        <td id="LC7342" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7343" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7343"></td>
        <td id="LC7343" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7344" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7344"></td>
        <td id="LC7344" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Madame Defarge and monsieur her husband returned amicably to the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7345" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7345"></td>
        <td id="LC7345" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">bosom of Saint Antoine, while a speck in a blue cap toiled through the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7346" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7346"></td>
        <td id="LC7346" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">darkness, and through the dust, and down the weary miles of avenue by</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7347" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7347"></td>
        <td id="LC7347" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the wayside, slowly tending towards that point of the compass where</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7348" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7348"></td>
        <td id="LC7348" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the chateau of Monsieur the Marquis, now in his grave, listened to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7349" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7349"></td>
        <td id="LC7349" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the whispering trees. Such ample leisure had the stone faces, now,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7350" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7350"></td>

        <td id="LC7630" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">it gives us, from morning to night, enough to think about, without</td>

        <td id="LC7631" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">embarrassing our heads concerning others. _I_ think for others? No, no.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7632" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7632"></td>
        <td id="LC7632" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7633" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7633"></td>
        <td id="LC7633" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">The spy, who was there to pick up any crumbs he could find or make, did</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7634" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7634"></td>
        <td id="LC7634" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">not allow his baffled state to express itself in his sinister face; but,</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L7635" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7635"></td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L7636" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7636"></td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L7637" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7637"></td>

        <td id="L7638" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7638"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7639" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7639"></td>
        <td id="LC7639" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Gaspard!” With a sigh of great compassion.</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L7640" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7640"></td>

      </tr>

      <tr>
        <td id="L7726" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7726"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>

      <tr>

        <td id="LC7818" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Defarge moved on from group to group, all three went quicker and fiercer</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7819" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7819"></td>
        <td id="LC7819" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">among every little knot of women that she had spoken with, and left</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7820" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7820"></td>
        <td id="LC7820" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">behind.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7821" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7821"></td>
        <td id="LC7821" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7822" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7822"></td>
        <td id="LC7822" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Her husband smoked at his door, looking after her with admiration. “A</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7823" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7823"></td>
        <td id="LC7823" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">great woman,” said he, “a strong woman, a grand woman, a frightfully</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7824" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7824"></td>
        <td id="LC7824" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">grand woman!”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7825" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7825"></td>
        <td id="LC7825" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7826" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7826"></td>
        <td id="LC7826" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Darkness closed around, and then came the ringing of church bells and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7827" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7827"></td>
        <td id="LC7827" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the distant beating of the military drums in the Palace Courtyard, as</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7828" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7828"></td>
        <td id="LC7828" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the women sat knitting, knitting. Darkness encompassed them. Another</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7829" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7829"></td>
        <td id="LC7829" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">darkness was closing in as surely, when the church bells, then ringing</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7830" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7830"></td>
        <td id="LC7830" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">pleasantly in many an airy steeple over France, should be melted into</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7831" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7831"></td>
        <td id="LC7831" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">thundering cannon; when the military drums should be beating to drown a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7832" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7832"></td>
        <td id="LC7832" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">wretched voice, that night all potent as the voice of Power and Plenty,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7833" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7833"></td>
        <td id="LC7833" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Freedom and Life. So much was closing in about the women who sat</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7834" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7834"></td>
        <td id="LC7834" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">knitting, knitting, that they their very selves were closing in around</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7835" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7835"></td>
        <td id="LC7835" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">a structure yet unbuilt, where they were to sit knitting, knitting,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7836" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7836"></td>
        <td id="LC7836" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">counting dropping heads.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7837" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7837"></td>

        <td id="L7841" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7841"></td>
        <td id="LC7841" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">XVII. One Night</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7842" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7842"></td>
        <td id="LC7842" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7843" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7843"></td>
        <td id="LC7843" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7844" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7844"></td>
        <td id="LC7844" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Never did the sun go down with a brighter glory on the quiet corner in</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7845" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7845"></td>
        <td id="LC7845" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Soho, than one memorable evening when the Doctor and his daughter sat</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7846" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7846"></td>
        <td id="LC7846" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">under the plane-tree together. Never did the moon rise with a milder</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7847" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7847"></td>
        <td id="LC7847" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">radiance over great London, than on that night when it found them still</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7848" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7848"></td>
        <td id="LC7848" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">seated under the tree, and shone upon their faces through its leaves.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7849" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7849"></td>
        <td id="LC7849" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7850" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7850"></td>
        <td id="LC7850" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Lucie was to be married to-morrow. She had reserved this last evening</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7851" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7851"></td>
        <td id="LC7851" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">for her father, and they sat alone under the plane-tree.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7852" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7852"></td>
        <td id="LC7852" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7853" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7853"></td>
        <td id="LC7853" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“You are happy, my dear father?”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7854" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7854"></td>
        <td id="LC7854" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7855" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7855"></td>
        <td id="LC7855" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Quite, my child.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7856" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7856"></td>
        <td id="LC7856" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7857" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7857"></td>
        <td id="LC7857" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">They had said little, though they had been there a long time. When it</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7858" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7858"></td>
        <td id="LC7858" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">was yet light enough to work and read, she had neither engaged herself</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7859" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7859"></td>
        <td id="LC7859" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">in her usual work, nor had she read to him. She had employed herself in</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7860" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7860"></td>
        <td id="LC7860" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">both ways, at his side under the tree, many and many a time; but, this</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7861" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7861"></td>
        <td id="LC7861" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">time was not quite like any other, and nothing could make it so.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7862" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7862"></td>
        <td id="LC7862" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7863" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7863"></td>
        <td id="LC7863" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“And I am very happy to-night, dear father. I am deeply happy in the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7864" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7864"></td>
        <td id="LC7864" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">love that Heaven has so blessed--my love for Charles, and Charles&#39;s love</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7865" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7865"></td>
        <td id="LC7865" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">for me. But, if my life were not to be still consecrated to you, or</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7866" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7866"></td>
        <td id="LC7866" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">if my marriage were so arranged as that it would part us, even by</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7867" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7867"></td>
        <td id="LC7867" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the length of a few of these streets, I should be more unhappy and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7868" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7868"></td>
        <td id="LC7868" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">self-reproachful now than I can tell you. Even as it is--”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7869" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7869"></td>
        <td id="LC7869" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7870" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7870"></td>
        <td id="LC7870" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Even as it was, she could not command her voice.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7871" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7871"></td>
        <td id="LC7871" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7872" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7872"></td>
        <td id="LC7872" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">In the sad moonlight, she clasped him by the neck, and laid her face</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7873" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7873"></td>
        <td id="LC7873" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">upon his breast. In the moonlight which is always sad, as the light of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7874" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7874"></td>
        <td id="LC7874" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the sun itself is--as the light called human life is--at its coming and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7875" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7875"></td>
        <td id="LC7875" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">its going.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7876" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7876"></td>
        <td id="LC7876" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7877" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7877"></td>
        <td id="LC7877" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Dearest dear! Can you tell me, this last time, that you feel quite,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7878" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7878"></td>
        <td id="LC7878" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">quite sure, no new affections of mine, and no new duties of mine, will</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7879" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7879"></td>
        <td id="LC7879" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">ever interpose between us? _I_ know it well, but do you know it? In your</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
