        <td id="LC7880" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">own heart, do you feel quite certain?”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7881" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7881"></td>
        <td id="LC7881" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7882" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7882"></td>
        <td id="LC7882" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Her father answered, with a cheerful firmness of conviction he could</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7883" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7883"></td>
        <td id="LC7883" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">scarcely have assumed, “Quite sure, my darling! More than that,” he</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7884" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7884"></td>
        <td id="LC7884" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">added, as he tenderly kissed her: “my future is far brighter, Lucie,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7885" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7885"></td>
        <td id="LC7885" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">seen through your marriage, than it could have been--nay, than it ever</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7886" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7886"></td>
        <td id="LC7886" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">was--without it.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7887" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7887"></td>
        <td id="LC7887" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7888" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7888"></td>
        <td id="LC7888" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“If I could hope _that_, my father!--”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7889" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7889"></td>
        <td id="LC7889" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7890" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7890"></td>
        <td id="LC7890" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Believe it, love! Indeed it is so. Consider how natural and how plain</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7891" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7891"></td>
        <td id="LC7891" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">it is, my dear, that it should be so. You, devoted and young, cannot</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7892" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7892"></td>
        <td id="LC7892" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">fully appreciate the anxiety I have felt that your life should not be</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7893" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7893"></td>
        <td id="LC7893" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">wasted--”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7894" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7894"></td>
        <td id="LC7894" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7895" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7895"></td>
        <td id="LC7895" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">She moved her hand towards his lips, but he took it in his, and repeated</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7896" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7896"></td>
        <td id="LC7896" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the word.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7897" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7897"></td>
        <td id="LC7897" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7898" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7898"></td>
        <td id="LC7898" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“--wasted, my child--should not be wasted, struck aside from the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7899" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7899"></td>
        <td id="LC7899" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">natural order of things--for my sake. Your unselfishness cannot entirely</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7900" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7900"></td>
        <td id="LC7900" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">comprehend how much my mind has gone on this; but, only ask yourself,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7901" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7901"></td>
        <td id="LC7901" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">how could my happiness be perfect, while yours was incomplete?”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7902" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7902"></td>
        <td id="LC7902" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7903" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7903"></td>
        <td id="LC7903" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“If I had never seen Charles, my father, I should have been quite happy</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7904" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7904"></td>
        <td id="LC7904" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">with you.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7905" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7905"></td>
        <td id="LC7905" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7906" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7906"></td>
        <td id="LC7906" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">He smiled at her unconscious admission that she would have been unhappy</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7907" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7907"></td>
        <td id="LC7907" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">without Charles, having seen him; and replied:</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7908" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7908"></td>
        <td id="LC7908" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7909" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7909"></td>
        <td id="LC7909" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“My child, you did see him, and it is Charles. If it had not been</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7910" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7910"></td>
        <td id="LC7910" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Charles, it would have been another. Or, if it had been no other, I</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7911" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7911"></td>
        <td id="LC7911" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">should have been the cause, and then the dark part of my life would have</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7912" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7912"></td>
        <td id="LC7912" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">cast its shadow beyond myself, and would have fallen on you.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7913" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7913"></td>
        <td id="LC7913" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7914" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7914"></td>
        <td id="LC7914" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">It was the first time, except at the trial, of her ever hearing him</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7915" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7915"></td>
        <td id="LC7915" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">refer to the period of his suffering. It gave her a strange and new</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7916" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7916"></td>
        <td id="LC7916" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">sensation while his words were in her ears; and she remembered it long</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7917" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7917"></td>
        <td id="LC7917" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">afterwards.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7918" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7918"></td>
        <td id="LC7918" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7919" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7919"></td>
        <td id="LC7919" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“See!” said the Doctor of Beauvais, raising his hand towards the moon.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7920" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7920"></td>
        <td id="LC7920" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“I have looked at her from my prison-window, when I could not bear her</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7921" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7921"></td>
        <td id="LC7921" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">light. I have looked at her when it has been such torture to me to think</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7922" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7922"></td>
        <td id="LC7922" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">of her shining upon what I had lost, that I have beaten my head against</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7923" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7923"></td>
        <td id="LC7923" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">my prison-walls. I have looked at her, in a state so dull and lethargic,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7924" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7924"></td>
        <td id="LC7924" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">that I have thought of nothing but the number of horizontal lines I</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7925" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7925"></td>
        <td id="LC7925" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">could draw across her at the full, and the number of perpendicular lines</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7926" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7926"></td>
        <td id="LC7926" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">with which I could intersect them.” He added in his inward and pondering</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7927" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7927"></td>
        <td id="LC7927" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">manner, as he looked at the moon, “It was twenty either way, I remember,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7928" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7928"></td>
        <td id="LC7928" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and the twentieth was difficult to squeeze in.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7929" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7929"></td>
        <td id="LC7929" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7930" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7930"></td>
        <td id="LC7930" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">The strange thrill with which she heard him go back to that time,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7931" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7931"></td>
        <td id="LC7931" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">deepened as he dwelt upon it; but, there was nothing to shock her in</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7932" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7932"></td>
        <td id="LC7932" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the manner of his reference. He only seemed to contrast his present</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7933" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7933"></td>
        <td id="LC7933" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">cheerfulness and felicity with the dire endurance that was over.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7934" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7934"></td>
        <td id="LC7934" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7935" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7935"></td>
        <td id="LC7935" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“I have looked at her, speculating thousands of times upon the unborn</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7936" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7936"></td>
        <td id="LC7936" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">child from whom I had been rent. Whether it was alive. Whether it had</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7937" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7937"></td>
        <td id="LC7937" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">been born alive, or the poor mother&#39;s shock had killed it. Whether it</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7938" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7938"></td>
        <td id="LC7938" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">was a son who would some day avenge his father. (There was a time in my</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7939" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7939"></td>
        <td id="LC7939" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">imprisonment, when my desire for vengeance was unbearable.) Whether it</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7940" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7940"></td>
        <td id="LC7940" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">was a son who would never know his father&#39;s story; who might even live</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7941" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7941"></td>
        <td id="LC7941" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">to weigh the possibility of his father&#39;s having disappeared of his own</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7942" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7942"></td>
        <td id="LC7942" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">will and act. Whether it was a daughter who would grow to be a woman.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7943" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7943"></td>
        <td id="LC7943" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7944" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7944"></td>
        <td id="LC7944" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">She drew closer to him, and kissed his cheek and his hand.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7945" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7945"></td>
        <td id="LC7945" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7946" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7946"></td>
        <td id="LC7946" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“I have pictured my daughter, to myself, as perfectly forgetful of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7947" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7947"></td>
        <td id="LC7947" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">me--rather, altogether ignorant of me, and unconscious of me. I have</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7948" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7948"></td>
        <td id="LC7948" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">cast up the years of her age, year after year. I have seen her married</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7949" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7949"></td>
        <td id="LC7949" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">to a man who knew nothing of my fate. I have altogether perished from</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7950" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7950"></td>
        <td id="LC7950" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the remembrance of the living, and in the next generation my place was a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7951" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7951"></td>
        <td id="LC7951" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">blank.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7952" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7952"></td>
        <td id="LC7952" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7953" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7953"></td>
        <td id="LC7953" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“My father! Even to hear that you had such thoughts of a daughter who</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7954" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7954"></td>
        <td id="LC7954" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">never existed, strikes to my heart as if I had been that child.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7955" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7955"></td>
        <td id="LC7955" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7956" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7956"></td>
        <td id="LC7956" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“You, Lucie? It is out of the Consolation and restoration you have</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7957" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7957"></td>
        <td id="LC7957" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">brought to me, that these remembrances arise, and pass between us and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7958" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7958"></td>
        <td id="LC7958" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the moon on this last night.--What did I say just now?”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7959" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7959"></td>
        <td id="LC7959" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7960" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7960"></td>
        <td id="LC7960" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“She knew nothing of you. She cared nothing for you.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7961" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7961"></td>
        <td id="LC7961" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7962" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7962"></td>
        <td id="LC7962" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“So! But on other moonlight nights, when the sadness and the silence</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7963" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7963"></td>
        <td id="LC7963" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">have touched me in a different way--have affected me with something as</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7964" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7964"></td>
        <td id="LC7964" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">like a sorrowful sense of peace, as any emotion that had pain for its</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7965" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7965"></td>
        <td id="LC7965" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">foundations could--I have imagined her as coming to me in my cell, and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7966" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7966"></td>
        <td id="LC7966" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">leading me out into the freedom beyond the fortress. I have seen her</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7967" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7967"></td>
        <td id="LC7967" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">image in the moonlight often, as I now see you; except that I never held</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7968" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7968"></td>
        <td id="LC7968" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">her in my arms; it stood between the little grated window and the door.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7969" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7969"></td>
        <td id="LC7969" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">But, you understand that that was not the child I am speaking of?”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7970" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7970"></td>
        <td id="LC7970" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7971" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7971"></td>
        <td id="LC7971" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“The figure was not; the--the--image; the fancy?”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7972" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7972"></td>
        <td id="LC7972" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7973" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7973"></td>
        <td id="LC7973" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“No. That was another thing. It stood before my disturbed sense of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7974" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7974"></td>
        <td id="LC7974" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">sight, but it never moved. The phantom that my mind pursued, was another</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7975" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7975"></td>
        <td id="LC7975" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and more real child. Of her outward appearance I know no more than</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7976" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7976"></td>
        <td id="LC7976" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">that she was like her mother. The other had that likeness too--as you</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7977" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7977"></td>
        <td id="LC7977" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">have--but was not the same. Can you follow me, Lucie? Hardly, I think?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7978" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7978"></td>
        <td id="LC7978" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">I doubt you must have been a solitary prisoner to understand these</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7979" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7979"></td>
        <td id="LC7979" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">perplexed distinctions.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7980" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7980"></td>
        <td id="LC7980" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7981" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7981"></td>
        <td id="LC7981" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">His collected and calm manner could not prevent her blood from running</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7982" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7982"></td>
        <td id="LC7982" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">cold, as he thus tried to anatomise his old condition.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7983" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7983"></td>
        <td id="LC7983" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7984" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7984"></td>
        <td id="LC7984" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“In that more peaceful state, I have imagined her, in the moonlight,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7985" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7985"></td>
        <td id="LC7985" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">coming to me and taking me out to show me that the home of her married</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7986" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7986"></td>
        <td id="LC7986" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">life was full of her loving remembrance of her lost father. My picture</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7987" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7987"></td>
        <td id="LC7987" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">was in her room, and I was in her prayers. Her life was active,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7988" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7988"></td>
        <td id="LC7988" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">cheerful, useful; but my poor history pervaded it all.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7989" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7989"></td>
        <td id="LC7989" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7990" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7990"></td>
        <td id="LC7990" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“I was that child, my father, I was not half so good, but in my love</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7991" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7991"></td>
        <td id="LC7991" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">that was I.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7992" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7992"></td>
        <td id="LC7992" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7993" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7993"></td>
        <td id="LC7993" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“And she showed me her children,” said the Doctor of Beauvais, “and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7994" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7994"></td>
        <td id="LC7994" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">they had heard of me, and had been taught to pity me. When they passed</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7995" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7995"></td>
        <td id="LC7995" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">a prison of the State, they kept far from its frowning walls, and looked</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7996" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7996"></td>
        <td id="LC7996" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">up at its bars, and spoke in whispers. She could never deliver me; I</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7997" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7997"></td>
        <td id="LC7997" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">imagined that she always brought me back after showing me such things.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7998" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7998"></td>
        <td id="LC7998" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">But then, blessed with the relief of tears, I fell upon my knees, and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L7999" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="7999"></td>
        <td id="LC7999" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">blessed her.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8000" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8000"></td>
        <td id="LC8000" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8001" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8001"></td>
        <td id="LC8001" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“I am that child, I hope, my father. O my dear, my dear, will you bless</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8002" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8002"></td>
        <td id="LC8002" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">me as fervently to-morrow?”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8003" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8003"></td>
        <td id="LC8003" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8004" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8004"></td>
        <td id="LC8004" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Lucie, I recall these old troubles in the reason that I have to-night</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8005" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8005"></td>
        <td id="LC8005" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">for loving you better than words can tell, and thanking God for my great</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8006" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8006"></td>
        <td id="LC8006" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">happiness. My thoughts, when they were wildest, never rose near the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8007" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8007"></td>
        <td id="LC8007" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">happiness that I have known with you, and that we have before us.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8008" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8008"></td>
        <td id="LC8008" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8009" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8009"></td>
        <td id="LC8009" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">He embraced her, solemnly commended her to Heaven, and humbly thanked</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8010" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8010"></td>
        <td id="LC8010" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Heaven for having bestowed her on him. By-and-bye, they went into the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8011" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8011"></td>
        <td id="LC8011" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">house.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8012" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8012"></td>
        <td id="LC8012" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8013" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8013"></td>
        <td id="LC8013" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">There was no one bidden to the marriage but Mr. Lorry; there was even to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8014" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8014"></td>
        <td id="LC8014" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">be no bridesmaid but the gaunt Miss Pross. The marriage was to make no</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8015" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8015"></td>
        <td id="LC8015" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">change in their place of residence; they had been able to extend it,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8016" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8016"></td>
        <td id="LC8016" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">by taking to themselves the upper rooms formerly belonging to the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8017" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8017"></td>
        <td id="LC8017" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">apocryphal invisible lodger, and they desired nothing more.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8018" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8018"></td>
        <td id="LC8018" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8019" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8019"></td>
        <td id="LC8019" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Doctor Manette was very cheerful at the little supper. They were only</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8020" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8020"></td>
        <td id="LC8020" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">three at table, and Miss Pross made the third. He regretted that Charles</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8021" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8021"></td>
        <td id="LC8021" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">was not there; was more than half disposed to object to the loving</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8022" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8022"></td>
        <td id="LC8022" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">little plot that kept him away; and drank to him affectionately.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8023" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8023"></td>
        <td id="LC8023" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8024" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8024"></td>
        <td id="LC8024" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">So, the time came for him to bid Lucie good night, and they separated.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8025" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8025"></td>
        <td id="LC8025" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">But, in the stillness of the third hour of the morning, Lucie came</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8026" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8026"></td>
        <td id="LC8026" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">downstairs again, and stole into his room; not free from unshaped fears,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8027" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8027"></td>
        <td id="LC8027" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">beforehand.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8028" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8028"></td>
        <td id="LC8028" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8029" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8029"></td>
        <td id="LC8029" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">All things, however, were in their places; all was quiet; and he lay</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8030" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8030"></td>
        <td id="LC8030" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">asleep, his white hair picturesque on the untroubled pillow, and his</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8031" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8031"></td>
        <td id="LC8031" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">hands lying quiet on the coverlet. She put her needless candle in the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8032" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8032"></td>
        <td id="LC8032" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">shadow at a distance, crept up to his bed, and put her lips to his;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8033" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8033"></td>
        <td id="LC8033" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">then, leaned over him, and looked at him.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8034" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8034"></td>
        <td id="LC8034" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8035" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8035"></td>
        <td id="LC8035" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Into his handsome face, the bitter waters of captivity had worn; but, he</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8036" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8036"></td>
        <td id="LC8036" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">covered up their tracks with a determination so strong, that he held the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8037" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8037"></td>
        <td id="LC8037" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">mastery of them even in his sleep. A more remarkable face in its quiet,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8038" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8038"></td>
        <td id="LC8038" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">resolute, and guarded struggle with an unseen assailant, was not to be</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8039" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8039"></td>
        <td id="LC8039" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">beheld in all the wide dominions of sleep, that night.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8040" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8040"></td>
        <td id="LC8040" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8041" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8041"></td>
        <td id="LC8041" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">She timidly laid her hand on his dear breast, and put up a prayer that</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8042" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8042"></td>
        <td id="LC8042" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">she might ever be as true to him as her love aspired to be, and as his</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8043" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8043"></td>
        <td id="LC8043" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">sorrows deserved. Then, she withdrew her hand, and kissed his lips once</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8044" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8044"></td>
        <td id="LC8044" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">more, and went away. So, the sunrise came, and the shadows of the leaves</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8045" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8045"></td>
        <td id="LC8045" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">of the plane-tree moved upon his face, as softly as her lips had moved</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8046" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8046"></td>
        <td id="LC8046" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">in praying for him.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8047" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8047"></td>
        <td id="LC8047" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8048" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8048"></td>

      </tr>

      </tr>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8051" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8051"></td>
        <td id="LC8051" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">XVIII. Nine Days</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8052" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8052"></td>
        <td id="LC8052" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8053" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8053"></td>
        <td id="LC8053" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8054" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8054"></td>
        <td id="LC8054" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">The marriage-day was shining brightly, and they were ready outside the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8055" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8055"></td>
        <td id="LC8055" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">closed door of the Doctor&#39;s room, where he was speaking with Charles</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8056" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8056"></td>
        <td id="LC8056" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Darnay. They were ready to go to church; the beautiful bride, Mr.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8057" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8057"></td>
        <td id="LC8057" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Lorry, and Miss Pross--to whom the event, through a gradual process of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8058" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8058"></td>
        <td id="LC8058" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">reconcilement to the inevitable, would have been one of absolute bliss,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8059" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8059"></td>
        <td id="LC8059" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">but for the yet lingering consideration that her brother Solomon should</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8060" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8060"></td>
        <td id="LC8060" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">have been the bridegroom.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8061" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8061"></td>
        <td id="LC8061" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8062" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8062"></td>
        <td id="LC8062" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“And so,” said Mr. Lorry, who could not sufficiently admire the bride,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8063" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8063"></td>
        <td id="LC8063" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and who had been moving round her to take in every point of her quiet,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8064" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8064"></td>
        <td id="LC8064" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">pretty dress; “and so it was for this, my sweet Lucie, that I brought</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8065" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8065"></td>
        <td id="LC8065" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">you across the Channel, such a baby! Lord bless me! How little I thought</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8066" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8066"></td>
        <td id="LC8066" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">what I was doing! How lightly I valued the obligation I was conferring</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8067" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8067"></td>
        <td id="LC8067" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">on my friend Mr. Charles!”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8068" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8068"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8069" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8069"></td>
        <td id="LC8069" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“You didn&#39;t mean it,” remarked the matter-of-fact Miss Pross, “and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8070" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8070"></td>
        <td id="LC8070" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">therefore how could you know it? Nonsense!”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8071" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8071"></td>
        <td id="LC8071" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8072" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8072"></td>
        <td id="LC8072" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Really? Well; but don&#39;t cry,” said the gentle Mr. Lorry.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8073" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8073"></td>
        <td id="LC8073" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8074" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8074"></td>
        <td id="LC8074" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“I am not crying,” said Miss Pross; “_you_ are.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8075" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8075"></td>
        <td id="LC8075" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8076" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8076"></td>
        <td id="LC8076" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“I, my Pross?” (By this time, Mr. Lorry dared to be pleasant with her,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8077" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8077"></td>
        <td id="LC8077" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">on occasion.)</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8078" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8078"></td>
        <td id="LC8078" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8079" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8079"></td>
        <td id="LC8079" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“You were, just now; I saw you do it, and I don&#39;t wonder at it. Such</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8080" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8080"></td>
        <td id="LC8080" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">a present of plate as you have made &#39;em, is enough to bring tears into</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8081" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8081"></td>
        <td id="LC8081" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">anybody&#39;s eyes. There&#39;s not a fork or a spoon in the collection,” said</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8082" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8082"></td>
        <td id="LC8082" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Miss Pross, “that I didn&#39;t cry over, last night after the box came, till</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8083" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8083"></td>
        <td id="LC8083" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">I couldn&#39;t see it.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8084" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8084"></td>
        <td id="LC8084" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8085" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8085"></td>
        <td id="LC8085" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“I am highly gratified,” said Mr. Lorry, “though, upon my honour, I</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8086" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8086"></td>
        <td id="LC8086" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">had no intention of rendering those trifling articles of remembrance</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8087" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8087"></td>
        <td id="LC8087" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">invisible to any one. Dear me! This is an occasion that makes a man</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8088" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8088"></td>
        <td id="LC8088" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">speculate on all he has lost. Dear, dear, dear! To think that there</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8089" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8089"></td>
        <td id="LC8089" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">might have been a Mrs. Lorry, any time these fifty years almost!”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8090" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8090"></td>
        <td id="LC8090" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8091" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8091"></td>
        <td id="LC8091" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Not at all!” From Miss Pross.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8092" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8092"></td>
        <td id="LC8092" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8093" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8093"></td>
        <td id="LC8093" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“You think there never might have been a Mrs. Lorry?” asked the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8094" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8094"></td>
        <td id="LC8094" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">gentleman of that name.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8095" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8095"></td>
        <td id="LC8095" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8096" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8096"></td>
        <td id="LC8096" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Pooh!” rejoined Miss Pross; “you were a bachelor in your cradle.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8097" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8097"></td>
        <td id="LC8097" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8098" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8098"></td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L8189" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8189"></td>
        <td id="LC8189" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">down, and he was very busy.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8190" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8190"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8191" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8191"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8192" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8192"></td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L8193" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8193"></td>
        <td id="LC8193" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">The Doctor looked at him for a moment--half inquiringly, half as if he</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8194" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8194"></td>
        <td id="LC8194" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">were angry at being spoken to--and bent over his work again.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8195" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8195"></td>
        <td id="LC8195" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8196" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8196"></td>
        <td id="LC8196" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">He had laid aside his coat and waistcoat; his shirt was open at the</td>

        <td id="L8197" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8197"></td>

      <tr>

        <td id="L8199" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8199"></td>

        <td id="L8201" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8201"></td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L8213" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8213"></td>

        <td id="L8224" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8224"></td>

        <td id="L8225" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8225"></td>

        <td id="L8256" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8256"></td>

        <td id="L8271" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8271"></td>
        <td id="LC8271" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">He made no effort to say why not, and said not a word more. But, Mr.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8272" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8272"></td>
        <td id="LC8272" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Lorry thought he saw, as he leaned forward on his bench in the dusk,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8273" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8273"></td>

      </tr>

        <td id="L8275" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8275"></td>
        <td id="LC8275" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">business perceived an advantage here, and determined to hold it.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8276" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8276"></td>

        <td id="L8277" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8277"></td>
        <td id="LC8277" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Miss Pross and he divided the night into two watches, and observed him</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8278" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8278"></td>
        <td id="LC8278" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">at intervals from the adjoining room. He paced up and down for a long</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8279" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8279"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8280" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8280"></td>
        <td id="LC8280" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">fell asleep. In the morning, he was up betimes, and went straight to his</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8281" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8281"></td>
        <td id="LC8281" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">bench and to work.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8282" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8282"></td>
        <td id="LC8282" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8283" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8283"></td>
        <td id="LC8283" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">On this second day, Mr. Lorry saluted him cheerfully by his name,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8284" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8284"></td>
        <td id="LC8284" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and spoke to him on topics that had been of late familiar to them. He</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8285" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8285"></td>
        <td id="LC8285" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">returned no reply, but it was evident that he heard what was said, and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8286" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8286"></td>
        <td id="LC8286" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">that he thought about it, however confusedly. This encouraged Mr. Lorry</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8287" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8287"></td>
        <td id="LC8287" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">to have Miss Pross in with her work, several times during the day;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8288" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8288"></td>
        <td id="LC8288" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">at those times, they quietly spoke of Lucie, and of her father then</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8289" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8289"></td>
        <td id="LC8289" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">present, precisely in the usual manner, and as if there were nothing</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8290" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8290"></td>
        <td id="LC8290" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">amiss. This was done without any demonstrative accompaniment, not long</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8291" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8291"></td>
        <td id="LC8291" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">enough, or often enough to harass him; and it lightened Mr. Lorry&#39;s</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8292" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8292"></td>
        <td id="LC8292" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">friendly heart to believe that he looked up oftener, and that he</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8293" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8293"></td>
        <td id="LC8293" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">appeared to be stirred by some perception of inconsistencies surrounding</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8294" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8294"></td>
        <td id="LC8294" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">him.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8295" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8295"></td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L8296" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8296"></td>
        <td id="LC8296" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">When it fell dark again, Mr. Lorry asked him as before:</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8297" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8297"></td>
        <td id="LC8297" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>

      <tr>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8303" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8303"></td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L8304" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8304"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8305" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8305"></td>
        <td id="LC8305" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">from him, and, after remaining absent for an hour, returned. In the</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L8312" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8312"></td>

        <td id="L8326" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8326"></td>

      <tr>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8329" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8329"></td>
        <td id="LC8329" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Worn out by anxious watching, Mr. Lorry fell asleep at his post. On the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8330" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8330"></td>
        <td id="LC8330" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">tenth morning of his suspense, he was startled by the shining of the sun</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8331" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8331"></td>
        <td id="LC8331" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">into the room where a heavy slumber had overtaken him when it was dark</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L8332" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8332"></td>

        <td id="L8333" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8333"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8334" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8334"></td>
        <td id="LC8334" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">He rubbed his eyes and roused himself; but he doubted, when he had</td>

        <td id="L8343" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8343"></td>

        <td id="L8344" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8344"></td>

        <td id="L8347" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8347"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8348" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8348"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8349" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8349"></td>
        <td id="LC8349" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">It was but the inquiry of his first confusion and astonishment, the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8350" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8350"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8351" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8351"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8352" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8352"></td>
        <td id="LC8352" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">How came he to have fallen asleep, in his clothes, on the sofa in Doctor</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L8353" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8353"></td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L8355" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8355"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8356" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8356"></td>
        <td id="LC8356" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Within a few minutes, Miss Pross stood whispering at his side. If he</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8357" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8357"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8358" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8358"></td>
        <td id="LC8358" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">resolved it; but he was by that time clear-headed, and had none.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8359" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8359"></td>
        <td id="LC8359" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">He advised that they should let the time go by until the regular</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8360" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8360"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8361" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8361"></td>
        <td id="LC8361" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">had occurred. If he appeared to be in his customary state of mind, Mr.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8362" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8362"></td>
        <td id="LC8362" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Lorry would then cautiously proceed to seek direction and guidance from</td>

        <td id="L8363" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8363"></td>
        <td id="LC8363" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the opinion he had been, in his anxiety, so anxious to obtain.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8364" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8364"></td>
        <td id="LC8364" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8365" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8365"></td>
        <td id="LC8365" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Miss Pross, submitting herself to his judgment, the scheme was worked</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8366" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8366"></td>
        <td id="LC8366" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">out with care. Having abundance of time for his usual methodical</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8367" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8367"></td>
        <td id="LC8367" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">toilette, Mr. Lorry presented himself at the breakfast-hour in his usual</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8368" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8368"></td>
        <td id="LC8368" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">white linen, and with his usual neat leg. The Doctor was summoned in the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8369" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8369"></td>
        <td id="LC8369" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">usual way, and came to breakfast.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8370" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8370"></td>
        <td id="LC8370" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8371" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8371"></td>
        <td id="LC8371" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">So far as it was possible to comprehend him without overstepping those</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8372" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8372"></td>
        <td id="LC8372" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">delicate and gradual approaches which Mr. Lorry felt to be the only safe</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8373" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8373"></td>
        <td id="LC8373" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">advance, he at first supposed that his daughter&#39;s marriage had taken</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8374" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8374"></td>
        <td id="LC8374" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">place yesterday. An incidental allusion, purposely thrown out, to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8375" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8375"></td>
        <td id="LC8375" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the day of the week, and the day of the month, set him thinking and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8376" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8376"></td>

      <tr>

        <td id="LC8378" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">he sought. And that aid was his own.</td>

        <td id="LC8457" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">about at all? What can I do for my friend? No man ever can have been</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L8458" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8458"></td>
        <td id="LC8458" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">more desirous in his heart to serve a friend, than I am to serve mine,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8459" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8459"></td>
        <td id="LC8459" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">if I knew how.</td>

        <td id="L8460" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8460"></td>

      <tr>

        <td id="LC8461" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“But I don&#39;t know how to originate, in such a case. If your sagacity,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8462" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8462"></td>
        <td id="LC8462" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">knowledge, and experience, could put me on the right track, I might be</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8463" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8463"></td>
        <td id="LC8463" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">able to do so much; unenlightened and undirected, I can do so little.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8464" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8464"></td>
        <td id="LC8464" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Pray discuss it with me; pray enable me to see it a little more clearly,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8465" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8465"></td>
        <td id="LC8465" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and teach me how to be a little more useful.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8466" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8466"></td>
        <td id="LC8466" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8467" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8467"></td>
        <td id="LC8467" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Doctor Manette sat meditating after these earnest words were spoken, and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8468" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8468"></td>
        <td id="LC8468" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Mr. Lorry did not press him.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8469" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8469"></td>
        <td id="LC8469" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8470" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8470"></td>
        <td id="LC8470" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“I think it probable,” said the Doctor, breaking silence with an effort,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8471" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8471"></td>
        <td id="LC8471" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“that the relapse you have described, my dear friend, was not quite</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8472" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8472"></td>
        <td id="LC8472" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">unforeseen by its subject.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8473" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8473"></td>
        <td id="LC8473" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8474" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8474"></td>
        <td id="LC8474" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Was it dreaded by him?” Mr. Lorry ventured to ask.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8475" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8475"></td>
        <td id="LC8475" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8476" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8476"></td>
        <td id="LC8476" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Very much.” He said it with an involuntary shudder.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8477" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8477"></td>
        <td id="LC8477" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8478" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8478"></td>
        <td id="LC8478" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“You have no idea how such an apprehension weighs on the sufferer&#39;s</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8479" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8479"></td>
        <td id="LC8479" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">mind, and how difficult--how almost impossible--it is, for him to force</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8480" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8480"></td>
        <td id="LC8480" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">himself to utter a word upon the topic that oppresses him.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8481" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8481"></td>
        <td id="LC8481" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8482" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8482"></td>
        <td id="LC8482" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Would he,” asked Mr. Lorry, “be sensibly relieved if he could prevail</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8483" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8483"></td>
        <td id="LC8483" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">upon himself to impart that secret brooding to any one, when it is on</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8484" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8484"></td>
        <td id="LC8484" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">him?”</td>

        <td id="L8485" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8485"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8487" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8487"></td>
        <td id="LC8487" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">believe it--in some cases--to be quite impossible.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8488" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8488"></td>
        <td id="LC8488" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L8489" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8489"></td>
        <td id="LC8489" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Now,” said Mr. Lorry, gently laying his hand on the Doctor&#39;s arm again,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8490" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8490"></td>
        <td id="LC8490" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">after a short silence on both sides, “to what would you refer this</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>

        <td id="LC8491" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">attack?”</td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8493" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8493"></td>
        <td id="LC8493" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“I believe,” returned Doctor Manette, “that there had been a strong and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8494" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8494"></td>
        <td id="LC8494" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">extraordinary revival of the train of thought and remembrance that</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8495" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8495"></td>
        <td id="LC8495" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">was the first cause of the malady. Some intense associations of a most</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8496" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8496"></td>
        <td id="LC8496" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">distressing nature were vividly recalled, I think. It is probable that</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8497" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8497"></td>
        <td id="LC8497" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">there had long been a dread lurking in his mind, that those associations</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L8498" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8498"></td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L8499" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8499"></td>
        <td id="LC8499" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">particular occasion. He tried to prepare himself in vain; perhaps the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8500" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8500"></td>
        <td id="LC8500" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">effort to prepare himself made him less able to bear it.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8501" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8501"></td>
        <td id="LC8501" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L8502" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8502"></td>
        <td id="LC8502" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Would he remember what took place in the relapse?” asked Mr. Lorry,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8503" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8503"></td>
        <td id="LC8503" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">with natural hesitation.</td>
      </tr>

      <tr>
        <td id="L8506" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8506"></td>
        <td id="LC8506" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">answered, in a low voice, “Not at all.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8507" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8507"></td>

        <td id="LC8508" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Now, as to the future,” hinted Mr. Lorry.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8509" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8509"></td>
        <td id="LC8509" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8510" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8510"></td>
        <td id="LC8510" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“As to the future,” said the Doctor, recovering firmness, “I should have</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8511" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8511"></td>
        <td id="LC8511" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">great hope. As it pleased Heaven in its mercy to restore him so soon, I</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8512" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8512"></td>
        <td id="LC8512" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">should have great hope. He, yielding under the pressure of a complicated</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8513" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8513"></td>
        <td id="LC8513" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">something, long dreaded and long vaguely foreseen and contended against,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8514" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8514"></td>
        <td id="LC8514" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and recovering after the cloud had burst and passed, I should hope that</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8515" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8515"></td>
        <td id="LC8515" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the worst was over.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8516" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8516"></td>
        <td id="LC8516" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8517" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8517"></td>
        <td id="LC8517" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Well, well! That&#39;s good comfort. I am thankful!” said Mr. Lorry.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8518" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8518"></td>
        <td id="LC8518" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8519" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8519"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8520" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8520"></td>
        <td id="LC8520" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8521" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8521"></td>
        <td id="LC8521" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“There are two other points,” said Mr. Lorry, “on which I am anxious to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8522" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8522"></td>
        <td id="LC8522" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">be instructed. I may go on?”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8523" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8523"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8524" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8524"></td>
        <td id="LC8524" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“You cannot do your friend a better service.” The Doctor gave him his</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8525" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8525"></td>
        <td id="LC8525" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">hand.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8526" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8526"></td>
