      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8527" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8527"></td>
        <td id="LC8527" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“To the first, then. He is of a studious habit, and unusually energetic;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8528" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8528"></td>
        <td id="LC8528" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">he applies himself with great ardour to the acquisition of professional</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8529" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8529"></td>
        <td id="LC8529" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">knowledge, to the conducting of experiments, to many things. Now, does</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8530" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8530"></td>
        <td id="LC8530" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">he do too much?”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8531" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8531"></td>
        <td id="LC8531" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8532" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8532"></td>
        <td id="LC8532" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“I think not. It may be the character of his mind, to be always in</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8533" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8533"></td>
        <td id="LC8533" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">singular need of occupation. That may be, in part, natural to it; in</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8534" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8534"></td>
        <td id="LC8534" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">part, the result of affliction. The less it was occupied with healthy</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8535" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8535"></td>
        <td id="LC8535" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">things, the more it would be in danger of turning in the unhealthy</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8536" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8536"></td>
        <td id="LC8536" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">direction. He may have observed himself, and made the discovery.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8537" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8537"></td>
        <td id="LC8537" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8538" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8538"></td>
        <td id="LC8538" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“You are sure that he is not under too great a strain?”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8539" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8539"></td>
        <td id="LC8539" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8540" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8540"></td>
        <td id="LC8540" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“I think I am quite sure of it.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8541" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8541"></td>
        <td id="LC8541" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8542" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8542"></td>
        <td id="LC8542" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“My dear Manette, if he were overworked now--”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8543" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8543"></td>
        <td id="LC8543" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8544" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8544"></td>
        <td id="LC8544" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“My dear Lorry, I doubt if that could easily be. There has been a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8545" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8545"></td>
        <td id="LC8545" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">violent stress in one direction, and it needs a counterweight.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8546" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8546"></td>
        <td id="LC8546" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8547" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8547"></td>
        <td id="LC8547" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Excuse me, as a persistent man of business. Assuming for a moment,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8548" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8548"></td>
        <td id="LC8548" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">that he _was_ overworked; it would show itself in some renewal of this</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8549" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8549"></td>
        <td id="LC8549" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">disorder?”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8550" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8550"></td>
        <td id="LC8550" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8551" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8551"></td>
        <td id="LC8551" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“I do not think so. I do not think,” said Doctor Manette with the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8552" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8552"></td>
        <td id="LC8552" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">firmness of self-conviction, “that anything but the one train of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8553" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8553"></td>
        <td id="LC8553" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">association would renew it. I think that, henceforth, nothing but some</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8554" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8554"></td>
        <td id="LC8554" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">extraordinary jarring of that chord could renew it. After what has</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8555" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8555"></td>
        <td id="LC8555" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">happened, and after his recovery, I find it difficult to imagine any</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8556" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8556"></td>
        <td id="LC8556" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">such violent sounding of that string again. I trust, and I almost</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8557" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8557"></td>
        <td id="LC8557" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">believe, that the circumstances likely to renew it are exhausted.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8558" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8558"></td>
        <td id="LC8558" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8559" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8559"></td>
        <td id="LC8559" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">He spoke with the diffidence of a man who knew how slight a thing</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8560" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8560"></td>
        <td id="LC8560" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">would overset the delicate organisation of the mind, and yet with the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8561" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8561"></td>
        <td id="LC8561" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">confidence of a man who had slowly won his assurance out of personal</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8562" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8562"></td>
        <td id="LC8562" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">endurance and distress. It was not for his friend to abate that</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8563" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8563"></td>
        <td id="LC8563" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">confidence. He professed himself more relieved and encouraged than he</td>
      </tr>

      <tr>
        <td id="L8656" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8656"></td>
        <td id="LC8656" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">XX. A Plea</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8657" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8657"></td>
        <td id="LC8657" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8658" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8658"></td>
        <td id="LC8658" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8659" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8659"></td>
        <td id="LC8659" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">When the newly-married pair came home, the first person who appeared, to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8660" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8660"></td>
        <td id="LC8660" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">offer his congratulations, was Sydney Carton. They had not been at home</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8661" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8661"></td>
        <td id="LC8661" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">many hours, when he presented himself. He was not improved in habits, or</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8662" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8662"></td>
        <td id="LC8662" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">in looks, or in manner; but there was a certain rugged air of fidelity</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8663" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8663"></td>
        <td id="LC8663" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">about him, which was new to the observation of Charles Darnay.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8664" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8664"></td>
        <td id="LC8664" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8665" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8665"></td>
        <td id="LC8665" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">He watched his opportunity of taking Darnay aside into a window, and of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8666" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8666"></td>
        <td id="LC8666" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">speaking to him when no one overheard.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8667" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8667"></td>
        <td id="LC8667" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8668" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8668"></td>
        <td id="LC8668" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Mr. Darnay,” said Carton, “I wish we might be friends.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8669" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8669"></td>
        <td id="LC8669" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8670" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8670"></td>
        <td id="LC8670" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“We are already friends, I hope.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8671" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8671"></td>
        <td id="LC8671" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8672" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8672"></td>
        <td id="LC8672" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“You are good enough to say so, as a fashion of speech; but, I don&#39;t</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8673" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8673"></td>
        <td id="LC8673" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">mean any fashion of speech. Indeed, when I say I wish we might be</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8674" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8674"></td>
        <td id="LC8674" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">friends, I scarcely mean quite that, either.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8675" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8675"></td>
        <td id="LC8675" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8676" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8676"></td>
        <td id="LC8676" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Charles Darnay--as was natural--asked him, in all good-humour and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8677" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8677"></td>
        <td id="LC8677" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">good-fellowship, what he did mean?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8678" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8678"></td>
        <td id="LC8678" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8679" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8679"></td>
        <td id="LC8679" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Upon my life,” said Carton, smiling, “I find that easier to comprehend</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8680" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8680"></td>
        <td id="LC8680" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">in my own mind, than to convey to yours. However, let me try. You</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8681" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8681"></td>
        <td id="LC8681" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">remember a certain famous occasion when I was more drunk than--than</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8682" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8682"></td>
        <td id="LC8682" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">usual?”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8683" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8683"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8684" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8684"></td>
        <td id="LC8684" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“I remember a certain famous occasion when you forced me to confess that</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8685" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8685"></td>
        <td id="LC8685" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">you had been drinking.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8686" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8686"></td>
        <td id="LC8686" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8687" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8687"></td>
        <td id="LC8687" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“I remember it too. The curse of those occasions is heavy upon me, for I</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8688" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8688"></td>
        <td id="LC8688" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">always remember them. I hope it may be taken into account one day,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8689" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8689"></td>
        <td id="LC8689" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">when all days are at an end for me! Don&#39;t be alarmed; I am not going to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8690" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8690"></td>
        <td id="LC8690" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">preach.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8691" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8691"></td>
        <td id="LC8691" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8692" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8692"></td>
        <td id="LC8692" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“I am not at all alarmed. Earnestness in you, is anything but alarming</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8693" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8693"></td>
        <td id="LC8693" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">to me.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8694" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8694"></td>
        <td id="LC8694" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8695" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8695"></td>
        <td id="LC8695" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Ah!” said Carton, with a careless wave of his hand, as if he waved that</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8696" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8696"></td>
        <td id="LC8696" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">away. “On the drunken occasion in question (one of a large number, as</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8697" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8697"></td>
        <td id="LC8697" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">you know), I was insufferable about liking you, and not liking you. I</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8698" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8698"></td>
        <td id="LC8698" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">wish you would forget it.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8699" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8699"></td>
        <td id="LC8699" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8700" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8700"></td>
        <td id="LC8700" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“I forgot it long ago.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8701" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8701"></td>
        <td id="LC8701" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8702" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8702"></td>
        <td id="LC8702" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Fashion of speech again! But, Mr. Darnay, oblivion is not so easy to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8703" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8703"></td>
        <td id="LC8703" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">me, as you represent it to be to you. I have by no means forgotten it,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8704" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8704"></td>
        <td id="LC8704" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and a light answer does not help me to forget it.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8705" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8705"></td>
        <td id="LC8705" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8706" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8706"></td>
        <td id="LC8706" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“If it was a light answer,” returned Darnay, “I beg your forgiveness</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8707" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8707"></td>
        <td id="LC8707" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">for it. I had no other object than to turn a slight thing, which, to my</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8708" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8708"></td>
        <td id="LC8708" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">surprise, seems to trouble you too much, aside. I declare to you, on the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8709" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8709"></td>
        <td id="LC8709" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">faith of a gentleman, that I have long dismissed it from my mind. Good</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8710" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8710"></td>
        <td id="LC8710" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Heaven, what was there to dismiss! Have I had nothing more important to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8711" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8711"></td>
        <td id="LC8711" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">remember, in the great service you rendered me that day?”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8712" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8712"></td>
        <td id="LC8712" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8713" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8713"></td>
        <td id="LC8713" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“As to the great service,” said Carton, “I am bound to avow to you, when</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8714" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8714"></td>
        <td id="LC8714" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">you speak of it in that way, that it was mere professional claptrap, I</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8715" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8715"></td>
        <td id="LC8715" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">don&#39;t know that I cared what became of you, when I rendered it.--Mind! I</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8716" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8716"></td>
        <td id="LC8716" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">say when I rendered it; I am speaking of the past.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8717" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8717"></td>
        <td id="LC8717" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8718" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8718"></td>
        <td id="LC8718" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“You make light of the obligation,” returned Darnay, “but I will not</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8719" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8719"></td>
        <td id="LC8719" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">quarrel with _your_ light answer.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8720" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8720"></td>
        <td id="LC8720" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8721" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8721"></td>
        <td id="LC8721" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Genuine truth, Mr. Darnay, trust me! I have gone aside from my purpose;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8722" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8722"></td>
        <td id="LC8722" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">I was speaking about our being friends. Now, you know me; you know I am</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8723" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8723"></td>
        <td id="LC8723" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">incapable of all the higher and better flights of men. If you doubt it,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8724" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8724"></td>
        <td id="LC8724" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">ask Stryver, and he&#39;ll tell you so.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8725" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8725"></td>
        <td id="LC8725" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8726" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8726"></td>
        <td id="LC8726" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“I prefer to form my own opinion, without the aid of his.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8727" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8727"></td>
        <td id="LC8727" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8728" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8728"></td>
        <td id="LC8728" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Well! At any rate you know me as a dissolute dog, who has never done</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8729" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8729"></td>
        <td id="LC8729" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">any good, and never will.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8730" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8730"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8731" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8731"></td>
        <td id="LC8731" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“I don&#39;t know that you &#39;never will.&#39;”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8732" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8732"></td>
        <td id="LC8732" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8733" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8733"></td>
        <td id="LC8733" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“But I do, and you must take my word for it. Well! If you could endure</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8734" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8734"></td>
        <td id="LC8734" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">to have such a worthless fellow, and a fellow of such indifferent</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8735" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8735"></td>
        <td id="LC8735" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">reputation, coming and going at odd times, I should ask that I might be</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8736" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8736"></td>
        <td id="LC8736" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">permitted to come and go as a privileged person here; that I might</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8737" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8737"></td>
        <td id="LC8737" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">be regarded as an useless (and I would add, if it were not for the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8738" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8738"></td>
        <td id="LC8738" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">resemblance I detected between you and me, an unornamental) piece of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8739" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8739"></td>
        <td id="LC8739" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">furniture, tolerated for its old service, and taken no notice of. I</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8740" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8740"></td>
        <td id="LC8740" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">doubt if I should abuse the permission. It is a hundred to one if I</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8741" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8741"></td>
        <td id="LC8741" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">should avail myself of it four times in a year. It would satisfy me, I</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8742" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8742"></td>
        <td id="LC8742" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">dare say, to know that I had it.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8743" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8743"></td>
        <td id="LC8743" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8744" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8744"></td>
        <td id="LC8744" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Will you try?”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8745" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8745"></td>
        <td id="LC8745" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8746" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8746"></td>
        <td id="LC8746" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“That is another way of saying that I am placed on the footing I have</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8747" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8747"></td>
        <td id="LC8747" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">indicated. I thank you, Darnay. I may use that freedom with your name?”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8748" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8748"></td>
        <td id="LC8748" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8749" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8749"></td>
        <td id="LC8749" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“I think so, Carton, by this time.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8750" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8750"></td>
        <td id="LC8750" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8751" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8751"></td>
        <td id="LC8751" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">They shook hands upon it, and Sydney turned away. Within a minute</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8752" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8752"></td>
        <td id="LC8752" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">afterwards, he was, to all outward appearance, as unsubstantial as ever.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8753" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8753"></td>
        <td id="LC8753" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8754" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8754"></td>
        <td id="LC8754" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">When he was gone, and in the course of an evening passed with Miss</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8755" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8755"></td>
        <td id="LC8755" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Pross, the Doctor, and Mr. Lorry, Charles Darnay made some mention of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8756" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8756"></td>
        <td id="LC8756" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">this conversation in general terms, and spoke of Sydney Carton as a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8757" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8757"></td>
        <td id="LC8757" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">problem of carelessness and recklessness. He spoke of him, in short, not</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8758" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8758"></td>
        <td id="LC8758" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">bitterly or meaning to bear hard upon him, but as anybody might who saw</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8759" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8759"></td>
        <td id="LC8759" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">him as he showed himself.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8760" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8760"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8761" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8761"></td>
        <td id="LC8761" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">He had no idea that this could dwell in the thoughts of his fair young</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8762" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8762"></td>
        <td id="LC8762" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">wife; but, when he afterwards joined her in their own rooms, he found</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8763" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8763"></td>
        <td id="LC8763" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">her waiting for him with the old pretty lifting of the forehead strongly</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8764" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8764"></td>
        <td id="LC8764" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">marked.</td>

        <td id="L8765" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8765"></td>

        <td id="L8766" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8766"></td>
        <td id="LC8766" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“We are thoughtful to-night!” said Darnay, drawing his arm about her.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8767" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8767"></td>
        <td id="LC8767" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L8795" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8795"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8797" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8797"></td>
        <td id="LC8797" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">astounded, “that I should have done him any wrong. I never thought this</td>

      </tr>

      </tr>
      <tr>

      </tr>

        <td id="LC8810" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">we are in our happiness, and how weak he is in his misery!”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8811" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8811"></td>
        <td id="LC8811" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L8812" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8812"></td>
        <td id="LC8812" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">The supplication touched him home. “I will always remember it, dear</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8813" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8813"></td>
        <td id="LC8813" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Heart! I will remember it as long as I live.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8814" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8814"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8815" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8815"></td>
        <td id="LC8815" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">He bent over the golden head, and put the rosy lips to his, and folded</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8816" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8816"></td>
        <td id="LC8816" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">her in his arms. If one forlorn wanderer then pacing the dark streets,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8817" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8817"></td>
        <td id="LC8817" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">could have heard her innocent disclosure, and could have seen the drops</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8818" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8818"></td>

      </tr>

        <td id="L8820" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8820"></td>
        <td id="LC8820" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">have parted from his lips for the first time--</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8821" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8821"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8822" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8822"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8823" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8823"></td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L8825" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8825"></td>
        <td id="LC8825" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8826" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8826"></td>
        <td id="LC8826" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8827" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8827"></td>
        <td id="LC8827" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">XXI. Echoing Footsteps</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8828" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8828"></td>
        <td id="LC8828" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8829" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8829"></td>
        <td id="LC8829" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8830" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8830"></td>
        <td id="LC8830" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">A wonderful corner for echoes, it has been remarked, that corner where</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8831" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8831"></td>
        <td id="LC8831" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the Doctor lived. Ever busily winding the golden thread which bound</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8832" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8832"></td>
        <td id="LC8832" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">her husband, and her father, and herself, and her old directress and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8833" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8833"></td>
        <td id="LC8833" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">companion, in a life of quiet bliss, Lucie sat in the still house in</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8834" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8834"></td>
        <td id="LC8834" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the tranquilly resounding corner, listening to the echoing footsteps of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8835" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8835"></td>
        <td id="LC8835" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">years.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8836" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8836"></td>
        <td id="LC8836" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8837" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8837"></td>
        <td id="LC8837" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">At first, there were times, though she was a perfectly happy young wife,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8838" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8838"></td>
        <td id="LC8838" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">when her work would slowly fall from her hands, and her eyes would be</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8839" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8839"></td>
        <td id="LC8839" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">dimmed. For, there was something coming in the echoes, something light,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8840" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8840"></td>
        <td id="LC8840" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">afar off, and scarcely audible yet, that stirred her heart too much.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8841" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8841"></td>
        <td id="LC8841" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Fluttering hopes and doubts--hopes, of a love as yet unknown to her:</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8842" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8842"></td>
        <td id="LC8842" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">doubts, of her remaining upon earth, to enjoy that new delight--divided</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8843" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8843"></td>
        <td id="LC8843" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">her breast. Among the echoes then, there would arise the sound of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8844" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8844"></td>
        <td id="LC8844" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">footsteps at her own early grave; and thoughts of the husband who would</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="LC9118" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“The Prisoners!”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9119" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9119"></td>
        <td id="LC9119" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9120" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9120"></td>
        <td id="LC9120" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Of all these cries, and ten thousand incoherences, “The Prisoners!” was</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9121" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9121"></td>
        <td id="LC9121" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the cry most taken up by the sea that rushed in, as if there were an</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9122" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9122"></td>
        <td id="LC9122" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">eternity of people, as well as of time and space. When the foremost</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9123" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9123"></td>
        <td id="LC9123" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">billows rolled past, bearing the prison officers with them, and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9124" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9124"></td>
        <td id="LC9124" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">threatening them all with instant death if any secret nook remained</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9125" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9125"></td>
        <td id="LC9125" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">undisclosed, Defarge laid his strong hand on the breast of one of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9126" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9126"></td>
        <td id="LC9126" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">these men--a man with a grey head, who had a lighted torch in his</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9127" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9127"></td>
        <td id="LC9127" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">hand--separated him from the rest, and got him between himself and the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9128" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9128"></td>
        <td id="LC9128" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">wall.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9129" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9129"></td>
        <td id="LC9129" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9130" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9130"></td>
        <td id="LC9130" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Show me the North Tower!” said Defarge. “Quick!”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9131" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9131"></td>
        <td id="LC9131" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9132" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9132"></td>
        <td id="LC9132" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“I will faithfully,” replied the man, “if you will come with me. But</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9133" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9133"></td>
        <td id="LC9133" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">there is no one there.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9134" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9134"></td>
        <td id="LC9134" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9135" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9135"></td>
        <td id="LC9135" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“What is the meaning of One Hundred and Five, North Tower?” asked</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9136" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9136"></td>
        <td id="LC9136" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Defarge. “Quick!”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9137" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9137"></td>
        <td id="LC9137" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9138" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9138"></td>
        <td id="LC9138" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“The meaning, monsieur?”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9139" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9139"></td>
        <td id="LC9139" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9140" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9140"></td>
        <td id="LC9140" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Does it mean a captive, or a place of captivity? Or do you mean that I</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9141" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9141"></td>
        <td id="LC9141" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">shall strike you dead?”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9142" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9142"></td>
        <td id="LC9142" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9143" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9143"></td>
        <td id="LC9143" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Kill him!” croaked Jacques Three, who had come close up.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9144" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9144"></td>
        <td id="LC9144" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9145" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9145"></td>
        <td id="LC9145" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Monsieur, it is a cell.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9146" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9146"></td>
        <td id="LC9146" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9147" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9147"></td>
        <td id="LC9147" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Show it me!”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9148" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9148"></td>
        <td id="LC9148" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9149" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9149"></td>
        <td id="LC9149" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Pass this way, then.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9150" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9150"></td>
        <td id="LC9150" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9151" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9151"></td>
        <td id="LC9151" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Jacques Three, with his usual craving on him, and evidently disappointed</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9152" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9152"></td>
        <td id="LC9152" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">by the dialogue taking a turn that did not seem to promise bloodshed,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9153" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9153"></td>
        <td id="LC9153" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">held by Defarge&#39;s arm as he held by the turnkey&#39;s. Their three heads had</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9154" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9154"></td>
        <td id="LC9154" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">been close together during this brief discourse, and it had been as much</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9155" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9155"></td>
        <td id="LC9155" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">as they could do to hear one another, even then: so tremendous was the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9156" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9156"></td>
        <td id="LC9156" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">noise of the living ocean, in its irruption into the Fortress, and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9157" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9157"></td>
        <td id="LC9157" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">its inundation of the courts and passages and staircases. All around</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9158" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9158"></td>
        <td id="LC9158" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">outside, too, it beat the walls with a deep, hoarse roar, from which,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9159" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9159"></td>
        <td id="LC9159" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">occasionally, some partial shouts of tumult broke and leaped into the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9160" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9160"></td>
        <td id="LC9160" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">air like spray.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9161" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9161"></td>
        <td id="LC9161" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9162" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9162"></td>
        <td id="LC9162" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Through gloomy vaults where the light of day had never shone, past</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9163" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9163"></td>
        <td id="LC9163" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">hideous doors of dark dens and cages, down cavernous flights of steps,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9164" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9164"></td>
        <td id="LC9164" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and again up steep rugged ascents of stone and brick, more like dry</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9165" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9165"></td>
        <td id="LC9165" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">waterfalls than staircases, Defarge, the turnkey, and Jacques Three,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9166" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9166"></td>
        <td id="LC9166" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">linked hand and arm, went with all the speed they could make. Here and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9167" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9167"></td>
        <td id="LC9167" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">there, especially at first, the inundation started on them and swept by;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9168" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9168"></td>
        <td id="LC9168" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">but when they had done descending, and were winding and climbing up a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9169" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9169"></td>
        <td id="LC9169" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">tower, they were alone. Hemmed in here by the massive thickness of walls</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9170" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9170"></td>
        <td id="LC9170" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and arches, the storm within the fortress and without was only audible</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9171" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9171"></td>
        <td id="LC9171" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">to them in a dull, subdued way, as if the noise out of which they had</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9172" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9172"></td>
        <td id="LC9172" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">come had almost destroyed their sense of hearing.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9173" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9173"></td>
        <td id="LC9173" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9174" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9174"></td>
        <td id="LC9174" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">The turnkey stopped at a low door, put a key in a clashing lock, swung</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9175" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9175"></td>
        <td id="LC9175" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the door slowly open, and said, as they all bent their heads and passed</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9176" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9176"></td>
        <td id="LC9176" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">in:</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9177" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9177"></td>
        <td id="LC9177" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9178" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9178"></td>
        <td id="LC9178" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“One hundred and five, North Tower!”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9179" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9179"></td>
        <td id="LC9179" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9180" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9180"></td>
        <td id="LC9180" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">There was a small, heavily-grated, unglazed window high in the wall,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9181" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9181"></td>
        <td id="LC9181" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">with a stone screen before it, so that the sky could be only seen by</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9182" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9182"></td>
        <td id="LC9182" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">stooping low and looking up. There was a small chimney, heavily barred</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9183" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9183"></td>
        <td id="LC9183" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">across, a few feet within. There was a heap of old feathery wood-ashes</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9184" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9184"></td>
        <td id="LC9184" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">on the hearth. There was a stool, and table, and a straw bed. There were</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9185" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9185"></td>
        <td id="LC9185" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the four blackened walls, and a rusted iron ring in one of them.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9186" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9186"></td>
        <td id="LC9186" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9187" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9187"></td>
        <td id="LC9187" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Pass that torch slowly along these walls, that I may see them,” said</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9188" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9188"></td>
        <td id="LC9188" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Defarge to the turnkey.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9189" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9189"></td>
        <td id="LC9189" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9190" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9190"></td>
        <td id="LC9190" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">The man obeyed, and Defarge followed the light closely with his eyes.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9191" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9191"></td>
        <td id="LC9191" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9192" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9192"></td>
        <td id="LC9192" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Stop!--Look here, Jacques!”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9193" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9193"></td>
        <td id="LC9193" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9194" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9194"></td>
        <td id="LC9194" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“A. M.!” croaked Jacques Three, as he read greedily.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9195" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9195"></td>
        <td id="LC9195" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9196" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9196"></td>
        <td id="LC9196" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Alexandre Manette,” said Defarge in his ear, following the letters</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9197" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9197"></td>
        <td id="LC9197" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">with his swart forefinger, deeply engrained with gunpowder. “And here he</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9198" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9198"></td>
        <td id="LC9198" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">wrote &#39;a poor physician.&#39; And it was he, without doubt, who scratched</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9199" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9199"></td>
        <td id="LC9199" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">a calendar on this stone. What is that in your hand? A crowbar? Give it</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9200" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9200"></td>
        <td id="LC9200" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">me!”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9201" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9201"></td>
        <td id="LC9201" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9202" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9202"></td>
        <td id="LC9202" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">He had still the linstock of his gun in his own hand. He made a sudden</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9203" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9203"></td>
        <td id="LC9203" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">exchange of the two instruments, and turning on the worm-eaten stool and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9204" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9204"></td>
        <td id="LC9204" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">table, beat them to pieces in a few blows.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9205" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9205"></td>
        <td id="LC9205" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9206" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9206"></td>
        <td id="LC9206" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Hold the light higher!” he said, wrathfully, to the turnkey. “Look</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9207" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9207"></td>
        <td id="LC9207" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">among those fragments with care, Jacques. And see! Here is my knife,”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9208" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9208"></td>
        <td id="LC9208" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"> throwing it to him; “rip open that bed, and search the straw. Hold the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9209" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9209"></td>
        <td id="LC9209" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">light higher, you!”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9210" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9210"></td>
        <td id="LC9210" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9211" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9211"></td>
        <td id="LC9211" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">With a menacing look at the turnkey he crawled upon the hearth, and,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9212" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9212"></td>

        <td id="L9300" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9300"></td>

        <td id="L9303" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9303"></td>
        <td id="LC9303" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Defarge sat at her counter, as usual, presiding over the customers.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9304" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9304"></td>
        <td id="LC9304" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Madame Defarge wore no rose in her head, for the great brotherhood of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9305" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9305"></td>
        <td id="LC9305" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Spies had become, even in one short week, extremely chary of trusting</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9306" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9306"></td>
        <td id="LC9306" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">themselves to the saint&#39;s mercies. The lamps across his streets had a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9307" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9307"></td>
        <td id="LC9307" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">portentously elastic swing with them.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9308" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9308"></td>
        <td id="LC9308" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9309" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9309"></td>
        <td id="LC9309" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Madame Defarge, with her arms folded, sat in the morning light and heat,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9310" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9310"></td>
        <td id="LC9310" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">contemplating the wine-shop and the street. In both, there were several</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9311" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9311"></td>
        <td id="LC9311" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">knots of loungers, squalid and miserable, but now with a manifest sense</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9312" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9312"></td>
        <td id="LC9312" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">of power enthroned on their distress. The raggedest nightcap, awry on</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9313" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9313"></td>
        <td id="LC9313" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the wretchedest head, had this crooked significance in it: “I know how</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9314" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9314"></td>
        <td id="LC9314" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">hard it has grown for me, the wearer of this, to support life in myself;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9315" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9315"></td>
        <td id="LC9315" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">but do you know how easy it has grown for me, the wearer of this, to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9316" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9316"></td>
        <td id="LC9316" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">destroy life in you?” Every lean bare arm, that had been without work</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9317" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9317"></td>
        <td id="LC9317" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">before, had this work always ready for it now, that it could strike.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9318" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9318"></td>
        <td id="LC9318" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">The fingers of the knitting women were vicious, with the experience that</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9319" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9319"></td>
        <td id="LC9319" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">they could tear. There was a change in the appearance of Saint Antoine;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9320" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9320"></td>
        <td id="LC9320" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the image had been hammering into this for hundreds of years, and the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9321" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9321"></td>
        <td id="LC9321" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">last finishing blows had told mightily on the expression.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9322" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9322"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9323" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9323"></td>
        <td id="LC9323" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Madame Defarge sat observing it, with such suppressed approval as was</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L9324" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9324"></td>
        <td id="LC9324" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">to be desired in the leader of the Saint Antoine women. One of her</td>

        <td id="L9325" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9325"></td>

        <td id="LC9326" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">grocer, and the mother of two children withal, this lieutenant had</td>

        <td id="L9327" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9327"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9330" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9330"></td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L9331" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9331"></td>
        <td id="LC9331" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">As if a train of powder laid from the outermost bound of Saint Antoine</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9332" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9332"></td>
        <td id="LC9332" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Quarter to the wine-shop door, had been suddenly fired, a fast-spreading</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L9334" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9334"></td>

        <td id="L9335" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9335"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9336" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9336"></td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L9337" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9337"></td>
        <td id="LC9337" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Defarge came in breathless, pulled off a red cap he wore, and looked</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9338" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9338"></td>
        <td id="LC9338" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">around him! “Listen, everywhere!” said madame again. “Listen to him!”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9339" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9339"></td>
        <td id="LC9339" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"> Defarge stood, panting, against a background of eager eyes and open</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9340" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9340"></td>
        <td id="LC9340" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">mouths, formed outside the door; all those within the wine-shop had</td>

        <td id="L9343" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9343"></td>

      </tr>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9348" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9348"></td>

        <td id="L9349" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9349"></td>

        <td id="L9352" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9352"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9357" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9357"></td>
        <td id="LC9357" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L9358" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9358"></td>
        <td id="LC9358" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Not dead! He feared us so much--and with reason--that he caused himself</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9359" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9359"></td>
        <td id="LC9359" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">to be represented as dead, and had a grand mock-funeral. But they have</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9360" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9360"></td>
        <td id="LC9360" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">found him alive, hiding in the country, and have brought him in. I have</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9361" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9361"></td>
        <td id="LC9361" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">seen him but now, on his way to the Hotel de Ville, a prisoner. I have</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9362" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9362"></td>
        <td id="LC9362" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">said that he had reason to fear us. Say all! _Had_ he reason?”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9363" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9363"></td>
        <td id="LC9363" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9364" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9364"></td>
        <td id="LC9364" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Wretched old sinner of more than threescore years and ten, if he had</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9365" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9365"></td>
        <td id="LC9365" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">never known it yet, he would have known it in his heart of hearts if he</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9366" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9366"></td>
        <td id="LC9366" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">could have heard the answering cry.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9367" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9367"></td>
