      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9368" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9368"></td>
        <td id="LC9368" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">A moment of profound silence followed. Defarge and his wife looked</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9369" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9369"></td>
        <td id="LC9369" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">steadfastly at one another. The Vengeance stooped, and the jar of a drum</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9370" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9370"></td>
        <td id="LC9370" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">was heard as she moved it at her feet behind the counter.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9371" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9371"></td>
        <td id="LC9371" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9372" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9372"></td>
        <td id="LC9372" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Patriots!” said Defarge, in a determined voice, “are we ready?”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9373" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9373"></td>
        <td id="LC9373" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9374" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9374"></td>
        <td id="LC9374" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Instantly Madame Defarge&#39;s knife was in her girdle; the drum was beating</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9375" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9375"></td>
        <td id="LC9375" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">in the streets, as if it and a drummer had flown together by magic; and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9376" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9376"></td>
        <td id="LC9376" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">The Vengeance, uttering terrific shrieks, and flinging her arms about</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9377" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9377"></td>
        <td id="LC9377" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">her head like all the forty Furies at once, was tearing from house to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9378" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9378"></td>
        <td id="LC9378" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">house, rousing the women.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9379" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9379"></td>
        <td id="LC9379" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9380" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9380"></td>
        <td id="LC9380" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">The men were terrible, in the bloody-minded anger with which they looked</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9381" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9381"></td>
        <td id="LC9381" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">from windows, caught up what arms they had, and came pouring down into</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9382" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9382"></td>
        <td id="LC9382" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the streets; but, the women were a sight to chill the boldest. From</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9383" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9383"></td>
        <td id="LC9383" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">such household occupations as their bare poverty yielded, from their</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9384" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9384"></td>
        <td id="LC9384" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">children, from their aged and their sick crouching on the bare ground</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9385" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9385"></td>
        <td id="LC9385" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">famished and naked, they ran out with streaming hair, urging one</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9386" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9386"></td>
        <td id="LC9386" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">another, and themselves, to madness with the wildest cries and actions.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9387" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9387"></td>
        <td id="LC9387" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Villain Foulon taken, my sister! Old Foulon taken, my mother! Miscreant</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9388" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9388"></td>
        <td id="LC9388" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Foulon taken, my daughter! Then, a score of others ran into the midst of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9389" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9389"></td>
        <td id="LC9389" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">these, beating their breasts, tearing their hair, and screaming, Foulon</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9390" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9390"></td>
        <td id="LC9390" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">alive! Foulon who told the starving people they might eat grass! Foulon</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9391" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9391"></td>
        <td id="LC9391" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">who told my old father that he might eat grass, when I had no bread</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9392" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9392"></td>
        <td id="LC9392" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">to give him! Foulon who told my baby it might suck grass, when these</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9393" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9393"></td>
        <td id="LC9393" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">breasts were dry with want! O mother of God, this Foulon! O Heaven our</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9394" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9394"></td>
        <td id="LC9394" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">suffering! Hear me, my dead baby and my withered father: I swear on my</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9395" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9395"></td>
        <td id="LC9395" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">knees, on these stones, to avenge you on Foulon! Husbands, and brothers,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9396" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9396"></td>

        <td id="L9397" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9397"></td>

        <td id="L9399" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9399"></td>
        <td id="LC9399" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">him! With these cries, numbers of the women, lashed into blind frenzy,</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L9486" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9486"></td>
        <td id="LC9486" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L9487" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9487"></td>
        <td id="LC9487" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Scanty and insufficient suppers those, and innocent of meat, as of</td>

        <td id="L9488" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9488"></td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L9495" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9495"></td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L9502" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9502"></td>

        <td id="L9503" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9503"></td>
        <td id="LC9503" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Saint Antoine slept, the Defarges slept: even The Vengeance slept with</td>

        <td id="L9517" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9517"></td>

        <td id="L9521" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9521"></td>
        <td id="LC9521" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">crag was not so dominant as of yore; there were soldiers to guard it,</td>

        <td id="L9526" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9526"></td>
        <td id="LC9526" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Far and wide lay a ruined country, yielding nothing but desolation.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9527" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9527"></td>
        <td id="LC9527" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Every green leaf, every blade of grass and blade of grain, was as</td>

        <td id="L9528" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9528"></td>

        <td id="LC9531" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">out.</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L9533" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9533"></td>
        <td id="LC9533" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Monseigneur (often a most worthy individual gentleman) was a national</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9534" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9534"></td>

        <td id="L9535" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9535"></td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L9537" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9537"></td>

      </tr>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9540" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9540"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9541" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9541"></td>
        <td id="LC9541" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">flints, and the last screw of the rack having been turned so often that</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9542" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9542"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9546" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9546"></td>
        <td id="LC9546" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">But, this was not the change on the village, and on many a village like</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9547" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9547"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9548" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9548"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>

        <td id="LC9549" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">of the chase--now, found in hunting the people; now, found in hunting</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9550" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9550"></td>
        <td id="LC9550" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the beasts, for whose preservation Monseigneur made edifying spaces</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L9551" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9551"></td>
        <td id="LC9551" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">of barbarous and barren wilderness. No. The change consisted in</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9552" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9552"></td>
        <td id="LC9552" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the appearance of strange faces of low caste, rather than in the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9553" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9553"></td>

      </tr>

        <td id="L9554" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9554"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9555" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9555"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9556" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9556"></td>
        <td id="LC9556" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">For, in these times, as the mender of roads worked, solitary, in the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9557" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9557"></td>
        <td id="LC9557" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">dust, not often troubling himself to reflect that dust he was and</td>
      </tr>

      </tr>

        <td id="L9559" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9559"></td>

      </tr>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9561" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9561"></td>
        <td id="LC9561" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and viewed the prospect, he would see some rough figure approaching on</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9562" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9562"></td>
        <td id="LC9562" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">foot, the like of which was once a rarity in those parts, but was now</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9563" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9563"></td>
        <td id="LC9563" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">a frequent presence. As it advanced, the mender of roads would discern</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9564" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9564"></td>

      </tr>

        <td id="L9565" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9565"></td>
        <td id="LC9565" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">aspect, tall, in wooden shoes that were clumsy even to the eyes of a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9566" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9566"></td>
        <td id="LC9566" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">mender of roads, grim, rough, swart, steeped in the mud and dust of many</td>
      </tr>

      </tr>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9569" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9569"></td>
        <td id="LC9569" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9570" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9570"></td>
        <td id="LC9570" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Such a man came upon him, like a ghost, at noon in the July weather,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9571" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9571"></td>
        <td id="LC9571" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">as he sat on his heap of stones under a bank, taking such shelter as he</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9572" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9572"></td>
        <td id="LC9572" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">could get from a shower of hail.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9573" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9573"></td>
        <td id="LC9573" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9574" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9574"></td>
        <td id="LC9574" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">The man looked at him, looked at the village in the hollow, at the mill,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9575" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9575"></td>
        <td id="LC9575" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and at the prison on the crag. When he had identified these objects</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9576" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9576"></td>
        <td id="LC9576" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">in what benighted mind he had, he said, in a dialect that was just</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9577" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9577"></td>
        <td id="LC9577" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">intelligible:</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9578" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9578"></td>
        <td id="LC9578" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9579" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9579"></td>
        <td id="LC9579" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“How goes it, Jacques?”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9580" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9580"></td>
        <td id="LC9580" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9581" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9581"></td>
        <td id="LC9581" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“All well, Jacques.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9582" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9582"></td>
        <td id="LC9582" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9583" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9583"></td>
        <td id="LC9583" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Touch then!”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9584" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9584"></td>
        <td id="LC9584" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9585" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9585"></td>
        <td id="LC9585" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">They joined hands, and the man sat down on the heap of stones.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9586" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9586"></td>
        <td id="LC9586" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9587" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9587"></td>
        <td id="LC9587" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“No dinner?”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9588" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9588"></td>
        <td id="LC9588" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9589" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9589"></td>
        <td id="LC9589" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Nothing but supper now,” said the mender of roads, with a hungry face.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9590" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9590"></td>
        <td id="LC9590" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9591" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9591"></td>
        <td id="LC9591" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“It is the fashion,” growled the man. “I meet no dinner anywhere.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9592" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9592"></td>
        <td id="LC9592" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9593" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9593"></td>
        <td id="LC9593" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">He took out a blackened pipe, filled it, lighted it with flint and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9594" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9594"></td>
        <td id="LC9594" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">steel, pulled at it until it was in a bright glow: then, suddenly held</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9595" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9595"></td>
        <td id="LC9595" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">it from him and dropped something into it from between his finger and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9596" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9596"></td>
        <td id="LC9596" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">thumb, that blazed and went out in a puff of smoke.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9597" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9597"></td>
        <td id="LC9597" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9598" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9598"></td>
        <td id="LC9598" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Touch then.” It was the turn of the mender of roads to say it this</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9599" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9599"></td>
        <td id="LC9599" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">time, after observing these operations. They again joined hands.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9600" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9600"></td>
        <td id="LC9600" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9601" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9601"></td>
        <td id="LC9601" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“To-night?” said the mender of roads.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9602" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9602"></td>
        <td id="LC9602" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9603" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9603"></td>
        <td id="LC9603" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“To-night,” said the man, putting the pipe in his mouth.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9604" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9604"></td>
        <td id="LC9604" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9605" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9605"></td>
        <td id="LC9605" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Where?”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9606" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9606"></td>
        <td id="LC9606" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9608" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9608"></td>
        <td id="LC9608" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9609" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9609"></td>
        <td id="LC9609" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">He and the mender of roads sat on the heap of stones looking silently at</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9610" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9610"></td>
        <td id="LC9610" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">one another, with the hail driving in between them like a pigmy charge</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9611" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9611"></td>
        <td id="LC9611" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">of bayonets, until the sky began to clear over the village.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9612" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9612"></td>
        <td id="LC9612" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9613" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9613"></td>
        <td id="LC9613" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Show me!” said the traveller then, moving to the brow of the hill.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9614" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9614"></td>
        <td id="LC9614" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9615" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9615"></td>
        <td id="LC9615" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“See!” returned the mender of roads, with extended finger. “You go down</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9616" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9616"></td>
        <td id="LC9616" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">here, and straight through the street, and past the fountain--”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9617" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9617"></td>
        <td id="LC9617" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9618" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9618"></td>
        <td id="LC9618" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“To the Devil with all that!” interrupted the other, rolling his eye</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9619" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9619"></td>
        <td id="LC9619" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">over the landscape. “_I_ go through no streets and past no fountains.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9620" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9620"></td>
        <td id="LC9620" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Well?”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9621" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9621"></td>
        <td id="LC9621" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9622" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9622"></td>
        <td id="LC9622" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Well! About two leagues beyond the summit of that hill above the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9623" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9623"></td>
        <td id="LC9623" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">village.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9624" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9624"></td>
        <td id="LC9624" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9625" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9625"></td>
        <td id="LC9625" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Good. When do you cease to work?”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9626" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9626"></td>
        <td id="LC9626" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9627" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9627"></td>
        <td id="LC9627" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“At sunset.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9628" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9628"></td>
        <td id="LC9628" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9629" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9629"></td>
        <td id="LC9629" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Will you wake me, before departing? I have walked two nights without</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9630" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9630"></td>
        <td id="LC9630" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">resting. Let me finish my pipe, and I shall sleep like a child. Will you</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9631" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9631"></td>
        <td id="LC9631" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">wake me?”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9632" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9632"></td>
        <td id="LC9632" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9633" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9633"></td>
        <td id="LC9633" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Surely.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9634" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9634"></td>
        <td id="LC9634" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9635" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9635"></td>
        <td id="LC9635" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">The wayfarer smoked his pipe out, put it in his breast, slipped off his</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9636" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9636"></td>
        <td id="LC9636" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">great wooden shoes, and lay down on his back on the heap of stones. He</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9637" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9637"></td>
        <td id="LC9637" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">was fast asleep directly.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9638" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9638"></td>
        <td id="LC9638" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9639" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9639"></td>
        <td id="LC9639" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">As the road-mender plied his dusty labour, and the hail-clouds, rolling</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9640" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9640"></td>
        <td id="LC9640" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">away, revealed bright bars and streaks of sky which were responded to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9641" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9641"></td>
        <td id="LC9641" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">by silver gleams upon the landscape, the little man (who wore a red cap</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9642" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9642"></td>
        <td id="LC9642" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">now, in place of his blue one) seemed fascinated by the figure on the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9643" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9643"></td>
        <td id="LC9643" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">heap of stones. His eyes were so often turned towards it, that he used</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9644" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9644"></td>
        <td id="LC9644" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">his tools mechanically, and, one would have said, to very poor account.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9645" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9645"></td>
        <td id="LC9645" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">The bronze face, the shaggy black hair and beard, the coarse woollen</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9646" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9646"></td>
        <td id="LC9646" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">red cap, the rough medley dress of home-spun stuff and hairy skins of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9647" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9647"></td>
        <td id="LC9647" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">beasts, the powerful frame attenuated by spare living, and the sullen</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9648" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9648"></td>
        <td id="LC9648" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and desperate compression of the lips in sleep, inspired the mender</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9649" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9649"></td>
        <td id="LC9649" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">of roads with awe. The traveller had travelled far, and his feet were</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9650" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9650"></td>
        <td id="LC9650" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">footsore, and his ankles chafed and bleeding; his great shoes, stuffed</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9651" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9651"></td>
        <td id="LC9651" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">with leaves and grass, had been heavy to drag over the many long</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9652" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9652"></td>
        <td id="LC9652" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">leagues, and his clothes were chafed into holes, as he himself was into</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9653" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9653"></td>
        <td id="LC9653" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">sores. Stooping down beside him, the road-mender tried to get a peep at</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9654" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9654"></td>
        <td id="LC9654" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">secret weapons in his breast or where not; but, in vain, for he slept</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9655" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9655"></td>
        <td id="LC9655" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">with his arms crossed upon him, and set as resolutely as his lips.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9656" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9656"></td>
        <td id="LC9656" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Fortified towns with their stockades, guard-houses, gates, trenches, and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9657" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9657"></td>
        <td id="LC9657" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">drawbridges, seemed to the mender of roads, to be so much air as against</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9658" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9658"></td>
        <td id="LC9658" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">this figure. And when he lifted his eyes from it to the horizon and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9659" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9659"></td>
        <td id="LC9659" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">looked around, he saw in his small fancy similar figures, stopped by no</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9660" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9660"></td>
        <td id="LC9660" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">obstacle, tending to centres all over France.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9661" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9661"></td>
        <td id="LC9661" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9662" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9662"></td>
        <td id="LC9662" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">The man slept on, indifferent to showers of hail and intervals of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9663" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9663"></td>
        <td id="LC9663" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">brightness, to sunshine on his face and shadow, to the paltering lumps</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9664" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9664"></td>
        <td id="LC9664" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">of dull ice on his body and the diamonds into which the sun changed</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9665" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9665"></td>
        <td id="LC9665" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">them, until the sun was low in the west, and the sky was glowing. Then,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9666" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9666"></td>
        <td id="LC9666" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the mender of roads having got his tools together and all things ready</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9667" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9667"></td>
        <td id="LC9667" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">to go down into the village, roused him.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9668" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9668"></td>
        <td id="LC9668" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9669" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9669"></td>
        <td id="LC9669" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Good!” said the sleeper, rising on his elbow. “Two leagues beyond the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9670" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9670"></td>
        <td id="LC9670" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">summit of the hill?”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9671" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9671"></td>
        <td id="LC9671" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9672" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9672"></td>
        <td id="LC9672" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“About.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9673" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9673"></td>
        <td id="LC9673" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9674" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9674"></td>

        <td id="L9676" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9676"></td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L9763" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9763"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9764" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9764"></td>
        <td id="LC9764" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Not only that; but the village, light-headed with famine, fire, and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9765" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9765"></td>
        <td id="LC9765" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">bell-ringing, and bethinking itself that Monsieur Gabelle had to do with</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9766" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9766"></td>
        <td id="LC9766" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the collection of rent and taxes--though it was but a small instalment</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9767" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9767"></td>
        <td id="LC9767" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">of taxes, and no rent at all, that Gabelle had got in those latter</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9768" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9768"></td>
        <td id="LC9768" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">days--became impatient for an interview with him, and, surrounding his</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9769" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9769"></td>
        <td id="LC9769" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">house, summoned him to come forth for personal conference. Whereupon,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9770" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9770"></td>
        <td id="LC9770" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Monsieur Gabelle did heavily bar his door, and retire to hold counsel</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9771" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9771"></td>
        <td id="LC9771" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">with himself. The result of that conference was, that Gabelle again</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9772" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9772"></td>
        <td id="LC9772" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">withdrew himself to his housetop behind his stack of chimneys; this time</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9773" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9773"></td>
        <td id="LC9773" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">resolved, if his door were broken in (he was a small Southern man</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9774" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9774"></td>
        <td id="LC9774" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">of retaliative temperament), to pitch himself head foremost over the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9775" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9775"></td>
        <td id="LC9775" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">parapet, and crush a man or two below.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9776" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9776"></td>
        <td id="LC9776" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9777" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9777"></td>
        <td id="LC9777" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Probably, Monsieur Gabelle passed a long night up there, with the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9778" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9778"></td>
        <td id="LC9778" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">distant chateau for fire and candle, and the beating at his door,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9779" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9779"></td>
        <td id="LC9779" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">combined with the joy-ringing, for music; not to mention his having an</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L9780" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9780"></td>
        <td id="LC9780" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">ill-omened lamp slung across the road before his posting-house gate,</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L9781" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9781"></td>
        <td id="LC9781" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">which the village showed a lively inclination to displace in his favour.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9782" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9782"></td>
        <td id="LC9782" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">A trying suspense, to be passing a whole summer night on the brink of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9783" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9783"></td>
        <td id="LC9783" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the black ocean, ready to take that plunge into it upon which Monsieur</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9784" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9784"></td>
        <td id="LC9784" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Gabelle had resolved! But, the friendly dawn appearing at last, and the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9785" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9785"></td>
        <td id="LC9785" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">rush-candles of the village guttering out, the people happily dispersed,</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L9786" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9786"></td>
        <td id="LC9786" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and Monsieur Gabelle came down bringing his life with him for that</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L9789" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9789"></td>
        <td id="LC9789" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Within a hundred miles, and in the light of other fires, there were</td>

        <td id="L9792" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9792"></td>

        <td id="L9796" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9796"></td>
        <td id="LC9796" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">North, and South, be that as it would; and whosoever hung, fire burned.</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L9797" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9797"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9798" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9798"></td>

        <td id="L9799" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9799"></td>

        <td id="L9804" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9804"></td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L9805" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9805"></td>

        <td id="L9806" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9806"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9807" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9807"></td>
        <td id="LC9807" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">In such risings of fire and risings of sea--the firm earth shaken by</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9808" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9808"></td>
        <td id="LC9808" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the rushes of an angry ocean which had now no ebb, but was always on the</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L9809" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9809"></td>
        <td id="LC9809" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">flow, higher and higher, to the terror and wonder of the beholders on</td>

        <td id="L9810" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9810"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9811" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9811"></td>
        <td id="LC9811" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">of little Lucie had been woven by the golden thread into the peaceful</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9812" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9812"></td>
        <td id="LC9812" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">tissue of the life of her home.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9813" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9813"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9814" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9814"></td>
        <td id="LC9814" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Many a night and many a day had its inmates listened to the echoes in</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9815" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9815"></td>
        <td id="LC9815" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the corner, with hearts that failed them when they heard the thronging</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9816" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9816"></td>
        <td id="LC9816" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">feet. For, the footsteps had become to their minds as the footsteps of</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="LC9817" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">a people, tumultuous under a red flag and with their country declared in</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L9818" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9818"></td>
        <td id="LC9818" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">danger, changed into wild beasts, by terrible enchantment long persisted</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>

        <td id="LC9819" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">in.</td>

        <td id="L9820" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9820"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9821" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9821"></td>
        <td id="LC9821" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Monseigneur, as a class, had dissociated himself from the phenomenon of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9822" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9822"></td>
        <td id="LC9822" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">his not being appreciated: of his being so little wanted in France, as</td>

        <td id="L9823" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9823"></td>

        <td id="L9824" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9824"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9825" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9825"></td>
        <td id="LC9825" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">infinite pains, and was so terrified at the sight of him that he could</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L9826" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9826"></td>
        <td id="LC9826" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">ask the Enemy no question, but immediately fled; so, Monseigneur, after</td>

        <td id="L9827" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9827"></td>
        <td id="LC9827" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">boldly reading the Lord&#39;s Prayer backwards for a great number of years,</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L9828" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9828"></td>
        <td id="LC9828" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and performing many other potent spells for compelling the Evil One, no</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L9830" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9830"></td>
        <td id="LC9830" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9831" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9831"></td>
        <td id="LC9831" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">The shining Bull&#39;s Eye of the Court was gone, or it would have been the</td>
      </tr>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9834" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9834"></td>

        <td id="L9835" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9835"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9836" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9836"></td>
        <td id="LC9836" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">outermost rotten ring of intrigue, corruption, and dissimulation, was</td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9838" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9838"></td>
        <td id="LC9838" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“suspended,” when the last tidings came over.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9839" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9839"></td>
        <td id="LC9839" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9840" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9840"></td>
        <td id="LC9840" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">The August of the year one thousand seven hundred and ninety-two was</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9841" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9841"></td>
        <td id="LC9841" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">come, and Monseigneur was by this time scattered far and wide.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9842" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9842"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9843" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9843"></td>
        <td id="LC9843" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">As was natural, the head-quarters and great gathering-place of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9844" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9844"></td>
        <td id="LC9844" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Monseigneur, in London, was Tellson&#39;s Bank. Spirits are supposed to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9845" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9845"></td>
        <td id="LC9845" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">haunt the places where their bodies most resorted, and Monseigneur</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9846" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9846"></td>
        <td id="LC9846" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">without a guinea haunted the spot where his guineas used to be.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9847" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9847"></td>
        <td id="LC9847" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Moreover, it was the spot to which such French intelligence as was most</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9848" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9848"></td>
        <td id="LC9848" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">to be relied upon, came quickest. Again: Tellson&#39;s was a munificent</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9849" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9849"></td>
        <td id="LC9849" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">house, and extended great liberality to old customers who had fallen</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9850" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9850"></td>
        <td id="LC9850" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">from their high estate. Again: those nobles who had seen the coming</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9851" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9851"></td>
        <td id="LC9851" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">storm in time, and anticipating plunder or confiscation, had made</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9852" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9852"></td>
        <td id="LC9852" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">provident remittances to Tellson&#39;s, were always to be heard of there</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9853" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9853"></td>
        <td id="LC9853" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">by their needy brethren. To which it must be added that every new-comer</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9854" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9854"></td>
        <td id="LC9854" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">from France reported himself and his tidings at Tellson&#39;s, almost as</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9855" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9855"></td>
        <td id="LC9855" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">a matter of course. For such variety of reasons, Tellson&#39;s was at that</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9856" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9856"></td>
        <td id="LC9856" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">time, as to French intelligence, a kind of High Exchange; and this</td>

        <td id="L9857" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9857"></td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L9946" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9946"></td>
        <td id="LC9946" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">bodyguard on Sunday nights for a long time past and I am used to him.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9947" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9947"></td>
        <td id="LC9947" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Nobody will suspect Jerry of being anything but an English bull-dog, or</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L9948" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="9948"></td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L10040" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10040"></td>
        <td id="LC10040" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Why, Mr. Darnay? D&#39;ye hear what he did? Don&#39;t ask, why, in these</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10041" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10041"></td>
        <td id="LC10041" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">times.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10042" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10042"></td>
        <td id="LC10042" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10043" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10043"></td>
        <td id="LC10043" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“But I do ask why?”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10044" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10044"></td>
        <td id="LC10044" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10045" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10045"></td>
        <td id="LC10045" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Then I tell you again, Mr. Darnay, I am sorry for it. I am sorry to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10046" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10046"></td>
        <td id="LC10046" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">hear you putting any such extraordinary questions. Here is a fellow,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10047" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10047"></td>
        <td id="LC10047" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">who, infected by the most pestilent and blasphemous code of devilry that</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10048" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10048"></td>
        <td id="LC10048" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">ever was known, abandoned his property to the vilest scum of the earth</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10049" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10049"></td>
        <td id="LC10049" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">that ever did murder by wholesale, and you ask me why I am sorry that a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10050" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10050"></td>
        <td id="LC10050" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">man who instructs youth knows him? Well, but I&#39;ll answer you. I am sorry</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10051" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10051"></td>
        <td id="LC10051" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">because I believe there is contamination in such a scoundrel. That&#39;s</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10052" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10052"></td>
        <td id="LC10052" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">why.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10053" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10053"></td>
        <td id="LC10053" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10054" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10054"></td>
        <td id="LC10054" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Mindful of the secret, Darnay with great difficulty checked himself, and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10055" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10055"></td>
        <td id="LC10055" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">said: “You may not understand the gentleman.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10056" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10056"></td>
        <td id="LC10056" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10057" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10057"></td>
        <td id="LC10057" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“I understand how to put _you_ in a corner, Mr. Darnay,” said Bully</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10058" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10058"></td>
        <td id="LC10058" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Stryver, “and I&#39;ll do it. If this fellow is a gentleman, I _don&#39;t_</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10059" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10059"></td>
        <td id="LC10059" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">understand him. You may tell him so, with my compliments. You may also</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10060" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10060"></td>
        <td id="LC10060" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">tell him, from me, that after abandoning his worldly goods and position</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10061" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10061"></td>
        <td id="LC10061" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">to this butcherly mob, I wonder he is not at the head of them. But, no,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10062" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10062"></td>
        <td id="LC10062" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">gentlemen,” said Stryver, looking all round, and snapping his fingers,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10063" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10063"></td>
        <td id="LC10063" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“I know something of human nature, and I tell you that you&#39;ll never</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10064" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10064"></td>
        <td id="LC10064" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">find a fellow like this fellow, trusting himself to the mercies of such</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10065" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10065"></td>
        <td id="LC10065" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">precious _protégés_. No, gentlemen; he&#39;ll always show &#39;em a clean pair</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10066" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10066"></td>
        <td id="LC10066" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">of heels very early in the scuffle, and sneak away.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10067" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10067"></td>
        <td id="LC10067" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10068" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10068"></td>
        <td id="LC10068" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">With those words, and a final snap of his fingers, Mr. Stryver</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10069" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10069"></td>
        <td id="LC10069" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">shouldered himself into Fleet-street, amidst the general approbation of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10070" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10070"></td>
        <td id="LC10070" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">his hearers. Mr. Lorry and Charles Darnay were left alone at the desk,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10071" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10071"></td>
        <td id="LC10071" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">in the general departure from the Bank.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10072" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10072"></td>
        <td id="LC10072" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10073" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10073"></td>
        <td id="LC10073" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Will you take charge of the letter?” said Mr. Lorry. “You know where to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10074" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10074"></td>
        <td id="LC10074" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">deliver it?”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10075" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10075"></td>
        <td id="LC10075" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10076" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10076"></td>
        <td id="LC10076" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“I do.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10077" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10077"></td>
        <td id="LC10077" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10078" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10078"></td>
        <td id="LC10078" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Will you undertake to explain, that we suppose it to have been</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10079" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10079"></td>
        <td id="LC10079" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">addressed here, on the chance of our knowing where to forward it, and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10080" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10080"></td>
        <td id="LC10080" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">that it has been here some time?”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10081" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10081"></td>
        <td id="LC10081" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10082" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10082"></td>
        <td id="LC10082" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“I will do so. Do you start for Paris from here?”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10083" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10083"></td>
        <td id="LC10083" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10084" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10084"></td>
        <td id="LC10084" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“From here, at eight.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10085" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10085"></td>
        <td id="LC10085" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10086" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10086"></td>
        <td id="LC10086" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“I will come back, to see you off.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10087" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10087"></td>
        <td id="LC10087" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10088" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10088"></td>
        <td id="LC10088" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Very ill at ease with himself, and with Stryver and most other men,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10089" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10089"></td>
        <td id="LC10089" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Darnay made the best of his way into the quiet of the Temple, opened the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10090" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10090"></td>
        <td id="LC10090" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">letter, and read it. These were its contents:</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10091" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10091"></td>
        <td id="LC10091" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10092" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10092"></td>
        <td id="LC10092" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10093" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10093"></td>
        <td id="LC10093" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Prison of the Abbaye, Paris.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10094" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10094"></td>
        <td id="LC10094" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10095" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10095"></td>
        <td id="LC10095" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“June 21, 1792. “MONSIEUR HERETOFORE THE MARQUIS.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10096" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10096"></td>
        <td id="LC10096" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10097" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10097"></td>
        <td id="LC10097" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“After having long been in danger of my life at the hands of the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10098" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10098"></td>
        <td id="LC10098" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">village, I have been seized, with great violence and indignity, and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10099" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10099"></td>
        <td id="LC10099" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">brought a long journey on foot to Paris. On the road I have suffered a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10100" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10100"></td>
        <td id="LC10100" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">great deal. Nor is that all; my house has been destroyed--razed to the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10101" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10101"></td>
        <td id="LC10101" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">ground.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10102" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10102"></td>
        <td id="LC10102" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10103" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10103"></td>
        <td id="LC10103" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“The crime for which I am imprisoned, Monsieur heretofore the Marquis,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10104" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10104"></td>
        <td id="LC10104" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and for which I shall be summoned before the tribunal, and shall lose my</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10105" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10105"></td>
        <td id="LC10105" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">life (without your so generous help), is, they tell me, treason against</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10106" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10106"></td>
        <td id="LC10106" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the majesty of the people, in that I have acted against them for an</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10107" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10107"></td>
        <td id="LC10107" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">emigrant. It is in vain I represent that I have acted for them, and not</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10108" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10108"></td>
        <td id="LC10108" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">against, according to your commands. It is in vain I represent that,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10109" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10109"></td>
        <td id="LC10109" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">before the sequestration of emigrant property, I had remitted the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10110" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10110"></td>
        <td id="LC10110" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">imposts they had ceased to pay; that I had collected no rent; that I had</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10111" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10111"></td>
        <td id="LC10111" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">had recourse to no process. The only response is, that I have acted for</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10112" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10112"></td>
        <td id="LC10112" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">an emigrant, and where is that emigrant?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10113" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10113"></td>
        <td id="LC10113" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10114" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10114"></td>
        <td id="LC10114" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Ah! most gracious Monsieur heretofore the Marquis, where is that</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10115" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10115"></td>
        <td id="LC10115" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">emigrant? I cry in my sleep where is he? I demand of Heaven, will he</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10116" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10116"></td>
        <td id="LC10116" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">not come to deliver me? No answer. Ah Monsieur heretofore the Marquis,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10117" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10117"></td>
        <td id="LC10117" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">I send my desolate cry across the sea, hoping it may perhaps reach your</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10118" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10118"></td>
        <td id="LC10118" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">ears through the great bank of Tilson known at Paris!</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10119" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10119"></td>
        <td id="LC10119" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10120" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10120"></td>
        <td id="LC10120" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“For the love of Heaven, of justice, of generosity, of the honour of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10121" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10121"></td>
        <td id="LC10121" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">your noble name, I supplicate you, Monsieur heretofore the Marquis, to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10122" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10122"></td>
        <td id="LC10122" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">succour and release me. My fault is, that I have been true to you. Oh</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10123" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10123"></td>
        <td id="LC10123" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Monsieur heretofore the Marquis, I pray you be you true to me!</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10124" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10124"></td>
        <td id="LC10124" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10125" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10125"></td>
        <td id="LC10125" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“From this prison here of horror, whence I every hour tend nearer and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10126" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10126"></td>
        <td id="LC10126" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">nearer to destruction, I send you, Monsieur heretofore the Marquis, the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10127" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10127"></td>
        <td id="LC10127" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">assurance of my dolorous and unhappy service.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10128" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10128"></td>
        <td id="LC10128" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10129" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10129"></td>
        <td id="LC10129" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Your afflicted,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10130" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10130"></td>
        <td id="LC10130" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10131" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10131"></td>
        <td id="LC10131" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Gabelle.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10132" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10132"></td>
        <td id="LC10132" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10133" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10133"></td>
        <td id="LC10133" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L10226" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10226"></td>

        <td id="L10227" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10227"></td>

        <td id="LC10265" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">in proof of his safety, immediately after his arrival.</td>

        <td id="L10267" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10267"></td>
        <td id="LC10267" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">It was a hard day, that day of being among them, with the first</td>

        <td id="LC10268" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">reservation of their joint lives on his mind. It was a hard matter to</td>

        <td id="LC10269" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">preserve the innocent deceit of which they were profoundly unsuspicious.</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L10270" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10270"></td>
        <td id="LC10270" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">But, an affectionate glance at his wife, so happy and busy, made him</td>

        <td id="L10303" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10303"></td>
        <td id="LC10303" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">The traveller fared slowly on his way, who fared towards Paris from</td>

        <td id="L10304" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10304"></td>
        <td id="LC10304" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">England in the autumn of the year one thousand seven hundred and</td>

        <td id="L10305" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10305"></td>

        <td id="L10306" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10306"></td>
        <td id="LC10306" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">horses, he would have encountered to delay him, though the fallen and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10307" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10307"></td>
        <td id="LC10307" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">unfortunate King of France had been upon his throne in all his glory;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10308" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10308"></td>
        <td id="LC10308" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">but, the changed times were fraught with other obstacles than</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10309" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10309"></td>
