      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10310" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10310"></td>
        <td id="LC10310" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">citizen-patriots, with their national muskets in a most explosive state</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10311" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10311"></td>
        <td id="LC10311" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">of readiness, who stopped all comers and goers, cross-questioned them,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10312" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10312"></td>
        <td id="LC10312" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">inspected their papers, looked for their names in lists of their own,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10313" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10313"></td>
        <td id="LC10313" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">turned them back, or sent them on, or stopped them and laid them in</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10314" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10314"></td>
        <td id="LC10314" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">hold, as their capricious judgment or fancy deemed best for the dawning</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10315" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10315"></td>
        <td id="LC10315" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Republic One and Indivisible, of Liberty, Equality, Fraternity, or</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10316" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10316"></td>
        <td id="LC10316" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Death.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10317" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10317"></td>
        <td id="LC10317" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10318" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10318"></td>
        <td id="LC10318" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">A very few French leagues of his journey were accomplished, when Charles</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10319" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10319"></td>
        <td id="LC10319" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Darnay began to perceive that for him along these country roads there</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10320" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10320"></td>
        <td id="LC10320" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">was no hope of return until he should have been declared a good citizen</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10321" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10321"></td>
        <td id="LC10321" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">at Paris. Whatever might befall now, he must on to his journey&#39;s end.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10322" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10322"></td>
        <td id="LC10322" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Not a mean village closed upon him, not a common barrier dropped across</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10323" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10323"></td>
        <td id="LC10323" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the road behind him, but he knew it to be another iron door in</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10324" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10324"></td>
        <td id="LC10324" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the series that was barred between him and England. The universal</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10325" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10325"></td>
        <td id="LC10325" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">watchfulness so encompassed him, that if he had been taken in a net,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10326" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10326"></td>
        <td id="LC10326" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">or were being forwarded to his destination in a cage, he could not have</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10327" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10327"></td>
        <td id="LC10327" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">felt his freedom more completely gone.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10328" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10328"></td>
        <td id="LC10328" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10329" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10329"></td>
        <td id="LC10329" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">This universal watchfulness not only stopped him on the highway twenty</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10330" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10330"></td>
        <td id="LC10330" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">times in a stage, but retarded his progress twenty times in a day, by</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10331" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10331"></td>
        <td id="LC10331" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">riding after him and taking him back, riding before him and stopping him</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10332" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10332"></td>
        <td id="LC10332" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">by anticipation, riding with him and keeping him in charge. He had been</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10333" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10333"></td>
        <td id="LC10333" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">days upon his journey in France alone, when he went to bed tired out, in</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10334" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10334"></td>
        <td id="LC10334" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">a little town on the high road, still a long way from Paris.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10335" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10335"></td>
        <td id="LC10335" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10336" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10336"></td>
        <td id="LC10336" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Nothing but the production of the afflicted Gabelle&#39;s letter from his</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10337" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10337"></td>
        <td id="LC10337" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">prison of the Abbaye would have got him on so far. His difficulty at the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10338" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10338"></td>
        <td id="LC10338" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">guard-house in this small place had been such, that he felt his journey</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10339" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10339"></td>
        <td id="LC10339" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">to have come to a crisis. And he was, therefore, as little surprised as</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10340" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10340"></td>
        <td id="LC10340" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">a man could be, to find himself awakened at the small inn to which he</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10341" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10341"></td>
        <td id="LC10341" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">had been remitted until morning, in the middle of the night.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10342" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10342"></td>
        <td id="LC10342" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10343" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10343"></td>
        <td id="LC10343" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Awakened by a timid local functionary and three armed patriots in rough</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10344" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10344"></td>
        <td id="LC10344" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">red caps and with pipes in their mouths, who sat down on the bed.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10345" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10345"></td>
        <td id="LC10345" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10346" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10346"></td>
        <td id="LC10346" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Emigrant,” said the functionary, “I am going to send you on to Paris,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10347" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10347"></td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L10352" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10352"></td>
        <td id="LC10352" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Silence!” growled a red-cap, striking at the coverlet with the butt-end</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10353" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10353"></td>
        <td id="LC10353" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">of his musket. “Peace, aristocrat!”</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L10354" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10354"></td>

        <td id="L10355" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10355"></td>
        <td id="LC10355" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“It is as the good patriot says,” observed the timid functionary. “You</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L10357" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10357"></td>

        <td id="L10358" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10358"></td>

        <td id="LC10361" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">not a favour to be protected from the lamp-iron!”</td>

        <td id="L10363" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10363"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10364" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10364"></td>
        <td id="LC10364" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and dress yourself, emigrant.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10365" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10365"></td>

      <tr>

        <td id="LC10366" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Darnay complied, and was taken back to the guard-house, where other</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10367" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10367"></td>
        <td id="LC10367" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">patriots in rough red caps were smoking, drinking, and sleeping, by</td>

        <td id="L10369" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10369"></td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L10370" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10370"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>

      </tr>

        <td id="L10374" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10374"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10375" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10375"></td>
        <td id="LC10375" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">The escorted governed his own horse, but a loose line was attached to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>

        <td id="L10377" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10377"></td>
        <td id="LC10377" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">wrist. In this state they set forth with the sharp rain driving in their</td>

        <td id="L10378" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10378"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10379" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10379"></td>

      <tr>

      <tr>
        <td id="L10381" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10381"></td>
        <td id="LC10381" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">between them and the capital.</td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10390" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10390"></td>
        <td id="LC10390" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">that was laid upon him to awaken any serious fears in his breast; for,</td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10398" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10398"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10400" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10400"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10401" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10401"></td>
        <td id="LC10401" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">He stopped in the act of swinging himself out of his saddle, and,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10402" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10402"></td>
        <td id="LC10402" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">resuming it as his safest place, said:</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10403" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10403"></td>
        <td id="LC10403" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10404" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10404"></td>
        <td id="LC10404" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Emigrant, my friends! Do you not see me here, in France, of my own</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10405" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10405"></td>
        <td id="LC10405" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">will?”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10406" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10406"></td>
        <td id="LC10406" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10407" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10407"></td>
        <td id="LC10407" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“You are a cursed emigrant,” cried a farrier, making at him in a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10408" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10408"></td>
        <td id="LC10408" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">furious manner through the press, hammer in hand; “and you are a cursed</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10409" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10409"></td>
        <td id="LC10409" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">aristocrat!”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10410" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10410"></td>
        <td id="LC10410" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10411" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10411"></td>
        <td id="LC10411" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">The postmaster interposed himself between this man and the rider&#39;s</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10412" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10412"></td>
        <td id="LC10412" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">bridle (at which he was evidently making), and soothingly said, “Let him</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10413" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10413"></td>
        <td id="LC10413" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">be; let him be! He will be judged at Paris.”</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L10414" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10414"></td>

      <tr>

      </tr>

        <td id="L10417" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10417"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>

        <td id="LC10505" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and women.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10506" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10506"></td>
        <td id="LC10506" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10507" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10507"></td>
        <td id="LC10507" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">When he had sat in his saddle some half-hour, taking note of these</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10508" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10508"></td>
        <td id="LC10508" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">things, Darnay found himself confronted by the same man in authority,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10509" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10509"></td>
        <td id="LC10509" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">who directed the guard to open the barrier. Then he delivered to the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10510" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10510"></td>
        <td id="LC10510" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">escort, drunk and sober, a receipt for the escorted, and requested him</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10511" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10511"></td>
        <td id="LC10511" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">to dismount. He did so, and the two patriots, leading his tired horse,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10512" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10512"></td>
        <td id="LC10512" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">turned and rode away without entering the city.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10513" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10513"></td>
        <td id="LC10513" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10514" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10514"></td>
        <td id="LC10514" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">He accompanied his conductor into a guard-room, smelling of common wine</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10515" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10515"></td>
        <td id="LC10515" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and tobacco, where certain soldiers and patriots, asleep and awake,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10516" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10516"></td>
        <td id="LC10516" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">drunk and sober, and in various neutral states between sleeping and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10517" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10517"></td>
        <td id="LC10517" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">waking, drunkenness and sobriety, were standing and lying about. The</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10518" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10518"></td>
        <td id="LC10518" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">light in the guard-house, half derived from the waning oil-lamps of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10519" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10519"></td>
        <td id="LC10519" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the night, and half from the overcast day, was in a correspondingly</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10520" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10520"></td>
        <td id="LC10520" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">uncertain condition. Some registers were lying open on a desk, and an</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10521" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10521"></td>
        <td id="LC10521" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">officer of a coarse, dark aspect, presided over these.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10522" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10522"></td>

        <td id="L10523" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10523"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10541" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10541"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10545" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10545"></td>
        <td id="LC10545" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Force.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10546" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10546"></td>

        <td id="L10547" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10547"></td>
        <td id="LC10547" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Just Heaven!” exclaimed Darnay. “Under what law, and for what offence?”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10548" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10548"></td>
        <td id="LC10548" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10549" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10549"></td>
        <td id="LC10549" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">The officer looked up from his slip of paper for a moment.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10550" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10550"></td>
        <td id="LC10550" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>

        <td id="LC10551" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“We have new laws, Evremonde, and new offences, since you were here.” He</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10552" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10552"></td>
        <td id="LC10552" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">said it with a hard smile, and went on writing.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10553" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10553"></td>

        <td id="LC10554" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“I entreat you to observe that I have come here voluntarily, in response</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10555" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10555"></td>
        <td id="LC10555" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">to that written appeal of a fellow-countryman which lies before you. I</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10556" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10556"></td>
        <td id="LC10556" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">demand no more than the opportunity to do so without delay. Is not that</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10557" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10557"></td>
        <td id="LC10557" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">my right?”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10558" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10558"></td>
        <td id="LC10558" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10559" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10559"></td>
        <td id="LC10559" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Emigrants have no rights, Evremonde,” was the stolid reply. The officer</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10560" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10560"></td>
        <td id="LC10560" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">wrote until he had finished, read over to himself what he had written,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10561" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10561"></td>
        <td id="LC10561" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">sanded it, and handed it to Defarge, with the words “In secret.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10562" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10562"></td>
        <td id="LC10562" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L10563" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10563"></td>
        <td id="LC10563" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Defarge motioned with the paper to the prisoner that he must accompany</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10564" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10564"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10565" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10565"></td>
        <td id="LC10565" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">them.</td>

        <td id="LC10567" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Is it you,” said Defarge, in a low voice, as they went down the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10568" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10568"></td>
        <td id="LC10568" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">guardhouse steps and turned into Paris, “who married the daughter of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10569" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10569"></td>
        <td id="LC10569" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Doctor Manette, once a prisoner in the Bastille that is no more?”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10570" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10570"></td>

        <td id="L10571" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10571"></td>
        <td id="LC10571" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Yes,” replied Darnay, looking at him with surprise.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10572" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10572"></td>
        <td id="LC10572" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>

        <td id="LC10573" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“My name is Defarge, and I keep a wine-shop in the Quarter Saint</td>

        <td id="L10574" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10574"></td>
        <td id="LC10574" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Antoine. Possibly you have heard of me.”</td>

      <tr>

        <td id="L10576" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10576"></td>
        <td id="LC10576" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“My wife came to your house to reclaim her father? Yes!”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10577" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10577"></td>
        <td id="LC10577" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10578" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10578"></td>
        <td id="LC10578" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">The word “wife” seemed to serve as a gloomy reminder to Defarge, to say</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10579" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10579"></td>
        <td id="LC10579" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">with sudden impatience, “In the name of that sharp female newly-born,</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L10580" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10580"></td>
        <td id="LC10580" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and called La Guillotine, why did you come to France?”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10581" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10581"></td>

        <td id="L10582" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10582"></td>

        <td id="LC10589" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">sudden and unfair, that I am absolutely lost. Will you render me a</td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10593" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10593"></td>
        <td id="LC10593" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>

      <tr>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10595" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10595"></td>
        <td id="LC10595" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10596" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10596"></td>
        <td id="LC10596" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Perhaps. According to its nature. You can say what it is.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10597" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10597"></td>
        <td id="LC10597" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10598" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10598"></td>
        <td id="LC10598" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“In this prison that I am going to so unjustly, shall I have some free</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10599" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10599"></td>
        <td id="LC10599" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">communication with the world outside?”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10600" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10600"></td>
        <td id="LC10600" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10601" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10601"></td>
        <td id="LC10601" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“You will see.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10602" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10602"></td>
        <td id="LC10602" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10603" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10603"></td>
        <td id="LC10603" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“I am not to be buried there, prejudged, and without any means of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10604" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10604"></td>
        <td id="LC10604" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">presenting my case?”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10605" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10605"></td>
        <td id="LC10605" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10606" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10606"></td>
        <td id="LC10606" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“You will see. But, what then? Other people have been similarly buried</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10607" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10607"></td>
        <td id="LC10607" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">in worse prisons, before now.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10608" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10608"></td>
        <td id="LC10608" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10609" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10609"></td>
        <td id="LC10609" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“But never by me, Citizen Defarge.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10610" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10610"></td>
        <td id="LC10610" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10611" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10611"></td>
        <td id="LC10611" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Defarge glanced darkly at him for answer, and walked on in a steady</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10612" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10612"></td>
        <td id="LC10612" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and set silence. The deeper he sank into this silence, the fainter hope</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10613" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10613"></td>
        <td id="LC10613" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">there was--or so Darnay thought--of his softening in any slight degree.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10614" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10614"></td>
        <td id="LC10614" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">He, therefore, made haste to say:</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10615" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10615"></td>
        <td id="LC10615" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10616" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10616"></td>
        <td id="LC10616" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“It is of the utmost importance to me (you know, Citizen, even better</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10617" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10617"></td>
        <td id="LC10617" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">than I, of how much importance), that I should be able to communicate to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10618" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10618"></td>
        <td id="LC10618" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Mr. Lorry of Tellson&#39;s Bank, an English gentleman who is now in Paris,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10619" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10619"></td>
        <td id="LC10619" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the simple fact, without comment, that I have been thrown into the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10620" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10620"></td>
        <td id="LC10620" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">prison of La Force. Will you cause that to be done for me?”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10621" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10621"></td>
        <td id="LC10621" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10622" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10622"></td>
        <td id="LC10622" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“I will do,” Defarge doggedly rejoined, “nothing for you. My duty is to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10623" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10623"></td>
        <td id="LC10623" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">my country and the People. I am the sworn servant of both, against you.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10624" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10624"></td>
        <td id="LC10624" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">I will do nothing for you.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10625" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10625"></td>
        <td id="LC10625" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10626" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10626"></td>
        <td id="LC10626" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Charles Darnay felt it hopeless to entreat him further, and his pride</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10627" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10627"></td>
        <td id="LC10627" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">was touched besides. As they walked on in silence, he could not but see</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10628" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10628"></td>
        <td id="LC10628" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">how used the people were to the spectacle of prisoners passing along the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10629" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10629"></td>
        <td id="LC10629" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">streets. The very children scarcely noticed him. A few passers turned</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10630" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10630"></td>
        <td id="LC10630" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">their heads, and a few shook their fingers at him as an aristocrat;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10631" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10631"></td>
        <td id="LC10631" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">otherwise, that a man in good clothes should be going to prison, was no</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10632" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10632"></td>
        <td id="LC10632" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">more remarkable than that a labourer in working clothes should be</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10633" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10633"></td>
        <td id="LC10633" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">going to work. In one narrow, dark, and dirty street through which they</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10634" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10634"></td>
        <td id="LC10634" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">passed, an excited orator, mounted on a stool, was addressing an excited</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10635" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10635"></td>
        <td id="LC10635" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">audience on the crimes against the people, of the king and the royal</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10636" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10636"></td>
        <td id="LC10636" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">family. The few words that he caught from this man&#39;s lips, first made</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10637" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10637"></td>
        <td id="LC10637" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">it known to Charles Darnay that the king was in prison, and that the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10638" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10638"></td>
        <td id="LC10638" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">foreign ambassadors had one and all left Paris. On the road (except at</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10639" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10639"></td>
        <td id="LC10639" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Beauvais) he had heard absolutely nothing. The escort and the universal</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10640" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10640"></td>
        <td id="LC10640" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">watchfulness had completely isolated him.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10641" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10641"></td>
        <td id="LC10641" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10642" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10642"></td>
        <td id="LC10642" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">That he had fallen among far greater dangers than those which had</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10643" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10643"></td>
        <td id="LC10643" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">developed themselves when he left England, he of course knew now. That</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10644" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10644"></td>
        <td id="LC10644" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">perils had thickened about him fast, and might thicken faster and faster</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10645" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10645"></td>
        <td id="LC10645" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">yet, he of course knew now. He could not but admit to himself that he</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10646" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10646"></td>
        <td id="LC10646" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">might not have made this journey, if he could have foreseen the events</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10647" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10647"></td>
        <td id="LC10647" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">of a few days. And yet his misgivings were not so dark as, imagined by</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10648" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10648"></td>
        <td id="LC10648" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the light of this later time, they would appear. Troubled as the future</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10649" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10649"></td>
        <td id="LC10649" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">was, it was the unknown future, and in its obscurity there was ignorant</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10650" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10650"></td>
        <td id="LC10650" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">hope. The horrible massacre, days and nights long, which, within a few</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10651" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10651"></td>
        <td id="LC10651" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">rounds of the clock, was to set a great mark of blood upon the blessed</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10652" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10652"></td>
        <td id="LC10652" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">garnering time of harvest, was as far out of his knowledge as if it had</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10653" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10653"></td>
        <td id="LC10653" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">been a hundred thousand years away. The “sharp female newly-born, and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10654" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10654"></td>
        <td id="LC10654" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">called La Guillotine,” was hardly known to him, or to the generality</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10655" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10655"></td>
        <td id="LC10655" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">of people, by name. The frightful deeds that were to be soon done, were</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10656" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10656"></td>
        <td id="LC10656" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">probably unimagined at that time in the brains of the doers. How could</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10657" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10657"></td>
        <td id="LC10657" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">they have a place in the shadowy conceptions of a gentle mind?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10658" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10658"></td>
        <td id="LC10658" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10659" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10659"></td>
        <td id="LC10659" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Of unjust treatment in detention and hardship, and in cruel separation</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10660" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10660"></td>
        <td id="LC10660" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">from his wife and child, he foreshadowed the likelihood, or the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10661" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10661"></td>
        <td id="LC10661" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">certainty; but, beyond this, he dreaded nothing distinctly. With this on</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10662" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10662"></td>
        <td id="LC10662" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">his mind, which was enough to carry into a dreary prison courtyard, he</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10663" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10663"></td>
        <td id="LC10663" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">arrived at the prison of La Force.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10664" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10664"></td>
        <td id="LC10664" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10665" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10665"></td>
        <td id="LC10665" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">A man with a bloated face opened the strong wicket, to whom Defarge</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10666" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10666"></td>
        <td id="LC10666" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">presented “The Emigrant Evremonde.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10667" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10667"></td>
        <td id="LC10667" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10668" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10668"></td>
        <td id="LC10668" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“What the Devil! How many more of them!” exclaimed the man with the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10669" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10669"></td>
        <td id="LC10669" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">bloated face.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10670" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10670"></td>
        <td id="LC10670" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10671" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10671"></td>
        <td id="LC10671" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Defarge took his receipt without noticing the exclamation, and withdrew,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10672" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10672"></td>
        <td id="LC10672" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">with his two fellow-patriots.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10673" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10673"></td>
        <td id="LC10673" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10674" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10674"></td>
        <td id="LC10674" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“What the Devil, I say again!” exclaimed the gaoler, left with his wife.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10675" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10675"></td>
        <td id="LC10675" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“How many more!”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10676" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10676"></td>
        <td id="LC10676" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10677" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10677"></td>
        <td id="LC10677" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">The gaoler&#39;s wife, being provided with no answer to the question, merely</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10678" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10678"></td>
        <td id="LC10678" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">replied, “One must have patience, my dear!” Three turnkeys who entered</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10679" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10679"></td>
        <td id="LC10679" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">responsive to a bell she rang, echoed the sentiment, and one added, “For</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10680" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10680"></td>
        <td id="LC10680" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the love of Liberty;” which sounded in that place like an inappropriate</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10681" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10681"></td>
        <td id="LC10681" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">conclusion.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10682" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10682"></td>
        <td id="LC10682" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10683" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10683"></td>
        <td id="LC10683" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">The prison of La Force was a gloomy prison, dark and filthy, and with a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10684" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10684"></td>
        <td id="LC10684" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">horrible smell of foul sleep in it. Extraordinary how soon the noisome</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10685" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10685"></td>
        <td id="LC10685" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">flavour of imprisoned sleep, becomes manifest in all such places that</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10686" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10686"></td>
        <td id="LC10686" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">are ill cared for!</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10687" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10687"></td>
        <td id="LC10687" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10688" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10688"></td>
        <td id="LC10688" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“In secret, too,” grumbled the gaoler, looking at the written paper. “As</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10689" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10689"></td>
        <td id="LC10689" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">if I was not already full to bursting!”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10690" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10690"></td>
        <td id="LC10690" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10691" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10691"></td>
        <td id="LC10691" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">He stuck the paper on a file, in an ill-humour, and Charles Darnay</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10692" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10692"></td>
        <td id="LC10692" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">awaited his further pleasure for half an hour: sometimes, pacing to and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10693" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10693"></td>
        <td id="LC10693" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">fro in the strong arched room: sometimes, resting on a stone seat: in</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10694" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10694"></td>
        <td id="LC10694" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">either case detained to be imprinted on the memory of the chief and his</td>
      </tr>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10788" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10788"></td>
        <td id="LC10788" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Five paces by four and a half, five paces by four and a half, five</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L10813" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10813"></td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L10877" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10877"></td>
        <td id="LC10877" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the usual night hum of the city, with now and then an indescribable ring</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10878" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10878"></td>
        <td id="LC10878" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">in it, weird and unearthly, as if some unwonted sounds of a terrible</td>

        <td id="L10966" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10966"></td>
        <td id="LC10966" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">The old man kissed her, and hurried her into his room, and turned the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10967" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10967"></td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L10968" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10968"></td>

        <td id="L10969" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10969"></td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L10970" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10970"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10971" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10971"></td>
        <td id="LC10971" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Looked out upon a throng of men and women: not enough in number, or near</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10972" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10972"></td>
        <td id="LC10972" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">enough, to fill the courtyard: not more than forty or fifty in all. The</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10973" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10973"></td>
        <td id="LC10973" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">people in possession of the house had let them in at the gate, and they</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10974" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10974"></td>
        <td id="LC10974" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">had rushed in to work at the grindstone; it had evidently been set up</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L10975" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10975"></td>
        <td id="LC10975" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">there for their purpose, as in a convenient and retired spot.</td>

        <td id="L10976" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10976"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10977" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10977"></td>
        <td id="LC10977" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">But, such awful workers, and such awful work!</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L10978" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10978"></td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L10979" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10979"></td>
        <td id="LC10979" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">The grindstone had a double handle, and, turning at it madly were two</td>
      </tr>

      <tr>
        <td id="L11061" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11061"></td>
        <td id="LC11061" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">The great grindstone, Earth, had turned when Mr. Lorry looked out again,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11062" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11062"></td>
        <td id="LC11062" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and the sun was red on the courtyard. But, the lesser grindstone stood</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11063" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11063"></td>
        <td id="LC11063" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">alone there in the calm morning air, with a red upon it that the sun had</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11064" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11064"></td>
        <td id="LC11064" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">never given, and would never take away.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11065" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11065"></td>
        <td id="LC11065" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L11066" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11066"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11067" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11067"></td>
        <td id="LC11067" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L11068" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11068"></td>
        <td id="LC11068" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11069" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11069"></td>
        <td id="LC11069" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">III. The Shadow</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11070" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11070"></td>
        <td id="LC11070" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11071" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11071"></td>
        <td id="LC11071" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11072" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11072"></td>
        <td id="LC11072" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">One of the first considerations which arose in the business mind of Mr.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11073" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11073"></td>
        <td id="LC11073" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Lorry when business hours came round, was this:--that he had no right to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11074" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11074"></td>
        <td id="LC11074" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">imperil Tellson&#39;s by sheltering the wife of an emigrant prisoner under</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11075" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11075"></td>
        <td id="LC11075" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the Bank roof. His own possessions, safety, life, he would have hazarded</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11076" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11076"></td>
        <td id="LC11076" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">for Lucie and her child, without a moment&#39;s demur; but the great trust</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11077" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11077"></td>
        <td id="LC11077" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">he held was not his own, and as to that business charge he was a strict</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11078" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11078"></td>
        <td id="LC11078" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">man of business.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11079" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11079"></td>
        <td id="LC11079" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11080" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11080"></td>
        <td id="LC11080" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">At first, his mind reverted to Defarge, and he thought of finding out</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11081" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11081"></td>
        <td id="LC11081" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the wine-shop again and taking counsel with its master in reference to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11082" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11082"></td>
        <td id="LC11082" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the safest dwelling-place in the distracted state of the city. But, the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11083" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11083"></td>
        <td id="LC11083" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">same consideration that suggested him, repudiated him; he lived in the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11084" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11084"></td>
        <td id="LC11084" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">most violent Quarter, and doubtless was influential there, and deep in</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11085" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11085"></td>
        <td id="LC11085" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">its dangerous workings.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11086" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11086"></td>
        <td id="LC11086" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11087" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11087"></td>
        <td id="LC11087" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Noon coming, and the Doctor not returning, and every minute&#39;s delay</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11088" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11088"></td>
        <td id="LC11088" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">tending to compromise Tellson&#39;s, Mr. Lorry advised with Lucie. She said</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11089" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11089"></td>
        <td id="LC11089" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">that her father had spoken of hiring a lodging for a short term, in that</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11090" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11090"></td>
        <td id="LC11090" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Quarter, near the Banking-house. As there was no business objection to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11091" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11091"></td>
        <td id="LC11091" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">this, and as he foresaw that even if it were all well with Charles, and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11092" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11092"></td>
        <td id="LC11092" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">he were to be released, he could not hope to leave the city, Mr. Lorry</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11093" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11093"></td>
        <td id="LC11093" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">went out in quest of such a lodging, and found a suitable one, high up</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11094" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11094"></td>
        <td id="LC11094" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">in a removed by-street where the closed blinds in all the other windows</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11095" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11095"></td>
        <td id="LC11095" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">of a high melancholy square of buildings marked deserted homes.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11096" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11096"></td>
        <td id="LC11096" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11097" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11097"></td>
        <td id="LC11097" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">To this lodging he at once removed Lucie and her child, and Miss Pross:</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11098" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11098"></td>
        <td id="LC11098" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">giving them what comfort he could, and much more than he had himself.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11099" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11099"></td>
        <td id="LC11099" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">He left Jerry with them, as a figure to fill a doorway that would bear</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11100" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11100"></td>
        <td id="LC11100" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">considerable knocking on the head, and returned to his own occupations.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11101" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11101"></td>
        <td id="LC11101" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">A disturbed and doleful mind he brought to bear upon them, and slowly</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11102" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11102"></td>
        <td id="LC11102" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and heavily the day lagged on with him.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11103" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11103"></td>
        <td id="LC11103" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11104" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11104"></td>
        <td id="LC11104" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">It wore itself out, and wore him out with it, until the Bank closed. He</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11105" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11105"></td>
        <td id="LC11105" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">was again alone in his room of the previous night, considering what to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11106" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11106"></td>
        <td id="LC11106" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">do next, when he heard a foot upon the stair. In a few moments, a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11107" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11107"></td>
        <td id="LC11107" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">man stood in his presence, who, with a keenly observant look at him,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11108" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11108"></td>
        <td id="LC11108" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">addressed him by his name.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11109" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11109"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11110" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11110"></td>
        <td id="LC11110" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Your servant,” said Mr. Lorry. “Do you know me?”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11111" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11111"></td>
        <td id="LC11111" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11112" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11112"></td>
        <td id="LC11112" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">He was a strongly made man with dark curling hair, from forty-five</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11113" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11113"></td>
        <td id="LC11113" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">to fifty years of age. For answer he repeated, without any change of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11114" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11114"></td>
        <td id="LC11114" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">emphasis, the words:</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11115" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11115"></td>
        <td id="LC11115" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11116" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11116"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11117" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11117"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11119" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11119"></td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L11121" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11121"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11122" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11122"></td>
        <td id="LC11122" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Much interested and agitated, Mr. Lorry said: “You come from Doctor</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L11123" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11123"></td>

        <td id="L11124" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11124"></td>

      <tr>

      <tr>
        <td id="L11129" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11129"></td>
        <td id="LC11129" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Defarge gave into his anxious hand, an open scrap of paper. It bore the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11130" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11130"></td>

      <tr>

      </tr>

        <td id="L11132" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11132"></td>
        <td id="LC11132" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    “Charles is safe, but I cannot safely leave this place yet.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11133" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11133"></td>
        <td id="LC11133" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">     I have obtained the favour that the bearer has a short note</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L11134" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11134"></td>
        <td id="LC11134" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">     from Charles to his wife.  Let the bearer see his wife.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11135" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11135"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11136" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11136"></td>
        <td id="LC11136" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">It was dated from La Force, within an hour.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11137" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11137"></td>

        <td id="L11138" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11138"></td>
        <td id="LC11138" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Will you accompany me,” said Mr. Lorry, joyfully relieved after reading</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11139" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11139"></td>
        <td id="LC11139" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">this note aloud, “to where his wife resides?”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11140" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11140"></td>

        <td id="L11141" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11141"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11142" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11142"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11143" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11143"></td>
        <td id="LC11143" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Scarcely noticing as yet, in what a curiously reserved and mechanical</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11144" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11144"></td>
        <td id="LC11144" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">way Defarge spoke, Mr. Lorry put on his hat and they went down into the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11145" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11145"></td>
        <td id="LC11145" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">courtyard. There, they found two women; one, knitting.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11146" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11146"></td>
        <td id="LC11146" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11147" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11147"></td>
        <td id="LC11147" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Madame Defarge, surely!” said Mr. Lorry, who had left her in exactly</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11148" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11148"></td>
        <td id="LC11148" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the same attitude some seventeen years ago.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11149" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11149"></td>

        <td id="L11150" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11150"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11151" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11151"></td>

      </tr>

        <td id="L11153" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11153"></td>
        <td id="LC11153" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">they moved.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11154" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11154"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11155" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11155"></td>
        <td id="LC11155" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Yes. That she may be able to recognise the faces and know the persons.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11156" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11156"></td>
        <td id="LC11156" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">It is for their safety.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11157" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11157"></td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L11158" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11158"></td>
        <td id="LC11158" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Beginning to be struck by Defarge&#39;s manner, Mr. Lorry looked dubiously</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11159" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11159"></td>

        <td id="L11160" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11160"></td>
        <td id="LC11160" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">The Vengeance.</td>

      <tr>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11163" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11163"></td>

        <td id="LC11165" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">tidings Mr. Lorry gave her of her husband, and clasped the hand that</td>

        <td id="L11166" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11166"></td>

        <td id="L11246" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11246"></td>

        <td id="L11247" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11247"></td>

        <td id="L11248" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11248"></td>
        <td id="LC11248" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">much influence around him.”</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L11249" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11249"></td>
