      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11250" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11250"></td>
        <td id="LC11250" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Surely it will release him!” said Madame Defarge. “Let it do so.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11251" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11251"></td>
        <td id="LC11251" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11252" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11252"></td>
        <td id="LC11252" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“As a wife and mother,” cried Lucie, most earnestly, “I implore you to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11253" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11253"></td>
        <td id="LC11253" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">have pity on me and not to exercise any power that you possess, against</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11254" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11254"></td>
        <td id="LC11254" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">my innocent husband, but to use it in his behalf. O sister-woman, think</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11255" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11255"></td>
        <td id="LC11255" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">of me. As a wife and mother!”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11256" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11256"></td>
        <td id="LC11256" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11257" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11257"></td>
        <td id="LC11257" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Madame Defarge looked, coldly as ever, at the suppliant, and said,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11258" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11258"></td>
        <td id="LC11258" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">turning to her friend The Vengeance:</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11259" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11259"></td>
        <td id="LC11259" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11260" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11260"></td>
        <td id="LC11260" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“The wives and mothers we have been used to see, since we were as little</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11261" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11261"></td>
        <td id="LC11261" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">as this child, and much less, have not been greatly considered? We have</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11262" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11262"></td>
        <td id="LC11262" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">known _their_ husbands and fathers laid in prison and kept from them,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11263" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11263"></td>
        <td id="LC11263" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">often enough? All our lives, we have seen our sister-women suffer, in</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11264" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11264"></td>
        <td id="LC11264" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">themselves and in their children, poverty, nakedness, hunger, thirst,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11265" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11265"></td>
        <td id="LC11265" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">sickness, misery, oppression and neglect of all kinds?”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11266" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11266"></td>
        <td id="LC11266" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11267" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11267"></td>
        <td id="LC11267" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“We have seen nothing else,” returned The Vengeance.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11268" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11268"></td>
        <td id="LC11268" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11269" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11269"></td>
        <td id="LC11269" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“We have borne this a long time,” said Madame Defarge, turning her eyes</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11270" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11270"></td>
        <td id="LC11270" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">again upon Lucie. “Judge you! Is it likely that the trouble of one wife</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11271" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11271"></td>
        <td id="LC11271" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and mother would be much to us now?”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11272" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11272"></td>
        <td id="LC11272" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11273" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11273"></td>
        <td id="LC11273" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">She resumed her knitting and went out. The Vengeance followed. Defarge</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11274" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11274"></td>
        <td id="LC11274" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">went last, and closed the door.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11275" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11275"></td>
        <td id="LC11275" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11276" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11276"></td>
        <td id="LC11276" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Courage, my dear Lucie,” said Mr. Lorry, as he raised her. “Courage,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11277" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11277"></td>
        <td id="LC11277" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">courage! So far all goes well with us--much, much better than it has of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11278" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11278"></td>
        <td id="LC11278" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">late gone with many poor souls. Cheer up, and have a thankful heart.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11279" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11279"></td>
        <td id="LC11279" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11280" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11280"></td>
        <td id="LC11280" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“I am not thankless, I hope, but that dreadful woman seems to throw a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11281" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11281"></td>
        <td id="LC11281" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">shadow on me and on all my hopes.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11282" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11282"></td>
        <td id="LC11282" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11283" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11283"></td>
        <td id="LC11283" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Tut, tut!” said Mr. Lorry; “what is this despondency in the brave</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11284" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11284"></td>
        <td id="LC11284" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">little breast? A shadow indeed! No substance in it, Lucie.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11285" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11285"></td>
        <td id="LC11285" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11286" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11286"></td>
        <td id="LC11286" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">But the shadow of the manner of these Defarges was dark upon himself,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11287" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11287"></td>
        <td id="LC11287" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">for all that, and in his secret mind it troubled him greatly.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11288" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11288"></td>
        <td id="LC11288" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11289" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11289"></td>
        <td id="LC11289" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11290" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11290"></td>
        <td id="LC11290" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11291" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11291"></td>
        <td id="LC11291" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11292" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11292"></td>
        <td id="LC11292" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">IV. Calm in Storm</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11293" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11293"></td>
        <td id="LC11293" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11294" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11294"></td>
        <td id="LC11294" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11295" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11295"></td>
        <td id="LC11295" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Doctor Manette did not return until the morning of the fourth day of his</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11296" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11296"></td>
        <td id="LC11296" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">absence. So much of what had happened in that dreadful time as could be</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11297" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11297"></td>
        <td id="LC11297" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">kept from the knowledge of Lucie was so well concealed from her, that</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11298" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11298"></td>
        <td id="LC11298" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">not until long afterwards, when France and she were far apart, did she</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11299" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11299"></td>
        <td id="LC11299" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">know that eleven hundred defenceless prisoners of both sexes and all</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11300" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11300"></td>
        <td id="LC11300" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">ages had been killed by the populace; that four days and nights had been</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11301" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11301"></td>
        <td id="LC11301" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">darkened by this deed of horror; and that the air around her had been</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11302" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11302"></td>
        <td id="LC11302" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">tainted by the slain. She only knew that there had been an attack upon</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11303" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11303"></td>
        <td id="LC11303" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the prisons, that all political prisoners had been in danger, and that</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11304" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11304"></td>
        <td id="LC11304" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">some had been dragged out by the crowd and murdered.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11305" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11305"></td>
        <td id="LC11305" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11306" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11306"></td>
        <td id="LC11306" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">To Mr. Lorry, the Doctor communicated under an injunction of secrecy on</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11307" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11307"></td>
        <td id="LC11307" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">which he had no need to dwell, that the crowd had taken him through a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11308" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11308"></td>
        <td id="LC11308" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">scene of carnage to the prison of La Force. That, in the prison he had</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11309" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11309"></td>
        <td id="LC11309" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">found a self-appointed Tribunal sitting, before which the prisoners were</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11310" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11310"></td>
        <td id="LC11310" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">brought singly, and by which they were rapidly ordered to be put forth</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11311" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11311"></td>
        <td id="LC11311" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">to be massacred, or to be released, or (in a few cases) to be sent back</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11312" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11312"></td>
        <td id="LC11312" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">to their cells. That, presented by his conductors to this Tribunal, he</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11313" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11313"></td>
        <td id="LC11313" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">had announced himself by name and profession as having been for eighteen</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11314" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11314"></td>
        <td id="LC11314" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">years a secret and unaccused prisoner in the Bastille; that, one of the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11315" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11315"></td>
        <td id="LC11315" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">body so sitting in judgment had risen and identified him, and that this</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11316" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11316"></td>
        <td id="LC11316" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">man was Defarge.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11317" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11317"></td>
        <td id="LC11317" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11318" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11318"></td>
        <td id="LC11318" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">That, hereupon he had ascertained, through the registers on the table,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11319" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11319"></td>
        <td id="LC11319" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">that his son-in-law was among the living prisoners, and had pleaded hard</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11320" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11320"></td>
        <td id="LC11320" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">to the Tribunal--of whom some members were asleep and some awake, some</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11321" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11321"></td>
        <td id="LC11321" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">dirty with murder and some clean, some sober and some not--for his life</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11322" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11322"></td>
        <td id="LC11322" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and liberty. That, in the first frantic greetings lavished on himself as</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11323" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11323"></td>
        <td id="LC11323" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">a notable sufferer under the overthrown system, it had been accorded</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11324" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11324"></td>
        <td id="LC11324" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">to him to have Charles Darnay brought before the lawless Court, and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11325" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11325"></td>
        <td id="LC11325" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">examined. That, he seemed on the point of being at once released, when</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11326" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11326"></td>
        <td id="LC11326" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the tide in his favour met with some unexplained check (not intelligible</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11327" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11327"></td>
        <td id="LC11327" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">to the Doctor), which led to a few words of secret conference. That,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11328" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11328"></td>
        <td id="LC11328" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the man sitting as President had then informed Doctor Manette that</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11329" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11329"></td>
        <td id="LC11329" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the prisoner must remain in custody, but should, for his sake, be held</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11330" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11330"></td>
        <td id="LC11330" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">inviolate in safe custody. That, immediately, on a signal, the prisoner</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11331" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11331"></td>
        <td id="LC11331" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">was removed to the interior of the prison again; but, that he, the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11332" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11332"></td>
        <td id="LC11332" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Doctor, had then so strongly pleaded for permission to remain and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11333" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11333"></td>
        <td id="LC11333" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">assure himself that his son-in-law was, through no malice or mischance,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11334" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11334"></td>
        <td id="LC11334" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">delivered to the concourse whose murderous yells outside the gate had</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11335" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11335"></td>
        <td id="LC11335" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">often drowned the proceedings, that he had obtained the permission, and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11336" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11336"></td>
        <td id="LC11336" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">had remained in that Hall of Blood until the danger was over.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11337" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11337"></td>
        <td id="LC11337" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11338" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11338"></td>
        <td id="LC11338" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">The sights he had seen there, with brief snatches of food and sleep by</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11339" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11339"></td>
        <td id="LC11339" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">intervals, shall remain untold. The mad joy over the prisoners who were</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11340" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11340"></td>
        <td id="LC11340" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">saved, had astounded him scarcely less than the mad ferocity against</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11341" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11341"></td>
        <td id="LC11341" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">those who were cut to pieces. One prisoner there was, he said, who had</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11342" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11342"></td>
        <td id="LC11342" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">been discharged into the street free, but at whom a mistaken savage had</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11343" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11343"></td>
        <td id="LC11343" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">thrust a pike as he passed out. Being besought to go to him and dress</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11344" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11344"></td>
        <td id="LC11344" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the wound, the Doctor had passed out at the same gate, and had found him</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11345" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11345"></td>
        <td id="LC11345" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">in the arms of a company of Samaritans, who were seated on the bodies</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11346" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11346"></td>
        <td id="LC11346" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">of their victims. With an inconsistency as monstrous as anything in this</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11347" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11347"></td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L11348" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11348"></td>
        <td id="LC11348" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">with the gentlest solicitude--had made a litter for him and escorted him</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L11349" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11349"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11350" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11350"></td>
        <td id="LC11350" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">anew into a butchery so dreadful, that the Doctor had covered his eyes</td>

      <tr>

      <tr>
        <td id="L11352" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11352"></td>
        <td id="LC11352" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11353" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11353"></td>
        <td id="LC11353" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">As Mr. Lorry received these confidences, and as he watched the face of</td>

        <td id="L11354" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11354"></td>
        <td id="LC11354" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">his friend now sixty-two years of age, a misgiving arose within him that</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11355" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11355"></td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L11356" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11356"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11357" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11357"></td>
        <td id="LC11357" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">But, he had never seen his friend in his present aspect: he had never</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11358" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11358"></td>
        <td id="LC11358" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">at all known him in his present character. For the first time the Doctor</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L11359" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11359"></td>

        <td id="L11361" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11361"></td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L11362" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11362"></td>
        <td id="LC11362" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“It all tended to a good end, my friend; it was not mere waste and ruin.</td>

        <td id="L11385" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11385"></td>

        <td id="L11402" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11402"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11403" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11403"></td>
        <td id="LC11403" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">But, though the Doctor tried hard, and never ceased trying, to get</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L11404" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11404"></td>
        <td id="LC11404" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Charles Darnay set at liberty, or at least to get him brought to trial,</td>

        <td id="LC11405" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the public current of the time set too strong and fast for him. The new</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L11406" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11406"></td>
        <td id="LC11406" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">era began; the king was tried, doomed, and beheaded; the Republic of</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L11407" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11407"></td>
        <td id="LC11407" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Liberty, Equality, Fraternity, or Death, declared for victory or death</td>

      <tr>

      <tr>
        <td id="L11417" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11417"></td>
        <td id="LC11417" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">What private solicitude could rear itself against the deluge of the Year</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11418" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11418"></td>
        <td id="LC11418" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">One of Liberty--the deluge rising from below, not falling from above,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11419" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11419"></td>

        <td id="L11420" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11420"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11421" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11421"></td>
        <td id="LC11421" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">There was no pause, no pity, no peace, no interval of relenting rest, no</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11422" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11422"></td>
        <td id="LC11422" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">measurement of time. Though days and nights circled as regularly as when</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11423" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11423"></td>
        <td id="LC11423" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">time was young, and the evening and morning were the first day, other</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11424" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11424"></td>
        <td id="LC11424" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">count of time there was none. Hold of it was lost in the raging fever</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11425" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11425"></td>
        <td id="LC11425" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">of a nation, as it is in the fever of one patient. Now, breaking the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11426" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11426"></td>
        <td id="LC11426" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">unnatural silence of a whole city, the executioner showed the people the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11427" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11427"></td>
        <td id="LC11427" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">head of the king--and now, it seemed almost in the same breath, the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11428" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11428"></td>
        <td id="LC11428" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">head of his fair wife which had had eight weary months of imprisoned</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11429" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11429"></td>
        <td id="LC11429" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">widowhood and misery, to turn it grey.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11430" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11430"></td>
        <td id="LC11430" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11431" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11431"></td>
        <td id="LC11431" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">And yet, observing the strange law of contradiction which obtains in</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11432" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11432"></td>

        <td id="L11523" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11523"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11524" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11524"></td>
        <td id="LC11524" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">thing; otherwise, she remained very pretty and comely. Sometimes, at</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11525" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11525"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11526" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11526"></td>
        <td id="LC11526" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">repressed all day, and would say that her sole reliance, under Heaven,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11527" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11527"></td>
        <td id="LC11527" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">was on him. He always resolutely answered: “Nothing can happen to him</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11528" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11528"></td>
        <td id="LC11528" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">without my knowledge, and I know that I can save him, Lucie.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11529" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11529"></td>
        <td id="LC11529" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11530" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11530"></td>
        <td id="LC11530" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">They had not made the round of their changed life many weeks, when her</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11531" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11531"></td>
        <td id="LC11531" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">father said to her, on coming home one evening:</td>

        <td id="L11534" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11534"></td>

        <td id="L11609" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11609"></td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L11610" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11610"></td>
        <td id="LC11610" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">In all weathers, in the snow and frost of winter, in the bitter winds of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11611" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11611"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11612" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11612"></td>
        <td id="LC11612" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">in the snow and frost of winter, Lucie passed two hours of every day at</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11613" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11613"></td>
        <td id="LC11613" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">this place; and every day on leaving it, she kissed the prison wall.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11614" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11614"></td>
        <td id="LC11614" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Her husband saw her (so she learned from her father) it might be once in</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11615" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11615"></td>
        <td id="LC11615" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">five or six times: it might be twice or thrice running: it might be, not</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11616" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11616"></td>
        <td id="LC11616" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">for a week or a fortnight together. It was enough that he could and did</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11617" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11617"></td>
        <td id="LC11617" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">see her when the chances served, and on that possibility she would have</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11618" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11618"></td>
        <td id="LC11618" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">waited out the day, seven days a week.</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L11619" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11619"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11620" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11620"></td>
        <td id="LC11620" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">These occupations brought her round to the December month, wherein her</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11621" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11621"></td>
        <td id="LC11621" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">father walked among the terrors with a steady head. On a lightly-snowing</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11622" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11622"></td>
        <td id="LC11622" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">afternoon she arrived at the usual corner. It was a day of some wild</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11623" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11623"></td>
        <td id="LC11623" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">rejoicing, and a festival. She had seen the houses, as she came along,</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L11624" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11624"></td>
        <td id="LC11624" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">decorated with little pikes, and with little red caps stuck upon them;</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L11625" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11625"></td>

        <td id="L11626" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11626"></td>
        <td id="LC11626" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">(tricoloured letters were the favourite), Republic One and Indivisible.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11627" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11627"></td>
        <td id="LC11627" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Liberty, Equality, Fraternity, or Death!</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11628" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11628"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11629" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11629"></td>
        <td id="LC11629" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">The miserable shop of the wood-sawyer was so small, that its whole</td>

        <td id="L11642" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11642"></td>
        <td id="LC11642" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">The Vengeance. There could not be fewer than five hundred people, and</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L11643" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11643"></td>

      </tr>

        <td id="L11646" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11646"></td>
        <td id="LC11646" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Men and women danced together, women danced together, men danced</td>

        <td id="L11665" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11665"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11704" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11704"></td>
        <td id="LC11704" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“There is no time to lose. I am well prepared, but there are precautions</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11705" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11705"></td>
        <td id="LC11705" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">to be taken, that could not be taken until he was actually summoned</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11706" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11706"></td>
        <td id="LC11706" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">before the Tribunal. He has not received the notice yet, but I know</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11707" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11707"></td>
        <td id="LC11707" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">that he will presently be summoned for to-morrow, and removed to the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11708" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11708"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11791" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11791"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11792" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11792"></td>
        <td id="LC11792" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">The passage to the Conciergerie was short and dark; the night in its</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11793" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11793"></td>
        <td id="LC11793" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">vermin-haunted cells was long and cold. Next day, fifteen prisoners were</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11794" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11794"></td>

      </tr>

        <td id="LC11795" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">were condemned, and the trials of the whole occupied an hour and a half.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11796" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11796"></td>
        <td id="LC11796" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11797" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11797"></td>
        <td id="LC11797" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Charles Evremonde, called Darnay,” was at length arraigned.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11798" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11798"></td>
        <td id="LC11798" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11799" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11799"></td>
        <td id="LC11799" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">His judges sat upon the Bench in feathered hats; but the rough red cap</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11800" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11800"></td>
        <td id="LC11800" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and tricoloured cockade was the head-dress otherwise prevailing. Looking</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11801" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11801"></td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L11895" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11895"></td>
        <td id="LC11895" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">that the citizen was his first witness. He also referred with confidence</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11896" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11896"></td>
        <td id="LC11896" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">to the citizen&#39;s letter, which had been taken from him at the Barrier,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11897" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11897"></td>
        <td id="LC11897" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">but which he did not doubt would be found among the papers then before</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11898" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11898"></td>
        <td id="LC11898" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the President.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11899" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11899"></td>
        <td id="LC11899" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11900" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11900"></td>
        <td id="LC11900" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">The Doctor had taken care that it should be there--had assured him that</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11901" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11901"></td>
        <td id="LC11901" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">it would be there--and at this stage of the proceedings it was produced</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11902" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11902"></td>
        <td id="LC11902" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and read. Citizen Gabelle was called to confirm it, and did so. Citizen</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11903" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11903"></td>
        <td id="LC11903" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Gabelle hinted, with infinite delicacy and politeness, that in the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11904" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11904"></td>
        <td id="LC11904" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">pressure of business imposed on the Tribunal by the multitude of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11905" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11905"></td>
        <td id="LC11905" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">enemies of the Republic with which it had to deal, he had been slightly</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11906" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11906"></td>
        <td id="LC11906" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">overlooked in his prison of the Abbaye--in fact, had rather passed out</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11907" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11907"></td>
        <td id="LC11907" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">of the Tribunal&#39;s patriotic remembrance--until three days ago; when he</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11908" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11908"></td>
        <td id="LC11908" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">had been summoned before it, and had been set at liberty on the Jury&#39;s</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11909" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11909"></td>
        <td id="LC11909" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">declaring themselves satisfied that the accusation against him was</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11910" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11910"></td>
        <td id="LC11910" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">answered, as to himself, by the surrender of the citizen Evremonde,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11911" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11911"></td>
        <td id="LC11911" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">called Darnay.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11912" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11912"></td>
        <td id="LC11912" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11913" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11913"></td>
        <td id="LC11913" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Doctor Manette was next questioned. His high personal popularity,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11914" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11914"></td>
        <td id="LC11914" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and the clearness of his answers, made a great impression; but, as he</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11915" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11915"></td>
        <td id="LC11915" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">proceeded, as he showed that the Accused was his first friend on his</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11916" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11916"></td>
        <td id="LC11916" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">release from his long imprisonment; that, the accused had remained in</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11917" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11917"></td>
        <td id="LC11917" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">England, always faithful and devoted to his daughter and himself in</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11918" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11918"></td>
        <td id="LC11918" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">their exile; that, so far from being in favour with the Aristocrat</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11919" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11919"></td>
        <td id="LC11919" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">government there, he had actually been tried for his life by it, as</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11920" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11920"></td>
        <td id="LC11920" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the foe of England and friend of the United States--as he brought these</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11921" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11921"></td>
        <td id="LC11921" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">circumstances into view, with the greatest discretion and with the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11922" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11922"></td>
        <td id="LC11922" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">straightforward force of truth and earnestness, the Jury and the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11923" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11923"></td>
        <td id="LC11923" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">populace became one. At last, when he appealed by name to Monsieur</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11924" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11924"></td>
        <td id="LC11924" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Lorry, an English gentleman then and there present, who, like himself,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11925" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11925"></td>
        <td id="LC11925" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">had been a witness on that English trial and could corroborate his</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11926" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11926"></td>
        <td id="LC11926" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">account of it, the Jury declared that they had heard enough, and that</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11927" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11927"></td>
        <td id="LC11927" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">they were ready with their votes if the President were content to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11928" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11928"></td>
        <td id="LC11928" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">receive them.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11929" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11929"></td>
        <td id="LC11929" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11930" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11930"></td>
        <td id="LC11930" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">At every vote (the Jurymen voted aloud and individually), the populace</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11931" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11931"></td>
        <td id="LC11931" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">set up a shout of applause. All the voices were in the prisoner&#39;s</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11932" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11932"></td>
        <td id="LC11932" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">favour, and the President declared him free.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11933" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11933"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11934" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11934"></td>
        <td id="LC11934" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Then, began one of those extraordinary scenes with which the populace</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11935" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11935"></td>
        <td id="LC11935" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">sometimes gratified their fickleness, or their better impulses towards</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11936" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11936"></td>
        <td id="LC11936" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">generosity and mercy, or which they regarded as some set-off against</td>

        <td id="L11937" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11937"></td>
        <td id="LC11937" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">their swollen account of cruel rage. No man can decide now to which of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11938" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11938"></td>
        <td id="LC11938" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">these motives such extraordinary scenes were referable; it is probable,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11939" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11939"></td>
        <td id="LC11939" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">to a blending of all the three, with the second predominating. No sooner</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11940" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11940"></td>
        <td id="LC11940" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">was the acquittal pronounced, than tears were shed as freely as blood</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11941" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11941"></td>
        <td id="LC11941" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">at another time, and such fraternal embraces were bestowed upon the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11942" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11942"></td>
        <td id="LC11942" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">prisoner by as many of both sexes as could rush at him, that after</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11943" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11943"></td>
        <td id="LC11943" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">his long and unwholesome confinement he was in danger of fainting from</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11944" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11944"></td>
        <td id="LC11944" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">exhaustion; none the less because he knew very well, that the very same</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11945" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11945"></td>
        <td id="LC11945" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">people, carried by another current, would have rushed at him with</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11946" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11946"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11947" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11947"></td>
        <td id="LC11947" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">streets.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11948" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11948"></td>
        <td id="LC11948" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11949" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11949"></td>
        <td id="LC11949" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">His removal, to make way for other accused persons who were to be tried,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11950" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11950"></td>
        <td id="LC11950" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">rescued him from these caresses for the moment. Five were to be tried</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11951" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11951"></td>
        <td id="LC11951" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">together, next, as enemies of the Republic, forasmuch as they had not</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11952" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11952"></td>
        <td id="LC11952" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">assisted it by word or deed. So quick was the Tribunal to compensate</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11953" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11953"></td>
        <td id="LC11953" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">itself and the nation for a chance lost, that these five came down to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11954" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11954"></td>
        <td id="LC11954" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">him before he left the place, condemned to die within twenty-four</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11955" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11955"></td>
        <td id="LC11955" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">hours. The first of them told him so, with the customary prison sign</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11956" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11956"></td>
        <td id="LC11956" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">of Death--a raised finger--and they all added in words, “Long live the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11957" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11957"></td>
        <td id="LC11957" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Republic!”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11958" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11958"></td>
        <td id="LC11958" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11959" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11959"></td>
        <td id="LC11959" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">The five had had, it is true, no audience to lengthen their proceedings,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11960" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11960"></td>
        <td id="LC11960" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">for when he and Doctor Manette emerged from the gate, there was a great</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11961" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11961"></td>
        <td id="LC11961" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">crowd about it, in which there seemed to be every face he had seen in</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11962" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11962"></td>
        <td id="LC11962" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Court--except two, for which he looked in vain. On his coming out, the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11963" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11963"></td>
        <td id="LC11963" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">concourse made at him anew, weeping, embracing, and shouting, all by</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11964" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11964"></td>
        <td id="LC11964" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">turns and all together, until the very tide of the river on the bank of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11965" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11965"></td>
        <td id="LC11965" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">which the mad scene was acted, seemed to run mad, like the people on the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11966" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11966"></td>
        <td id="LC11966" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">shore.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11967" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11967"></td>
        <td id="LC11967" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11968" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11968"></td>
        <td id="LC11968" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">They put him into a great chair they had among them, and which they had</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11969" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11969"></td>
        <td id="LC11969" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">taken either out of the Court itself, or one of its rooms or passages.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11970" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11970"></td>
        <td id="LC11970" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Over the chair they had thrown a red flag, and to the back of it they</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11971" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11971"></td>
        <td id="LC11971" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">had bound a pike with a red cap on its top. In this car of triumph, not</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11972" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11972"></td>
        <td id="LC11972" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">even the Doctor&#39;s entreaties could prevent his being carried to his home</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11973" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11973"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11974" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11974"></td>
        <td id="LC11974" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and casting up to sight from the stormy deep such wrecks of faces, that</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11975" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11975"></td>
        <td id="LC11975" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">he more than once misdoubted his mind being in confusion, and that he</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11976" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11976"></td>
        <td id="LC11976" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">was in the tumbril on his way to the Guillotine.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11977" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11977"></td>
        <td id="LC11977" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11978" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11978"></td>
        <td id="LC11978" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">In wild dreamlike procession, embracing whom they met and pointing</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11979" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11979"></td>
        <td id="LC11979" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">him out, they carried him on. Reddening the snowy streets with the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11980" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11980"></td>
        <td id="LC11980" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">prevailing Republican colour, in winding and tramping through them, as</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11981" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11981"></td>
        <td id="LC11981" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">they had reddened them below the snow with a deeper dye, they carried</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11982" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11982"></td>
        <td id="LC11982" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">him thus into the courtyard of the building where he lived. Her father</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11983" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11983"></td>
        <td id="LC11983" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">had gone on before, to prepare her, and when her husband stood upon his</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11984" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11984"></td>
        <td id="LC11984" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">feet, she dropped insensible in his arms.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11985" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11985"></td>
        <td id="LC11985" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L11986" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11986"></td>
        <td id="LC11986" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">As he held her to his heart and turned her beautiful head between his</td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12079" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12079"></td>
        <td id="LC12079" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">lighted, they fared forth on this duty, and made and brought home</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12080" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12080"></td>
        <td id="LC12080" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">such purchases as were needful. Although Miss Pross, through her long</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12081" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12081"></td>
        <td id="LC12081" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">association with a French family, might have known as much of their</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12082" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12082"></td>
        <td id="LC12082" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">language as of her own, if she had had a mind, she had no mind in that</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12083" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12083"></td>
        <td id="LC12083" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">direction; consequently she knew no more of that “nonsense” (as she was</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12084" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12084"></td>
        <td id="LC12084" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">pleased to call it) than Mr. Cruncher did. So her manner of marketing</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12085" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12085"></td>
        <td id="LC12085" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">was to plump a noun-substantive at the head of a shopkeeper without any</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12086" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12086"></td>
        <td id="LC12086" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">introduction in the nature of an article, and, if it happened not to be</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12087" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12087"></td>
        <td id="LC12087" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the name of the thing she wanted, to look round for that thing, lay hold</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12088" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12088"></td>
        <td id="LC12088" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">of it, and hold on by it until the bargain was concluded. She always</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12089" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12089"></td>
        <td id="LC12089" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">made a bargain for it, by holding up, as a statement of its just price,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12090" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12090"></td>
        <td id="LC12090" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">one finger less than the merchant held up, whatever his number might be.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12091" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12091"></td>
        <td id="LC12091" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12092" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12092"></td>
        <td id="LC12092" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Now, Mr. Cruncher,” said Miss Pross, whose eyes were red with felicity;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12093" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12093"></td>
        <td id="LC12093" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“if you are ready, I am.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12094" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12094"></td>
        <td id="LC12094" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12095" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12095"></td>
        <td id="LC12095" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Jerry hoarsely professed himself at Miss Pross&#39;s service. He had worn</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12096" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12096"></td>
        <td id="LC12096" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">all his rust off long ago, but nothing would file his spiky head down.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12097" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12097"></td>
        <td id="LC12097" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12098" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12098"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12099" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12099"></td>
        <td id="LC12099" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">have a precious time of it. We want wine, among the rest. Nice toasts</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12100" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12100"></td>
        <td id="LC12100" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">these Redheads will be drinking, wherever we buy it.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12101" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12101"></td>
        <td id="LC12101" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L12102" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12102"></td>

      </tr>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12104" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12104"></td>

      </tr>

        <td id="L12109" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12109"></td>

        <td id="LC12122" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">May I ask a question, Doctor Manette, before I go?”</td>

      </tr>

        <td id="L12132" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12132"></td>
        <td id="LC12132" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">short and the long of it is, that I am a subject of His Most Gracious</td>

        <td id="L12137" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12137"></td>
        <td id="LC12137" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Mr. Cruncher, in an access of loyalty, growlingly repeated the words</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12138" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12138"></td>
        <td id="LC12138" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">after Miss Pross, like somebody at church.</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L12148" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12148"></td>

      <tr>

      <tr>
        <td id="L12150" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12150"></td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L12155" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12155"></td>
        <td id="LC12155" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">They went out, leaving Lucie, and her husband, her father, and the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12156" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12156"></td>
        <td id="LC12156" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">child, by a bright fire. Mr. Lorry was expected back presently from the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12157" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12157"></td>
        <td id="LC12157" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Banking House. Miss Pross had lighted the lamp, but had put it aside in</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12158" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12158"></td>
        <td id="LC12158" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">a corner, that they might enjoy the fire-light undisturbed. Little Lucie</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12159" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12159"></td>
        <td id="LC12159" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">sat by her grandfather with her hands clasped through his arm: and he,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12160" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12160"></td>
        <td id="LC12160" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">in a tone not rising much above a whisper, began to tell her a story of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12161" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12161"></td>
        <td id="LC12161" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">a great and powerful Fairy who had opened a prison-wall and let out</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12162" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12162"></td>
        <td id="LC12162" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">a captive who had once done the Fairy a service. All was subdued and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12163" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12163"></td>
        <td id="LC12163" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">quiet, and Lucie was more at ease than she had been.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12164" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12164"></td>
        <td id="LC12164" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12165" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12165"></td>
        <td id="LC12165" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“What is that?” she cried, all at once.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12166" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12166"></td>
        <td id="LC12166" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12167" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12167"></td>
        <td id="LC12167" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“My dear!” said her father, stopping in his story, and laying his hand</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12168" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12168"></td>
        <td id="LC12168" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">on hers, “command yourself. What a disordered state you are in! The</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12169" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12169"></td>
        <td id="LC12169" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">least thing--nothing--startles you! _You_, your father&#39;s daughter!”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12170" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12170"></td>
        <td id="LC12170" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12171" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12171"></td>
        <td id="LC12171" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“I thought, my father,” said Lucie, excusing herself, with a pale face</td>

        <td id="L12258" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12258"></td>
        <td id="LC12258" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">VIII. A Hand at Cards</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12259" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12259"></td>
        <td id="LC12259" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12260" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12260"></td>
        <td id="LC12260" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12261" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12261"></td>
        <td id="LC12261" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Happily unconscious of the new calamity at home, Miss Pross threaded her</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12262" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12262"></td>
        <td id="LC12262" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">way along the narrow streets and crossed the river by the bridge of the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12263" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12263"></td>
        <td id="LC12263" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Pont-Neuf, reckoning in her mind the number of indispensable purchases</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12264" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12264"></td>
        <td id="LC12264" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">she had to make. Mr. Cruncher, with the basket, walked at her side. They</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12265" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12265"></td>
        <td id="LC12265" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">both looked to the right and to the left into most of the shops they</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12266" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12266"></td>
        <td id="LC12266" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">passed, had a wary eye for all gregarious assemblages of people, and</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="LC12449" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“What purpose?” the spy asked.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12450" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12450"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12451" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12451"></td>
        <td id="LC12451" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“It would be troublesome, and might be dangerous, to explain in the</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L12633" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12633"></td>

      </tr>

      </tr>

        <td id="L12635" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12635"></td>
        <td id="LC12635" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the holder in growing rather livid as he turned them over.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12636" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12636"></td>
        <td id="LC12636" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12637" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12637"></td>

        <td id="LC12729" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“I did.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12730" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12730"></td>

        <td id="L12731" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12731"></td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L12732" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12732"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>

        <td id="L12767" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12767"></td>

        <td id="LC12768" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">card--a certain Guillotine card! Do you play?”</td>

        <td id="L12769" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12769"></td>

      <tr>

      </tr>

        <td id="L12771" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12771"></td>

        <td id="LC12808" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Sydney Carton filled another glass with brandy, poured it slowly out</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="LC12814" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">into the dark room here, and let us have one final word alone.”</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L12819" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12819"></td>
        <td id="LC12819" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">IX. The Game Made</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12820" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12820"></td>
        <td id="LC12820" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12821" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12821"></td>
        <td id="LC12821" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12822" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12822"></td>
        <td id="LC12822" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">While Sydney Carton and the Sheep of the prisons were in the adjoining</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
