      <tr>
        <td id="L12911" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12911"></td>
        <td id="LC12911" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">returned from the dark room. “Adieu, Mr. Barsad,” said the former; “our</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12912" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12912"></td>
        <td id="LC12912" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">arrangement thus made, you have nothing to fear from me.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12913" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12913"></td>
        <td id="LC12913" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12914" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12914"></td>
        <td id="LC12914" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">He sat down in a chair on the hearth, over against Mr. Lorry. When they</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12915" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12915"></td>
        <td id="LC12915" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">were alone, Mr. Lorry asked him what he had done?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12916" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12916"></td>
        <td id="LC12916" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12917" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12917"></td>
        <td id="LC12917" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Not much. If it should go ill with the prisoner, I have ensured access</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12918" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12918"></td>
        <td id="LC12918" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">to him, once.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12919" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12919"></td>
        <td id="LC12919" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12920" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12920"></td>
        <td id="LC12920" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Mr. Lorry&#39;s countenance fell.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12921" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12921"></td>
        <td id="LC12921" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12922" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12922"></td>
        <td id="LC12922" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“It is all I could do,” said Carton. “To propose too much, would be</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12923" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12923"></td>
        <td id="LC12923" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">to put this man&#39;s head under the axe, and, as he himself said, nothing</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12924" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12924"></td>
        <td id="LC12924" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">worse could happen to him if he were denounced. It was obviously the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12925" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12925"></td>
        <td id="LC12925" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">weakness of the position. There is no help for it.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12926" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12926"></td>
        <td id="LC12926" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12927" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12927"></td>
        <td id="LC12927" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“But access to him,” said Mr. Lorry, “if it should go ill before the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12928" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12928"></td>
        <td id="LC12928" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Tribunal, will not save him.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12929" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12929"></td>
        <td id="LC12929" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12930" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12930"></td>
        <td id="LC12930" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“I never said it would.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12931" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12931"></td>
        <td id="LC12931" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12932" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12932"></td>
        <td id="LC12932" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Mr. Lorry&#39;s eyes gradually sought the fire; his sympathy with his</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12933" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12933"></td>
        <td id="LC12933" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">darling, and the heavy disappointment of his second arrest, gradually</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12934" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12934"></td>
        <td id="LC12934" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">weakened them; he was an old man now, overborne with anxiety of late,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12935" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12935"></td>
        <td id="LC12935" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and his tears fell.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12936" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12936"></td>
        <td id="LC12936" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12937" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12937"></td>
        <td id="LC12937" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“You are a good man and a true friend,” said Carton, in an altered</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12938" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12938"></td>
        <td id="LC12938" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">voice. “Forgive me if I notice that you are affected. I could not see my</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L12939" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12939"></td>
        <td id="LC12939" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">father weep, and sit by, careless. And I could not respect your</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12940" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12940"></td>
        <td id="LC12940" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">sorrow more, if you were my father. You are free from that misfortune,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12941" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12941"></td>
        <td id="LC12941" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">however.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12942" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12942"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12943" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12943"></td>
        <td id="LC12943" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Though he said the last words, with a slip into his usual manner, there</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12944" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12944"></td>
        <td id="LC12944" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">was a true feeling and respect both in his tone and in his touch,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12945" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12945"></td>
        <td id="LC12945" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">that Mr. Lorry, who had never seen the better side of him, was wholly</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12946" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12946"></td>
        <td id="LC12946" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">unprepared for. He gave him his hand, and Carton gently pressed it.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12947" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12947"></td>
        <td id="LC12947" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12948" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12948"></td>
        <td id="LC12948" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“To return to poor Darnay,” said Carton. “Don&#39;t tell Her of this</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12949" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12949"></td>
        <td id="LC12949" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">interview, or this arrangement. It would not enable Her to go to see</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12950" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12950"></td>
        <td id="LC12950" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">him. She might think it was contrived, in case of the worse, to convey</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12951" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12951"></td>
        <td id="LC12951" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">to him the means of anticipating the sentence.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12952" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12952"></td>
        <td id="LC12952" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12953" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12953"></td>
        <td id="LC12953" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Mr. Lorry had not thought of that, and he looked quickly at Carton to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12954" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12954"></td>
        <td id="LC12954" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">see if it were in his mind. It seemed to be; he returned the look, and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12955" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12955"></td>
        <td id="LC12955" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">evidently understood it.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12956" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12956"></td>
        <td id="LC12956" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12957" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12957"></td>
        <td id="LC12957" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“She might think a thousand things,” Carton said, “and any of them would</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12958" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12958"></td>
        <td id="LC12958" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">only add to her trouble. Don&#39;t speak of me to her. As I said to you when</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12959" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12959"></td>
        <td id="LC12959" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">I first came, I had better not see her. I can put my hand out, to do any</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12960" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12960"></td>
        <td id="LC12960" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">little helpful work for her that my hand can find to do, without that.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12961" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12961"></td>
        <td id="LC12961" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">You are going to her, I hope? She must be very desolate to-night.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12962" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12962"></td>
        <td id="LC12962" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12963" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12963"></td>
        <td id="LC12963" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“I am going now, directly.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12964" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12964"></td>
        <td id="LC12964" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12965" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12965"></td>
        <td id="LC12965" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“I am glad of that. She has such a strong attachment to you and reliance</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12966" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12966"></td>
        <td id="LC12966" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">on you. How does she look?”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12967" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12967"></td>
        <td id="LC12967" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12968" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12968"></td>
        <td id="LC12968" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Anxious and unhappy, but very beautiful.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12969" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12969"></td>
        <td id="LC12969" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12970" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12970"></td>
        <td id="LC12970" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Ah!”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12971" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12971"></td>
        <td id="LC12971" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12972" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12972"></td>
        <td id="LC12972" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">It was a long, grieving sound, like a sigh--almost like a sob. It</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12973" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12973"></td>
        <td id="LC12973" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">attracted Mr. Lorry&#39;s eyes to Carton&#39;s face, which was turned to the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12974" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12974"></td>
        <td id="LC12974" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">fire. A light, or a shade (the old gentleman could not have said which),</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12975" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12975"></td>
        <td id="LC12975" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">passed from it as swiftly as a change will sweep over a hill-side on a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12976" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12976"></td>
        <td id="LC12976" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">wild bright day, and he lifted his foot to put back one of the little</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12977" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12977"></td>
        <td id="LC12977" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">flaming logs, which was tumbling forward. He wore the white riding-coat</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12978" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12978"></td>
        <td id="LC12978" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and top-boots, then in vogue, and the light of the fire touching their</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12979" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12979"></td>
        <td id="LC12979" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">light surfaces made him look very pale, with his long brown hair,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12980" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12980"></td>
        <td id="LC12980" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">all untrimmed, hanging loose about him. His indifference to fire was</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12981" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12981"></td>
        <td id="LC12981" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">sufficiently remarkable to elicit a word of remonstrance from Mr. Lorry;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12982" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12982"></td>
        <td id="LC12982" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">his boot was still upon the hot embers of the flaming log, when it had</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12983" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12983"></td>
        <td id="LC12983" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">broken under the weight of his foot.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12984" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12984"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12985" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12985"></td>
        <td id="LC12985" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“I forgot it,” he said.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12986" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12986"></td>
        <td id="LC12986" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12987" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12987"></td>
        <td id="LC12987" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Mr. Lorry&#39;s eyes were again attracted to his face. Taking note of the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12988" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12988"></td>
        <td id="LC12988" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">wasted air which clouded the naturally handsome features, and having</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12989" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12989"></td>
        <td id="LC12989" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the expression of prisoners&#39; faces fresh in his mind, he was strongly</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12990" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12990"></td>
        <td id="LC12990" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">reminded of that expression.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12991" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12991"></td>
        <td id="LC12991" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12992" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12992"></td>
        <td id="LC12992" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“And your duties here have drawn to an end, sir?” said Carton, turning</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12993" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12993"></td>
        <td id="LC12993" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">to him.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12994" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12994"></td>
        <td id="LC12994" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12995" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12995"></td>
        <td id="LC12995" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Yes. As I was telling you last night when Lucie came in so</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12996" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12996"></td>
        <td id="LC12996" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">unexpectedly, I have at length done all that I can do here. I hoped to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12997" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12997"></td>
        <td id="LC12997" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">have left them in perfect safety, and then to have quitted Paris. I have</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12998" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12998"></td>
        <td id="LC12998" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">my Leave to Pass. I was ready to go.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12999" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12999"></td>
        <td id="LC12999" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13000" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13000"></td>
        <td id="LC13000" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">They were both silent.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13001" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13001"></td>
        <td id="LC13001" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13002" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13002"></td>
        <td id="LC13002" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Yours is a long life to look back upon, sir?” said Carton, wistfully.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13003" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13003"></td>
        <td id="LC13003" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13004" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13004"></td>
        <td id="LC13004" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“I am in my seventy-eighth year.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13005" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13005"></td>
        <td id="LC13005" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13006" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13006"></td>
        <td id="LC13006" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“You have been useful all your life; steadily and constantly occupied;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13007" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13007"></td>
        <td id="LC13007" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">trusted, respected, and looked up to?”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13008" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13008"></td>
        <td id="LC13008" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13009" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13009"></td>
        <td id="LC13009" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“I have been a man of business, ever since I have been a man. Indeed, I</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13010" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13010"></td>
        <td id="LC13010" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">may say that I was a man of business when a boy.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13011" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13011"></td>
        <td id="LC13011" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13012" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13012"></td>
        <td id="LC13012" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“See what a place you fill at seventy-eight. How many people will miss</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13013" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13013"></td>
        <td id="LC13013" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">you when you leave it empty!”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13014" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13014"></td>
        <td id="LC13014" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13015" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13015"></td>
        <td id="LC13015" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“A solitary old bachelor,” answered Mr. Lorry, shaking his head. “There</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13016" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13016"></td>
        <td id="LC13016" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">is nobody to weep for me.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13017" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13017"></td>
        <td id="LC13017" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13018" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13018"></td>
        <td id="LC13018" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“How can you say that? Wouldn&#39;t She weep for you? Wouldn&#39;t her child?”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13019" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13019"></td>
        <td id="LC13019" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13020" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13020"></td>
        <td id="LC13020" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Yes, yes, thank God. I didn&#39;t quite mean what I said.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13021" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13021"></td>
        <td id="LC13021" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13022" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13022"></td>
        <td id="LC13022" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“It _is_ a thing to thank God for; is it not?”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13023" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13023"></td>
        <td id="LC13023" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13024" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13024"></td>
        <td id="LC13024" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Surely, surely.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13025" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13025"></td>
        <td id="LC13025" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13026" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13026"></td>
        <td id="LC13026" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“If you could say, with truth, to your own solitary heart, to-night,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13027" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13027"></td>
        <td id="LC13027" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&#39;I have secured to myself the love and attachment, the gratitude or</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13028" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13028"></td>
        <td id="LC13028" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">respect, of no human creature; I have won myself a tender place in no</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13029" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13029"></td>
        <td id="LC13029" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">regard; I have done nothing good or serviceable to be remembered by!&#39;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13030" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13030"></td>
        <td id="LC13030" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">your seventy-eight years would be seventy-eight heavy curses; would they</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13031" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13031"></td>
        <td id="LC13031" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">not?”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13032" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13032"></td>
        <td id="LC13032" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13033" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13033"></td>
        <td id="LC13033" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“You say truly, Mr. Carton; I think they would be.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13034" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13034"></td>
        <td id="LC13034" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13035" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13035"></td>
        <td id="LC13035" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Sydney turned his eyes again upon the fire, and, after a silence of a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13036" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13036"></td>
        <td id="LC13036" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">few moments, said:</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13037" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13037"></td>
        <td id="LC13037" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13038" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13038"></td>
        <td id="LC13038" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“I should like to ask you:--Does your childhood seem far off? Do the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13039" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13039"></td>
        <td id="LC13039" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">days when you sat at your mother&#39;s knee, seem days of very long ago?”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13040" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13040"></td>
        <td id="LC13040" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13041" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13041"></td>
        <td id="LC13041" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Responding to his softened manner, Mr. Lorry answered:</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13042" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13042"></td>
        <td id="LC13042" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13043" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13043"></td>
        <td id="LC13043" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Twenty years back, yes; at this time of my life, no. For, as I draw</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13044" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13044"></td>
        <td id="LC13044" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">closer and closer to the end, I travel in the circle, nearer and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13045" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13045"></td>
        <td id="LC13045" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">nearer to the beginning. It seems to be one of the kind smoothings and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13046" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13046"></td>
        <td id="LC13046" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">preparings of the way. My heart is touched now, by many remembrances</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13047" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13047"></td>
        <td id="LC13047" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">that had long fallen asleep, of my pretty young mother (and I so old!),</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13048" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13048"></td>
        <td id="LC13048" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and by many associations of the days when what we call the World was not</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13049" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13049"></td>
        <td id="LC13049" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">so real with me, and my faults were not confirmed in me.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13050" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13050"></td>
        <td id="LC13050" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13051" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13051"></td>
        <td id="LC13051" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“I understand the feeling!” exclaimed Carton, with a bright flush. “And</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13052" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13052"></td>
        <td id="LC13052" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">you are the better for it?”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13053" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13053"></td>
        <td id="LC13053" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13054" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13054"></td>
        <td id="LC13054" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“I hope so.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13055" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13055"></td>
        <td id="LC13055" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13056" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13056"></td>
        <td id="LC13056" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Carton terminated the conversation here, by rising to help him on with</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13057" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13057"></td>
        <td id="LC13057" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">his outer coat; “But you,” said Mr. Lorry, reverting to the theme, “you</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13058" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13058"></td>
        <td id="LC13058" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">are young.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13059" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13059"></td>
        <td id="LC13059" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13060" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13060"></td>
        <td id="LC13060" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Yes,” said Carton. “I am not old, but my young way was never the way to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13061" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13061"></td>
        <td id="LC13061" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">age. Enough of me.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13062" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13062"></td>
        <td id="LC13062" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13063" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13063"></td>
        <td id="LC13063" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“And of me, I am sure,” said Mr. Lorry. “Are you going out?”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13064" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13064"></td>
        <td id="LC13064" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13065" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13065"></td>
        <td id="LC13065" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“I&#39;ll walk with you to her gate. You know my vagabond and restless</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13066" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13066"></td>
        <td id="LC13066" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">habits. If I should prowl about the streets a long time, don&#39;t be</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13067" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13067"></td>
        <td id="LC13067" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">uneasy; I shall reappear in the morning. You go to the Court to-morrow?”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13068" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13068"></td>
        <td id="LC13068" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13069" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13069"></td>
        <td id="LC13069" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Yes, unhappily.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13070" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13070"></td>
        <td id="LC13070" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13071" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13071"></td>
        <td id="LC13071" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“I shall be there, but only as one of the crowd. My Spy will find a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13072" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13072"></td>
        <td id="LC13072" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">place for me. Take my arm, sir.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13073" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13073"></td>
        <td id="LC13073" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13074" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13074"></td>
        <td id="LC13074" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Mr. Lorry did so, and they went down-stairs and out in the streets. A</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13075" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13075"></td>
        <td id="LC13075" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">few minutes brought them to Mr. Lorry&#39;s destination. Carton left him</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13076" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13076"></td>
        <td id="LC13076" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">there; but lingered at a little distance, and turned back to the gate</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13077" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13077"></td>
        <td id="LC13077" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">again when it was shut, and touched it. He had heard of her going to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13078" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13078"></td>
        <td id="LC13078" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the prison every day. “She came out here,” he said, looking about him,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13079" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13079"></td>
        <td id="LC13079" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“turned this way, must have trod on these stones often. Let me follow in</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13080" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13080"></td>
        <td id="LC13080" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">her steps.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13081" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13081"></td>
        <td id="LC13081" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13082" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13082"></td>
        <td id="LC13082" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">It was ten o&#39;clock at night when he stood before the prison of La Force,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13083" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13083"></td>
        <td id="LC13083" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">where she had stood hundreds of times. A little wood-sawyer, having</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13084" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13084"></td>
        <td id="LC13084" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">closed his shop, was smoking his pipe at his shop-door.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13085" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13085"></td>
        <td id="LC13085" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13086" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13086"></td>
        <td id="LC13086" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Good night, citizen,” said Sydney Carton, pausing in going by; for, the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13087" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13087"></td>
        <td id="LC13087" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">man eyed him inquisitively.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13088" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13088"></td>
        <td id="LC13088" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13089" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13089"></td>
        <td id="LC13089" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Good night, citizen.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13090" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13090"></td>
        <td id="LC13090" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13091" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13091"></td>
        <td id="LC13091" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“How goes the Republic?”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13092" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13092"></td>
        <td id="LC13092" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13093" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13093"></td>
        <td id="LC13093" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“You mean the Guillotine. Not ill. Sixty-three to-day. We shall mount</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13094" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13094"></td>
        <td id="LC13094" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">to a hundred soon. Samson and his men complain sometimes, of being</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13095" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13095"></td>
        <td id="LC13095" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">exhausted. Ha, ha, ha! He is so droll, that Samson. Such a Barber!”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13096" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13096"></td>
        <td id="LC13096" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13097" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13097"></td>
        <td id="LC13097" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Do you often go to see him--”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13098" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13098"></td>
        <td id="LC13098" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13099" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13099"></td>

        <td id="LC13192" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13285" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13285"></td>
        <td id="LC13285" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Openly, President.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13286" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13286"></td>
        <td id="LC13286" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13287" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13287"></td>
        <td id="LC13287" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“By whom?”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13288" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13288"></td>
        <td id="LC13288" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13289" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13289"></td>
        <td id="LC13289" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Three voices. Ernest Defarge, wine-vendor of St. Antoine.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13290" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13290"></td>
        <td id="LC13290" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13291" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13291"></td>
        <td id="LC13291" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Good.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13292" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13292"></td>
        <td id="LC13292" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13293" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13293"></td>
        <td id="LC13293" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Therese Defarge, his wife.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13294" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13294"></td>
        <td id="LC13294" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13295" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13295"></td>
        <td id="LC13295" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Good.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13296" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13296"></td>
        <td id="LC13296" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13297" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13297"></td>
        <td id="LC13297" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Alexandre Manette, physician.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13298" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13298"></td>
        <td id="LC13298" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13299" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13299"></td>
        <td id="LC13299" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">A great uproar took place in the court, and in the midst of it, Doctor</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13300" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13300"></td>
        <td id="LC13300" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Manette was seen, pale and trembling, standing where he had been seated.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13301" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13301"></td>
        <td id="LC13301" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13302" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13302"></td>
        <td id="LC13302" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“President, I indignantly protest to you that this is a forgery and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13303" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13303"></td>
        <td id="LC13303" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">a fraud. You know the accused to be the husband of my daughter. My</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13304" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13304"></td>
        <td id="LC13304" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">daughter, and those dear to her, are far dearer to me than my life. Who</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13305" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13305"></td>
        <td id="LC13305" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and where is the false conspirator who says that I denounce the husband</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13306" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13306"></td>
        <td id="LC13306" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">of my child!”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13307" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13307"></td>
        <td id="LC13307" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13308" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13308"></td>
        <td id="LC13308" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Citizen Manette, be tranquil. To fail in submission to the authority of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13309" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13309"></td>
        <td id="LC13309" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the Tribunal would be to put yourself out of Law. As to what is dearer</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13310" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13310"></td>
        <td id="LC13310" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">to you than life, nothing can be so dear to a good citizen as the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13311" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13311"></td>
        <td id="LC13311" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Republic.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13312" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13312"></td>
        <td id="LC13312" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13313" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13313"></td>
        <td id="LC13313" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Loud acclamations hailed this rebuke. The President rang his bell, and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13314" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13314"></td>
        <td id="LC13314" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">with warmth resumed.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13315" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13315"></td>
        <td id="LC13315" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13316" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13316"></td>
        <td id="LC13316" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“If the Republic should demand of you the sacrifice of your child</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13317" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13317"></td>
        <td id="LC13317" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">herself, you would have no duty but to sacrifice her. Listen to what is</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13318" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13318"></td>
        <td id="LC13318" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">to follow. In the meanwhile, be silent!”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13319" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13319"></td>
        <td id="LC13319" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13320" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13320"></td>
        <td id="LC13320" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Frantic acclamations were again raised. Doctor Manette sat down, with</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13321" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13321"></td>
        <td id="LC13321" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">his eyes looking around, and his lips trembling; his daughter drew</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13322" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13322"></td>
        <td id="LC13322" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">closer to him. The craving man on the jury rubbed his hands together,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13323" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13323"></td>
        <td id="LC13323" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and restored the usual hand to his mouth.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13324" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13324"></td>
        <td id="LC13324" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13325" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13325"></td>
        <td id="LC13325" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Defarge was produced, when the court was quiet enough to admit of his</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13326" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13326"></td>
        <td id="LC13326" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">being heard, and rapidly expounded the story of the imprisonment, and of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13327" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13327"></td>
        <td id="LC13327" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">his having been a mere boy in the Doctor&#39;s service, and of the release,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13328" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13328"></td>
        <td id="LC13328" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and of the state of the prisoner when released and delivered to him.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13329" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13329"></td>
        <td id="LC13329" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">This short examination followed, for the court was quick with its work.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13330" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13330"></td>
        <td id="LC13330" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13331" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13331"></td>
        <td id="LC13331" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“You did good service at the taking of the Bastille, citizen?”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13332" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13332"></td>
        <td id="LC13332" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13333" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13333"></td>
        <td id="LC13333" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“I believe so.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13334" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13334"></td>
        <td id="LC13334" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13335" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13335"></td>
        <td id="LC13335" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Here, an excited woman screeched from the crowd: “You were one of the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13336" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13336"></td>
        <td id="LC13336" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">best patriots there. Why not say so? You were a cannonier that day</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13337" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13337"></td>
        <td id="LC13337" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">there, and you were among the first to enter the accursed fortress when</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13338" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13338"></td>
        <td id="LC13338" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">it fell. Patriots, I speak the truth!”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13339" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13339"></td>
        <td id="LC13339" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13340" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13340"></td>
        <td id="LC13340" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">It was The Vengeance who, amidst the warm commendations of the audience,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13341" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13341"></td>
        <td id="LC13341" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">thus assisted the proceedings. The President rang his bell; but, The</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13342" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13342"></td>
        <td id="LC13342" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Vengeance, warming with encouragement, shrieked, “I defy that bell!”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13343" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13343"></td>
        <td id="LC13343" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"> wherein she was likewise much commended.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13344" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13344"></td>
        <td id="LC13344" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13345" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13345"></td>
        <td id="LC13345" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Inform the Tribunal of what you did that day within the Bastille,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13346" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13346"></td>
        <td id="LC13346" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">citizen.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13347" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13347"></td>
        <td id="LC13347" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13348" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13348"></td>
        <td id="LC13348" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“I knew,” said Defarge, looking down at his wife, who stood at the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13349" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13349"></td>
        <td id="LC13349" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">bottom of the steps on which he was raised, looking steadily up at him;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13350" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13350"></td>
        <td id="LC13350" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“I knew that this prisoner, of whom I speak, had been confined in a cell</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13351" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13351"></td>
        <td id="LC13351" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">known as One Hundred and Five, North Tower. I knew it from himself. He</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13352" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13352"></td>
        <td id="LC13352" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">knew himself by no other name than One Hundred and Five, North Tower,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13353" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13353"></td>
        <td id="LC13353" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">when he made shoes under my care. As I serve my gun that day, I resolve,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13354" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13354"></td>
        <td id="LC13354" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">when the place shall fall, to examine that cell. It falls. I mount to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13355" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13355"></td>
        <td id="LC13355" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the cell, with a fellow-citizen who is one of the Jury, directed by a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13356" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13356"></td>
        <td id="LC13356" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">gaoler. I examine it, very closely. In a hole in the chimney, where a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13357" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13357"></td>
        <td id="LC13357" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">stone has been worked out and replaced, I find a written paper. This is</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13358" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13358"></td>
        <td id="LC13358" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">that written paper. I have made it my business to examine some specimens</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13359" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13359"></td>
        <td id="LC13359" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">of the writing of Doctor Manette. This is the writing of Doctor Manette.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13360" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13360"></td>
        <td id="LC13360" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">I confide this paper, in the writing of Doctor Manette, to the hands of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13361" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13361"></td>
        <td id="LC13361" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the President.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13362" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13362"></td>
        <td id="LC13362" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13363" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13363"></td>
        <td id="LC13363" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Let it be read.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13364" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13364"></td>
        <td id="LC13364" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13365" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13365"></td>
        <td id="LC13365" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">In a dead silence and stillness--the prisoner under trial looking</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13366" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13366"></td>
        <td id="LC13366" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">lovingly at his wife, his wife only looking from him to look with</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13367" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13367"></td>
        <td id="LC13367" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">solicitude at her father, Doctor Manette keeping his eyes fixed on the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13368" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13368"></td>
        <td id="LC13368" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">reader, Madame Defarge never taking hers from the prisoner, Defarge</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13369" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13369"></td>
        <td id="LC13369" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">never taking his from his feasting wife, and all the other eyes there</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13370" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13370"></td>
        <td id="LC13370" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">intent upon the Doctor, who saw none of them--the paper was read, as</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13371" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13371"></td>
        <td id="LC13371" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">follows.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13372" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13372"></td>
        <td id="LC13372" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13373" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13373"></td>
        <td id="LC13373" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13374" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13374"></td>
        <td id="LC13374" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13375" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13375"></td>
        <td id="LC13375" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13376" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13376"></td>
        <td id="LC13376" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">X. The Substance of the Shadow</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13377" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13377"></td>
        <td id="LC13377" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13378" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13378"></td>
        <td id="LC13378" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13379" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13379"></td>
        <td id="LC13379" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“I, Alexandre Manette, unfortunate physician, native of Beauvais, and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13380" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13380"></td>
        <td id="LC13380" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">afterwards resident in Paris, write this melancholy paper in my doleful</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13381" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13381"></td>
        <td id="LC13381" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">cell in the Bastille, during the last month of the year, 1767. I write</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13382" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13382"></td>
        <td id="LC13382" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">it at stolen intervals, under every difficulty. I design to secrete it</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13383" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13383"></td>
        <td id="LC13383" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">in the wall of the chimney, where I have slowly and laboriously made a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13384" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13384"></td>
        <td id="LC13384" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">place of concealment for it. Some pitying hand may find it there, when I</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13385" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13385"></td>
        <td id="LC13385" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and my sorrows are dust.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13386" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13386"></td>
        <td id="LC13386" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13387" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13387"></td>
        <td id="LC13387" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“These words are formed by the rusty iron point with which I write with</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13388" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13388"></td>
        <td id="LC13388" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">difficulty in scrapings of soot and charcoal from the chimney, mixed</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13389" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13389"></td>
        <td id="LC13389" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">with blood, in the last month of the tenth year of my captivity. Hope</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13390" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13390"></td>
        <td id="LC13390" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">has quite departed from my breast. I know from terrible warnings I have</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13391" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13391"></td>
        <td id="LC13391" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">noted in myself that my reason will not long remain unimpaired, but I</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13392" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13392"></td>
        <td id="LC13392" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">solemnly declare that I am at this time in the possession of my right</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13393" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13393"></td>
        <td id="LC13393" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">mind--that my memory is exact and circumstantial--and that I write the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13394" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13394"></td>
        <td id="LC13394" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">truth as I shall answer for these my last recorded words, whether they</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L13395" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13395"></td>
        <td id="LC13395" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">be ever read by men or not, at the Eternal Judgment-seat.</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L13396" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13396"></td>
        <td id="LC13396" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13397" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13397"></td>
        <td id="LC13397" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“One cloudy moonlight night, in the third week of December (I think the</td>

        <td id="LC13398" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">twenty-second of the month) in the year 1757, I was walking on a retired</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13399" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13399"></td>
        <td id="LC13399" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">part of the quay by the Seine for the refreshment of the frosty air,</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L13400" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13400"></td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L13401" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13401"></td>
        <td id="LC13401" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">School of Medicine, when a carriage came along behind me, driven very</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13402" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13402"></td>
        <td id="LC13402" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">fast. As I stood aside to let that carriage pass, apprehensive that it</td>

        <td id="L13403" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13403"></td>

        <td id="LC13422" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">physician, originally an expert surgeon, who within the last year or two</td>

        <td id="L13433" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13433"></td>
        <td id="LC13433" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“The manner of both was imperious, and they both moved, as these words</td>

        <td id="L13435" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13435"></td>
        <td id="LC13435" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">They were armed. I was not.</td>

        <td id="L13436" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13436"></td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L13441" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13441"></td>
        <td id="LC13441" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“The reply to this was made by him who had spoken second. &#39;Doctor,</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L13442" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13442"></td>
        <td id="LC13442" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">your clients are people of condition. As to the nature of the case,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13443" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13443"></td>
        <td id="LC13443" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">our confidence in your skill assures us that you will ascertain it for</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L13446" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13446"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13447" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13447"></td>
        <td id="LC13447" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“I could do nothing but comply, and I entered it in silence. They both</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13448" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13448"></td>
        <td id="LC13448" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">entered after me--the last springing in, after putting up the steps. The</td>

        <td id="L13449" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13449"></td>
        <td id="LC13449" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">carriage turned about, and drove on at its former speed.</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L13450" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13450"></td>
        <td id="LC13450" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13451" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13451"></td>
        <td id="LC13451" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“I repeat this conversation exactly as it occurred. I have no doubt that</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13452" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13452"></td>
        <td id="LC13452" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">it is, word for word, the same. I describe everything exactly as it took</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13453" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13453"></td>
        <td id="LC13453" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">place, constraining my mind not to wander from the task. Where I make</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13454" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13454"></td>
        <td id="LC13454" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the broken marks that follow here, I leave off for the time, and put my</td>
