      <tr>
        <td id="L13455" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13455"></td>
        <td id="LC13455" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">paper in its hiding-place.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13456" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13456"></td>
        <td id="LC13456" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13457" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13457"></td>
        <td id="LC13457" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">        *****</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13458" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13458"></td>
        <td id="LC13458" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13459" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13459"></td>
        <td id="LC13459" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“The carriage left the streets behind, passed the North Barrier, and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13460" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13460"></td>
        <td id="LC13460" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">emerged upon the country road. At two-thirds of a league from the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13461" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13461"></td>
        <td id="LC13461" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Barrier--I did not estimate the distance at that time, but afterwards</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13462" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13462"></td>
        <td id="LC13462" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">when I traversed it--it struck out of the main avenue, and presently</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13463" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13463"></td>
        <td id="LC13463" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">stopped at a solitary house, We all three alighted, and walked, by</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13464" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13464"></td>
        <td id="LC13464" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">a damp soft footpath in a garden where a neglected fountain had</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13465" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13465"></td>
        <td id="LC13465" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">overflowed, to the door of the house. It was not opened immediately, in</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13466" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13466"></td>
        <td id="LC13466" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">answer to the ringing of the bell, and one of my two conductors struck</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13467" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13467"></td>
        <td id="LC13467" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the man who opened it, with his heavy riding glove, across the face.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13468" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13468"></td>
        <td id="LC13468" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13469" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13469"></td>
        <td id="LC13469" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“There was nothing in this action to attract my particular attention,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13470" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13470"></td>
        <td id="LC13470" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">for I had seen common people struck more commonly than dogs. But, the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13471" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13471"></td>
        <td id="LC13471" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">other of the two, being angry likewise, struck the man in like manner</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13472" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13472"></td>
        <td id="LC13472" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">with his arm; the look and bearing of the brothers were then so exactly</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13473" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13473"></td>
        <td id="LC13473" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">alike, that I then first perceived them to be twin brothers.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13474" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13474"></td>
        <td id="LC13474" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13475" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13475"></td>
        <td id="LC13475" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“From the time of our alighting at the outer gate (which we found</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13476" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13476"></td>
        <td id="LC13476" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">locked, and which one of the brothers had opened to admit us, and had</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13477" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13477"></td>
        <td id="LC13477" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">relocked), I had heard cries proceeding from an upper chamber. I was</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13478" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13478"></td>
        <td id="LC13478" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">conducted to this chamber straight, the cries growing louder as we</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13479" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13479"></td>
        <td id="LC13479" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">ascended the stairs, and I found a patient in a high fever of the brain,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13480" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13480"></td>
        <td id="LC13480" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">lying on a bed.</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L13481" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13481"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13482" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13482"></td>
        <td id="LC13482" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“The patient was a woman of great beauty, and young; assuredly not much</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L13483" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13483"></td>

      </tr>

        <td id="L13484" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13484"></td>
        <td id="LC13484" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">her sides with sashes and handkerchiefs. I noticed that these bonds were</td>

        <td id="L13485" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13485"></td>

        <td id="L13489" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13489"></td>
        <td id="LC13489" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“I saw this, within the first minute of my contemplation of the patient;</td>

        <td id="L13536" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13536"></td>
        <td id="LC13536" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“I opened some of the bottles, smelt them, and put the stoppers to my</td>

        <td id="L13540" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13540"></td>

        <td id="L13541" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13541"></td>

      <tr>

        <td id="LC13542" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“&#39;You see, monsieur, I am going to use them,&#39; I replied, and said no</td>

        <td id="L13544" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13544"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13545" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13545"></td>
        <td id="LC13545" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“I made the patient swallow, with great difficulty, and after many</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13546" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13546"></td>
        <td id="LC13546" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">efforts, the dose that I desired to give. As I intended to repeat it</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13547" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13547"></td>
        <td id="LC13547" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">after a while, and as it was necessary to watch its influence, I then</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13548" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13548"></td>
        <td id="LC13548" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">sat down by the side of the bed. There was a timid and suppressed woman</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13549" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13549"></td>
        <td id="LC13549" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">in attendance (wife of the man down-stairs), who had retreated into</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13550" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13550"></td>
        <td id="LC13550" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">a corner. The house was damp and decayed, indifferently</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13551" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13551"></td>
        <td id="LC13551" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">furnished--evidently, recently occupied and temporarily used. Some thick</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13552" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13552"></td>
        <td id="LC13552" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">old hangings had been nailed up before the windows, to deaden the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13553" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13553"></td>
        <td id="LC13553" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">sound of the shrieks. They continued to be uttered in their regular</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13554" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13554"></td>
        <td id="LC13554" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">succession, with the cry, &#39;My husband, my father, and my brother!&#39; the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13555" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13555"></td>
        <td id="LC13555" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">counting up to twelve, and &#39;Hush!&#39; The frenzy was so violent, that I had</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13556" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13556"></td>
        <td id="LC13556" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">not unfastened the bandages restraining the arms; but, I had looked to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13557" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13557"></td>
        <td id="LC13557" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">them, to see that they were not painful. The only spark of encouragement</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13558" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13558"></td>
        <td id="LC13558" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">in the case, was, that my hand upon the sufferer&#39;s breast had this much</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13559" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13559"></td>
        <td id="LC13559" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">soothing influence, that for minutes at a time it tranquillised the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13560" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13560"></td>
        <td id="LC13560" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">figure. It had no effect upon the cries; no pendulum could be more</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13561" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13561"></td>
        <td id="LC13561" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">regular.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13562" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13562"></td>
        <td id="LC13562" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13563" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13563"></td>
        <td id="LC13563" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“For the reason that my hand had this effect (I assume), I had sat by</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13564" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13564"></td>
        <td id="LC13564" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the side of the bed for half an hour, with the two brothers looking on,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13565" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13565"></td>
        <td id="LC13565" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">before the elder said:</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13566" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13566"></td>
        <td id="LC13566" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13567" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13567"></td>
        <td id="LC13567" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“&#39;There is another patient.&#39;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13568" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13568"></td>
        <td id="LC13568" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13569" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13569"></td>
        <td id="LC13569" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“I was startled, and asked, &#39;Is it a pressing case?&#39;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13570" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13570"></td>
        <td id="LC13570" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13571" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13571"></td>
        <td id="LC13571" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“&#39;You had better see,&#39; he carelessly answered; and took up a light.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13572" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13572"></td>
        <td id="LC13572" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13573" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13573"></td>
        <td id="LC13573" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">        *****</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13574" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13574"></td>
        <td id="LC13574" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13575" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13575"></td>
        <td id="LC13575" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“The other patient lay in a back room across a second staircase, which</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13576" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13576"></td>
        <td id="LC13576" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">was a species of loft over a stable. There was a low plastered ceiling</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13577" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13577"></td>
        <td id="LC13577" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">to a part of it; the rest was open, to the ridge of the tiled roof, and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13578" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13578"></td>
        <td id="LC13578" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">there were beams across. Hay and straw were stored in that portion of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13579" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13579"></td>
        <td id="LC13579" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the place, fagots for firing, and a heap of apples in sand. I had to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13580" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13580"></td>
        <td id="LC13580" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">pass through that part, to get at the other. My memory is circumstantial</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13581" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13581"></td>
        <td id="LC13581" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and unshaken. I try it with these details, and I see them all, in</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13582" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13582"></td>
        <td id="LC13582" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">this my cell in the Bastille, near the close of the tenth year of my</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13583" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13583"></td>
        <td id="LC13583" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">captivity, as I saw them all that night.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13584" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13584"></td>
        <td id="LC13584" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13585" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13585"></td>
        <td id="LC13585" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“On some hay on the ground, with a cushion thrown under his head, lay a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13586" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13586"></td>
        <td id="LC13586" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">handsome peasant boy--a boy of not more than seventeen at the most.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13587" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13587"></td>
        <td id="LC13587" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">He lay on his back, with his teeth set, his right hand clenched on his</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13588" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13588"></td>
        <td id="LC13588" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">breast, and his glaring eyes looking straight upward. I could not see</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13589" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13589"></td>
        <td id="LC13589" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">where his wound was, as I kneeled on one knee over him; but, I could see</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13590" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13590"></td>
        <td id="LC13590" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">that he was dying of a wound from a sharp point.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13591" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13591"></td>
        <td id="LC13591" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13592" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13592"></td>
        <td id="LC13592" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“&#39;I am a doctor, my poor fellow,&#39; said I. &#39;Let me examine it.&#39;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13593" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13593"></td>
        <td id="LC13593" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13594" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13594"></td>
        <td id="LC13594" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“&#39;I do not want it examined,&#39; he answered; &#39;let it be.&#39;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13595" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13595"></td>
        <td id="LC13595" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13596" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13596"></td>
        <td id="LC13596" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“It was under his hand, and I soothed him to let me move his hand away.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13597" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13597"></td>
        <td id="LC13597" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">The wound was a sword-thrust, received from twenty to twenty-four hours</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13598" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13598"></td>
        <td id="LC13598" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">before, but no skill could have saved him if it had been looked to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13599" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13599"></td>
        <td id="LC13599" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">without delay. He was then dying fast. As I turned my eyes to the elder</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13600" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13600"></td>
        <td id="LC13600" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">brother, I saw him looking down at this handsome boy whose life was</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13601" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13601"></td>
        <td id="LC13601" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">ebbing out, as if he were a wounded bird, or hare, or rabbit; not at all</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13602" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13602"></td>
        <td id="LC13602" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">as if he were a fellow-creature.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13603" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13603"></td>
        <td id="LC13603" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13604" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13604"></td>
        <td id="LC13604" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“&#39;How has this been done, monsieur?&#39; said I.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13605" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13605"></td>
        <td id="LC13605" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13606" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13606"></td>
        <td id="LC13606" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“&#39;A crazed young common dog! A serf! Forced my brother to draw upon him,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13607" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13607"></td>
        <td id="LC13607" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and has fallen by my brother&#39;s sword--like a gentleman.&#39;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13608" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13608"></td>
        <td id="LC13608" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13609" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13609"></td>
        <td id="LC13609" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“There was no touch of pity, sorrow, or kindred humanity, in this</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13610" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13610"></td>
        <td id="LC13610" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">answer. The speaker seemed to acknowledge that it was inconvenient to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13611" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13611"></td>
        <td id="LC13611" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">have that different order of creature dying there, and that it would</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13612" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13612"></td>
        <td id="LC13612" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">have been better if he had died in the usual obscure routine of his</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13613" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13613"></td>
        <td id="LC13613" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">vermin kind. He was quite incapable of any compassionate feeling about</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13614" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13614"></td>
        <td id="LC13614" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the boy, or about his fate.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13615" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13615"></td>
        <td id="LC13615" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13616" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13616"></td>
        <td id="LC13616" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“The boy&#39;s eyes had slowly moved to him as he had spoken, and they now</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13617" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13617"></td>
        <td id="LC13617" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">slowly moved to me.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13618" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13618"></td>
        <td id="LC13618" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13619" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13619"></td>
        <td id="LC13619" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“&#39;Doctor, they are very proud, these Nobles; but we common dogs are</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13620" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13620"></td>
        <td id="LC13620" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">proud too, sometimes. They plunder us, outrage us, beat us, kill us; but</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13621" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13621"></td>
        <td id="LC13621" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">we have a little pride left, sometimes. She--have you seen her, Doctor?&#39;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13622" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13622"></td>
        <td id="LC13622" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13623" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13623"></td>
        <td id="LC13623" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“The shrieks and the cries were audible there, though subdued by the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13624" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13624"></td>
        <td id="LC13624" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">distance. He referred to them, as if she were lying in our presence.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13625" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13625"></td>
        <td id="LC13625" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13626" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13626"></td>
        <td id="LC13626" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“I said, &#39;I have seen her.&#39;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13627" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13627"></td>
        <td id="LC13627" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13628" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13628"></td>
        <td id="LC13628" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“&#39;She is my sister, Doctor. They have had their shameful rights, these</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13629" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13629"></td>
        <td id="LC13629" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Nobles, in the modesty and virtue of our sisters, many years, but we</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13630" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13630"></td>
        <td id="LC13630" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">have had good girls among us. I know it, and have heard my father say</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13631" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13631"></td>
        <td id="LC13631" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">so. She was a good girl. She was betrothed to a good young man, too: a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13632" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13632"></td>
        <td id="LC13632" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">tenant of his. We were all tenants of his--that man&#39;s who stands there.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13633" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13633"></td>
        <td id="LC13633" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">The other is his brother, the worst of a bad race.&#39;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13634" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13634"></td>
        <td id="LC13634" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13635" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13635"></td>
        <td id="LC13635" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“It was with the greatest difficulty that the boy gathered bodily force</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13636" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13636"></td>
        <td id="LC13636" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">to speak; but, his spirit spoke with a dreadful emphasis.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13637" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13637"></td>
        <td id="LC13637" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13638" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13638"></td>
        <td id="LC13638" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“&#39;We were so robbed by that man who stands there, as all we common dogs</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13639" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13639"></td>
        <td id="LC13639" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">are by those superior Beings--taxed by him without mercy, obliged to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13640" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13640"></td>
        <td id="LC13640" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">work for him without pay, obliged to grind our corn at his mill, obliged</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13641" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13641"></td>
        <td id="LC13641" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">to feed scores of his tame birds on our wretched crops, and forbidden</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13642" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13642"></td>
        <td id="LC13642" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">for our lives to keep a single tame bird of our own, pillaged and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13643" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13643"></td>
        <td id="LC13643" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">plundered to that degree that when we chanced to have a bit of meat, we</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13644" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13644"></td>
        <td id="LC13644" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">ate it in fear, with the door barred and the shutters closed, that his</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13645" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13645"></td>
        <td id="LC13645" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">people should not see it and take it from us--I say, we were so robbed,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13646" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13646"></td>
        <td id="LC13646" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and hunted, and were made so poor, that our father told us it was a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13647" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13647"></td>
        <td id="LC13647" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">dreadful thing to bring a child into the world, and that what we should</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13648" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13648"></td>
        <td id="LC13648" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">most pray for, was, that our women might be barren and our miserable</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13649" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13649"></td>
        <td id="LC13649" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">race die out!&#39;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13650" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13650"></td>
        <td id="LC13650" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13651" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13651"></td>
        <td id="LC13651" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“I had never before seen the sense of being oppressed, bursting forth</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13652" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13652"></td>
        <td id="LC13652" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">like a fire. I had supposed that it must be latent in the people</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13653" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13653"></td>
        <td id="LC13653" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">somewhere; but, I had never seen it break out, until I saw it in the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13654" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13654"></td>
        <td id="LC13654" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">dying boy.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13655" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13655"></td>
        <td id="LC13655" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13656" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13656"></td>
        <td id="LC13656" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“&#39;Nevertheless, Doctor, my sister married. He was ailing at that time,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13657" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13657"></td>
        <td id="LC13657" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">poor fellow, and she married her lover, that she might tend and comfort</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13658" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13658"></td>
        <td id="LC13658" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">him in our cottage--our dog-hut, as that man would call it. She had not</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13659" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13659"></td>
        <td id="LC13659" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">been married many weeks, when that man&#39;s brother saw her and admired</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13660" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13660"></td>
        <td id="LC13660" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">her, and asked that man to lend her to him--for what are husbands among</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13661" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13661"></td>
        <td id="LC13661" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">us! He was willing enough, but my sister was good and virtuous, and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13662" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13662"></td>
        <td id="LC13662" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">hated his brother with a hatred as strong as mine. What did the two</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13663" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13663"></td>
        <td id="LC13663" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">then, to persuade her husband to use his influence with her, to make her</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13664" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13664"></td>
        <td id="LC13664" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">willing?&#39;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13665" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13665"></td>
        <td id="LC13665" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13666" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13666"></td>
        <td id="LC13666" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“The boy&#39;s eyes, which had been fixed on mine, slowly turned to the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13667" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13667"></td>
        <td id="LC13667" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">looker-on, and I saw in the two faces that all he said was true. The two</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13668" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13668"></td>
        <td id="LC13668" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">opposing kinds of pride confronting one another, I can see, even in this</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13669" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13669"></td>
        <td id="LC13669" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Bastille; the gentleman&#39;s, all negligent indifference; the peasant&#39;s, all</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13670" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13670"></td>
        <td id="LC13670" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">trodden-down sentiment, and passionate revenge.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13671" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13671"></td>
        <td id="LC13671" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13672" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13672"></td>
        <td id="LC13672" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“&#39;You know, Doctor, that it is among the Rights of these Nobles to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13673" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13673"></td>
        <td id="LC13673" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">harness us common dogs to carts, and drive us. They so harnessed him and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13674" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13674"></td>
        <td id="LC13674" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">drove him. You know that it is among their Rights to keep us in their</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13675" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13675"></td>
        <td id="LC13675" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">grounds all night, quieting the frogs, in order that their noble sleep</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13676" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13676"></td>
        <td id="LC13676" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">may not be disturbed. They kept him out in the unwholesome mists at</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13677" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13677"></td>
        <td id="LC13677" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">night, and ordered him back into his harness in the day. But he was</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13678" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13678"></td>
        <td id="LC13678" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">not persuaded. No! Taken out of harness one day at noon, to feed--if he</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13679" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13679"></td>
        <td id="LC13679" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">could find food--he sobbed twelve times, once for every stroke of the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13680" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13680"></td>
        <td id="LC13680" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">bell, and died on her bosom.&#39;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13681" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13681"></td>
        <td id="LC13681" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13682" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13682"></td>
        <td id="LC13682" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Nothing human could have held life in the boy but his determination to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13683" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13683"></td>
        <td id="LC13683" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">tell all his wrong. He forced back the gathering shadows of death, as</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13684" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13684"></td>
        <td id="LC13684" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">he forced his clenched right hand to remain clenched, and to cover his</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13685" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13685"></td>
        <td id="LC13685" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">wound.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13686" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13686"></td>
        <td id="LC13686" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13687" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13687"></td>
        <td id="LC13687" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“&#39;Then, with that man&#39;s permission and even with his aid, his</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13688" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13688"></td>
        <td id="LC13688" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">brother took her away; in spite of what I know she must have told his</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13689" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13689"></td>
        <td id="LC13689" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">brother--and what that is, will not be long unknown to you, Doctor, if</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13690" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13690"></td>
        <td id="LC13690" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">it is now--his brother took her away--for his pleasure and diversion,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13691" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13691"></td>
        <td id="LC13691" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">for a little while. I saw her pass me on the road. When I took the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13692" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13692"></td>
        <td id="LC13692" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">tidings home, our father&#39;s heart burst; he never spoke one of the words</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13693" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13693"></td>
        <td id="LC13693" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">that filled it. I took my young sister (for I have another) to a place</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13694" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13694"></td>
        <td id="LC13694" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">beyond the reach of this man, and where, at least, she will never be</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13695" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13695"></td>
        <td id="LC13695" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">_his_ vassal. Then, I tracked the brother here, and last night climbed</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13696" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13696"></td>
        <td id="LC13696" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">in--a common dog, but sword in hand.--Where is the loft window? It was</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13697" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13697"></td>
        <td id="LC13697" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">somewhere here?&#39;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13698" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13698"></td>
        <td id="LC13698" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13699" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13699"></td>
        <td id="LC13699" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“The room was darkening to his sight; the world was narrowing around</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13700" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13700"></td>
        <td id="LC13700" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">him. I glanced about me, and saw that the hay and straw were trampled</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13701" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13701"></td>
        <td id="LC13701" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">over the floor, as if there had been a struggle.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13702" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13702"></td>
        <td id="LC13702" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13703" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13703"></td>
        <td id="LC13703" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“&#39;She heard me, and ran in. I told her not to come near us till he was</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13704" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13704"></td>
        <td id="LC13704" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">dead. He came in and first tossed me some pieces of money; then struck</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13705" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13705"></td>
        <td id="LC13705" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">at me with a whip. But I, though a common dog, so struck at him as to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13706" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13706"></td>
        <td id="LC13706" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">make him draw. Let him break into as many pieces as he will, the sword</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13707" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13707"></td>
        <td id="LC13707" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">that he stained with my common blood; he drew to defend himself--thrust</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13708" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13708"></td>
        <td id="LC13708" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">at me with all his skill for his life.&#39;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13709" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13709"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13710" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13710"></td>
        <td id="LC13710" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“My glance had fallen, but a few moments before, on the fragments of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13711" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13711"></td>
        <td id="LC13711" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">a broken sword, lying among the hay. That weapon was a gentleman&#39;s. In</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13712" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13712"></td>
        <td id="LC13712" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">another place, lay an old sword that seemed to have been a soldier&#39;s.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13713" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13713"></td>
        <td id="LC13713" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13714" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13714"></td>
        <td id="LC13714" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“&#39;Now, lift me up, Doctor; lift me up. Where is he?&#39;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13715" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13715"></td>
        <td id="LC13715" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13716" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13716"></td>
        <td id="LC13716" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“&#39;He is not here,&#39; I said, supporting the boy, and thinking that he</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13717" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13717"></td>
        <td id="LC13717" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">referred to the brother.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13718" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13718"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13719" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13719"></td>
        <td id="LC13719" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“&#39;He! Proud as these nobles are, he is afraid to see me. Where is the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13720" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13720"></td>
        <td id="LC13720" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">man who was here? Turn my face to him.&#39;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13721" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13721"></td>
        <td id="LC13721" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13722" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13722"></td>
        <td id="LC13722" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“I did so, raising the boy&#39;s head against my knee. But, invested for the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13723" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13723"></td>
        <td id="LC13723" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">moment with extraordinary power, he raised himself completely: obliging</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13724" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13724"></td>
        <td id="LC13724" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">me to rise too, or I could not have still supported him.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13725" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13725"></td>
        <td id="LC13725" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13726" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13726"></td>
        <td id="LC13726" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“&#39;Marquis,&#39; said the boy, turned to him with his eyes opened wide, and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13727" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13727"></td>
        <td id="LC13727" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">his right hand raised, &#39;in the days when all these things are to be</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13728" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13728"></td>
        <td id="LC13728" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">answered for, I summon you and yours, to the last of your bad race, to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13729" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13729"></td>
        <td id="LC13729" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">answer for them. I mark this cross of blood upon you, as a sign that</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13730" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13730"></td>
        <td id="LC13730" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">I do it. In the days when all these things are to be answered for,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13731" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13731"></td>
        <td id="LC13731" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">I summon your brother, the worst of the bad race, to answer for them</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13732" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13732"></td>
        <td id="LC13732" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">separately. I mark this cross of blood upon him, as a sign that I do</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13733" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13733"></td>
        <td id="LC13733" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">it.&#39;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13734" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13734"></td>
        <td id="LC13734" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13735" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13735"></td>
        <td id="LC13735" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Twice, he put his hand to the wound in his breast, and with his</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13736" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13736"></td>
        <td id="LC13736" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">forefinger drew a cross in the air. He stood for an instant with the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13737" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13737"></td>
        <td id="LC13737" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">finger yet raised, and as it dropped, he dropped with it, and I laid him</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13738" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13738"></td>
        <td id="LC13738" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">down dead.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13739" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13739"></td>
        <td id="LC13739" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13740" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13740"></td>
        <td id="LC13740" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">        *****</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13741" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13741"></td>
        <td id="LC13741" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13742" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13742"></td>
        <td id="LC13742" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“When I returned to the bedside of the young woman, I found her raving</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13743" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13743"></td>
        <td id="LC13743" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">in precisely the same order of continuity. I knew that this might last</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13744" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13744"></td>
        <td id="LC13744" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">for many hours, and that it would probably end in the silence of the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13745" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13745"></td>
        <td id="LC13745" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">grave.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13746" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13746"></td>
        <td id="LC13746" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13747" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13747"></td>
        <td id="LC13747" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“I repeated the medicines I had given her, and I sat at the side of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13748" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13748"></td>
        <td id="LC13748" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the bed until the night was far advanced. She never abated the piercing</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13749" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13749"></td>
        <td id="LC13749" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">quality of her shrieks, never stumbled in the distinctness or the order</td>

        <td id="L13750" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13750"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13751" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13751"></td>

        <td id="L13821" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13821"></td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L13830" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13830"></td>
