      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13831" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13831"></td>
        <td id="LC13831" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“My patient died, two hours before midnight--at a time, by my watch,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13832" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13832"></td>
        <td id="LC13832" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">answering almost to the minute when I had first seen her. I was alone</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13833" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13833"></td>
        <td id="LC13833" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">with her, when her forlorn young head drooped gently on one side, and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13834" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13834"></td>
        <td id="LC13834" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">all her earthly wrongs and sorrows ended.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13835" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13835"></td>
        <td id="LC13835" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13836" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13836"></td>
        <td id="LC13836" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“The brothers were waiting in a room down-stairs, impatient to ride</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13837" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13837"></td>
        <td id="LC13837" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">away. I had heard them, alone at the bedside, striking their boots with</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13838" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13838"></td>
        <td id="LC13838" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">their riding-whips, and loitering up and down.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13839" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13839"></td>
        <td id="LC13839" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13840" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13840"></td>
        <td id="LC13840" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“&#39;At last she is dead?&#39; said the elder, when I went in.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13841" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13841"></td>
        <td id="LC13841" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13842" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13842"></td>
        <td id="LC13842" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“&#39;She is dead,&#39; said I.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13843" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13843"></td>
        <td id="LC13843" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13844" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13844"></td>
        <td id="LC13844" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“&#39;I congratulate you, my brother,&#39; were his words as he turned round.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13845" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13845"></td>
        <td id="LC13845" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13846" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13846"></td>
        <td id="LC13846" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“He had before offered me money, which I had postponed taking. He now</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13847" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13847"></td>
        <td id="LC13847" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">gave me a rouleau of gold. I took it from his hand, but laid it on</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13848" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13848"></td>
        <td id="LC13848" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the table. I had considered the question, and had resolved to accept</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13849" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13849"></td>
        <td id="LC13849" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">nothing.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13850" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13850"></td>
        <td id="LC13850" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13851" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13851"></td>
        <td id="LC13851" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“&#39;Pray excuse me,&#39; said I. &#39;Under the circumstances, no.&#39;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13852" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13852"></td>
        <td id="LC13852" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13853" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13853"></td>
        <td id="LC13853" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“They exchanged looks, but bent their heads to me as I bent mine to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13854" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13854"></td>
        <td id="LC13854" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">them, and we parted without another word on either side.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13855" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13855"></td>
        <td id="LC13855" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13856" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13856"></td>
        <td id="LC13856" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">        *****</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13857" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13857"></td>
        <td id="LC13857" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13858" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13858"></td>
        <td id="LC13858" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“I am weary, weary, weary--worn down by misery. I cannot read what I</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13859" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13859"></td>
        <td id="LC13859" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">have written with this gaunt hand.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13860" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13860"></td>
        <td id="LC13860" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13861" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13861"></td>
        <td id="LC13861" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Early in the morning, the rouleau of gold was left at my door in a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13862" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13862"></td>
        <td id="LC13862" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">little box, with my name on the outside. From the first, I had anxiously</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13863" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13863"></td>
        <td id="LC13863" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">considered what I ought to do. I decided, that day, to write privately</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13864" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13864"></td>
        <td id="LC13864" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">to the Minister, stating the nature of the two cases to which I had been</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13865" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13865"></td>
        <td id="LC13865" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">summoned, and the place to which I had gone: in effect, stating all the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13866" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13866"></td>
        <td id="LC13866" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">circumstances. I knew what Court influence was, and what the immunities</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13867" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13867"></td>
        <td id="LC13867" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">of the Nobles were, and I expected that the matter would never be</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13868" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13868"></td>
        <td id="LC13868" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">heard of; but, I wished to relieve my own mind. I had kept the matter a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13869" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13869"></td>
        <td id="LC13869" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">profound secret, even from my wife; and this, too, I resolved to state</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13870" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13870"></td>
        <td id="LC13870" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">in my letter. I had no apprehension whatever of my real danger; but</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13871" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13871"></td>
        <td id="LC13871" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">I was conscious that there might be danger for others, if others were</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13872" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13872"></td>
        <td id="LC13872" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">compromised by possessing the knowledge that I possessed.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13873" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13873"></td>
        <td id="LC13873" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13874" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13874"></td>
        <td id="LC13874" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“I was much engaged that day, and could not complete my letter that</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13875" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13875"></td>
        <td id="LC13875" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">night. I rose long before my usual time next morning to finish it.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13876" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13876"></td>
        <td id="LC13876" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">It was the last day of the year. The letter was lying before me just</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13877" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13877"></td>
        <td id="LC13877" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">completed, when I was told that a lady waited, who wished to see me.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13878" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13878"></td>
        <td id="LC13878" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13879" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13879"></td>
        <td id="LC13879" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">        *****</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13880" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13880"></td>
        <td id="LC13880" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13881" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13881"></td>
        <td id="LC13881" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“I am growing more and more unequal to the task I have set myself. It is</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13882" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13882"></td>
        <td id="LC13882" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">so cold, so dark, my senses are so benumbed, and the gloom upon me is so</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13883" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13883"></td>
        <td id="LC13883" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">dreadful.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13884" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13884"></td>
        <td id="LC13884" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13885" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13885"></td>
        <td id="LC13885" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“The lady was young, engaging, and handsome, but not marked for long</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13886" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13886"></td>
        <td id="LC13886" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">life. She was in great agitation. She presented herself to me as the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13887" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13887"></td>
        <td id="LC13887" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">wife of the Marquis St. Evremonde. I connected the title by which the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13888" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13888"></td>
        <td id="LC13888" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">boy had addressed the elder brother, with the initial letter embroidered</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13889" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13889"></td>
        <td id="LC13889" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">on the scarf, and had no difficulty in arriving at the conclusion that I</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13890" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13890"></td>
        <td id="LC13890" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">had seen that nobleman very lately.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13891" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13891"></td>
        <td id="LC13891" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13892" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13892"></td>
        <td id="LC13892" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“My memory is still accurate, but I cannot write the words of our</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13893" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13893"></td>
        <td id="LC13893" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">conversation. I suspect that I am watched more closely than I was, and I</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13894" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13894"></td>
        <td id="LC13894" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">know not at what times I may be watched. She had in part suspected, and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13895" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13895"></td>
        <td id="LC13895" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">in part discovered, the main facts of the cruel story, of her husband&#39;s</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13896" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13896"></td>
        <td id="LC13896" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">share in it, and my being resorted to. She did not know that the girl</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13897" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13897"></td>
        <td id="LC13897" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">was dead. Her hope had been, she said in great distress, to show her,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13898" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13898"></td>
        <td id="LC13898" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">in secret, a woman&#39;s sympathy. Her hope had been to avert the wrath of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13899" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13899"></td>
        <td id="LC13899" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Heaven from a House that had long been hateful to the suffering many.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13900" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13900"></td>
        <td id="LC13900" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13901" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13901"></td>
        <td id="LC13901" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“She had reasons for believing that there was a young sister living, and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13902" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13902"></td>
        <td id="LC13902" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">her greatest desire was, to help that sister. I could tell her nothing</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13903" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13903"></td>
        <td id="LC13903" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">but that there was such a sister; beyond that, I knew nothing. Her</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13904" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13904"></td>
        <td id="LC13904" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">inducement to come to me, relying on my confidence, had been the hope</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13905" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13905"></td>
        <td id="LC13905" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">that I could tell her the name and place of abode. Whereas, to this</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13906" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13906"></td>
        <td id="LC13906" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">wretched hour I am ignorant of both.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13907" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13907"></td>
        <td id="LC13907" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13908" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13908"></td>
        <td id="LC13908" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">        *****</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13909" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13909"></td>
        <td id="LC13909" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13910" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13910"></td>
        <td id="LC13910" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“These scraps of paper fail me. One was taken from me, with a warning,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13911" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13911"></td>
        <td id="LC13911" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">yesterday. I must finish my record to-day.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13912" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13912"></td>
        <td id="LC13912" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13913" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13913"></td>
        <td id="LC13913" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“She was a good, compassionate lady, and not happy in her marriage. How</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13914" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13914"></td>
        <td id="LC13914" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">could she be! The brother distrusted and disliked her, and his influence</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13915" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13915"></td>
        <td id="LC13915" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">was all opposed to her; she stood in dread of him, and in dread of her</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13916" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13916"></td>
        <td id="LC13916" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">husband too. When I handed her down to the door, there was a child, a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13917" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13917"></td>
        <td id="LC13917" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">pretty boy from two to three years old, in her carriage.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13918" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13918"></td>
        <td id="LC13918" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13919" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13919"></td>
        <td id="LC13919" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“&#39;For his sake, Doctor,&#39; she said, pointing to him in tears, &#39;I would do</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13920" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13920"></td>
        <td id="LC13920" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">all I can to make what poor amends I can. He will never prosper in his</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13921" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13921"></td>
        <td id="LC13921" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">inheritance otherwise. I have a presentiment that if no other innocent</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13922" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13922"></td>
        <td id="LC13922" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">atonement is made for this, it will one day be required of him. What</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13923" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13923"></td>
        <td id="LC13923" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">I have left to call my own--it is little beyond the worth of a few</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13924" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13924"></td>
        <td id="LC13924" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">jewels--I will make it the first charge of his life to bestow, with the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13925" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13925"></td>
        <td id="LC13925" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">compassion and lamenting of his dead mother, on this injured family, if</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13926" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13926"></td>
        <td id="LC13926" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the sister can be discovered.&#39;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13927" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13927"></td>
        <td id="LC13927" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13928" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13928"></td>
        <td id="LC13928" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“She kissed the boy, and said, caressing him, &#39;It is for thine own dear</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13929" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13929"></td>
        <td id="LC13929" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">sake. Thou wilt be faithful, little Charles?&#39; The child answered her</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13930" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13930"></td>
        <td id="LC13930" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">bravely, &#39;Yes!&#39; I kissed her hand, and she took him in her arms, and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13931" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13931"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14024" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14024"></td>
        <td id="LC14024" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">taken him last night, and Barsad. The people had all poured out to the</td>

        <td id="L14025" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14025"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14026" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14026"></td>
        <td id="LC14026" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">him then; it is but a moment.” It was silently acquiesced in, and they</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14027" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14027"></td>
        <td id="LC14027" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">passed her over the seats in the hall to a raised place, where he, by</td>

        <td id="L14028" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14028"></td>

        <td id="L14114" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14114"></td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L14116" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14116"></td>
        <td id="LC14116" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14117" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14117"></td>
        <td id="LC14117" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Nothing connected with Charles was concealed from me. I had the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14118" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14118"></td>
        <td id="LC14118" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">strongest assurances that I should save him; and I did.” He returned the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14119" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14119"></td>
        <td id="LC14119" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">answer in great trouble, and very slowly.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14120" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14120"></td>
        <td id="LC14120" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14121" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14121"></td>
        <td id="LC14121" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Try them again. The hours between this and to-morrow afternoon are few</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14122" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14122"></td>
        <td id="LC14122" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and short, but try.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14123" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14123"></td>
        <td id="LC14123" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14124" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14124"></td>
        <td id="LC14124" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“I intend to try. I will not rest a moment.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14125" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14125"></td>
        <td id="LC14125" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14126" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14126"></td>
        <td id="LC14126" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“That&#39;s well. I have known such energy as yours do great things before</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14127" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14127"></td>
        <td id="LC14127" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">now--though never,” he added, with a smile and a sigh together, “such</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14128" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14128"></td>
        <td id="LC14128" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">great things as this. But try! Of little worth as life is when we misuse</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14129" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14129"></td>
        <td id="LC14129" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">it, it is worth that effort. It would cost nothing to lay down if it</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14130" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14130"></td>
        <td id="LC14130" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">were not.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14131" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14131"></td>
        <td id="LC14131" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14132" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14132"></td>
        <td id="LC14132" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“I will go,” said Doctor Manette, “to the Prosecutor and the President</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14133" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14133"></td>
        <td id="LC14133" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">straight, and I will go to others whom it is better not to name. I will</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14134" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14134"></td>
        <td id="LC14134" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">write too, and--But stay! There is a Celebration in the streets, and no</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14135" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14135"></td>
        <td id="LC14135" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">one will be accessible until dark.”</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L14136" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14136"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14137" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14137"></td>
        <td id="LC14137" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“That&#39;s true. Well! It is a forlorn hope at the best, and not much the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14138" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14138"></td>
        <td id="LC14138" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">forlorner for being delayed till dark. I should like to know how you</td>

      </tr>

        <td id="LC14143" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">this.”</td>

        <td id="L14161" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14161"></td>
        <td id="LC14161" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">him--which is a large supposition; for what is his life, or any man&#39;s</td>

        <td id="L14163" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14163"></td>
        <td id="LC14163" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">court.”</td>

        <td id="L14164" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14164"></td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L14166" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14166"></td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L14167" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14167"></td>
        <td id="LC14167" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Mr. Lorry leaned his arm upon the door-post, and bowed his face upon it.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14168" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14168"></td>

        <td id="L14169" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14169"></td>
        <td id="LC14169" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Don&#39;t despond,” said Carton, very gently; “don&#39;t grieve. I encouraged</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14170" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14170"></td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L14173" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14173"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14175" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14175"></td>
        <td id="LC14175" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">But he will perish; there is no real hope.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14176" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14176"></td>
        <td id="LC14176" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>

        <td id="LC14177" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Yes. He will perish: there is no real hope,” echoed Carton.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14178" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14178"></td>
        <td id="LC14178" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14179" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14179"></td>
        <td id="LC14179" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">And walked with a settled step, down-stairs.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14180" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14180"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14184" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14184"></td>
        <td id="LC14184" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">XII. Darkness</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14185" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14185"></td>
        <td id="LC14185" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14186" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14186"></td>
        <td id="LC14186" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14187" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14187"></td>
        <td id="LC14187" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Sydney Carton paused in the street, not quite decided where to go. “At</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14188" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14188"></td>
        <td id="LC14188" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Tellson&#39;s banking-house at nine,” he said, with a musing face. “Shall I</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14189" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14189"></td>
        <td id="LC14189" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">do well, in the mean time, to show myself? I think so. It is best that</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14190" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14190"></td>
        <td id="LC14190" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">these people should know there is such a man as I here; it is a sound</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14191" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14191"></td>
        <td id="LC14191" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">precaution, and may be a necessary preparation. But care, care, care!</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14192" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14192"></td>
        <td id="LC14192" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Let me think it out!”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14193" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14193"></td>
        <td id="LC14193" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14194" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14194"></td>
        <td id="LC14194" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Checking his steps which had begun to tend towards an object, he took a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14195" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14195"></td>
        <td id="LC14195" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">turn or two in the already darkening street, and traced the thought</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14196" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14196"></td>
        <td id="LC14196" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">in his mind to its possible consequences. His first impression was</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14197" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14197"></td>
        <td id="LC14197" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">confirmed. “It is best,” he said, finally resolved, “that these people</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14198" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14198"></td>
        <td id="LC14198" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">should know there is such a man as I here.” And he turned his face</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14199" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14199"></td>
        <td id="LC14199" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">towards Saint Antoine.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14200" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14200"></td>
        <td id="LC14200" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14201" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14201"></td>
        <td id="LC14201" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Defarge had described himself, that day, as the keeper of a wine-shop in</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14202" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14202"></td>
        <td id="LC14202" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the Saint Antoine suburb. It was not difficult for one who knew the city</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14203" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14203"></td>
        <td id="LC14203" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">well, to find his house without asking any question. Having ascertained</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14204" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14204"></td>
        <td id="LC14204" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">its situation, Carton came out of those closer streets again, and dined</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14205" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14205"></td>
        <td id="LC14205" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">at a place of refreshment and fell sound asleep after dinner. For the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14206" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14206"></td>
        <td id="LC14206" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">first time in many years, he had no strong drink. Since last night he</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14207" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14207"></td>
        <td id="LC14207" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">had taken nothing but a little light thin wine, and last night he had</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14208" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14208"></td>
        <td id="LC14208" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">dropped the brandy slowly down on Mr. Lorry&#39;s hearth like a man who had</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14209" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14209"></td>
        <td id="LC14209" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">done with it.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14210" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14210"></td>
        <td id="LC14210" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14211" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14211"></td>
        <td id="LC14211" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">It was as late as seven o&#39;clock when he awoke refreshed, and went out</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14212" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14212"></td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L14213" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14213"></td>
        <td id="LC14213" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">stopped at a shop-window where there was a mirror, and slightly altered</td>

        <td id="L14298" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14298"></td>

        <td id="LC14299" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“As to thee,” pursued madame, implacably, addressing her husband, “if it</td>

        <td id="L14300" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14300"></td>
        <td id="LC14300" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">depended on thee--which, happily, it does not--thou wouldst rescue this</td>

        <td id="L14301" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14301"></td>

        <td id="L14302" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14302"></td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L14303" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14303"></td>
        <td id="LC14303" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“No!” protested Defarge. “Not if to lift this glass would do it! But I</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14304" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14304"></td>
        <td id="LC14304" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">would leave the matter there. I say, stop there.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14305" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14305"></td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L14306" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14306"></td>
        <td id="LC14306" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“See you then, Jacques,” said Madame Defarge, wrathfully; “and see you,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14307" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14307"></td>
        <td id="LC14307" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">too, my little Vengeance; see you both! Listen! For other crimes as</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14308" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14308"></td>
        <td id="LC14308" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">tyrants and oppressors, I have this race a long time on my register,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14309" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14309"></td>
        <td id="LC14309" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">doomed to destruction and extermination. Ask my husband, is that so.”</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L14310" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14310"></td>
        <td id="LC14310" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>

        <td id="L14311" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14311"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>

        <td id="L14314" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14314"></td>

        <td id="LC14396" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Come, come!” said he, in a whimpering miserable way; “let me get to</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L14397" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14397"></td>
        <td id="LC14397" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">work. Give me my work.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>

      <tr>
        <td id="L14486" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14486"></td>

      <tr>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14489" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14489"></td>
        <td id="LC14489" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">more probably a week afterwards. You know it is a capital crime, to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14490" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14490"></td>
        <td id="LC14490" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">mourn for, or sympathise with, a victim of the Guillotine. She and her</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14491" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14491"></td>
        <td id="LC14491" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">father would unquestionably be guilty of this crime, and this woman (the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14492" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14492"></td>
        <td id="LC14492" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">inveteracy of whose pursuit cannot be described) would wait to add that</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14493" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14493"></td>
        <td id="LC14493" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">strength to her case, and make herself doubly sure. You follow me?”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14494" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14494"></td>
        <td id="LC14494" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14495" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14495"></td>
        <td id="LC14495" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“So attentively, and with so much confidence in what you say, that for</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14496" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14496"></td>
        <td id="LC14496" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the moment I lose sight,” touching the back of the Doctor&#39;s chair, “even</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14497" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14497"></td>
        <td id="LC14497" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">of this distress.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14498" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14498"></td>
        <td id="LC14498" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14499" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14499"></td>
        <td id="LC14499" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“You have money, and can buy the means of travelling to the seacoast</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14500" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14500"></td>
        <td id="LC14500" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">as quickly as the journey can be made. Your preparations have been</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14501" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14501"></td>
        <td id="LC14501" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">completed for some days, to return to England. Early to-morrow have your</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14502" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14502"></td>
        <td id="LC14502" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">horses ready, so that they may be in starting trim at two o&#39;clock in the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14503" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14503"></td>
        <td id="LC14503" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">afternoon.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14504" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14504"></td>
        <td id="LC14504" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14505" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14505"></td>
        <td id="LC14505" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“It shall be done!”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14506" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14506"></td>
        <td id="LC14506" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14507" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14507"></td>
        <td id="LC14507" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">His manner was so fervent and inspiring, that Mr. Lorry caught the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14508" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14508"></td>
        <td id="LC14508" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">flame, and was as quick as youth.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14509" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14509"></td>
        <td id="LC14509" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14510" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14510"></td>
        <td id="LC14510" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“You are a noble heart. Did I say we could depend upon no better man?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14511" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14511"></td>
        <td id="LC14511" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Tell her, to-night, what you know of her danger as involving her child</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14512" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14512"></td>
        <td id="LC14512" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and her father. Dwell upon that, for she would lay her own fair head</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14513" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14513"></td>
        <td id="LC14513" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">beside her husband&#39;s cheerfully.” He faltered for an instant; then went</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14514" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14514"></td>
        <td id="LC14514" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">on as before. “For the sake of her child and her father, press upon her</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14515" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14515"></td>
        <td id="LC14515" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the necessity of leaving Paris, with them and you, at that hour. Tell</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14516" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14516"></td>
        <td id="LC14516" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">her that it was her husband&#39;s last arrangement. Tell her that more</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14517" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14517"></td>
        <td id="LC14517" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">depends upon it than she dare believe, or hope. You think that her</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14518" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14518"></td>
        <td id="LC14518" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">father, even in this sad state, will submit himself to her; do you not?”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14519" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14519"></td>
        <td id="LC14519" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14520" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14520"></td>
        <td id="LC14520" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“I am sure of it.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14521" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14521"></td>
        <td id="LC14521" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14522" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14522"></td>
        <td id="LC14522" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“I thought so. Quietly and steadily have all these arrangements made in</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14523" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14523"></td>
        <td id="LC14523" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the courtyard here, even to the taking of your own seat in the carriage.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14524" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14524"></td>
        <td id="LC14524" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">The moment I come to you, take me in, and drive away.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14525" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14525"></td>
        <td id="LC14525" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14526" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14526"></td>
        <td id="LC14526" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“I understand that I wait for you under all circumstances?”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14527" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14527"></td>
        <td id="LC14527" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14528" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14528"></td>
        <td id="LC14528" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“You have my certificate in your hand with the rest, you know, and will</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14529" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14529"></td>
        <td id="LC14529" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">reserve my place. Wait for nothing but to have my place occupied, and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14530" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14530"></td>
        <td id="LC14530" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">then for England!”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14531" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14531"></td>
        <td id="LC14531" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14532" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14532"></td>
        <td id="LC14532" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Why, then,” said Mr. Lorry, grasping his eager but so firm and steady</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14533" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14533"></td>
        <td id="LC14533" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">hand, “it does not all depend on one old man, but I shall have a young</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14534" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14534"></td>
        <td id="LC14534" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and ardent man at my side.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14535" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14535"></td>
        <td id="LC14535" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14536" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14536"></td>
        <td id="LC14536" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“By the help of Heaven you shall! Promise me solemnly that nothing will</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14537" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14537"></td>
        <td id="LC14537" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">influence you to alter the course on which we now stand pledged to one</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14538" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14538"></td>
        <td id="LC14538" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">another.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14539" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14539"></td>
        <td id="LC14539" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14540" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14540"></td>
        <td id="LC14540" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Nothing, Carton.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14541" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14541"></td>
        <td id="LC14541" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14542" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14542"></td>
        <td id="LC14542" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Remember these words to-morrow: change the course, or delay in it--for</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14543" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14543"></td>
        <td id="LC14543" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">any reason--and no life can possibly be saved, and many lives must</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14544" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14544"></td>
        <td id="LC14544" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">inevitably be sacrificed.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14545" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14545"></td>
        <td id="LC14545" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14546" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14546"></td>
        <td id="LC14546" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“I will remember them. I hope to do my part faithfully.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14547" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14547"></td>
        <td id="LC14547" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14548" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14548"></td>
        <td id="LC14548" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“And I hope to do mine. Now, good bye!”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14549" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14549"></td>
        <td id="LC14549" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14550" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14550"></td>
        <td id="LC14550" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Though he said it with a grave smile of earnestness, and though he even</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14551" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14551"></td>
        <td id="LC14551" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">put the old man&#39;s hand to his lips, he did not part from him then. He</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14552" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14552"></td>
        <td id="LC14552" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">helped him so far to arouse the rocking figure before the dying embers,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14553" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14553"></td>
        <td id="LC14553" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">as to get a cloak and hat put upon it, and to tempt it forth to find</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14554" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14554"></td>
        <td id="LC14554" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">where the bench and work were hidden that it still moaningly besought</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14555" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14555"></td>
        <td id="LC14555" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">to have. He walked on the other side of it and protected it to the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14556" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14556"></td>
        <td id="LC14556" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">courtyard of the house where the afflicted heart--so happy in</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14557" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14557"></td>
        <td id="LC14557" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the memorable time when he had revealed his own desolate heart to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14558" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14558"></td>
        <td id="LC14558" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">it--outwatched the awful night. He entered the courtyard and remained</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14559" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14559"></td>
        <td id="LC14559" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">there for a few moments alone, looking up at the light in the window of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14560" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14560"></td>
        <td id="LC14560" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">her room. Before he went away, he breathed a blessing towards it, and a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14561" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14561"></td>
        <td id="LC14561" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Farewell.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14562" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14562"></td>
        <td id="LC14562" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14563" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14563"></td>
        <td id="LC14563" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14564" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14564"></td>
        <td id="LC14564" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14565" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14565"></td>
        <td id="LC14565" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14566" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14566"></td>
        <td id="LC14566" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">XIII. Fifty-two</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14567" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14567"></td>
        <td id="LC14567" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14568" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14568"></td>
        <td id="LC14568" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14569" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14569"></td>
        <td id="LC14569" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">In the black prison of the Conciergerie, the doomed of the day awaited</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14570" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14570"></td>
        <td id="LC14570" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">their fate. They were in number as the weeks of the year. Fifty-two were</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14571" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14571"></td>
        <td id="LC14571" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">to roll that afternoon on the life-tide of the city to the boundless</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14572" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14572"></td>
        <td id="LC14572" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">everlasting sea. Before their cells were quit of them, new occupants</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14573" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14573"></td>
        <td id="LC14573" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">were appointed; before their blood ran into the blood spilled yesterday,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14574" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14574"></td>
        <td id="LC14574" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the blood that was to mingle with theirs to-morrow was already set</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14575" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14575"></td>
        <td id="LC14575" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">apart.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14576" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14576"></td>
        <td id="LC14576" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14577" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14577"></td>
        <td id="LC14577" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Two score and twelve were told off. From the farmer-general of seventy,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14578" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14578"></td>
        <td id="LC14578" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">whose riches could not buy his life, to the seamstress of twenty, whose</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14579" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14579"></td>
        <td id="LC14579" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">poverty and obscurity could not save her. Physical diseases, engendered</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14580" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14580"></td>
        <td id="LC14580" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">in the vices and neglects of men, will seize on victims of all degrees;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14581" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14581"></td>
        <td id="LC14581" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and the frightful moral disorder, born of unspeakable suffering,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14582" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14582"></td>
        <td id="LC14582" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">intolerable oppression, and heartless indifference, smote equally</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14583" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14583"></td>
        <td id="LC14583" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">without distinction.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14584" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14584"></td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L14675" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14675"></td>

        <td id="L14676" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14676"></td>

        <td id="L14765" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14765"></td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L14767" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14767"></td>
        <td id="LC14767" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Carton! Dear Carton! It is madness. It cannot be accomplished, it never</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14768" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14768"></td>
        <td id="LC14768" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">can be done, it has been attempted, and has always failed. I implore you</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14769" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14769"></td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L14864" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14864"></td>
        <td id="LC14864" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14865" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14865"></td>
        <td id="LC14865" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Don&#39;t fear me. I will be true to the death.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14866" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14866"></td>
        <td id="LC14866" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14867" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14867"></td>
        <td id="LC14867" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“You must be, Mr. Carton, if the tale of fifty-two is to be right. Being</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14868" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14868"></td>
        <td id="LC14868" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">made right by you in that dress, I shall have no fear.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14869" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14869"></td>
        <td id="LC14869" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14870" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14870"></td>
        <td id="LC14870" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Have no fear! I shall soon be out of the way of harming you, and the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14871" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14871"></td>
        <td id="LC14871" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">rest will soon be far from here, please God! Now, get assistance and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14872" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14872"></td>
        <td id="LC14872" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">take me to the coach.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14873" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14873"></td>
        <td id="LC14873" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14874" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14874"></td>
        <td id="LC14874" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“You?” said the Spy nervously.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14875" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14875"></td>
        <td id="LC14875" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L14876" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14876"></td>
        <td id="LC14876" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Him, man, with whom I have exchanged. You go out at the gate by which</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14877" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14877"></td>
        <td id="LC14877" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">you brought me in?”</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L14878" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14878"></td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L14879" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14879"></td>
        <td id="LC14879" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Of course.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14880" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14880"></td>
        <td id="LC14880" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14881" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14881"></td>
        <td id="LC14881" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“I was weak and faint when you brought me in, and I am fainter now you</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14882" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14882"></td>
        <td id="LC14882" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">take me out. The parting interview has overpowered me. Such a thing has</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14883" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14883"></td>
        <td id="LC14883" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">happened here, often, and too often. Your life is in your own hands.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14884" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14884"></td>
        <td id="LC14884" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Quick! Call assistance!”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14885" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14885"></td>
        <td id="LC14885" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L14886" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14886"></td>
        <td id="LC14886" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“You swear not to betray me?” said the trembling Spy, as he paused for a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14887" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14887"></td>
        <td id="LC14887" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">last moment.</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L14888" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14888"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14889" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14889"></td>
        <td id="LC14889" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Man, man!” returned Carton, stamping his foot; “have I sworn by no</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14890" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14890"></td>
        <td id="LC14890" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">solemn vow already, to go through with this, that you waste the precious</td>

      <tr>

        <td id="LC14891" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">moments now? Take him yourself to the courtyard you know of, place</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14892" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14892"></td>
        <td id="LC14892" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">him yourself in the carriage, show him yourself to Mr. Lorry, tell him</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14893" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14893"></td>
        <td id="LC14893" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">yourself to give him no restorative but air, and to remember my words of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14894" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14894"></td>
        <td id="LC14894" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">last night, and his promise of last night, and drive away!”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14895" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14895"></td>
        <td id="LC14895" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14896" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14896"></td>
        <td id="LC14896" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">The Spy withdrew, and Carton seated himself at the table, resting his</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14897" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14897"></td>
        <td id="LC14897" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">forehead on his hands. The Spy returned immediately, with two men.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14898" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14898"></td>
        <td id="LC14898" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14899" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14899"></td>
        <td id="LC14899" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“How, then?” said one of them, contemplating the fallen figure. “So</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14900" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14900"></td>
        <td id="LC14900" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">afflicted to find that his friend has drawn a prize in the lottery of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14901" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14901"></td>
        <td id="LC14901" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Sainte Guillotine?”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14902" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14902"></td>
