      <tr>
        <td id="L14903" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14903"></td>
        <td id="LC14903" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“A good patriot,” said the other, “could hardly have been more afflicted</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14904" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14904"></td>
        <td id="LC14904" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">if the Aristocrat had drawn a blank.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14905" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14905"></td>
        <td id="LC14905" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14906" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14906"></td>
        <td id="LC14906" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">They raised the unconscious figure, placed it on a litter they had</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14907" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14907"></td>
        <td id="LC14907" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">brought to the door, and bent to carry it away.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14908" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14908"></td>
        <td id="LC14908" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14909" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14909"></td>
        <td id="LC14909" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“The time is short, Evremonde,” said the Spy, in a warning voice.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14910" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14910"></td>
        <td id="LC14910" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14911" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14911"></td>
        <td id="LC14911" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“I know it well,” answered Carton. “Be careful of my friend, I entreat</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14912" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14912"></td>
        <td id="LC14912" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">you, and leave me.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14913" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14913"></td>
        <td id="LC14913" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14914" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14914"></td>
        <td id="LC14914" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Come, then, my children,” said Barsad. “Lift him, and come away!”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14915" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14915"></td>
        <td id="LC14915" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14916" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14916"></td>
        <td id="LC14916" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">The door closed, and Carton was left alone. Straining his powers of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14917" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14917"></td>
        <td id="LC14917" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">listening to the utmost, he listened for any sound that might denote</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14918" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14918"></td>
        <td id="LC14918" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">suspicion or alarm. There was none. Keys turned, doors clashed,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14919" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14919"></td>
        <td id="LC14919" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">footsteps passed along distant passages: no cry was raised, or hurry</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14920" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14920"></td>
        <td id="LC14920" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">made, that seemed unusual. Breathing more freely in a little while, he</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14921" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14921"></td>
        <td id="LC14921" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">sat down at the table, and listened again until the clock struck Two.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14922" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14922"></td>
        <td id="LC14922" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14923" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14923"></td>
        <td id="LC14923" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Sounds that he was not afraid of, for he divined their meaning, then</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14924" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14924"></td>
        <td id="LC14924" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">began to be audible. Several doors were opened in succession, and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14925" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14925"></td>
        <td id="LC14925" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">finally his own. A gaoler, with a list in his hand, looked in, merely</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14926" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14926"></td>
        <td id="LC14926" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">saying, “Follow me, Evremonde!” and he followed into a large dark room,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14927" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14927"></td>
        <td id="LC14927" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">at a distance. It was a dark winter day, and what with the shadows</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14928" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14928"></td>
        <td id="LC14928" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">within, and what with the shadows without, he could but dimly discern</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14929" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14929"></td>
        <td id="LC14929" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the others who were brought there to have their arms bound. Some were</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14930" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14930"></td>
        <td id="LC14930" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">standing; some seated. Some were lamenting, and in restless motion;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14931" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14931"></td>
        <td id="LC14931" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">but, these were few. The great majority were silent and still, looking</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14932" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14932"></td>
        <td id="LC14932" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">fixedly at the ground.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14933" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14933"></td>
        <td id="LC14933" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14934" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14934"></td>
        <td id="LC14934" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">As he stood by the wall in a dim corner, while some of the fifty-two</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14935" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14935"></td>
        <td id="LC14935" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">were brought in after him, one man stopped in passing, to embrace him,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14936" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14936"></td>
        <td id="LC14936" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">as having a knowledge of him. It thrilled him with a great dread of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14937" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14937"></td>
        <td id="LC14937" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">discovery; but the man went on. A very few moments after that, a young</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14938" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14938"></td>
        <td id="LC14938" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">woman, with a slight girlish form, a sweet spare face in which there was</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14939" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14939"></td>
        <td id="LC14939" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">no vestige of colour, and large widely opened patient eyes, rose from</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14940" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14940"></td>
        <td id="LC14940" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the seat where he had observed her sitting, and came to speak to him.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14941" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14941"></td>
        <td id="LC14941" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14942" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14942"></td>
        <td id="LC14942" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Citizen Evremonde,” she said, touching him with her cold hand. “I am a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14943" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14943"></td>
        <td id="LC14943" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">poor little seamstress, who was with you in La Force.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14944" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14944"></td>
        <td id="LC14944" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14945" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14945"></td>
        <td id="LC14945" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">He murmured for answer: “True. I forget what you were accused of?”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14946" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14946"></td>
        <td id="LC14946" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14947" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14947"></td>
        <td id="LC14947" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Plots. Though the just Heaven knows that I am innocent of any. Is it</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14948" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14948"></td>
        <td id="LC14948" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">likely? Who would think of plotting with a poor little weak creature</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14949" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14949"></td>
        <td id="LC14949" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">like me?”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14950" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14950"></td>
        <td id="LC14950" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14951" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14951"></td>
        <td id="LC14951" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">The forlorn smile with which she said it, so touched him, that tears</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14952" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14952"></td>
        <td id="LC14952" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">started from his eyes.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14953" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14953"></td>
        <td id="LC14953" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14954" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14954"></td>
        <td id="LC14954" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“I am not afraid to die, Citizen Evremonde, but I have done nothing. I</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14955" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14955"></td>
        <td id="LC14955" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">am not unwilling to die, if the Republic which is to do so much good</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14956" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14956"></td>
        <td id="LC14956" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">to us poor, will profit by my death; but I do not know how that can be,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14957" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14957"></td>
        <td id="LC14957" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Citizen Evremonde. Such a poor weak little creature!”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14958" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14958"></td>
        <td id="LC14958" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14959" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14959"></td>
        <td id="LC14959" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">As the last thing on earth that his heart was to warm and soften to, it</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14960" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14960"></td>
        <td id="LC14960" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">warmed and softened to this pitiable girl.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14961" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14961"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14962" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14962"></td>
        <td id="LC14962" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“I heard you were released, Citizen Evremonde. I hoped it was true?”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14963" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14963"></td>
        <td id="LC14963" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>

        <td id="L14964" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14964"></td>
        <td id="LC14964" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“It was. But, I was again taken and condemned.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14965" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14965"></td>
        <td id="LC14965" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L14966" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14966"></td>
        <td id="LC14966" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“If I may ride with you, Citizen Evremonde, will you let me hold your</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L14967" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14967"></td>
        <td id="LC14967" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">hand? I am not afraid, but I am little and weak, and it will give me</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14968" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14968"></td>
        <td id="LC14968" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">more courage.”</td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14970" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14970"></td>
        <td id="LC14970" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">As the patient eyes were lifted to his face, he saw a sudden doubt in</td>

        <td id="L14971" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14971"></td>
        <td id="LC14971" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">them, and then astonishment. He pressed the work-worn, hunger-worn young</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L14972" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14972"></td>
        <td id="LC14972" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">fingers, and touched his lips.</td>

      </tr>

        <td id="L14995" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14995"></td>

        <td id="L14998" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="14998"></td>
        <td id="LC14998" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Revolution-fever will have been too much for him?”</td>

      </tr>
      <tr>

      </tr>
      <tr>

      <tr>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15011" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15011"></td>
        <td id="LC15011" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">This is she?”</td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15014" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15014"></td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L15015" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15015"></td>
        <td id="LC15015" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Kiss me, child of Evremonde. Now, thou hast kissed a good Republican;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15016" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15016"></td>
        <td id="LC15016" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">something new in thy family; remember it! Sydney Carton. Advocate.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15017" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15017"></td>
        <td id="LC15017" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">English. Which is he?”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15018" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15018"></td>
        <td id="LC15018" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15019" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15019"></td>
        <td id="LC15019" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">He lies here, in this corner of the carriage. He, too, is pointed out.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15020" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15020"></td>
        <td id="LC15020" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15021" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15021"></td>
        <td id="LC15021" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Apparently the English advocate is in a swoon?”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15022" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15022"></td>
        <td id="LC15022" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15023" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15023"></td>
        <td id="LC15023" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">It is hoped he will recover in the fresher air. It is represented that</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15024" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15024"></td>
        <td id="LC15024" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">he is not in strong health, and has separated sadly from a friend who is</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15025" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15025"></td>
        <td id="LC15025" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">under the displeasure of the Republic.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15026" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15026"></td>
        <td id="LC15026" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15027" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15027"></td>
        <td id="LC15027" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Is that all? It is not a great deal, that! Many are under the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15028" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15028"></td>
        <td id="LC15028" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">displeasure of the Republic, and must look out at the little window.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15029" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15029"></td>
        <td id="LC15029" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Jarvis Lorry. Banker. English. Which is he?”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15030" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15030"></td>
        <td id="LC15030" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15031" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15031"></td>
        <td id="LC15031" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“I am he. Necessarily, being the last.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15032" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15032"></td>
        <td id="LC15032" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15033" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15033"></td>
        <td id="LC15033" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">It is Jarvis Lorry who has replied to all the previous questions. It</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15034" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15034"></td>
        <td id="LC15034" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">is Jarvis Lorry who has alighted and stands with his hand on the coach</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15035" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15035"></td>
        <td id="LC15035" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">door, replying to a group of officials. They leisurely walk round the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15036" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15036"></td>
        <td id="LC15036" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">carriage and leisurely mount the box, to look at what little luggage it</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15037" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15037"></td>
        <td id="LC15037" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">carries on the roof; the country-people hanging about, press nearer to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15038" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15038"></td>
        <td id="LC15038" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the coach doors and greedily stare in; a little child, carried by its</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15039" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15039"></td>
        <td id="LC15039" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">mother, has its short arm held out for it, that it may touch the wife of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15040" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15040"></td>
        <td id="LC15040" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">an aristocrat who has gone to the Guillotine.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15041" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15041"></td>
        <td id="LC15041" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15042" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15042"></td>
        <td id="LC15042" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Behold your papers, Jarvis Lorry, countersigned.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15043" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15043"></td>
        <td id="LC15043" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15044" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15044"></td>
        <td id="LC15044" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“One can depart, citizen?”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15045" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15045"></td>
        <td id="LC15045" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15046" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15046"></td>
        <td id="LC15046" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“One can depart. Forward, my postilions! A good journey!”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15047" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15047"></td>
        <td id="LC15047" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15048" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15048"></td>
        <td id="LC15048" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“I salute you, citizens.--And the first danger passed!”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15049" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15049"></td>
        <td id="LC15049" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15050" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15050"></td>
        <td id="LC15050" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">These are again the words of Jarvis Lorry, as he clasps his hands, and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15051" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15051"></td>
        <td id="LC15051" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">looks upward. There is terror in the carriage, there is weeping, there</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15052" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15052"></td>
        <td id="LC15052" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">is the heavy breathing of the insensible traveller.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15053" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15053"></td>
        <td id="LC15053" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15054" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15054"></td>
        <td id="LC15054" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Are we not going too slowly? Can they not be induced to go faster?”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15055" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15055"></td>
        <td id="LC15055" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"> asks Lucie, clinging to the old man.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15056" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15056"></td>
        <td id="LC15056" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15057" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15057"></td>
        <td id="LC15057" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“It would seem like flight, my darling. I must not urge them too much;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15058" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15058"></td>
        <td id="LC15058" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">it would rouse suspicion.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15059" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15059"></td>
        <td id="LC15059" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15060" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15060"></td>
        <td id="LC15060" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Look back, look back, and see if we are pursued!”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15061" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15061"></td>
        <td id="LC15061" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15062" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15062"></td>
        <td id="LC15062" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“The road is clear, my dearest. So far, we are not pursued.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15063" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15063"></td>
        <td id="LC15063" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15064" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15064"></td>
        <td id="LC15064" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Houses in twos and threes pass by us, solitary farms, ruinous buildings,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15065" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15065"></td>
        <td id="LC15065" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">dye-works, tanneries, and the like, open country, avenues of leafless</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15066" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15066"></td>
        <td id="LC15066" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">trees. The hard uneven pavement is under us, the soft deep mud is on</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15067" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15067"></td>
        <td id="LC15067" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">either side. Sometimes, we strike into the skirting mud, to avoid the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15068" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15068"></td>
        <td id="LC15068" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">stones that clatter us and shake us; sometimes, we stick in ruts and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15069" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15069"></td>
        <td id="LC15069" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">sloughs there. The agony of our impatience is then so great, that in our</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15070" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15070"></td>
        <td id="LC15070" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">wild alarm and hurry we are for getting out and running--hiding--doing</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15071" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15071"></td>
        <td id="LC15071" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">anything but stopping.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15072" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15072"></td>
        <td id="LC15072" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15073" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15073"></td>
        <td id="LC15073" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Out of the open country, in again among ruinous buildings, solitary</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15074" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15074"></td>
        <td id="LC15074" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">farms, dye-works, tanneries, and the like, cottages in twos and threes,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15075" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15075"></td>
        <td id="LC15075" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">avenues of leafless trees. Have these men deceived us, and taken us back</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15076" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15076"></td>
        <td id="LC15076" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">by another road? Is not this the same place twice over? Thank Heaven,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15077" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15077"></td>
        <td id="LC15077" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">no. A village. Look back, look back, and see if we are pursued! Hush!</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15078" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15078"></td>
        <td id="LC15078" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the posting-house.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15079" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15079"></td>
        <td id="LC15079" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15080" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15080"></td>
        <td id="LC15080" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Leisurely, our four horses are taken out; leisurely, the coach stands in</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15081" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15081"></td>
        <td id="LC15081" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the little street, bereft of horses, and with no likelihood upon it</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15082" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15082"></td>
        <td id="LC15082" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">of ever moving again; leisurely, the new horses come into visible</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15083" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15083"></td>
        <td id="LC15083" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">existence, one by one; leisurely, the new postilions follow, sucking and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15084" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15084"></td>
        <td id="LC15084" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">plaiting the lashes of their whips; leisurely, the old postilions count</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15085" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15085"></td>
        <td id="LC15085" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">their money, make wrong additions, and arrive at dissatisfied results.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15086" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15086"></td>
        <td id="LC15086" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">All the time, our overfraught hearts are beating at a rate that would</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15087" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15087"></td>
        <td id="LC15087" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">far outstrip the fastest gallop of the fastest horses ever foaled.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15088" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15088"></td>
        <td id="LC15088" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15089" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15089"></td>
        <td id="LC15089" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">At length the new postilions are in their saddles, and the old are left</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15090" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15090"></td>
        <td id="LC15090" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">behind. We are through the village, up the hill, and down the hill, and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15091" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15091"></td>
        <td id="LC15091" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">on the low watery grounds. Suddenly, the postilions exchange speech with</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15092" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15092"></td>
        <td id="LC15092" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">animated gesticulation, and the horses are pulled up, almost on their</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15093" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15093"></td>
        <td id="LC15093" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">haunches. We are pursued?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15094" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15094"></td>
        <td id="LC15094" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15095" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15095"></td>
        <td id="LC15095" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Ho! Within the carriage there. Speak then!”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15096" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15096"></td>
        <td id="LC15096" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15097" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15097"></td>
        <td id="LC15097" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“What is it?” asks Mr. Lorry, looking out at window.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15098" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15098"></td>
        <td id="LC15098" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15099" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15099"></td>
        <td id="LC15099" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“How many did they say?”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15100" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15100"></td>
        <td id="LC15100" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15101" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15101"></td>
        <td id="LC15101" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“I do not understand you.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15102" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15102"></td>
        <td id="LC15102" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15103" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15103"></td>
        <td id="LC15103" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“--At the last post. How many to the Guillotine to-day?”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15104" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15104"></td>
        <td id="LC15104" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15105" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15105"></td>
        <td id="LC15105" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Fifty-two.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15106" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15106"></td>
        <td id="LC15106" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15107" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15107"></td>
        <td id="LC15107" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“I said so! A brave number! My fellow-citizen here would have it</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15108" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15108"></td>
        <td id="LC15108" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">forty-two; ten more heads are worth having. The Guillotine goes</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15109" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15109"></td>
        <td id="LC15109" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">handsomely. I love it. Hi forward. Whoop!”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15110" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15110"></td>
        <td id="LC15110" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15111" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15111"></td>
        <td id="LC15111" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">The night comes on dark. He moves more; he is beginning to revive, and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15112" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15112"></td>
        <td id="LC15112" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">to speak intelligibly; he thinks they are still together; he asks him,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15113" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15113"></td>
        <td id="LC15113" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">by his name, what he has in his hand. O pity us, kind Heaven, and help</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15114" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15114"></td>
        <td id="LC15114" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">us! Look out, look out, and see if we are pursued.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15115" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15115"></td>
        <td id="LC15115" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15116" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15116"></td>
        <td id="LC15116" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">The wind is rushing after us, and the clouds are flying after us, and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15117" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15117"></td>
        <td id="LC15117" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the moon is plunging after us, and the whole wild night is in pursuit of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15118" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15118"></td>
        <td id="LC15118" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">us; but, so far, we are pursued by nothing else.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15119" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15119"></td>
        <td id="LC15119" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15120" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15120"></td>
        <td id="LC15120" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15121" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15121"></td>
        <td id="LC15121" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15122" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15122"></td>
        <td id="LC15122" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15123" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15123"></td>
        <td id="LC15123" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">XIV. The Knitting Done</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15124" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15124"></td>
        <td id="LC15124" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15125" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15125"></td>
        <td id="LC15125" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15126" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15126"></td>
        <td id="LC15126" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">In that same juncture of time when the Fifty-Two awaited their fate</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15127" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15127"></td>
        <td id="LC15127" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Madame Defarge held darkly ominous council with The Vengeance and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15128" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15128"></td>
        <td id="LC15128" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Jacques Three of the Revolutionary Jury. Not in the wine-shop did Madame</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15129" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15129"></td>
        <td id="LC15129" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Defarge confer with these ministers, but in the shed of the wood-sawyer,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15130" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15130"></td>
        <td id="LC15130" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">erst a mender of roads. The sawyer himself did not participate in the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15131" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15131"></td>
        <td id="LC15131" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">conference, but abided at a little distance, like an outer satellite who</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15132" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15132"></td>
        <td id="LC15132" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">was not to speak until required, or to offer an opinion until invited.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15133" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15133"></td>
        <td id="LC15133" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15134" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15134"></td>
        <td id="LC15134" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“But our Defarge,” said Jacques Three, “is undoubtedly a good</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15135" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15135"></td>
        <td id="LC15135" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Republican? Eh?”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15136" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15136"></td>
        <td id="LC15136" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15137" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15137"></td>
        <td id="LC15137" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“There is no better,” the voluble Vengeance protested in her shrill</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15138" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15138"></td>
        <td id="LC15138" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">notes, “in France.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15139" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15139"></td>
        <td id="LC15139" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15140" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15140"></td>
        <td id="LC15140" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Peace, little Vengeance,” said Madame Defarge, laying her hand with</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15141" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15141"></td>
        <td id="LC15141" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">a slight frown on her lieutenant&#39;s lips, “hear me speak. My husband,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15142" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15142"></td>
        <td id="LC15142" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">fellow-citizen, is a good Republican and a bold man; he has deserved</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15143" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15143"></td>
        <td id="LC15143" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">well of the Republic, and possesses its confidence. But my husband has</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15144" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15144"></td>
        <td id="LC15144" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">his weaknesses, and he is so weak as to relent towards this Doctor.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15145" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15145"></td>
        <td id="LC15145" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15146" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15146"></td>
        <td id="LC15146" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“It is a great pity,” croaked Jacques Three, dubiously shaking his head,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15147" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15147"></td>
        <td id="LC15147" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">with his cruel fingers at his hungry mouth; “it is not quite like a good</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15148" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15148"></td>

        <td id="L15241" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15241"></td>
        <td id="LC15241" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15242" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15242"></td>
        <td id="LC15242" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Madame Defarge beckoned the Juryman and The Vengeance a little nearer to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15243" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15243"></td>
        <td id="LC15243" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the door, and there expounded her further views to them thus:</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15244" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15244"></td>
        <td id="LC15244" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15245" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15245"></td>
        <td id="LC15245" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“She will now be at home, awaiting the moment of his death. She will</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15246" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15246"></td>
        <td id="LC15246" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">be mourning and grieving. She will be in a state of mind to impeach the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15247" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15247"></td>
        <td id="LC15247" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">justice of the Republic. She will be full of sympathy with its enemies.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15248" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15248"></td>
        <td id="LC15248" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">I will go to her.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15249" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15249"></td>
        <td id="LC15249" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15250" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15250"></td>
        <td id="LC15250" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“What an admirable woman; what an adorable woman!” exclaimed Jacques</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15251" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15251"></td>
        <td id="LC15251" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Three, rapturously. “Ah, my cherished!” cried The Vengeance; and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15252" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15252"></td>
        <td id="LC15252" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">embraced her.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15253" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15253"></td>
        <td id="LC15253" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15254" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15254"></td>
        <td id="LC15254" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Take you my knitting,” said Madame Defarge, placing it in her</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15255" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15255"></td>
        <td id="LC15255" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">lieutenant&#39;s hands, “and have it ready for me in my usual seat. Keep</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15256" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15256"></td>
        <td id="LC15256" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">me my usual chair. Go you there, straight, for there will probably be a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15257" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15257"></td>
        <td id="LC15257" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">greater concourse than usual, to-day.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15258" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15258"></td>
        <td id="LC15258" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15259" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15259"></td>
        <td id="LC15259" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“I willingly obey the orders of my Chief,” said The Vengeance with</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15260" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15260"></td>
        <td id="LC15260" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">alacrity, and kissing her cheek. “You will not be late?”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15261" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15261"></td>
        <td id="LC15261" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15262" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15262"></td>
        <td id="LC15262" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“I shall be there before the commencement.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15263" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15263"></td>
        <td id="LC15263" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15264" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15264"></td>
        <td id="LC15264" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“And before the tumbrils arrive. Be sure you are there, my soul,” said</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15265" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15265"></td>
        <td id="LC15265" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">The Vengeance, calling after her, for she had already turned into the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15266" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15266"></td>
        <td id="LC15266" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">street, “before the tumbrils arrive!”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15267" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15267"></td>
        <td id="LC15267" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15268" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15268"></td>
        <td id="LC15268" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Madame Defarge slightly waved her hand, to imply that she heard, and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15269" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15269"></td>
        <td id="LC15269" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">might be relied upon to arrive in good time, and so went through the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15270" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15270"></td>
        <td id="LC15270" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">mud, and round the corner of the prison wall. The Vengeance and the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15271" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15271"></td>
        <td id="LC15271" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Juryman, looking after her as she walked away, were highly appreciative</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15272" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15272"></td>
        <td id="LC15272" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">of her fine figure, and her superb moral endowments.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15273" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15273"></td>
        <td id="LC15273" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15274" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15274"></td>
        <td id="LC15274" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">There were many women at that time, upon whom the time laid a dreadfully</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15275" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15275"></td>
        <td id="LC15275" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">disfiguring hand; but, there was not one among them more to be dreaded</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15276" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15276"></td>
        <td id="LC15276" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">than this ruthless woman, now taking her way along the streets. Of a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15277" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15277"></td>
        <td id="LC15277" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">strong and fearless character, of shrewd sense and readiness, of great</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15278" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15278"></td>
        <td id="LC15278" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">determination, of that kind of beauty which not only seems to impart</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15279" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15279"></td>
        <td id="LC15279" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">to its possessor firmness and animosity, but to strike into others an</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15280" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15280"></td>
        <td id="LC15280" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">instinctive recognition of those qualities; the troubled time would have</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15281" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15281"></td>
        <td id="LC15281" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">heaved her up, under any circumstances. But, imbued from her childhood</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15282" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15282"></td>
        <td id="LC15282" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">with a brooding sense of wrong, and an inveterate hatred of a class,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15283" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15283"></td>
        <td id="LC15283" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">opportunity had developed her into a tigress. She was absolutely without</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15284" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15284"></td>
        <td id="LC15284" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">pity. If she had ever had the virtue in her, it had quite gone out of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15285" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15285"></td>
        <td id="LC15285" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">her.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15286" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15286"></td>
        <td id="LC15286" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15287" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15287"></td>
        <td id="LC15287" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">It was nothing to her, that an innocent man was to die for the sins of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15288" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15288"></td>
        <td id="LC15288" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">his forefathers; she saw, not him, but them. It was nothing to her, that</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15289" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15289"></td>
        <td id="LC15289" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">his wife was to be made a widow and his daughter an orphan; that was</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15290" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15290"></td>
        <td id="LC15290" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">insufficient punishment, because they were her natural enemies and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15291" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15291"></td>
        <td id="LC15291" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">her prey, and as such had no right to live. To appeal to her, was made</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15292" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15292"></td>
        <td id="LC15292" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">hopeless by her having no sense of pity, even for herself. If she had</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15293" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15293"></td>
        <td id="LC15293" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">been laid low in the streets, in any of the many encounters in which</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15294" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15294"></td>
        <td id="LC15294" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">she had been engaged, she would not have pitied herself; nor, if she had</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15295" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15295"></td>
        <td id="LC15295" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">been ordered to the axe to-morrow, would she have gone to it with any</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15296" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15296"></td>
        <td id="LC15296" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">softer feeling than a fierce desire to change places with the man who</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15297" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15297"></td>
        <td id="LC15297" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">sent her there.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15298" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15298"></td>
        <td id="LC15298" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15299" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15299"></td>
        <td id="LC15299" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Such a heart Madame Defarge carried under her rough robe. Carelessly</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15300" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15300"></td>
        <td id="LC15300" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">worn, it was a becoming robe enough, in a certain weird way, and her</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15301" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15301"></td>
        <td id="LC15301" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">dark hair looked rich under her coarse red cap. Lying hidden in her</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15302" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15302"></td>
        <td id="LC15302" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">bosom, was a loaded pistol. Lying hidden at her waist, was a sharpened</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15303" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15303"></td>
        <td id="LC15303" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">dagger. Thus accoutred, and walking with the confident tread of such</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15304" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15304"></td>
        <td id="LC15304" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">a character, and with the supple freedom of a woman who had habitually</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15305" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15305"></td>
        <td id="LC15305" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">walked in her girlhood, bare-foot and bare-legged, on the brown</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15306" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15306"></td>
        <td id="LC15306" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">sea-sand, Madame Defarge took her way along the streets.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15307" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15307"></td>
        <td id="LC15307" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15308" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15308"></td>
        <td id="LC15308" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Now, when the journey of the travelling coach, at that very moment</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15309" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15309"></td>
        <td id="LC15309" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">waiting for the completion of its load, had been planned out last night,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15310" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15310"></td>
        <td id="LC15310" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the difficulty of taking Miss Pross in it had much engaged Mr. Lorry&#39;s</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15311" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15311"></td>
        <td id="LC15311" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">attention. It was not merely desirable to avoid overloading the coach,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15312" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15312"></td>
        <td id="LC15312" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">but it was of the highest importance that the time occupied in examining</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15313" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15313"></td>
        <td id="LC15313" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">it and its passengers, should be reduced to the utmost; since their</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15314" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15314"></td>
        <td id="LC15314" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">escape might depend on the saving of only a few seconds here and there.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15315" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15315"></td>
        <td id="LC15315" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Finally, he had proposed, after anxious consideration, that Miss Pross</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15316" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15316"></td>
        <td id="LC15316" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and Jerry, who were at liberty to leave the city, should leave it at</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15317" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15317"></td>
        <td id="LC15317" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">three o&#39;clock in the lightest-wheeled conveyance known to that period.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15318" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15318"></td>
        <td id="LC15318" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Unencumbered with luggage, they would soon overtake the coach, and,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15319" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15319"></td>
        <td id="LC15319" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">passing it and preceding it on the road, would order its horses in</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15320" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15320"></td>
        <td id="LC15320" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">advance, and greatly facilitate its progress during the precious hours</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15321" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15321"></td>
        <td id="LC15321" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">of the night, when delay was the most to be dreaded.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15322" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15322"></td>
        <td id="LC15322" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15323" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15323"></td>
        <td id="LC15323" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Seeing in this arrangement the hope of rendering real service in that</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15324" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15324"></td>
        <td id="LC15324" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">pressing emergency, Miss Pross hailed it with joy. She and Jerry had</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15325" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15325"></td>
        <td id="LC15325" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">beheld the coach start, had known who it was that Solomon brought, had</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15326" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15326"></td>
        <td id="LC15326" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">passed some ten minutes in tortures of suspense, and were now concluding</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15327" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15327"></td>
        <td id="LC15327" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">their arrangements to follow the coach, even as Madame Defarge,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15328" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15328"></td>
        <td id="LC15328" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">taking her way through the streets, now drew nearer and nearer to the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15329" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15329"></td>
        <td id="LC15329" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">else-deserted lodging in which they held their consultation.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15330" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15330"></td>
        <td id="LC15330" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15331" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15331"></td>
        <td id="LC15331" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Now what do you think, Mr. Cruncher,” said Miss Pross, whose agitation</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15332" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15332"></td>
        <td id="LC15332" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">was so great that she could hardly speak, or stand, or move, or live:</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
