      <tr>
        <td id="L15425" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15425"></td>
        <td id="LC15425" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Heaven knows we don&#39;t,” returned Miss Pross, “but have no fear for me.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15426" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15426"></td>
        <td id="LC15426" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Take me in at the cathedral, at Three o&#39;Clock, or as near it as you can,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15427" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15427"></td>
        <td id="LC15427" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and I am sure it will be better than our going from here. I feel certain</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15428" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15428"></td>
        <td id="LC15428" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">of it. There! Bless you, Mr. Cruncher! Think-not of me, but of the lives</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15429" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15429"></td>
        <td id="LC15429" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">that may depend on both of us!”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15430" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15430"></td>
        <td id="LC15430" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15431" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15431"></td>
        <td id="LC15431" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">This exordium, and Miss Pross&#39;s two hands in quite agonised entreaty</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15432" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15432"></td>
        <td id="LC15432" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">clasping his, decided Mr. Cruncher. With an encouraging nod or two, he</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15433" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15433"></td>
        <td id="LC15433" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">immediately went out to alter the arrangements, and left her by herself</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15434" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15434"></td>
        <td id="LC15434" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">to follow as she had proposed.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15435" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15435"></td>
        <td id="LC15435" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15436" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15436"></td>
        <td id="LC15436" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">The having originated a precaution which was already in course of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15437" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15437"></td>
        <td id="LC15437" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">execution, was a great relief to Miss Pross. The necessity of composing</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15438" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15438"></td>
        <td id="LC15438" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">her appearance so that it should attract no special notice in the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15439" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15439"></td>
        <td id="LC15439" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">streets, was another relief. She looked at her watch, and it was twenty</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15440" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15440"></td>
        <td id="LC15440" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">minutes past two. She had no time to lose, but must get ready at once.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15441" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15441"></td>
        <td id="LC15441" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15442" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15442"></td>
        <td id="LC15442" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Afraid, in her extreme perturbation, of the loneliness of the deserted</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15443" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15443"></td>
        <td id="LC15443" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">rooms, and of half-imagined faces peeping from behind every open door</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15444" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15444"></td>
        <td id="LC15444" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">in them, Miss Pross got a basin of cold water and began laving her eyes,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15445" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15445"></td>
        <td id="LC15445" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">which were swollen and red. Haunted by her feverish apprehensions, she</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15446" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15446"></td>
        <td id="LC15446" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">could not bear to have her sight obscured for a minute at a time by the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15447" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15447"></td>
        <td id="LC15447" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">dripping water, but constantly paused and looked round to see that there</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15448" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15448"></td>
        <td id="LC15448" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">was no one watching her. In one of those pauses she recoiled and cried</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15449" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15449"></td>
        <td id="LC15449" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">out, for she saw a figure standing in the room.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15450" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15450"></td>
        <td id="LC15450" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15451" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15451"></td>
        <td id="LC15451" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">The basin fell to the ground broken, and the water flowed to the feet of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15452" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15452"></td>
        <td id="LC15452" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Madame Defarge. By strange stern ways, and through much staining blood,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15453" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15453"></td>
        <td id="LC15453" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">those feet had come to meet that water.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15454" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15454"></td>
        <td id="LC15454" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15455" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15455"></td>
        <td id="LC15455" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Madame Defarge looked coldly at her, and said, “The wife of Evremonde;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15456" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15456"></td>
        <td id="LC15456" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">where is she?”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15457" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15457"></td>
        <td id="LC15457" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15458" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15458"></td>
        <td id="LC15458" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">It flashed upon Miss Pross&#39;s mind that the doors were all standing open,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15459" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15459"></td>
        <td id="LC15459" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and would suggest the flight. Her first act was to shut them. There were</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15460" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15460"></td>
        <td id="LC15460" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">four in the room, and she shut them all. She then placed herself before</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15461" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15461"></td>
        <td id="LC15461" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the door of the chamber which Lucie had occupied.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15462" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15462"></td>
        <td id="LC15462" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15463" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15463"></td>
        <td id="LC15463" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Madame Defarge&#39;s dark eyes followed her through this rapid movement,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15464" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15464"></td>
        <td id="LC15464" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and rested on her when it was finished. Miss Pross had nothing beautiful</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15465" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15465"></td>
        <td id="LC15465" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">about her; years had not tamed the wildness, or softened the grimness,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15466" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15466"></td>
        <td id="LC15466" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">of her appearance; but, she too was a determined woman in her different</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15467" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15467"></td>
        <td id="LC15467" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">way, and she measured Madame Defarge with her eyes, every inch.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15468" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15468"></td>
        <td id="LC15468" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15469" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15469"></td>
        <td id="LC15469" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“You might, from your appearance, be the wife of Lucifer,” said Miss</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15470" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15470"></td>
        <td id="LC15470" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Pross, in her breathing. “Nevertheless, you shall not get the better of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15471" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15471"></td>
        <td id="LC15471" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">me. I am an Englishwoman.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15472" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15472"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15473" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15473"></td>
        <td id="LC15473" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Madame Defarge looked at her scornfully, but still with something of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15474" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15474"></td>
        <td id="LC15474" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Miss Pross&#39;s own perception that they two were at bay. She saw a tight,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15475" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15475"></td>
        <td id="LC15475" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">hard, wiry woman before her, as Mr. Lorry had seen in the same figure a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15476" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15476"></td>
        <td id="LC15476" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">woman with a strong hand, in the years gone by. She knew full well that</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15477" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15477"></td>
        <td id="LC15477" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Miss Pross was the family&#39;s devoted friend; Miss Pross knew full well</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15478" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15478"></td>
        <td id="LC15478" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">that Madame Defarge was the family&#39;s malevolent enemy.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15479" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15479"></td>
        <td id="LC15479" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15480" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15480"></td>
        <td id="LC15480" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“On my way yonder,” said Madame Defarge, with a slight movement of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15481" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15481"></td>
        <td id="LC15481" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">her hand towards the fatal spot, “where they reserve my chair and my</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15482" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15482"></td>
        <td id="LC15482" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">knitting for me, I am come to make my compliments to her in passing. I</td>

        <td id="L15483" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15483"></td>
        <td id="LC15483" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">wish to see her.”</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L15484" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15484"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15485" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15485"></td>
        <td id="LC15485" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“I know that your intentions are evil,” said Miss Pross, “and you may</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15486" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15486"></td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L15487" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15487"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15488" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15488"></td>
        <td id="LC15488" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Each spoke in her own language; neither understood the other&#39;s words;</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L15489" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15489"></td>
        <td id="LC15489" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">both were very watchful, and intent to deduce from look and manner, what</td>

      <tr>

        <td id="LC15490" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the unintelligible words meant.</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L15491" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15491"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15492" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15492"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>

        <td id="LC15493" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">moment,” said Madame Defarge. “Good patriots will know what that means.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15494" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15494"></td>
        <td id="LC15494" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Let me see her. Go tell her that I wish to see her. Do you hear?”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15495" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15495"></td>
        <td id="LC15495" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15496" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15496"></td>
        <td id="LC15496" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“If those eyes of yours were bed-winches,” returned Miss Pross, “and I</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15497" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15497"></td>
        <td id="LC15497" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">was an English four-poster, they shouldn&#39;t loose a splinter of me. No,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15498" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15498"></td>
        <td id="LC15498" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">you wicked foreign woman; I am your match.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15499" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15499"></td>
        <td id="LC15499" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15500" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15500"></td>
        <td id="LC15500" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Madame Defarge was not likely to follow these idiomatic remarks in</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15501" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15501"></td>
        <td id="LC15501" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">detail; but, she so far understood them as to perceive that she was set</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15502" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15502"></td>
        <td id="LC15502" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">at naught.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15503" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15503"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15504" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15504"></td>
        <td id="LC15504" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Woman imbecile and pig-like!” said Madame Defarge, frowning. “I take no</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15505" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15505"></td>
        <td id="LC15505" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">answer from you. I demand to see her. Either tell her that I demand</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L15506" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15506"></td>
        <td id="LC15506" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">to see her, or stand out of the way of the door and let me go to her!”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15507" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15507"></td>
        <td id="LC15507" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"> This, with an angry explanatory wave of her right arm.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15508" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15508"></td>
        <td id="LC15508" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15509" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15509"></td>
        <td id="LC15509" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“I little thought,” said Miss Pross, “that I should ever want to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15510" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15510"></td>
        <td id="LC15510" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">understand your nonsensical language; but I would give all I have,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15511" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15511"></td>
        <td id="LC15511" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">except the clothes I wear, to know whether you suspect the truth, or any</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15512" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15512"></td>
        <td id="LC15512" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">part of it.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15513" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15513"></td>
        <td id="LC15513" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15514" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15514"></td>
        <td id="LC15514" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Neither of them for a single moment released the other&#39;s eyes. Madame</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15515" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15515"></td>
        <td id="LC15515" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Defarge had not moved from the spot where she stood when Miss Pross</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15516" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15516"></td>
        <td id="LC15516" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">first became aware of her; but, she now advanced one step.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15517" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15517"></td>
        <td id="LC15517" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15518" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15518"></td>
        <td id="LC15518" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“I am a Briton,” said Miss Pross, “I am desperate. I don&#39;t care an</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15519" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15519"></td>
        <td id="LC15519" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">English Twopence for myself. I know that the longer I keep you here, the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15520" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15520"></td>
        <td id="LC15520" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">greater hope there is for my Ladybird. I&#39;ll not leave a handful of that</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15521" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15521"></td>
        <td id="LC15521" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">dark hair upon your head, if you lay a finger on me!”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15522" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15522"></td>
        <td id="LC15522" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15523" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15523"></td>
        <td id="LC15523" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Thus Miss Pross, with a shake of her head and a flash of her eyes</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15524" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15524"></td>
        <td id="LC15524" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">between every rapid sentence, and every rapid sentence a whole breath.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15525" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15525"></td>
        <td id="LC15525" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Thus Miss Pross, who had never struck a blow in her life.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15526" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15526"></td>
        <td id="LC15526" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15527" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15527"></td>
        <td id="LC15527" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">But, her courage was of that emotional nature that it brought the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15528" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15528"></td>
        <td id="LC15528" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">irrepressible tears into her eyes. This was a courage that Madame</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15529" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15529"></td>
        <td id="LC15529" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Defarge so little comprehended as to mistake for weakness. “Ha, ha!” she</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15530" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15530"></td>
        <td id="LC15530" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">laughed, “you poor wretch! What are you worth! I address myself to that</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15531" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15531"></td>
        <td id="LC15531" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Doctor.” Then she raised her voice and called out, “Citizen Doctor! Wife</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15532" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15532"></td>
        <td id="LC15532" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">of Evremonde! Child of Evremonde! Any person but this miserable fool,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15533" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15533"></td>
        <td id="LC15533" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">answer the Citizeness Defarge!”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15534" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15534"></td>
        <td id="LC15534" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15535" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15535"></td>
        <td id="LC15535" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Perhaps the following silence, perhaps some latent disclosure in the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15536" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15536"></td>
        <td id="LC15536" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">expression of Miss Pross&#39;s face, perhaps a sudden misgiving apart from</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15537" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15537"></td>
        <td id="LC15537" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">either suggestion, whispered to Madame Defarge that they were gone.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15538" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15538"></td>
        <td id="LC15538" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Three of the doors she opened swiftly, and looked in.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15539" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15539"></td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L15540" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15540"></td>
        <td id="LC15540" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Those rooms are all in disorder, there has been hurried packing, there</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="LC15542" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">you! Let me look.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15543" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15543"></td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L15544" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15544"></td>
        <td id="LC15544" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Never!” said Miss Pross, who understood the request as perfectly as</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15545" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15545"></td>
        <td id="LC15545" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Madame Defarge understood the answer.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15546" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15546"></td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L15547" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15547"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15548" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15548"></td>
        <td id="LC15548" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">brought back,” said Madame Defarge to herself.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15549" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15549"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15550" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15550"></td>
        <td id="LC15550" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“As long as you don&#39;t know whether they are in that room or not, you are</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15551" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15551"></td>
        <td id="LC15551" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">uncertain what to do,” said Miss Pross to herself; “and you shall not</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15552" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15552"></td>
        <td id="LC15552" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">know that, if I can prevent your knowing it; and know that, or not know</td>

        <td id="LC15553" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">that, you shall not leave here while I can hold you.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15554" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15554"></td>
        <td id="LC15554" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15555" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15555"></td>
        <td id="LC15555" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“I have been in the streets from the first, nothing has stopped me,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15556" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15556"></td>
        <td id="LC15556" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">I will tear you to pieces, but I will have you from that door,” said</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15557" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15557"></td>
        <td id="LC15557" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Madame Defarge.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15558" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15558"></td>
        <td id="LC15558" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15559" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15559"></td>
        <td id="LC15559" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“We are alone at the top of a high house in a solitary courtyard, we are</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15560" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15560"></td>
        <td id="LC15560" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">not likely to be heard, and I pray for bodily strength to keep you here,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15561" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15561"></td>
        <td id="LC15561" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">while every minute you are here is worth a hundred thousand guineas to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15562" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15562"></td>
        <td id="LC15562" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">my darling,” said Miss Pross.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15563" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15563"></td>
        <td id="LC15563" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15564" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15564"></td>
        <td id="LC15564" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Madame Defarge made at the door. Miss Pross, on the instinct of the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15565" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15565"></td>
        <td id="LC15565" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">moment, seized her round the waist in both her arms, and held her tight.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15566" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15566"></td>
        <td id="LC15566" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">It was in vain for Madame Defarge to struggle and to strike; Miss Pross,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15567" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15567"></td>
        <td id="LC15567" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">with the vigorous tenacity of love, always so much stronger than hate,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15568" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15568"></td>
        <td id="LC15568" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">clasped her tight, and even lifted her from the floor in the struggle</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15569" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15569"></td>
        <td id="LC15569" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">that they had. The two hands of Madame Defarge buffeted and tore her</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15570" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15570"></td>
        <td id="LC15570" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">face; but, Miss Pross, with her head down, held her round the waist, and</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L15571" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15571"></td>
        <td id="LC15571" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">clung to her with more than the hold of a drowning woman.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15572" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15572"></td>
        <td id="LC15572" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15573" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15573"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15574" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15574"></td>
        <td id="LC15574" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">waist. “It is under my arm,” said Miss Pross, in smothered tones, “you</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15575" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15575"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15576" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15576"></td>
        <td id="LC15576" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">you till one or other of us faints or dies!”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15577" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15577"></td>
        <td id="LC15577" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15578" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15578"></td>
        <td id="LC15578" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Madame Defarge&#39;s hands were at her bosom. Miss Pross looked up, saw</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15579" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15579"></td>
        <td id="LC15579" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">what it was, struck at it, struck out a flash and a crash, and stood</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15580" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15580"></td>
        <td id="LC15580" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">alone--blinded with smoke.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15581" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15581"></td>
        <td id="LC15581" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15582" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15582"></td>
        <td id="LC15582" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">All this was in a second. As the smoke cleared, leaving an awful</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15583" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15583"></td>
        <td id="LC15583" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">stillness, it passed out on the air, like the soul of the furious woman</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15584" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15584"></td>
        <td id="LC15584" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">whose body lay lifeless on the ground.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15585" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15585"></td>
        <td id="LC15585" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15586" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15586"></td>
        <td id="LC15586" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">In the first fright and horror of her situation, Miss Pross passed the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15587" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15587"></td>
        <td id="LC15587" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">body as far from it as she could, and ran down the stairs to call for</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15588" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15588"></td>
        <td id="LC15588" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">fruitless help. Happily, she bethought herself of the consequences of</td>

        <td id="LC15589" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">what she did, in time to check herself and go back. It was dreadful to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15590" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15590"></td>
        <td id="LC15590" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">go in at the door again; but, she did go in, and even went near it, to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15591" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15591"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15592" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15592"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15594" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15594"></td>
        <td id="LC15594" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and to cry, and then got up and hurried away.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15595" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15595"></td>
        <td id="LC15595" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15596" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15596"></td>
        <td id="LC15596" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">By good fortune she had a veil on her bonnet, or she could hardly have</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15597" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15597"></td>
        <td id="LC15597" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">gone along the streets without being stopped. By good fortune, too, she</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15598" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15598"></td>
        <td id="LC15598" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">was naturally so peculiar in appearance as not to show disfigurement</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15599" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15599"></td>
        <td id="LC15599" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">like any other woman. She needed both advantages, for the marks of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15600" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15600"></td>
        <td id="LC15600" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">gripping fingers were deep in her face, and her hair was torn, and her</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15601" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15601"></td>
        <td id="LC15601" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">dress (hastily composed with unsteady hands) was clutched and dragged a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15602" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15602"></td>
        <td id="LC15602" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">hundred ways.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15603" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15603"></td>
        <td id="LC15603" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15604" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15604"></td>
        <td id="LC15604" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">In crossing the bridge, she dropped the door key in the river. Arriving</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15605" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15605"></td>
        <td id="LC15605" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">at the cathedral some few minutes before her escort, and waiting there,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15606" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15606"></td>
        <td id="LC15606" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">she thought, what if the key were already taken in a net, what if</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15607" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15607"></td>
        <td id="LC15607" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">it were identified, what if the door were opened and the remains</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15608" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15608"></td>
        <td id="LC15608" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">discovered, what if she were stopped at the gate, sent to prison, and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15609" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15609"></td>
        <td id="LC15609" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">charged with murder! In the midst of these fluttering thoughts, the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15610" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15610"></td>
        <td id="LC15610" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">escort appeared, took her in, and took her away.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15611" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15611"></td>
        <td id="LC15611" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15612" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15612"></td>
        <td id="LC15612" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Is there any noise in the streets?” she asked him.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15613" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15613"></td>
        <td id="LC15613" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15614" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15614"></td>
        <td id="LC15614" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“The usual noises,” Mr. Cruncher replied; and looked surprised by the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15615" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15615"></td>
        <td id="LC15615" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">question and by her aspect.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15616" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15616"></td>
        <td id="LC15616" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15617" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15617"></td>
        <td id="LC15617" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“I don&#39;t hear you,” said Miss Pross. “What do you say?”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15618" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15618"></td>
        <td id="LC15618" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15619" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15619"></td>
        <td id="LC15619" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">It was in vain for Mr. Cruncher to repeat what he said; Miss Pross could</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15620" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15620"></td>
        <td id="LC15620" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">not hear him. “So I&#39;ll nod my head,” thought Mr. Cruncher, amazed, “at</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15621" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15621"></td>
        <td id="LC15621" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">all events she&#39;ll see that.” And she did.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15622" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15622"></td>
        <td id="LC15622" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15623" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15623"></td>
        <td id="LC15623" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Is there any noise in the streets now?” asked Miss Pross again,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15624" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15624"></td>
        <td id="LC15624" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">presently.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15625" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15625"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15626" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15626"></td>
        <td id="LC15626" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Again Mr. Cruncher nodded his head.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15627" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15627"></td>

        <td id="L15628" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15628"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15629" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15629"></td>
        <td id="LC15629" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15630" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15630"></td>
        <td id="LC15630" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Gone deaf in an hour?” said Mr. Cruncher, ruminating, with his mind</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15631" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15631"></td>
        <td id="LC15631" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">much disturbed; “wot&#39;s come to her?”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15632" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15632"></td>
        <td id="LC15632" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15633" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15633"></td>
        <td id="LC15633" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“I feel,” said Miss Pross, “as if there had been a flash and a crash,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15634" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15634"></td>
        <td id="LC15634" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and that crash was the last thing I should ever hear in this life.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15635" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15635"></td>
        <td id="LC15635" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15636" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15636"></td>
        <td id="LC15636" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Blest if she ain&#39;t in a queer condition!” said Mr. Cruncher, more and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15637" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15637"></td>
        <td id="LC15637" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">more disturbed. “Wot can she have been a takin&#39;, to keep her courage up?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15638" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15638"></td>
        <td id="LC15638" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Hark! There&#39;s the roll of them dreadful carts! You can hear that, miss?”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15639" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15639"></td>
        <td id="LC15639" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15640" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15640"></td>
        <td id="LC15640" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“I can hear,” said Miss Pross, seeing that he spoke to her, “nothing. O,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15641" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15641"></td>
        <td id="LC15641" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">my good man, there was first a great crash, and then a great stillness,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15642" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15642"></td>
        <td id="LC15642" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and that stillness seems to be fixed and unchangeable, never to be</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15643" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15643"></td>
        <td id="LC15643" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">broken any more as long as my life lasts.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15644" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15644"></td>
        <td id="LC15644" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15645" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15645"></td>
        <td id="LC15645" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“If she don&#39;t hear the roll of those dreadful carts, now very nigh their</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15646" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15646"></td>
        <td id="LC15646" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">journey&#39;s end,” said Mr. Cruncher, glancing over his shoulder, “it&#39;s my</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15647" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15647"></td>
        <td id="LC15647" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">opinion that indeed she never will hear anything else in this world.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15648" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15648"></td>
        <td id="LC15648" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15649" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15649"></td>
        <td id="LC15649" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">And indeed she never did.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15650" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15650"></td>
        <td id="LC15650" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15651" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15651"></td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L15652" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15652"></td>
