      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15653" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15653"></td>
        <td id="LC15653" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15654" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15654"></td>
        <td id="LC15654" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">XV. The Footsteps Die Out For Ever</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15655" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15655"></td>
        <td id="LC15655" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15656" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15656"></td>
        <td id="LC15656" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15657" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15657"></td>
        <td id="LC15657" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Along the Paris streets, the death-carts rumble, hollow and harsh. Six</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15658" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15658"></td>
        <td id="LC15658" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">tumbrils carry the day&#39;s wine to La Guillotine. All the devouring and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15659" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15659"></td>
        <td id="LC15659" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">insatiate Monsters imagined since imagination could record itself,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15660" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15660"></td>
        <td id="LC15660" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">are fused in the one realisation, Guillotine. And yet there is not in</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15661" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15661"></td>
        <td id="LC15661" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">France, with its rich variety of soil and climate, a blade, a leaf,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15662" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15662"></td>
        <td id="LC15662" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">a root, a sprig, a peppercorn, which will grow to maturity under</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15663" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15663"></td>
        <td id="LC15663" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">conditions more certain than those that have produced this horror. Crush</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15664" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15664"></td>
        <td id="LC15664" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">humanity out of shape once more, under similar hammers, and it will</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15665" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15665"></td>
        <td id="LC15665" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">twist itself into the same tortured forms. Sow the same seed of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15666" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15666"></td>
        <td id="LC15666" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">rapacious license and oppression over again, and it will surely yield</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15667" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15667"></td>
        <td id="LC15667" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the same fruit according to its kind.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15668" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15668"></td>
        <td id="LC15668" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15669" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15669"></td>
        <td id="LC15669" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Six tumbrils roll along the streets. Change these back again to what</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15670" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15670"></td>
        <td id="LC15670" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">they were, thou powerful enchanter, Time, and they shall be seen to be</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15671" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15671"></td>
        <td id="LC15671" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the carriages of absolute monarchs, the equipages of feudal nobles, the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15672" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15672"></td>
        <td id="LC15672" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">toilettes of flaring Jezebels, the churches that are not my father&#39;s</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15673" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15673"></td>
        <td id="LC15673" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">house but dens of thieves, the huts of millions of starving peasants!</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15674" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15674"></td>
        <td id="LC15674" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">No; the great magician who majestically works out the appointed order</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15675" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15675"></td>
        <td id="LC15675" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">of the Creator, never reverses his transformations. “If thou be changed</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15676" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15676"></td>
        <td id="LC15676" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">into this shape by the will of God,” say the seers to the enchanted, in</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15677" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15677"></td>
        <td id="LC15677" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the wise Arabian stories, “then remain so! But, if thou wear this</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15678" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15678"></td>
        <td id="LC15678" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">form through mere passing conjuration, then resume thy former aspect!”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15679" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15679"></td>
        <td id="LC15679" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"> Changeless and hopeless, the tumbrils roll along.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15680" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15680"></td>
        <td id="LC15680" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15681" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15681"></td>
        <td id="LC15681" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">As the sombre wheels of the six carts go round, they seem to plough up</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15682" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15682"></td>
        <td id="LC15682" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">a long crooked furrow among the populace in the streets. Ridges of faces</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15683" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15683"></td>
        <td id="LC15683" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">are thrown to this side and to that, and the ploughs go steadily onward.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15684" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15684"></td>
        <td id="LC15684" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">So used are the regular inhabitants of the houses to the spectacle, that</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15685" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15685"></td>
        <td id="LC15685" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">in many windows there are no people, and in some the occupation of the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15686" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15686"></td>
        <td id="LC15686" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">hands is not so much as suspended, while the eyes survey the faces in</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15687" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15687"></td>
        <td id="LC15687" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the tumbrils. Here and there, the inmate has visitors to see the sight;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15688" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15688"></td>
        <td id="LC15688" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">then he points his finger, with something of the complacency of a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15689" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15689"></td>
        <td id="LC15689" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">curator or authorised exponent, to this cart and to this, and seems to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15690" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15690"></td>
        <td id="LC15690" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">tell who sat here yesterday, and who there the day before.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15691" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15691"></td>
        <td id="LC15691" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15692" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15692"></td>
        <td id="LC15692" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Of the riders in the tumbrils, some observe these things, and all</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15693" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15693"></td>
        <td id="LC15693" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">things on their last roadside, with an impassive stare; others, with</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15694" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15694"></td>
        <td id="LC15694" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">a lingering interest in the ways of life and men. Some, seated with</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15695" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15695"></td>
        <td id="LC15695" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">drooping heads, are sunk in silent despair; again, there are some so</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15696" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15696"></td>
        <td id="LC15696" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">heedful of their looks that they cast upon the multitude such glances as</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15697" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15697"></td>
        <td id="LC15697" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">they have seen in theatres, and in pictures. Several close their eyes,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15698" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15698"></td>
        <td id="LC15698" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and think, or try to get their straying thoughts together. Only one, and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15699" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15699"></td>
        <td id="LC15699" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">he a miserable creature, of a crazed aspect, is so shattered and made</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15700" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15700"></td>
        <td id="LC15700" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">drunk by horror, that he sings, and tries to dance. Not one of the whole</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15701" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15701"></td>
        <td id="LC15701" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">number appeals by look or gesture, to the pity of the people.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15702" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15702"></td>
        <td id="LC15702" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15703" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15703"></td>
        <td id="LC15703" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">There is a guard of sundry horsemen riding abreast of the tumbrils,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15704" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15704"></td>
        <td id="LC15704" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and faces are often turned up to some of them, and they are asked some</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15705" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15705"></td>
        <td id="LC15705" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">question. It would seem to be always the same question, for, it is</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15706" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15706"></td>
        <td id="LC15706" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">always followed by a press of people towards the third cart. The</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15707" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15707"></td>
        <td id="LC15707" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">horsemen abreast of that cart, frequently point out one man in it with</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15708" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15708"></td>
        <td id="LC15708" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">their swords. The leading curiosity is, to know which is he; he stands</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15709" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15709"></td>
        <td id="LC15709" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">at the back of the tumbril with his head bent down, to converse with a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15710" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15710"></td>
        <td id="LC15710" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">mere girl who sits on the side of the cart, and holds his hand. He has</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15711" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15711"></td>
        <td id="LC15711" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">no curiosity or care for the scene about him, and always speaks to the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15712" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15712"></td>
        <td id="LC15712" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">girl. Here and there in the long street of St. Honore, cries are raised</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15713" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15713"></td>
        <td id="LC15713" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">against him. If they move him at all, it is only to a quiet smile, as he</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15714" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15714"></td>
        <td id="LC15714" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">shakes his hair a little more loosely about his face. He cannot easily</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15715" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15715"></td>
        <td id="LC15715" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">touch his face, his arms being bound.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15716" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15716"></td>
        <td id="LC15716" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15717" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15717"></td>
        <td id="LC15717" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">On the steps of a church, awaiting the coming-up of the tumbrils, stands</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15718" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15718"></td>
        <td id="LC15718" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the Spy and prison-sheep. He looks into the first of them: not there.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15719" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15719"></td>
        <td id="LC15719" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">He looks into the second: not there. He already asks himself, “Has he</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15720" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15720"></td>
        <td id="LC15720" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">sacrificed me?” when his face clears, as he looks into the third.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15721" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15721"></td>
        <td id="LC15721" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15722" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15722"></td>
        <td id="LC15722" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Which is Evremonde?” says a man behind him.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15723" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15723"></td>
        <td id="LC15723" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15724" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15724"></td>
        <td id="LC15724" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“That. At the back there.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15725" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15725"></td>
        <td id="LC15725" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15726" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15726"></td>
        <td id="LC15726" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“With his hand in the girl&#39;s?”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15727" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15727"></td>
        <td id="LC15727" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15728" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15728"></td>
        <td id="LC15728" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Yes.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15729" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15729"></td>
        <td id="LC15729" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15730" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15730"></td>
        <td id="LC15730" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">The man cries, “Down, Evremonde! To the Guillotine all aristocrats!</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15731" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15731"></td>
        <td id="LC15731" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Down, Evremonde!”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15732" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15732"></td>
        <td id="LC15732" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15733" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15733"></td>
        <td id="LC15733" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Hush, hush!” the Spy entreats him, timidly.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15734" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15734"></td>
        <td id="LC15734" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15735" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15735"></td>
        <td id="LC15735" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“And why not, citizen?”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15736" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15736"></td>
        <td id="LC15736" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15737" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15737"></td>
        <td id="LC15737" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“He is going to pay the forfeit: it will be paid in five minutes more.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15738" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15738"></td>
        <td id="LC15738" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Let him be at peace.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15739" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15739"></td>
        <td id="LC15739" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15740" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15740"></td>
        <td id="LC15740" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">But the man continuing to exclaim, “Down, Evremonde!” the face of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15741" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15741"></td>
        <td id="LC15741" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Evremonde is for a moment turned towards him. Evremonde then sees the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15742" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15742"></td>
        <td id="LC15742" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Spy, and looks attentively at him, and goes his way.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15743" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15743"></td>
        <td id="LC15743" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15744" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15744"></td>
        <td id="LC15744" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">The clocks are on the stroke of three, and the furrow ploughed among the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15745" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15745"></td>
        <td id="LC15745" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">populace is turning round, to come on into the place of execution, and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15746" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15746"></td>
        <td id="LC15746" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">end. The ridges thrown to this side and to that, now crumble in and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15747" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15747"></td>
        <td id="LC15747" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">close behind the last plough as it passes on, for all are following</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15748" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15748"></td>
        <td id="LC15748" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">to the Guillotine. In front of it, seated in chairs, as in a garden of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15749" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15749"></td>
        <td id="LC15749" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">public diversion, are a number of women, busily knitting. On one of the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15750" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15750"></td>
        <td id="LC15750" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">fore-most chairs, stands The Vengeance, looking about for her friend.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15751" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15751"></td>
        <td id="LC15751" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15752" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15752"></td>
        <td id="LC15752" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Therese!” she cries, in her shrill tones. “Who has seen her? Therese</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15753" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15753"></td>
        <td id="LC15753" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Defarge!”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15754" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15754"></td>
        <td id="LC15754" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15755" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15755"></td>
        <td id="LC15755" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“She never missed before,” says a knitting-woman of the sisterhood.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15756" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15756"></td>
        <td id="LC15756" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15757" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15757"></td>
        <td id="LC15757" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“No; nor will she miss now,” cries The Vengeance, petulantly. “Therese.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15758" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15758"></td>
        <td id="LC15758" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15759" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15759"></td>
        <td id="LC15759" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Louder,” the woman recommends.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15760" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15760"></td>
        <td id="LC15760" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15761" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15761"></td>
        <td id="LC15761" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Ay! Louder, Vengeance, much louder, and still she will scarcely hear</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15762" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15762"></td>
        <td id="LC15762" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">thee. Louder yet, Vengeance, with a little oath or so added, and yet</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15763" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15763"></td>
        <td id="LC15763" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">it will hardly bring her. Send other women up and down to seek her,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15764" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15764"></td>
        <td id="LC15764" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">lingering somewhere; and yet, although the messengers have done dread</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15765" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15765"></td>
        <td id="LC15765" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">deeds, it is questionable whether of their own wills they will go far</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15766" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15766"></td>
        <td id="LC15766" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">enough to find her!</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15767" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15767"></td>
        <td id="LC15767" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15768" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15768"></td>
        <td id="LC15768" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Bad Fortune!” cries The Vengeance, stamping her foot in the chair, “and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15769" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15769"></td>
        <td id="LC15769" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">here are the tumbrils! And Evremonde will be despatched in a wink, and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15770" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15770"></td>
        <td id="LC15770" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">she not here! See her knitting in my hand, and her empty chair ready for</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15771" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15771"></td>
        <td id="LC15771" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">her. I cry with vexation and disappointment!”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15772" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15772"></td>
        <td id="LC15772" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15773" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15773"></td>
        <td id="LC15773" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">As The Vengeance descends from her elevation to do it, the tumbrils</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15774" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15774"></td>
        <td id="LC15774" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">begin to discharge their loads. The ministers of Sainte Guillotine are</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15775" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15775"></td>
        <td id="LC15775" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">robed and ready. Crash!--A head is held up, and the knitting-women who</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15776" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15776"></td>
        <td id="LC15776" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">scarcely lifted their eyes to look at it a moment ago when it could</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15777" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15777"></td>
        <td id="LC15777" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">think and speak, count One.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15778" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15778"></td>
        <td id="LC15778" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15779" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15779"></td>
        <td id="LC15779" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">The second tumbril empties and moves on; the third comes up. Crash!--And</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15780" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15780"></td>
        <td id="LC15780" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the knitting-women, never faltering or pausing in their Work, count Two.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15781" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15781"></td>
        <td id="LC15781" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15782" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15782"></td>
        <td id="LC15782" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">The supposed Evremonde descends, and the seamstress is lifted out next</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15783" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15783"></td>
        <td id="LC15783" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">after him. He has not relinquished her patient hand in getting out, but</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15784" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15784"></td>
        <td id="LC15784" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">still holds it as he promised. He gently places her with her back to the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15785" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15785"></td>
        <td id="LC15785" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">crashing engine that constantly whirrs up and falls, and she looks into</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15786" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15786"></td>
        <td id="LC15786" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">his face and thanks him.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15787" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15787"></td>
        <td id="LC15787" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15788" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15788"></td>
        <td id="LC15788" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“But for you, dear stranger, I should not be so composed, for I am</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15789" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15789"></td>
        <td id="LC15789" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">naturally a poor little thing, faint of heart; nor should I have been</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15790" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15790"></td>
        <td id="LC15790" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">able to raise my thoughts to Him who was put to death, that we might</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15791" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15791"></td>
        <td id="LC15791" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">have hope and comfort here to-day. I think you were sent to me by</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15792" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15792"></td>
        <td id="LC15792" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Heaven.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15793" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15793"></td>
        <td id="LC15793" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15794" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15794"></td>
        <td id="LC15794" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Or you to me,” says Sydney Carton. “Keep your eyes upon me, dear child,</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L15795" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15795"></td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L15797" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15797"></td>

        <td id="L15798" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15798"></td>
        <td id="LC15798" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">it go, if they are rapid.”</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L15799" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15799"></td>
        <td id="LC15799" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>

        <td id="LC15800" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“They will be rapid. Fear not!”</td>

      <tr>

      <tr>
        <td id="L15802" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15802"></td>

      <tr>

      <tr>
        <td id="L15882" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15882"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15883" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15883"></td>
        <td id="LC15883" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“I see that I hold a sanctuary in their hearts, and in the hearts of</td>
      </tr>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15885" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15885"></td>
        <td id="LC15885" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">for me on the anniversary of this day. I see her and her husband, their</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15886" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15886"></td>
        <td id="LC15886" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">course done, lying side by side in their last earthly bed, and I know</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15887" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15887"></td>
        <td id="LC15887" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">that each was not more honoured and held sacred in the other&#39;s soul,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15888" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15888"></td>
        <td id="LC15888" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">than I was in the souls of both.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15889" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15889"></td>
        <td id="LC15889" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15890" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15890"></td>
        <td id="LC15890" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“I see that child who lay upon her bosom and who bore my name, a man</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15891" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15891"></td>
        <td id="LC15891" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">winning his way up in that path of life which once was mine. I see him</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15892" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15892"></td>
        <td id="LC15892" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">winning it so well, that my name is made illustrious there by the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15893" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15893"></td>
        <td id="LC15893" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">light of his. I see the blots I threw upon it, faded away. I see him,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15894" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15894"></td>
        <td id="LC15894" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">fore-most of just judges and honoured men, bringing a boy of my name,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15895" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15895"></td>
        <td id="LC15895" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">with a forehead that I know and golden hair, to this place--then fair to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15896" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15896"></td>
        <td id="LC15896" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">look upon, with not a trace of this day&#39;s disfigurement--and I hear him</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15897" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15897"></td>
        <td id="LC15897" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">tell the child my story, with a tender and a faltering voice.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15898" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15898"></td>
        <td id="LC15898" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15899" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15899"></td>
        <td id="LC15899" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“It is a far, far better thing that I do, than I have ever done; it is a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15900" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15900"></td>
        <td id="LC15900" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">far, far better rest that I go to than I have ever known.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L15901" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="15901"></td>
        <td id="LC15901" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>

        <td id="L16068" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="16068"></td>
        <td id="LC16068" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>

        <td id="L16069" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="16069"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L16070" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="16070"></td>
        <td id="LC16070" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">     the use of Project Gutenberg-tm works calculated using the method</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L16071" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="16071"></td>
        <td id="LC16071" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">     you already use to calculate your applicable taxes.  The fee is</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L16072" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="16072"></td>
        <td id="LC16072" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">     owed to the owner of the Project Gutenberg-tm trademark, but he</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L16165" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="16165"></td>
        <td id="LC16165" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">or cause to occur: (a) distribution of this or any Project Gutenberg-tm</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L16166" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="16166"></td>
        <td id="LC16166" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">work, (b) alteration, modification, or additions or deletions to any</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L16167" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="16167"></td>
        <td id="LC16167" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Project Gutenberg-tm work, and (c) any Defect you cause.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L16168" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="16168"></td>
        <td id="LC16168" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L16169" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="16169"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L16170" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="16170"></td>
        <td id="LC16170" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Section  2.  Information about the Mission of Project Gutenberg-tm</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L16171" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="16171"></td>
        <td id="LC16171" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L16172" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="16172"></td>
        <td id="LC16172" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Project Gutenberg-tm is synonymous with the free distribution of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L16173" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="16173"></td>
        <td id="LC16173" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">electronic works in formats readable by the widest variety of computers</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L16174" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="16174"></td>
        <td id="LC16174" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">including obsolete, old, middle-aged and new computers.  It exists</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L16175" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="16175"></td>
        <td id="LC16175" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">because of the efforts of hundreds of volunteers and donations from</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L16176" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="16176"></td>
        <td id="LC16176" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">people in all walks of life.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L16177" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="16177"></td>
        <td id="LC16177" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L16178" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="16178"></td>
        <td id="LC16178" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Volunteers and financial support to provide volunteers with the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L16179" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="16179"></td>
        <td id="LC16179" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">assistance they need, are critical to reaching Project Gutenberg-tm&#39;s</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L16180" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="16180"></td>
        <td id="LC16180" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">goals and ensuring that the Project Gutenberg-tm collection will</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L16181" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="16181"></td>
        <td id="LC16181" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">remain freely available for generations to come.  In 2001, the Project</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L16182" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="16182"></td>
        <td id="LC16182" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Gutenberg Literary Archive Foundation was created to provide a secure</td>
      </tr>

      </tr>

        <td id="L16227" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="16227"></td>

      </tr>

      </tr>
      <tr>

        <td id="L16235" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="16235"></td>

        <td id="L16250" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="16250"></td>
        <td id="LC16250" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Section 5.  General Information About Project Gutenberg-tm electronic</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L16251" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="16251"></td>
        <td id="LC16251" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">works.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L16252" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="16252"></td>
        <td id="LC16252" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L16253" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="16253"></td>
        <td id="LC16253" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Professor Michael S. Hart is the originator of the Project Gutenberg-tm</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L16254" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="16254"></td>
        <td id="LC16254" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">concept of a library of electronic works that could be freely shared</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L16255" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="16255"></td>
        <td id="LC16255" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">with anyone.  For thirty years, he produced and distributed Project</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L16256" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="16256"></td>
        <td id="LC16256" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Gutenberg-tm eBooks with only a loose network of volunteer support.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L16257" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="16257"></td>
        <td id="LC16257" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L16258" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="16258"></td>
        <td id="LC16258" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"></td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L16259" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="16259"></td>
        <td id="LC16259" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Project Gutenberg-tm eBooks are often created from several printed</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L16260" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="16260"></td>
